"God morning, sir." Someone greets you as you wake up. Sitting up in bed you see a man in some sort of uniform standing at the door to your bedroom. However it doesn't look like your bedroom; it seems too high class to be your bedroom. "I trust sir had a good night." You try to find your bearings since you hadn't been awake for five minutes.

"I think so," You answer eventually, "But I did have a strange dream last night." There's a flash of concern in the man's eyes before he settles down and says.

"Well, sir, I'm sure that Jane would be happy to talk to you about anything that's troubling you. After all, no one dares to refuse her what she wishes for." You're surprised by this. You remember that Jane is your girlfriend and remember various good times with her but she wasn't special to anyone else except her family.

You get up and get dressed, the man keeps offering to dress you but you ask him to relax and let you do it yourself. Considering his behaviour you assume that he's either a butler or a footman; it seems to you that you've entered a parallel universe where Jane's family seems to have become very influencial.

Once you're dressed another man enters wearing the exact same uniform of the first man you met. "Miss Jane wishes to know how you're getting on." He addresses you, you smile and answer.

"I'm ready now. Would she like to see me?" The men seem to almost smirk and the second man answers.

"She's always ready to see you, sir." You smile with satisfaction and follow both of them out of the door. You step out onto a balcony overlooking a vast cave that looks big enough to contain the whole of New York City, London, Kyoto and Hong Kong and still have room to spare. It's mind-blowing! The men show you to what looks like a tradtional Rolls-Royce and drive you down the cave on a balcony the size of a city street but with no other cars in sight. You are stunned by the fact that the whole cave is lit when it's big enough to be a whole country on its own.
1151.title: Going to your Girlfriend

11511.content:
After about thirty minutes of driving at what must've been fifty miles per hour the Rolls stops in a part of the cave that seems like a vast circular temple as big has Cumbria. You can't see much as you're on the wall-side of the Rolls but this separate section of the cave seems to be more well-lit than the rest, which seems like a corridor now.

"Come on out, sweetie." The beautiful voice of your girlfriend is music to your ears, except that it seems to echo even more than the cave should allow. You exit the Rolls and walk round the back of it, and there she is.

If the caves were mind-blowing then Jane was unbelievable. You had to lean on the Rolls as you tried to take her in. It seems that Jane was no longer the dainty girl you were familiar with, she was a massive, titanic anthropomorphic giant coyote! Her stature was such that you were sure that she was bigger than Mt. Everest. She wore a wonderful dress that you were sure someone could make a lifesize map of Greater London on, her fur was surprisingly fine for a being so big and her eyes were resting right upon you. It is obvious why no one would argue with her.
11511.title: Jane the Giant

11513.content:
You wake up somewhat groggy, you look over and a man's face enters you're vision. You jump back and he says "good morning, did you have a pleasent sleep?"

"Um yeah, it was good" you reply. You look around the room and notice you're not in you're house, you're in a bedroom atleast twice you're normal ones size and you're sleeping on a four poster bed.

"Miss Clarisse will be most happy to hear that" he says, "you have a date with her in an hour please get dressed and I will drive you there" he says. You sit back confused, you knew you're girlfriend Clarisse had some influence as she showed up for you're first date in a stretch limo but you don't remember her having this much influence. You get up and grab a plain old shirt and pants out of a closet and get dressed. You head downstairs following the man and find a huge spread laid out on a giant table, you sit down and begin eating. "Sir I must remind you that when you see Ms Clarisse you are to not gawk and be as polite as possible."

"Sure, she's my girlfriend after all" you say. You quickly finish eating a course out of the probable 7 on the table and put a jacket and shoes on, you follow the man who seemed to be some kind of chauffeur/butler outside. You gasp as all you can see is grassland and in the distance a structure so large it made mount everest look like a puny rock, "ok I am definitley not normally where i'm supposed to be" you think. The chauffer doesn't even react as he loads you into the car and starts driving directly toward the structure. As you get closer you start recognizing features on it like windows, and a door, "holy shit it's a giant house" you think to yourself.

"So who lives there the whole state of Nevada?" you ask the driver.

"Sir that's Miss Clarisse's house, the government was very generous once she reached the 6 mile mark and ended not only the Afghan war but also the one in Iraq" the driver says.

"Um....how'd she do that?" you ask.

"Oh the government just told the extremists if they kept it up we'd let her go on them after telling them they hurt you sir" the chauffer says.

"So wait, my girlfriend is 6 miles tall?" you ask him.

"Oh no no sir, that was when she was 15 she's grown another 2 miles in the last 2 years" the driver says putting the car at full speed.

"Great so my girlfriend is 8 miles tall, wow guess parallel universe do exist and i'm in one" you think to yourself. You keep driving and the driver says "we're about half way there sir," you look outside and all you can see is row upon row of carrots. These carrots weren't normal sized though they were huge, most were bigger than limo you were driving in."

"Wow those are some big carrots" you say.

"Yes sir, well the government took some of her DNA and were able to splice it with plants to create the produce you see in front of you, lucky thing too she was almost bankrupting the country on food costs alone" the driver says.

"Hey, why aren't you suprised that i'm asking questions when she's been my girlfriend for 5 years" you ask the guy.

"Oh well that's easily explained sir, you're you from a parallel universe, looks like the scientists did a good job" the driver says.

"Wait, so you mean I was brought here and you know?" you ask.

"Oh yes, you see the you from this universe was taken out by a sniper before we could move him into Clarisse's abode, she doesn't know about it so collectivley the world has been franticly developing inter-dimensional technology to find another you, we thought other universes were less scary then telling Clarisse you were dead." the driver says laughing.

"Oh and what about my family, my friends, my life" you say.

"Sir, sadly that is all behind you, the machine is one way" he says as you feel the car stop. "Do not worry, Ms Clarisse will take very good care of you, besides that I think you'll be in shock from meeting her, I think this universe's you fainted when he first met her. He presses a button on a remote and you hear a buzzer sound and a gate opens and he drives up to a doorstep with a set of steps heading up it. He opens the door and you walk up the steps thinking "well if I can't go back might as well become what they wish of me, I don't want my girlfriend destroying everything." The chauffer presses another button and you hear a doorbell ring although it sounded more like the loudest church bell in existence. The door opens inward and you look up, and up, and up. The driver had neglected to mention one thing that made sense now, you're girlfriend was not only now 8 miles tall but also an anthromorphic bunny.

"Hi Alex, I was wondering when you'd show up" she says in a voice that sounded like that of an angel.

"Hey Clarisse" you reply. She bends down and places a finger on the ground, you walk up and grab onto the fluffy fur, you're quickly lifted up very quickly suprisingly you're not crushed by gs or anything like that even though you guessed you were moving maybe a quarter of the speed of the space shuttle. She lowers her finger to her other palm pad and drops you on before shutting the door. You look as the door shuts and were pretty sure this place could survive getting hit by a good portion of the world's nuclear arms. So should you tell her the truth striaght from the get go or let her believe that you're her "true" BF....
11513.title: Other Girlfriend Story

115130.content:
You awake to find yourself in a room lit purely by a distant skylight, filled with a kaleidoscope of extra-soft cushions and the walls are painted a golden colour with absolutely no corners. The floor is covered with a plush green carpet where there are no cushions and a single unlit lamp hangs from the ceiling. Most bizarrely is how cool it is; last night you went to bed with a dreadful feeling of clamminess under the oppressive heat that had accumulated during the day. Now you feel quite refreshed, especially with those periodic gusts coming in through the skylight. Suddenly the light is blocked off and it's almost impossible to see around you. Looking up you see something completely shocking.

An enormous green eye is peering down at you, now and again it blinks with a mighty rumble allowing you to see its long eyelashes; it's almost as though the owner of this eye's being flirtatious. Next thing you know the whole room goes topsy-turvy as you hear a sound like a spoon striking a teacup, fortunately there are so many cushions you're slightly dazed but uninjured.

"Sorry." A mighty familiar feminine voice giggles. "You're just so cute when you gaze up at me like that." You're gobsmacked. The green eye that was looking down at you was your girlfriend's. You think back to that cheerful face of your sweetheart Anga and those emerald eyes and struggle to come to terms with what's happened. She's now ginormous! Just then you take another tumble as the room goes head-over-heels and you find yourself sliding down the chute that led to the skylight and free-falling right into a massive gray paw. You sit up and dust yourself off as Anga giggles again. "You're such a fussy little thing." She teases. You look up at the titanic beast that was apparently your own girlfriend. A one and a quarter mile tall skunk!
115130.title: My Skyscraper Skunk

1151302.content:
As you wake up, you cover your eyes because of the bright sun. You sit up in bed and look around before you see that your ceiling appears to be some kind of mosaic dome with images of animals dressed as Greek figures all around. "Huh?" you ask. "What's going on? Ari, what's... Ari?" You look around and see no sign of your girlfriend Ari. She was nowhere to be seen. "Ari?" you ask.

As you get out of bed, you wonder. After all, you distinctively remember Ari being in bed with you. But this definitely wasn't the bedroom you remembered. You then notice something on the wall and put on your glasses before you walk up to it. It appeared to be a movie poster. The poster depicted a pear-shaped obese anthropomorphic sheep big enough to make the skyscrapers below her look like ant-hills. The poster read "Sheepzilla". You look and see that there were other posters next to this one and all depicted that same sheep. Upon closer examination, this sheep giant is a woman and appears to be wearing blue lipstick and small glasses that contrast with her silvery wool and black skin. You take a closer look and realize that this sheep has the same face as Ari. "Huh," you say. "Ari did say she was going to be in the movies once she was out of high school. Guess she decided it would be monster movies. It must be uncomfortable to be in that suit all the time.

That's when you hear thunderous giggling and gasp. "Trust me. You get used to it." Says a deep yet still feminine voice. Suddenly you recognize that voice. "Ari?" you ask. "Where are you." "Right above you silly. How does it feel to be the fiancé of the famous Sheepzilla." You didn't know what Ari was talking about and then gasp as you look up at a pair of blue lips big enough to swallow an entire parking lot. Upon further examination, they belonged to that sheep giantess from the poster, except she was all too real and had to be ten miles high. "A-Ari?" you ask in surprise.

Ari nods her head and wiggles her massive woolly butt as she reaches down to pick you up.
1151302.title: Sheepzilla

choices: The guy comes back on to apologize
115131.content:
She walks into the house and places you down on a couch as big as most cities and lays out in front of you with her head tilted sideways. "Why are you being so quiet, you haven't seen me in a month" Clarisse says, "wow they came up with the technology in a month that's pretty impressive" you think. She leans forward and gently pushes you over with the tip of a finger and you just push her back. She looks down at you in confusion and you sit up "hey Clarisse, can we talk?" you say.

"What's wrong darling, you've been acting me, you didn't even call my big ms fluffy buns" Clarisse says. You laugh inwardly at the nickname and say "well Clarisse that's kind of the problem, i'm not exactly you're boyfriend."

"Oh did they have to hide him again, and you're what a look-alike, a robot?" she asks.

"No, um....I don't know how to say this becuase I just learned it myself but, the boy you fell in love with was killed a month ago by a sniper and I am him, i'm just from a parallel universe." you say. She just looks at you and says "ok so you're a look-alike, geez they go to extremes sometimes." You rustle around in you're pocket and to you're suprise you find a picture with a note attatched. You open the note and it says "I know you're the one they brought to replace him, I don't want to see Clarisse hurt but if you feel you have to tell her then this picture will be enough to convince her." The picture was of the other you, dead with a bullet hole in his head, you could see a timer that dated the pic as a month ago in the bottom. "Poor guy, had this wonderful woman and he lost his life because some people were afraid of her" you think. You hear a quite voice come out of you're shirt collar "what are you doing, you can't tell her, that will screw us all."

"Screw you, this girl needs closure and i'm gonna give it to her, besides you didn't care about me and I bet you didn't care about him or her right now either" you say. You tap Clarisse and she looks over, "I need to show you something" you say. You climb up onto her palm and she brings her face forward, you hold the picture in front of you and after a second you see the realization hits her. she starts to tear up and you cover you're ears. She starts crying, the tears falling on you every so often, she cries for a good 5 minutes and you really weren't sure what you could do to stop it. You turn the picture over and notice there's a message scrawled on the back "To my daughter, do not worry the person standing in front of you is the exact same boy you fell in love with. I've watched him for a month now and he will take good care of you, never forget the boy you fell in love with but you can fall in love again." "Wow so her mother was the one who chose me to come, well I might as well do my best" you think. Clarisse stops crying after another 5 minutes and you hold the back of the picture up for her to read, she stops sniffling and just stands there.

"So who are you?" she asks staring down at you somewhat angrily.

"Alexander at you're service" you say bowing. She pushes you over "so other then telling me the love of my life is dead why are you here?" she asks.

"Look, as I said i'm you're boyfriend from a parallel universe, you're not an 8 mile tall anthromoprhic rabbit there but otherwise no difference. I was brought here to act as a replacement for you're boyfriend so that you'd never know that he died, that plan did not work out as well as they hoped" you say. The tv on the wall turns on and a face appears "so you told her, do you have any idea what you've done?"

"Screw you, you had the balls to hide the fact that her love was dead for a month and then you try to deceive her again. I can see where you're coming from, but she can't be that irrational I know this girl, admittedly not as a bunny and she wouldn't hurt a fly heck she wouldn't even swat a spider that was crawling up her arm" you yell at the tv. All you hear is the man on the tv say "take the shot," you hear a bullet but you don't feel it as you had closed you're eyes. You open you're eyes and you find yourself surrounded by white, you look up and see Clarisse staring at the tv. "If the person who took that shot is within this house in the hour and I find him, I will become the first omnivorous bunny" Clarisse yells, you actualy hear the guy scream and him start scrambling to get out. She turns to the tv and says "Mr.president you have no worry, I will not hurt anyone but I will also not help you stop anymore wars, all those people's deaths are on you're head" she says before switching off the tv. You look up at her and ask "why?"

"Why what?" she replies

"Why didn't you let them kill me, I mean I must be the last person in the universe you'd want to save right now, I just told you you're lovers dead and i'm just a stand-in" you say.

"You're not so bad" she says leaning forward she kisses you pushing you gently against her palm.

"What are you doing?" you ask.

"Sorry" she says

"Look you have to be going through a lot right now, you'll need a bit of time to get used to me, and I to you, plus you'll probably need something like a week or month to fully accept he's dead an...." you're cut off as she kisses you again.

"You really are the man I fell in love with" she says smiling, "you might not be exact but I can tell from that comment that even with just meeting you that you care for me."

"Well you are my girlfriend" you say.

"All I saw outside is carrots, is that the only thing to eat here?" you ask.

"Yeah but I can cook up a storm, you'll love my carrot cake" she says happily.

"Really, the you in my universe sucks at cooking" you say. "Also you're probably a tiny bit in shock" you say having studied a few psychology books becuase you were bored and you found the subject interesting. "3,2,1" you say and she hugs you against her chest whispering "never leave me, never leave me." You just sit there and wait till she's finished, she places you down on the couch and spins around, "so was the other me this good looking?"

"Yeah but she didn't have a cute little tail coming out her backside" you reply,

"Oh so you like my tail?" she asks.

"Yeah it's cute, even though it's bigger then I am" you reply.

"Hmm well you're a guy so you probably like just my body" she says.

"Oh yeah, you probably still tell just as bad jokes as before" you reply.

"What do you call a flying turtle?" she asks.

"I don't know" you reply.

"A shellicopter" she says, you giggled a bit and said "see now that's the really bad humour I remember you having."

"Why aren't you trying to get back?" she asks you.

"Well they told me the machine's one way and well, the night before I came here was the night I lost her, I took her home and find a message on my machine that not a minute after I left her appartment was on fire, I waited for an hour and the news came on saying the fire was out but that there was only 1 confirmed death and..." you trail off as you're eyes start to water, "Clarisse don't let the pain get to you" you say.

"What are you talking about?" she asks.

"When I heard she was gone the first thing I tried to do was take my own life, but I couldn't do it. Probably why I was brought here to keep me from ending it. You're mother probably heard me say that I was going to make sure I finished it in the morning, even hid a gun near my bed and left a note" you say. You're eyes fill with tears and you just stare down and let them fall one by one, as you remember the pain and what you had tried to do. You look up and she's right in front of you, she gently blows on you knocking you over. You just lay there feeling kind of dejected and pissed that you had hurt the girl in front of you. She gently pokes you once, twice, she keeps poking you till you look up at her. She's smiling down at you and asks "Alex do you want to be my boyfriend?"

You just look up at her stunned, you wait a second before replying, "I would love to" you say.

"Well then give you're new girlfriend a kiss" she says leaning over. You get up and you have to stand on you're toes to reach her, right when you're about to kiss her she moves back causing you to lose you're balance and fall forward. "Sorry" she says giggling, "it was just too good an opprotunity" she says scooping you up. She holds you next to her cheek and you kiss her, you spend the next few seconds getting fur out of you're mouth. "Don't worry, you'll learn to do it without getting any fur" she says smiling. Next is
115131.title: tell her

choices: she wants to go out and play
1151311.content:
The tv turns on and the guy who you realize is supposed to be the president of the U.S comes back on. "Well you seem to be doing well" he asks "no more hatred, we can expect Clarisse's help in any conflicts right?" he aims the question at you.

"Hey it's not my call, besides I have a condition even if it was my call" you say.

"What would that condition be?" the president asks.

"Make that damn machine that brought me here work in reverse and let me see my family to say goodbye, or atleast send a note through saying I went on a spiritual journey or something and didn't commit suicide, they probably think i'm dead right now" you say.

"Done" the president says, you see a machine wheeled in behind him and a man hands the president a note, he holds it up to the camera and you read it. The note's perfect and the president himself activates the machine and sends it through. The machine is wheeled out and the president says "so we can expect Clarisse's help with any global conflicts right?""

"That's not my choice it's hers" you say turning to Clarisse.

"Hmm first you try to trick me, then you try to kill my new boyfriend when he's kind enough to tell me, soooo no" Clarisse says. She sticks her tongue out at the president and makes a licking motion and turns the tv off.

"Ok that made sense up to the end" you say.

"Oh well when I was younger he tried to give me a carrot but I kind of forgot he was there and well he should be glad I didn't swallow" Clarisse says. "Actually ever since then,,,," she trails off and leans over, she pushes you onto the couch with her nose and licks you from head to toe. "Mmm you taste really good, better then carrots, in fact you taste good enough to eat" Clarisse says smiling.

"Hehe, eep" you say and you faint right then and there. You slowly wake up and you see Clarisse staring down at you obviously concerned as she kept chewing on a carrot. You sit up and moan "augh, what just happened" you say.

"You fainted, i'm sorry my little prank went too far" she says her ears drooping.

"Well no harm done, just you know never do that again ok?" you say.

"Of course anything for my little fluffy-wuffy" she says.

"Oh so i'm you're fluffy-wuffy wuffy what do you want to be?" you ask

"Hmmm, are you ok with calling me Ms.fluffy buns?" she asks.

"Sure I mean the other me called you it so why not" you say.

"Oh thank you" she says, she gently lowers a hand to you and cuddles you against her cheek once you get on.

"I remember you saying something about carrot cake before" you say.

"Oh you're hungry, of course i'll go grab some" Clarisse says. She walks off and comes back carrying a piece more fit for her size "dig in" she says.

"Isn't this a bit big?" you ask.

"Oh i'll just eat whatever you don't, we both get a meal that way" she says smiling. You start eating and right away you realize just how good a cook this girl is as this is by and away the best carrot cake you're ever eaten. You eat a pretty large portion of the cake for you're size before moving back and sitting down more stuffed then you've been in a while. Clarisse starts eating and quickly finishes off the rest of the cake. You look up and laugh "hey Clarisse you have crumbs stuck in you're fur" you say.

"Oh, well can you get them for me?" she asks, She raises you near her mouth and you spend the next minute removing crumbs. "Thank you" she says when you're finished and gives you a kiss. You sit down in her palm pad and ask "so what do you do for fun around here?"

"You know hide and seek right?" Clarisse says.

"Yeah I know hide and seek" you say.

"Well my version is called Jack and the giant, guess who's the giant" Clarisse says grinning. "You have to hide from me for 10 minutes and if you do you win, however if I find you I win, the winner gets to request one thing of the loser" Clarisse says.

"Um isn't that kind of dangerous, given the size difference" you say.

"Not normally, the playing field is my body and I have to guess what part of me you're on" Clarisse says.

"Um isn't that kind of getting too close too quickly" you say blushing.

"Are you going to take advantage of the situation?" she asks giving the question an angry undertone.

"Of course not, that would be totally wrong" you say.

"Well then there's no problem" Clarisse says, she picks you up and drops you down into her fur, you instantly crouch down and start crawling to help the fur cover you. You crawl for a few minutes not really sure you were making any progress to well anywhere when she says "breasts" you look around and clearly being able to see them you shout back "no". You crawl around for a few more minutes when the "floor" gives way and you land in a hole "hmm i'd say my belly button" Clarisse says. You look up to see her smiling down at you "hey I was right" she says, she sticks a finger slightly in her belly button and you grab onto her fur and she pulls you out. She places you down on her palm and stops to think "hmm what should I have you do, it's been so long since I last won at this" she says. She lifts her hand up and puts you down near one of her ears "would you mind giving my ear a scratch? it's been such a long time since they last got the care and attention I can't give them" she says. You walk up and she bends her ear over, you hop up and start rubbing and scratching, you can hear her sigh. You rub for a probable good half hour and you somehow covered about half her ear. You feel her fingers pinch around you and you're transferred over to her other ear where you start rubbing again. After another half an hour you just lay there exhausted and she gently picks you up and puts you down on her palm. "Aww is my little fluffy-wuffy tired" she asks.

"Yes" you say in reply, you just lay there tired as all heck. "Aww well let me try to fix that for you" she says. You feel the tip of one of her fingers start rubbing against you're back and you sigh. It wasn't really removing the exhaustion but it was removing a lot of the strain in you're body and was really soothing. After a minute you try to get up but she just gently pushes you back down and she starts singing "fluffy-wuffy fluffy-wuffy I am here for you, fluffy-wuffy fluffy-wuffy I will care for you. Watch and protect you, bake and clean too, all I ask is you love me too."

"Wow that was great" you say getting up.

"Oh you're awake, um oh...." she tries to hide behind her ears to cover up her embarrasment.

"Hey why are you hiding, that was beautiful, did you come up with it just now?" you ask.

"Well yes, but I was always told I had a really bad singing voice" Clarisse says.

"You don't, that was great, is there more to the song?" you ask.

She nods and starts singing again "fluffy-wuffy fluffy-wuffy do you like me? fluffy-wuffy please tell me. I can't stand not being able to know, becuase I love you with my heart and soul."

"The answer's yes Clarisse and that was excellent" you say smiling.

"Well thank you" she says "i'll be sure to sing for you as often as you want".

"Sure, might as well write that down and call it the fluffy-wuffy song" you say jokingly but still smiling. She puts you down, runs off and grabs a piece of paper and a pencil and actually does write it down along with a melody you know since she brings it back once she's written it down and you learn the song has a verse 3 and 4. You share a laugh and for some reason the thought of that sniper crosses you're mind. "Hey Clarisse what would have happened if you did find that guy?" you ask.

"Oh I forgot all about him, i'd probably just eat him in one gulp" she says. You look up at her horiffied and she says "i'm kidding, I wouldn't do anything, just put him outside the house and scare him a bit by showing him my teeth" she says. "Ok that's good, you really need to stop trying to scare me" you say.

"Don't you think i'm a good girl?" she asks sweetly.

"Well yes but sadly i've heard of many an instance where power turns someone from good to bad" you say.

"Oh is my little fluffy-wuffy worried about me" she says snuggling up against you "don't worry I don't do anything bad, as long as you're with me I'll be a good girl" she says.

"You can be a good girl without me right?" you say.

"Oh of course, i'm not allowed out enough to really do anything bad" Clarisse says.

"When was the last time you went outside?" you ask.

"Hmmm, i'd have to say back when I was 15 and I was almost sent over to stop the wars" Clarisse says.

"Aww well you should go out every so often" you say.

"Well it's really hard to watch for everything when you're this big" she says.

"Oh yeah, hmmm well there's a large field near the house they gave me, you should be able to atleast walk around it" you say.

"Well you're house is only a 5 minute walk and it's been a whiile since I saw it" she says.

"You wanna go play there?" you ask.
1151311.title: The guy comes back on to apologize

choices: next day is just a normal day
next day is the first day of mating season
11513112.content:
"I don't think I want to go outside for a bit I mean i've already lost you once because I wasn't watching over you" Clarisse says.

"That seems fair" you reply sitting back, Clarisse lowers you onto her stomach and you sit down.

"This is great" you say.

"What is?" Clarisse asks.

"Well not only is my girlfriend beautiful and a great cook she also makes a really comfy bed" you say curling up.

"Hey I think i'm more then a bed" Clarisse says.

"You're right you're also a wonderful singer and I love you to death" you say. You stop for a second suprised at what you just said, I mean you did love her because she was still the same being but saying it so early for some reason suprised you. Clarisse smiles down at you with a big bunny grin and lowers her hand to you. You climb on and she stands up and walks upstairs, you look around trying to get as much knowledge of the house as you can. From what you see the upper floor was only made of a bathroom and Clarisse's room but once she entered her room you saw why. It was huge, not only because she was so big but her bedroom was pretty much the size of the living room downstairs complete with tv and a couch of it's own. Clarisse lays down on the bed and she puts you down in front of a pink monolith sticking out of the white. "Um....is that what I think it is?" you ask.

"Maybe, you should touch it and find out" Clarisse replies. You slowly walk over the soft surface and poke the pink thing, Clarisse doesn't react in any way so you slowly start rubbing it and that's when Clarisse lets out a moan. You jump back and say "i'm sorry."

"Sorry for what that felt great" Clarisse says, you look up and you can see her smiling down at you.

"Well yeah but we just met and.." Clarisse gently pushes you over with 1 finger and shushes you.

"If I didn't want you there, you wouldn't be there now would you" she says smiling.

"Well no I wouldn't" you say.

"Well then stop being so uptight and have some fun" Clarisse says. She picks you up and holds you in front of her face "or am I not good enough, do you not want me?" she asks.

"No no no that's not the problem" you say waving you're hands. "It's just....processing all this is a bit much, well that and i'm really not sure where to start" you say.

"Well then i'll be the lead" Clarisse says. She puts you down in between her mountains and says "you're mission if you choose to accept it is scale one of the two mountains surrounding you and plant a flag at the top."

"I don't have a flag" you say.

"That doesn't matter, get climbing otherwise an earthquake's gonna start" Clarisse says while smiling. You sigh and start climbing her left breast, the soft flesh gave way as you pushed and grabbed it making climbing very easy. It takes you an hour and somehow by going all out you make it to the top, you lay out once you reach the top panting.

"There I made it" you say trying to catch you're breath.

"That felt great, it was like I was getting a mini massage' Clarisse says happily.

"Glad you liked it, can I get a drink?" you ask.

"Sure" Clarisse says, she gently picks you up and puts you down on a pillow before getting up and walking downstairs. You move around trying to get some of the strain off you're body "augh i've done more physical work today then I usually do in a week" you think. Clarisse comes back in a minute carrying a tiny cup which was still about 10 times you're size. She holds it between 2 fingers while you drink you're fill before setting it down on a bedside table. Clarisse lays down next to you and this is when a fact sets in.

"Hey Clarisse why are you naked?" you ask.

"Oh, it's hard to make clothes for me and honestly no one's really said anything about it before" Clarisse says.

"Well doesn't it get cold?" you ask.

"No I have fur to keep me warm" she replies.

"Alright, I just don't want anyone oggling you as you're my girlfriend" you say.

"Aw well aren't you a little sweetie" Clarisse says reaching over and picking you up. She gently drops you into her chest and you lay there in her fur content to be near her and neither of you had a care in the world.

"You don't mind if I sleep here do you?" you ask.

"No, you've been sleeping there whenever I got my paws on you since we met" Clarisse says.

"Mmm well that's good" you say getting as comfortable as possible. You lay out on you're stomach and you feel Clarisse start stroking you're back with 1 finger.

"Ahhh that feels nice, wish I could return the favour" you say.

"Yeah I guess it'd be nice if you could, but then I couldn't cuddle you like this" Clarisse says picking you up and gently hugging you against her cheek.

"Yeah, besides how many guys can brag their girlfriend is truly one of a kind" you say.

"So i'm kind of curious but since you're part animal are you controlled by the whole mating season thing?" you ask.

"A lady has to have some secrets" Clarisse replies.

"So that's a yes" you say, and you're literally blown over for you're answer.

"Why'd you ask?" Clarisse asks.

"No reason, I just thought it was something i'd rather know now rather then later" you say.

"Well I shouldn't be like that for a while so there's nothing to worry about" Clarisse says.

"So what happens when you're in mating season?" you ask,

"Well I am a rabbit, so I do what rabbits do" she replies. This was a bit unnerving to you as phrases like "they're going at it like rabbits" were coined for a reason.

"What do I normally do when you're within natures hold" you ask.

"You'd normally have school or something else that made you leave the house but now that i'm not letting my eyes off you that's not happening aren't you lucky?" she says truly happy.

"Yeah, that's great" you reply.

"Was the other me ever here when you were in heat?" you ask.

"Once, I saw him and my memory goes a bit fuzzy but I remember waking up with him on my chest, asleep, from what I could tell he was exhausted" Clarisse says.

"Was he unhurt?" you ask.

She turns and stares at you for a bit "it sounds to me like you don't truly trust me" Clarisse says.

"No that's not the problem it's just I know I lose myself to my urges and I assume you're stronger then me but we haven't known each other long" you say. Clarisse picks you up and stares at you "well if you don't trust me then maybe you shouldn't stay" she says opening her mouth. You just hang there stunned at what was happening, "well I guess it's my own fault, had such a nice second chance given to me and I screw it up because i'm untrusting" you think. She brings you closer and closer and you don't even react, you can feel her breath and as she brings you closer the intake gets shorter and shorter almost like she was waiting for someone to say something.

"Look Clarisse i'm sorry for what I said, i'm just afraid of being hurt, especially by you even if you don't mean it, becuase i'm not sure how I could handle that" you say. You feel her mouth shut almost around you and she lifts you up and drops you on her nose. You just stare up at her for a bit till you see a tear fall down her cheek.

"Idiot" she whispers, "I almost.....I almost got rid of you, because you don't trust me" Clarisse whispers.

"Clarisse i'm sorry, please don't cry" you say running up and hugging her face trying to comfort her but not sure what you can do. She stops crying after the first tear falls and she picks you up between 2 fingers, "i'll forgive you but you have to show you trust me" Clarisse says. "Anything" you reply. She reaches under the bed and pulls out a fitting pair of scissors.

"Close you're eyes and hold out you're palms" Clarisse says snipping the scissors. You shut you're eyes scared to death, you keep them shut for a minute and you don't feel anything. "You can open them now" Clarisse says. You look at you're jacket and the crest for it is missing, you look in you're hands and you're holding what feels like cotton. You look up at Clarisse in confusion and she passes you a sewing kit. "Stitch that cotton into you're jacket" she says. It takes you a minute but you do it and Clarisse puts the mini kit away. "Now you can't lose that jacket, i'm trusting you" Clarisse says.

"Ok but where'd you get the cotton" you ask, she puts you down and sits down in front of you, you notice instantly. "Did...did you cut off part of you're tail?" you ask.

"Yes this way i'll always be with you" she says.

"Thank you" you say walking up and hugging her tail. Clarisse picks you up, "well do you trust me now?" she asks.

"Of course" you reply. She smiles and snuggles you in between her breasts and gently lays a hand over where you are acting as a blanket. You quickly fall asleep to the sound of her breathing and heartbeat.
11513112.title: she'd rather stay inside

115131122.content:
You woke up slowly as you had never been more comfortable then you were right now. You sit up and Clarisse is still sleeping, you shrug and just go back to sleep for a bit as you knew you weren't gonna be able to wake her. You woke up again probably half an hour later with Clarisse staring down at you intently.

"Hey" you say and she looks down at you even more intently now that she knew you were up. She gently picks you up and much to you're suprise you see what looks like a giant gas grenade fly out of nowhere and explode in her face, she slowly falls forward still holding onto you and you're quickly surrounded by some sort of special forces and pried out of Clarisse's grip.

"What the...what the hell was that?" you say to one of them.

"Just knockout gas" the leader says "we're here to extract you for a few days" he says.

"What?" you reply.

"Today is the start of Mrs. Clarrisse's natural mating cycle and it would be.....regretable if you were to be injured" he says.

"I'm not going anywhere, even if she's in heat I can't just disappear, she'll go nuts, you want that?" you reply.

"We...never considered that possibility, fine you can stay but you better have some damn good luck kid" the leader says before him and his team disperse back to wherever they came from. "Great, more so that Clarisse being in heat, there are special forces as well as tanks probably scattered around the house" you think sighing. Clarisse gets up after a few minutes and looks around in fear not knowing where you were.

"Clarisse i'm down here" you say and she looks down and quickly locks onto you. She smiles and lifts you up to her face before gently rubbing against you.

"Fluffy-wuffy" she says and snuggles against you before laying out, she gently snuggles you into her chest and pets you with 1 finger before much to you're suprise she starts to sing. She sings the full version of that song you heard before all the while with a big grin on her face. Clarisse lifts you back up after a bit and says "Fluffy do you love me?"

"Of course Ms. fluffy buns" you reply. Clarisse smiles before doing the one thing you were dreading. She starts lowering you towards her nether regions and when she has you over it, you can feel and smell the desire emananting from her organ. "Hey, hey Clarisse isn't this taking things a bit too quickly?" you ask. She quickly pulls you back to her face "Fluffy-wuffy doesn't love me?" she asks confused.

"I love you with my whole heart, it's just i'm really not sure I can take that step yet" you say. She looks down at you still confused "you don't want me to get hurt or anything right?" you ask her.

"No" Clarisse replies before rubbing against you.

"Well right now if we did that, I think i'd get hurt and you'd be the one who hurt me" you say hoping you're plan will work.

She stares down at you in shock, "No I don't want to hurt you" she says fighting her natural instincts.

"So then can we wait a bit Clarisse till i'm ready?" you ask.

"Of..of course we can, i'll wait as long as necesscary" Clarisse says snapping out of the control of her urges, she smiles down at you and you hear static. You look down at the bed and you see something black in contrast to all the white, "hey Clarisse can you put me down?" you ask. She does and you run up to grab the walkie-talkie "Kid what the fuck is happening?" you recognize the voice of the special ops guy. "Nothing, she's back to normal now, so I suggest you guys get out of here" you say. "That's, that's impossible" the guy says "we have strict orders to stay until her cycle is complete" he says. You turn to Clarisse, "who are you talking to?" she asks.

"Just some special ops guys, they were sent here to watch over you and well me during you're mating cycle, but the guy won't believe me you're not on it anymore" you say. Clarisse gently picks you up and you hold the walkie-talkie in front of her mouth. "Hello, who is the leader of this operation?" she asks into the walkie-talkie.

"That would be me Mrs.Clarisse 3rd division special ops commander Brad talon" you hear the leader say.

"Well Mr.Talon as you can tell I am no longer controlled by my natural desires, so you can leave" Clarisse says.

"We cannot do that Mrs. we were given strict orders we have to stay until you were finished you're mating cycle" says the reply.

"Alright how about this then? you all leave and give me some privacy, or I will personally find each of you and then you will be mine to do with as I please" she says.

"Hey isn't that a little harsh?" you say.

"No it isn't i'm sick of these government agents who were sent out because some bigwig doesn't treat me like a living thing and instead like some kind of weapon or thing to be used" Clarisse says.

"We...we will pull out, thank you for giving us the chance" Brad replies. You smile as you see a bunch of C-130 hercules transport fly through the room and out an open window. Clarisse sighs "damn government always meddling in my buisness" she says.

"Well if they hadn't meddled I wouldn't be here right now" you reply.

"Well that is true" Clarisse says.

"So...how long does you're mating cycle last?" you ask.

"Not long, only a day or 2" Clarisse replies.

"Alright" you reply. Clarisse lowers you to the bed and pins you under one finger "you know just because I have my urges under control doesn't mean we still can't have fun some like yesterday" she says.

"Can we atleast have some breakfast first" you say.

"Sure" Clarisse says picking you up and placing you down on her palm. She walks downstairs to the kitchen and puts you down on the table before rummaging around in a fridge. "Now I know there should have been another piece of, ahah" she says as she pulls herself out. She places a plate with another piece of carrot cake down on the table and moves you onto it. You eat you're fill before stepping back and letting her devour it which showered you in crumbs.

"You really like you're own cooking don't you?" you ask.

"Yeah, do you like my cooking?" she asks.

"Of course" you reply.

"Hehe, Alex you're covered in crumbs" she says.

"Oh you're right" you say shaking yourself you only got a few off. Clarisse lowers her hand to you and runs upstairs "oh this'll be so much fun, my first time" she says. You're about to ask first what? when she opens the door to the bathroom.

"Oh no, no no no" you say.

"Pleaseeeeee" she says holding it till she's nearly out of breath.

"Fine, but it has to be a bath not a shower that would probably pulverize me" you say.

"Yay" Clarisse shouts, she starts the water running and it was like niagra falls had been created in the bathroom. Clarisse just waits there for a bit before turning the water off and entering. She holds you over the water as she gets in before slowly lowering her palm in till it was up to you're neck. Finally she submerges her hand and you have to start swimming.

"Would you mind if I just laid on top of you?" you ask while swimming.

"Aww don't want to be away from me?" Clarisse asks.

"Well yes, and i'm pretty sure even the slightest motion will make a wave bigger then I am" you say.

"Fine" Clarisse says picking you up and putting you down on her shoulder. Staring down you say "I claim this land in the name of well me."

"Oh yeah and what if the land fights back?" Clarisse says picking you up.

"Well then I guess i'm at her mercy" you reply.

"Good thinking but this bunny loves you so you'll be well taken care of" Clarisse says. You both wash yourselves quickly as a small area had been set aside for you for that purpose and the shared bath is soon finished and you could tell by how Clarisse's ears were drooping it was over faster then she wanted.

Just to clarify you ask "Clarisse what's wrong?"

"That was over too quickly, and you didn't stare at me" she says.

"What?" you reply.

"You didn't stare at me even once, am I not attractive?" she asks.

"Clarisse I respect you too much to stare" you say.

"Oh come on you can stare a bit" she says leaning forward.

"Well if I must" you say looking her form up and down she starts to blush. She lets you stare for a minute before picking you up "ok that's enough" she says.

"Whatever" you say sitting down in her paw. Clarisse walks downstairs and says.

1151311222.content:
"There's something I need to show you" she says before walking through the house, she walks over to what you thought was a wall but there was a actually a door about the size of a garage door etched into the wood. Clarisse puts you down near the door and you walk up and open it, there wasn't much in there a few books that looked like photo albums, a blanket. "Grab the books" she says, you grab them and climb up onto her offered finger. Clarisse walks over to the couch and sits down gently depositing you on her stomach, you look through the books, you keep seeing the same man and woman and what looks like well Clarisse as a baby but way smaller.

"Clarisse is this?" you ask.

She nods, "that's me, my growth started increasing when I hit a year old and I was already a freak baby, once the government learned of me my parents freely gave me up" she says on the verge of tears.

"Hey hey it's because they loved you" you say. Clarisse shakes her head, she takes you back to the little room and you see one last object a black tape recorder. You pick it up and hit play, you listen and you hear a conversation between what you realize are Clarisse's parents and a government agent. The government agent offered them a large sum of money for doing their country such a "great service" but they turned it down saying "we don't want this freak child in our lives anymore or any reminder of her." You hit the stop button and rewound the tape putting it back, you jumped as a tear splashed near you and Clarisse just lay her head down and started to sob. You ran up and climbed onto her cheek even though it took a few minutes, "shh, shh there there Clarisse, you're not a freak, you're a beautiful bunny and I wouldn't have you any other way then you are now" you say. You spend the next 10 minutes comforting her and eventually the tears dry and the sobs turn to sniffling which stops. Clarisse lets you get up before staring down at you "thank you" she whispers wiping a few tears away.

"Clarisse, I know this is part of your past, but can I destroy it?" you ask. Clarisse just looks at you stunned, "not the good things, but this" you say picking up the tape recorder. "I want you to trust me and forget what is on this tape and only remember the good times."

"But won't that be a li.... "so then believe the lie" you yell. You were crying now, "I can't...I can't believe that the the parents of this beautiful girl were such monsters that they'd do this, I wouldn't know you now if they weren't but still" you can't help it you punch the floor as you had to release some steam. "Please Clarisse for me, forget it, I....I don't ever want to see those beautiful eyes ever stained by tears again" you say looking up at her. Clarisse looks down at you stunned, "sorry, I probably said too much" you say shuffling you're feet. You were ever so gently pushed back by something soft and you look up to see Clarisse, or atleast her lips. You were slowly pushed down till she was kissing you and the floor and she held the kiss for a good 10 minutes thankfully you got air from inside her mouth. Clarisse lifts her lips and then you're carefully lifted up and dropped onto her palm and brought to her cheek. "Thank you Alex" she says gently rubbing against you.

"For what" you ask hugging her back.

"For caring for this silly rabbit" she says lifting you up and dropping you on top of her nose.

"It's no problem, I love my big fluffy bunny" you reply hugging her nose. You laid down and Clarisse carefully stood up and walked over to the kitchen table and sat, you were transferred from her nose to the table and you just sat there. "So what about you're family?" she asks.

"I had a...happier upbringing let's leave it at that" you say. Clarisse looks down at you, "oh come on you said you'd trust me right?" she says.

"Fine, I had a good upbringing as I said, parents loved me and always supported me so no Clarisse I don't have any problems in my past and i'm sorry" you say.

"Sorry for what?" she asks.

"I'm you're boyfriend I should be protecting you, but I can't protect you from that" you say sighing. Clarisse giggles a bit, "thank you fluffy wuffy, you're always worrying about me" she says.

"No problem" you reply. Clarisse picks you up gently and looks down at you, "so how should I reward you?" she asks.

"Reward for what?" you ask.

"For always caring for me hmmmm...." she trails off in thought and you can't help but laugh.

"Geez Clarisse it's not like you owe me for every little thing" you say. She nods in response but still just sits there thinking, Finally she stands up and smiles devilishly at you, "you're going to like this" she says matter of factly. She walks through the house seemingly to try to remember something before seeming to give up, she walks over to the couch and lays down making sure her chest was compact before nestling you inside. You were right you did like it, her fur was so soft but it was really warm and still kind of bouncy, kind of like being on a waterbed. You laid back and Clarisse sighed, "so you get something out of this too?" you ask rubbing her. Clarisse gives off a soft moan and nods, "well you're not the only one who wants some fun" she replies. You nestled yourself in and Clarisse gently laid a hand over her breast trapping you. "So do you think you can escape?" she asks.

"Do you really think I want to?" you reply. You spent the next few minutes petting, poking and prodding and even licking to find out what Clarisse liked best. Finally you settled on gently stroking her fur and she sighed the whole time you were doing it, "mmmm how does someone so small make me feel so good" she says.

"Love I guess, it's the same for how you can be so gentle even though you're so big" you reply. Clarisse nods and then lays out on the couch as you hit a sweet spot.

You spend the next 10 minutes stroking before she's able to sit up and she gently pushes you down signalling you to stop. "Geez even though that was supposed to be a reward you spent more time making me relax then relaxing" Clarisse says.

"Clarisse as long as you're happy and I get to stay near you that's all I need, well that and essentials like food and water" you say.

"Geez way to wreck it" Clarisse says before playfully poking her breast near you causing you to fall into the impression. Clarisse giggled and held her finger there trapping you, "hey let me out" you say.

"No, you're going to be trapped there forever right next to me" she says.

"Fine, but uh what about when I need to use the toilet, in fact I think I need to go right now" you say. Clarisse freezes and quickly picks you up before running to the bathroom and putting you down on the ground where you notice there's a tiny toilet set up for you. She turns around and you do you're buisness before washing up, Clarisse picks you up and walks back into the bedroom, "that's not fair" she says pouting.

"Me having to go the bathroom isn't fair?" you ask.

She nods, "you were supposed to stay in the forever and ever" she says dropping you gently back on top of her breast.

"Hey that's fine with me" you say laying back. "It's warm, soft, and best of all i'm near you at all times, what's not to like" you say. You look up to see Clarisse with a huge grin on her face.

"Geez you always know just what to say to make me happy don't you" she says.

"Well I aim to please" you reply.

You tried to push her off but it seemed it didn't act both ways, as although it felt like she was only giving off 120 pounds of force it felt like you were trying to move however much she weighed. After a few seconds she rolls over and scoops you up in her palm, you turn away and she pokes you. "Aww what's wrong fluffy?" she asks.

"Do you have any idea, how scared I was, I trust you Clarisse, but that was....that was....that was the most terrifying thing i've ever experienced" you say coming close to tears. It wasn't like you didn't trust Clarisse and sure there was a few things that hadn't made sense to you but in your eyes it was the equivelant of the moon falling on you and expecting to live.

"Were you, scared of me?" she asks thankfully not trying to turn you around. You couldn't help yourself, you nodded and felt the tears start to flow splashing onto her fur below you. You were slowly lifted up and Clarisse gently hugs you to her cheek "I'm so sorry, I didn't know I'd scare you this much" she says, You nodded again and snuggled up against her fur, Clarisse gently started to sing and she gently puts you down on her stomach and starts to stroke your back with 1 finger. You slowly calmed down and started to pet her tummy or atleast what you could to try and pay her back. Clarisse sighs, "oooh that feels so good" she says. You push up and she moves her finger "that's another thing, how can you see me, and how can you feel that?" you ask.

"Well to answer your first question, I am a rabbit and we're known for 2 things, our big floppy ears, and our good eyesight" Clarisse says. Continuing she says "to answer your other question, I think it's like with my whole weight thing, even though your so small I can feel everything you do like your my sized" she says.

"So how come I couldn't get you to move before?" you ask.

She looks at you "you really think i'd let you go that easy" she says smiling. You sigh "fine, but can you please never do anything like that?" you ask.

Clarisse nods "will do fluffy, your not....mad at me are you?" she asks.

"What if I am?" you ask honestly not sure if you were or not. Clarisse's ears drop and she stares at you sadly, "I'm really sorry fluffy, it seemed like you might find it funny afterwards" she says trying to smile. You sighed and looked up at her "look Clarisse im not actually angry and since you promised never to do it again I forgive you" you say. She gives off a quite girly squeal and you were scooped up and she gently kisses her palm, "ooh thank you fluffy" she says smiling.

"Anything for you Clarisse" you reply.

"Anything?" she replies smiling.

"Well, ok nothing nasty" you reply, she nods still smiling.

"I know" she says putting you down near her belly button, she slowly pushes you forward till you fall in and she giggles "there now your stuck" she says.

"Hey this is entrapment" you say but Clarisse just covers her stomach with her hand and lays back against the bed. You were sure she could still hear you yet she had decided on....something you weren't sure what but you weren't exactly going to stay where you were. You started to climb the inside of her belly button, problem was even though it was really small to you it was like climbing a small skyscraper to you and every so often her bellybutton would shake almost like Clarisse was laughing. Finally you reach the top after a half an hour of climbing you sit on the edge of Clarisse's bellybutton. You knew she could feel you so you push against her hand and suprisingly you could move it a bit, you start to push up when suddenly the weight increases and you hear Clarisse.

"Who goest there, you cannot get past this gate without knowing the password" she says trying to make her voice as deep and loud as possible.

"Clarrisse is the most beautiful bunny in the world" you reply. Clarisse moves her hand away and stares at you "it's no fun if you guess on the first try" she says sternly.

"Well sorry, make the password something less obvious next time" you say.

"But I like hearing you compliment me" she says smiling from ear to ear.

"There's gotta be a better way than that" you say sitting down on her fur.

"You could just ya know compliment me at random intervals" she says smiling.

"Fine beautiful let's go with that" you say getting a smile out of her. Clarisse picks you up and snuggles you just under her beck "well I think it's about time we both took a nap, don't you?" she says. You nodded and got as comfy as you could in the fur as Clarisse laid her hand over you and you both fell asleep.

11521.content:
You awake from the strange dream, entering an awake if not groggy state. Blinking your eyes a couple times, you gazed around with a curious expression. Where was your room? It was mostly complete darkness around your bed. Groping about blindly for a light, you find a flashlight on your bedside table. Flicking it on, an amazingly powerful beam of light cut a path through the dark, dazzling your eyes for a moment. What you saw made your mouth hang open for a few seconds. All around you, was empty space for miles and miles. Only you and the bed you rested in were pretty much the only visible things. Pointing the light up, a wall greeted you, as vast and as large vertically as the horizontal level. Strangely, the wall and the ground were covered with a thick, reddish-brown fur. Rubbing your hand against it, you smiled slightly at how soft and warm it was.

To make the situation stranger, you could hear breathing. The wall and the ground seemed to move in and out with the breathing as well. Jumping out of your bed, you wandered around, finding no aim as what to do next. Looking up once more, climbing the living wall seemed like an interesting idea. You were pretty athletic, and a fit body could help lead you to what was at the top of that wall.

So you began climbing. It wouldn't be an easy task, considering how...big it was, going beyond your line of sight, but it was a challenge you wanted to face. A repeating motion went on for hours, pull up, push with your feet, and continue on up.

After so long, your breathe began to become a little heavy through your mouth, and your limbs began to feel the ache of exertion. Looking down, you had left the ground far below, and yet looking up, there was no end in sight. It could take you days to reach the top. Maybe weeks? Months? You didn't have the energy for that, no human did. Sighing, you still climbed upwards, furthering the plight.

Just before your body gave out with exhaustion another hour later, a great earthquake shook the world. You held onto the furry wall with for dear life."Honey, you awake?"

The voice seemed familiar. Your mother's? It couldn't be...the voice was loud. LOUD. It seemed to echo and vibrate your entire body. A chuckling followed the booming female voice."Honey! I can feel you climbing my pouch! Now you know you're too small to explore it...."

Another earthquake. Light filtered tinto the darkness,. Looking up, a hand was descending down upon you. You couldn't quite gauge it's size, however...

The hand plucked you up between it's equally furry thumb and forefinger. All you could see and feel was brown/red fur, but it felt somewhat comforting. Next you found yourself laying flat on your back, looking up at tree's that towered above you. But these weren't trees...no branches or leaves, just a single strand that shot up into the air, feeling like fur. Looking up past that, more amazement filled you. Two monumental....breasts blocked your view. Yes, breasts. They were...big, to say the least. As in, planetary. Astronomically large, able to hold worlds between them. Past them, a blur, probably thousands and thousands of more miles up, was a humanoid face of a kangaroo. It held the features of both a human and an animal, grinning down at you.

"Good morning, honey."Your mother spoke.

You wake up to find yourself in an unusually spacious bedroom. By all accounts you could fit the entire volume of your old house in this one room. A panoramic window is cast in a slight shadow suggesting that the sun is up but it's not shining onto your side of the house. Looking round this stately layout you find two doors, one leads out onto a magnificent landing while the other enters a delightful en-suite. During your look around you come upon a photo album titled 'A Family Treasury'.

Looking through this you find some shocking material. In one photo you see yourself as a toddler in a field of white grass, in another you see yourself with your sister and father when you were only about six or seven on some bizarre pink paving with a very weird looking background. Further on you see yourself in your high school uniform standing in more of the earlier-seen white grass with suggestions of the pink paving nearby with a great mass looming in the background. You stop and do a double-take. Flicking back you realise that the white grass was, in fact, fur and the paving was a paw pad, which means the background was the face of a humongous animal of some kind. The scale it was at couldn't have been less than five miles, quite possibly a lot more than that. Leaving you to wonder why you and your family were posing for photographs on such a massive creature; there was not a hint of fear in those faces suggesting that they knew the giant very well and trusted it to extraordinary lengths.

Suddenly you hear and feel a series of mighty tremors rhythmically reverberating through the edifice like someone was tapping their finger on a tabletop, but these were powerful enough to register on the Richter scale and were coming from the roof.

"Come on, kids." You hear your mother's voice at a volume you'd expect for her but coming from outside and above your room. "It's high time you were up." Bewildered you go to the window and open the curtains. You are immediately confronted by a giant eye filling your view. It blinks showing eyelashes the size of tree trunks. "Ah!" You hear your mother's voice again, this time coming from slightly below and off to the side of you. "You're up at least, sweetie." You gasp in shock at the realisation. This furry behemoth who could drop an entire church down her throat was your mother! She's a titanic...

You try to stand up but your feet are sore as you try to walk forward. "Ow. Oh, what is wrong with me." "I'd try staying in bed if I were you." Your father enters the room and walks up to you. You feel your head. "That cold was anything but common." You groan. Your dad shakes his head. "That wasn't a cold you had, it was a virus. Your mother was beside herself with grief. But she's been taking care of you since you caught that cold. She's all heart." You remember your mother now. She was a very protective woman and had been keeping you warm and safe all while you were sick. But that virus you had left you feeling so light headed that you couldn't even remember what she looked like. Suddenly you hear a rumbling noise and roll across the ground as everything begins to shake.

Your dad walks you out of the room and you look up to see a titanic donkey woman one hundred miles tall and pear shaped with enormous thighs and a big butt accented by her black leather pants. She was wearing a blue shirt and had long red hair with a pair of glasses.

The donkey titaness lowers her head down as she takes a seat on a couple of mountains and crushes them as she smiles. "How you feeling today baby?" she asks you. Wait, you recognize that voice. A hundred mile high donkey woman, big enough to swallow entire cities, a woman who could single handedly conquer the world on brute force alone and she was your mom.

You look around and you see that you're in a middle school and that you're in the nurse's office. "What the?" you ask. You then groan and see that you're covered in bandages on your head, arm and leg. Apparently you had just recently been injured. You see that you're wearing a soccer uniform so that's probably how you got hurt to begin with.

You then turn to see the school nurse on the phone. She hung up upon seeing you were awake. "Oh," says the nurse. "Thank goodness you're awake. That was quite a nasty fall you took." "A fall?" you ask. "What fall?" The nurse let out a sigh. "Just as I thought. That spill you took on the field caused you to hit your head. I'd say you have a mild case of memory loss but nothing serious. You'll just have to lay low for a while. And soccer practice is definitely out of the question." You try to walk but you grunt because your leg is still in pain and the nurse has to stop you.

"You really shouldn't be moving around like that. You're going to reopen your wounds again. Don't worry. I already contacted your mother, she'll be here in a minute." That confused you. You knew for a fact that your mom was currently at work. How could she possibly be able to reach the school in only a minute. "But that's...." Before you can continue there was a shaking noise and the nurse ducked to the ground.

The entire school was being shaken up by the quake and the floor even cracked slightly. "What's going on?! A quake?!" The nurse let out a sigh. "Not a serious earthquake. Just your mother approaching." You raise an eyebrow. You knew that your mother was more than a little on the plump side but there was no way she was heavy enough to cause an earthquake. Before you could question any further, the nurse starts to lead you out. "I still have no idea how that woman can exist or how she could've possibly given birth to you.

Outside, you look forward and see something that catches you by surprise. There is a large hoof that appears to be bigger than your school right in front of you. You look up and then you see the owner of the foot. She was an absolutely massive 5 miles high anthropomorphic bison. She had bright brown fur with long black hair that was worn in an afro and large curved horns. She was also very obese with a large bulging belly, a monstrous butt and a pair of E-cup (in scale) breasts as well as an udder as big as her head. She was also wearing a skin-tight pair of jeans that looked like they were coming apart along with a red jacket and black A-shirt. You'd swear that this buffalo giantess looked like... no, it couldn't be.

But then the buffalo giantess looks down on you in concern. "Oh my gosh!" she yells in your mother's voice. "Are you alright, Darling?" You couldn't believe it. It appeared that the buffalo woman was your mother. Looks like your headache is the least of your problems.

11522.content:
You awake with a start after your vivid dream, your mind still trying to comprehend what you have just seen. As expected, the vast majority of that dream is cloudy and indescribable, but it did not feel like being entrapped in a living nightmare. It was more like that of a distant memory which, even now, can only be seen by the unconscious mind, and what ever it was, you felt entirely safe and carefree of any dangers the vision may have presented. You also felt some strange form of familiarity towards it, as if you yourself knew that very entity your entire life. 'It doesn't matter,' You thought to yourself, 'it was only a dream'.

You lift yourself up and glance around to ensure you were no longer half asleep. Through drowsy eyes, you see that everything is still bitch black, giving the instant assumption that it was still the dead of night. Though this appeared to be your room, you can't even see the windows or the bed which you lay upon, which now seems all the more inviting now that you have awoken from your deep sleep. Satisfied that nothing was amiss, you happily return to the warm, soft, furry confines of your bed and-

'Wait. What?'

You shoot back up again, suddenly feeling more alert then ever before. Rubbing the sleep from your eyes, you feel around for the switch of a bed light lamp. Your hand grasped not the switch for the light lamp, but only more of the same strands of fur that you lay upon, which only now you realise are much bigger that anything you felt before. You also realise that there is something else that was rather off about your 'bed'. The entire surface resonated with a strange bodily heat, and (where you thought it was your own imagination deceiving you) is heaving up and down, as if it were taking in large quantities of air whilst it too was in a state of slumber. While you sat up bolt up right and fighting impulse to make a run for it, you realise that all your movements had caused the entire, unseen massive landscape to stir.

It was waking up.

Just then, a deep, resonating male voice suddenly broke the tense silence, shaking you to your very core.
"Is that you, my child?" The voice spoke, a hint sleepiness in his voice.
The nameless entity sounded as if he were a great and mighty God was speaking from the very heavens themselves, yet somehow you were not scared by it. There something comforting about the way it spoke. Familiar even. You struggle to lift yourself up and stand above the great strands of fur towering above you. Whatever you were doing caught the entity's attention, as he spoke once more in the same, rumbling tone. "Having trouble?" It asked, almost inquisitively. "Here. Let me help."
At this, the 'roof' above your head began to move. The great ceiling of your resting spot began to lift, sending a ray of morning sunlight directly upon you. After shielding your eyes from the sudden in burst of light, you eyes adjust just in time to see the the large roof above you was in fact...
...a hand. Or is it a paw? It looks like it is both. But that isn't the most astonishing fact about it. What could been seen as a normal sized hand paw, looks more like the size of an entire city block, if not larger. The great palm was covered in more of the same strands of fur, now seen as coloured in deep grey and brown coat. The tips of each finger have humongous, sharpened claws that look like they could easily skewer through reinforced concrete. It hoovers above you for what feels like an eternity, before bringing forth the fore and thumb finger directly where you are standing. You only stare in both fascination and horror as the great digits surround you, finally pinching between two leathery patches that not even two whole football pitches could fill. They then lift you firmly but ever so gently from the bed of fur you slept in, bringing you higher and higher until you start to recognise the scenery before you. The field of fur you were confined to beyond to that of a great, masculine chest, complete with well shaped pecs and six packed abs, all clad in same brown and greying fur. Judging by where you were last plucked from, it looks like you were rest just in between the central area of the chest, nestled neatly in the vast mountains of muscle of fur and muscle. Just from this height, you can easily assume that this creature which you have slept upon had to be at least 100 times larger than that of an average human.

You glance up to see if you can face this unimaginable being, but could only feel your stomach drop at the site that met your gaze.
