choices: Just then the Rabbit Nurse and her human enter
Another giant animal enters the room
131211.content:
What happened next I couldn’t explain, I was now looking down at my tiny form that I was holding in my claw, “my claw?” and I realized that I was looking through the eyes of the dragon who was holding me, I couldn’t move or speak it was like I was watching a movie. “Cain, Cain!” the dragon said and I heard panic in her voice, it was weird but I could actually feel the dragon’s horror, she quickly pushed the call nurse button that was beside her bed. In no time someone came to answer it.

“Please help him!” the dragon cried as to my surprise it was the rabbit that responded the call. The rabbit came over to the bed, and looked at me as the dragon held me up to her, and I watch as a smile crossed her face, and she gave a small laugh, “This isn’t funny,” the dragon said and I felt the dragon’s anger. “I’m sorry dear, but I couldn’t help it, your partner’s fine, he just hasn’t gotten used to this world yet,” the rabbit said with a soft smile, puzzlement cross the dragon’s mind and face, “this world?” she asked looking toward the rabbit.

“You see in this world we anthro all have human partners, we need each other to survive, in fact you wouldn’t be here if it wasn’t for him,” the rabbit said sitting on the bed kind of like a mother talking to her child. “What do you mean?” the dragon asked, “you see you were born from him, he created you out of his imagination,” the rabbit said. I felt wonder surge through the dragon, as she looked down at my tiny form, “but why was he scared of me” she asked, “because this all new to him, just picture what it must be like for him, he woke up in a strange place, and found it popular to him giant creature that he didn’t know if they were friendly or not,” the rabbit explained in a smoothing tone. The dragon held me close to her chest which, for the first time notice that she was tank-top, and said, “Poor Cain, I feel so bad for him, I didn’t mean to scare him,” and I heard and heard sadness in her voice. “What should I do now?” the dragon asked looking up from me toward the rabbit, “just keep him close,” the rabbit said getting up, “I need to tell everyone that he’s found and with his partner,” she said and gave the dragon a smile before turning and leaving the room. Once the rabbit was gone, the dragon looked down at me again, and gave a soft smile as she closed her eyes. Now it was me that felt awful, but I could feel this dragon’s kindness like a warm blanket around my rattled consciousness, and for the first time I felt myself relax and I drifted off to sleep.

I awoke to the same feeling of warmth, and I opened my eyes to find that I was still lying against the dragoness chest, her clawed hand gently covering me like a blanket, I was gently raising and falling as the dragoness breathed. “Good morning,” I heard her soft voice, and I looked up to her looking down at me with her soft yellow eyes, “good morning,” I answered feeling comfortable with talking to her. I just then felt a little embarrassed, “I’m sorry,” I said looking up at her, “about what?” she asked, “for freaking out like that, I was just scared,” I said abashed, “it alright, I should of known better,” she said looking guilty.

We looked at each other a long moment, it was strange now that I was looking at her, I felt nothing but security and peace coming off of her, and her eyes shined with happiness as they looked at me. I rested my head back down again the dragon’s chest, and I could feel her strong and steady heartbeat, and as I listened I felt something…something that was hard to describe. It was like the dragoness’ heart and my own beat as one, as if they were one and same, connected as if the dragon and I were the same person, “your heart feels so strong,” the dragon said and I looked up again at her soft eyes. “And your feels so warm,” I answered her and she laughed which sounded like music to my ears, and just then I realized something, “I never asked your name,” I asked. The dragon looked at me, and seemed to think, “my name?” she said wistfully, “I don’t think I have one,” she said looking down at me, “how about Selena,” I said looking up at her, and the dragon smiled, “I like that, and that will be my name,” she said holding me closer to her.
131211.title: Forming the Bond

1312111.content:
I felt so at peace that I almost drifted back off to sleep against Selena’s chest, but just then there came a knock on the door, and I turned to see the rabbit nurse standing there, but I also noticed that riding on her shoulder was the doctor that I had see when I has woken up. “So how is our renegade feeling?” the doctor said in a amused tone as the nurse came close, and she placed him on Selena’s bedside table, “why don’t you join me,” he said with a grin. I look up at Selena’s face, I kind of didn’t want to leave, and judging by her expression she didn’t want me too either, “oh, come on,” the doctor said with a laugh, and with reluctant Selena carefully placed me on the table in front of the doctor. “I was kind of worried when I was told you had ran off, but I find it’s interesting that you were able to find your partner’s room,” he said giving me a smile. “Why didn’t you tell me,” I asked, “would you have believed me?” he asked with a grin, and I sighed and looked over to see the rabbit talking to Selena almost in a similar fashion as the doctor was talking to me.

“How did all start?” I asked turning back to the doctor, “How did what start?” the doctor asked, “this…” indicating the entire room, “this world, and what is a dimensional jump?” I asked, “the first to your first question is that no one know, just like any world no one knows how it starts, it just is,” the doctor pointed out, “and as for a dimensional jump, only the ones working for the Immigration Board know how they work, we just help those they bring here to get used to this new world,” was the answer. I scratched my head and sighed, “what about my family?” I asked, and a sense of dread cross my mind, I may never see them again, “oh them, I got some good news and bad news,” the doctor said scratching his own balding head. “What the good news?” I asked, “the good news is that they all made it safely to this world,” the doctor said, and my heart leapt, my family was here, “and what the bad?” I asked, “The bad is that they were sent to a different hospital,” he said looking apologetically. My mind was racing, my mom, dad, and sister was here in this world, but that also meant that they had partners as well looking back at Selena who was listening to the rabbit although her eyes kept drifting over to me, “my family just doubled,” I grinned. “So where are they?” I asked looking back to the doctor, “I afraid it’s in another city, but after your release in a few days we plan on sending you over there to meet them,” he said with a nod, “A few days?” I asked puzzled, “just to run a few tests, standard processors, just to make sure everything fine,” he said, and I sighed but nodded at least I knew they were here, and that was good to heard.

“Well, that about it, I was just coming to make sure everything was alright,” the doctor said as the nurse stood up and placed a hand down for him, “oh, if your guys are hungry, there is a cafeteria on the first floor, its free to all patients, and the food is rather good…although,” he said the last part behind his hand, “stay away from the three-bean soup,” before waving to us as he left, and the rabbit closing the door behind them. “Did you hear that,” I said looking back at Selena, “what?” she ask noting my excitement, “our family is here in this world too,” I said, and Selena smiles, “that great,” she said happily her voice matching my excitement, “Where are they?” she asked the same question I did, and I told her the same thing the doctor had said. “I see,” she said, “well as long as their safe, that all that matter right,” she added, “yeah,” I answered. Just then a loud growl rumble throughout the room, and Selena brushed as she placed her hands on her stomach, “the doctor also told me were we can get a bite to eat,” I said trying to suppress a laugh.
1312111.title: Q&A

choices: We head back to the room
13121111.content:
It didn’t take long and for the first time Selena stood up, and I marveled at her, she had a lean powerful body with large sliver wings, and I also noticed that she was wearing a blue skirt that had a hole for her long sliver tail. She carefully place me on her shoulder like the rabbit had done for the doctor before leaving the room and now stood in the hall, everything looked a lot safer now that I was in no danger of becoming a stain on someone’s foot. Selena made her way to the elevator, and pushed the button, and entered as soon as the doors open, “hold the door please,” someone called as Selena held it as a male fox stepped into lift. “Thanks,” he said a little breathlessly as he pressed one of the buttons for the second floor, before sighing as he lean against the back of the compartment, and Selena pressed the button for the first floor and the doors closed. “That was a close one,” the fox said, I notice Selena giving him a weary eye, and a small frown, “I told you not to stop in the waiting room,” said a voice and I was surprised to see a human girl sticking half-way out of the fox’s shirt pocket, “by the way thank you as well,” the girl called over to us, and I waved and nodded to her.

Soon we reached the second floor, and the fox leave but not before thanking Selena again as the doors closed and we reached our floor, “you could have smile,” I said as we exited and slowly made our way to the cafeteria, “I didn’t like him,” Selena said looking at me. I shrugged, but then laughed that caused Selena to grin as well as we found the door with a small sign beside it reading cafeteria, “I guess this is it,” I said as Selena made her way in. The first thing we noticed was it was setup like a mini-restaurant with a series of booths that lined against the walls, and small round tables in the center of the room. We could see other animals sitting at a few of the tables, eating and talking with their human sitting at miniature version of the table including food in proportion to the human size, also I notice the wide varies of ages in both animal and human. I noticed a elderly weasel who was lost in thought as his human a old woman was eating at the tiny table that stood on the counter, while sitting at another one a wolf who looked about six was laughing as her human was riding on her muzzle, both looked very happy as the wolf mother was eating her own meal while her human was talking to her as he stood beside her large pointed ear.

Selena made her to the counter where a cheery looking crane was standing, “so what can I get you folks,” he asked, Selena turned her head toward me, “how about a hamburger?” I said, and she nodded, “two burgers please,” she said looking at the bird, who nodded, “coming right up,” he said and then added, “ you can go ahead and sit down, I’ll bring it to your table,” he said as he turned toward the grill. Selena and I exchange puzzled looks but shrugged as she first stop at the drinking fountain and got herself a cup of soda, and to my surprise there was even a mini one so I could get one as well. After getting our drinks we sat at one of the booths, and Selena placed me on the table’s smooth surface as she sighed, “well this isn’t too bad,” she commented looking around, “yeah,” I said taking a slip of soda as I look at the strange landscape. Everything still looked so bizarre, everyday items now were now like something out of a sci-fi movie, like the salt shaker that stood against the wall, the once small object was now like a large white pillar to me, and I knew that it could crush me if it were to tip over.

I looked back at Selena was taking a slip for her cup, and I judge she was drinking the equivalent to a swimming pool worth of soda without noticing, “Cain, can I ask you something?” Selena asked putting her cup down, “yes,” I answered snapping back to the moment, “Will you sleep with me tonight,” Selena asked looking a little embarrassed, scratching the back of her head. “I don’t see why not, how come you ask?” I asked, “Alice was telling me that they plan to have you sleep in the human hospital tonight,” Selena explained, “Alice?” I asked but I quickly realized that Alice had been the rabbit nurse. I smiled, “I sure that they will let me, after all I couldn’t be safer then in the hands of my partner,” I answered, and this caused Selena to blush harder.
13121111.title: We head for the cafeteria

choices: We need to run a few tests
We need you to answer a few questions
131211112.content:
The mood was suddenly broken as we heard, “where did he go!” and we turned to see someone rushed in, it was the fox from the elevator and we could see panic on his face. He looked around and saw us, and rushed over, and without a word crawled under the table, a look of pure disgust crossed Selena’s face. I blinked in confusion as just then another animals burst into the room, an anger looking rhino dressed in dark suit, except for that he had a bucket of blue paint on his head, he scanned the room which has fallen silence as everyone stare at the newcomer, there was something about this rhino that unnerved me, he began to search the room till he stopped at our table, “did you see a fox run by this way?” he asked in a gruff voice, Selena opened her mouth to answer, but I answered, “he just left, there he goes,” I pointed at the door. The rhino turned and rushed back toward the door, where he bellowed as he we heard him charge off.

“Thank you so much, you saved our lives,” said the fox as he crawl out from under the table, “and might I add, you have some lovely toes miss,” he added, Selena growled with anger as he sat down across from her. “Would you now mind telling me, why that blue rhino was after you?” I asked, “Well…” the fox said looking a little sheepish, “I believe I can answer that,” said a voice, and from the fox’s pocket the girl I had seen early pop out. The fox carefully scooped her out, and placed her on the table in front of me, she looked a little older then I was, her face was heavily freckled and she had long red hair pulled back in long pigtails. “Miss Donna Summers, at your service,” she introduced herself as we shook hands, I noticed that she had a southern draw as she spoke, “and this is Roxus, my partner,” and the fox smiled as he held out a hand to Selena but she was giving him a deadly look, and he recoiled it. “I’m Cain, and this is Selena, now what’s going on?” I asked, “Well, you see Roxus and I are kind of new here and we were exploring and we can of…bump into that rhino’s ladder as he was painting,” Donna explained and gave a small nervous laugh, “and I reckon he didn’t take it well,” she said.

I blinked, “your new here too?” I asked, “yep, just arrived here this morning,” Donna stated, and looked back at Roxus, but she then turned back to me, “so when do you come from?” she asked, “California, how about yourself?” I answered, “the great state of Texas,” Donna answered proudly. “Out of curiosity do have you heard anything about the Immigration Board?” I asked, “nothing beyond those are the fellas that brought us here,” she responded, “I see,” I said with a sigh somehow I had doubted that she would know anymore then I did. Just then the voice of crane piped in, “here are your hamburgers,” he said, “enjoy,” he added and left without waiting for a responds, “well, we better get moving,” Donna said as Roxus stood up, “before that rhino gets back,” she added under her breath as her partner put her back in his shirt pocket.

I heard Selena give a slight grunt of indignation as they left, “I didn’t think they were too bad,” I said grabbing the little plate were a hamburger right for my size sat next to the giant one meant for Selena. “I still don’t trust them,” she said a offhanded tone, “maybe not, but we should give them the benefit of the doubt,” I said as I sat the little table, and Selena sighed, “maybe your right,” she said as we began to eat. The burger was not the best nor was it the worst, but it did satisfy my hunger although I watch Selena eat her own, and was amazed the hamburger itself was the size of a large truck, and she devoured it with little trouble. After the meal Selena placed me on her shoulder before we threw our trash away and head back to the room where we found Alice waiting for us.

What does Alice want?
131211112.title: Meeting a new friend (kind of)

choices: I stay in the human ward
1312111122.content:
“Enjoy your dinner?” the doctor said from again from the bedside table, “yes,” I answered noticing that Alice had wheeled in a cart of medical instruments, I shifted uncomfortably on Selena’s shoulder. “Why don’t you come down here, I need to talk to you,” the doctor said, and again with a bit of reluctant Selena place me beside the doctor, “have a seat, miss Selena,” Alice said indicating the bed. “So what up?” I asked looking at the doctor, “I need to you to fill some forms,” he said and handed me a clipboard with a pen, and I sighed as I began to work on it.

The questions were mostly asking my name, my partner’s name, and as well as things as were I used to live, and so on. I looked up to see that Alice was giving Selena a check-up, looking into her mouth and ear, but it when she check’s Selena’s blood pressure that I got a surprise, Alice place the arm band around Selena’s left forearm, and began to squeeze the little ball-like thing that constricts the band. Suddenly I felt pressure on my own arm, and I rubbed it, “that weird,” I said to the doctor who raises a eyebrow, “my arm suddenly feels tight,” I said wondering that going on, “that no surprise, what you are feeling is what your partner is feeling,” he said. I gave him a puzzled look, “you see we are connected to our partners, we can feel it when they are happy or sad or when they are in pain, and they can feel us as well,” he explained. I looked at Selena who smiled at me, “amazing,” I said with a smile of my own.

It didn’t take me long to finish the paperwork, and I handed it back to the doctor who began to look through it, just then I remembered something, “oh by the way,” I asked, the doctor gave me a eye before looking back at the papers, “yes,” he answered, “I was wondering if it would be alright if I sleep here tonight with Selena?” I asked. The doctor raised his head and looked at me, his expression was neutral, but there was something in his voice as he answered that hinted at disapproval, “I’d prefer it if you spent the night in the human ward,” he said, and then his expression soften as he said, “just for the first night,” he said. I looked over at Selena who had been listening to the conversation, I could see her crestfallen expression at her face, and I sighed, “in fact,” the doctor continued, “Maybe you should come back with me now,” he said.

Panic cross Selena’s face, but Alice placed a comforting hand on her shoulder, “don’t worry dear its only for a short while,” she said in a reassuring tone, “are you sure I can’t stay longer?” I asked. “To hear you talk it sounds like we are separating forever,” the doctor said with a sigh, but then smiled, “This is just standard processor, by tomorrow you two will be able to start your lives together,” he said. Alice stood up and put a hand down for the doctor and me, and I sighed as I look back at Selena who wore an expression of complete sadness as we left. Alice brought us to the front desk were we carefully deposited us on a platform were a door lead us back to the human ward.
1312111122.title: We need you to answer a few questions

choices: I find Alice there talking to Selena
13121111221.content:
I spent the rest of the day wondering the halls of the hospital, finding in to an exact double of its giant counterpart. Time passed slowly and when night finally came a voice came over the intercom informing all patients to return their rooms, and I reluctantly entered my where I lay on the bed looking up at the ceiling. “Poor Selena,” I thought remembering the look on her face, and without much debate I decided to sneak out, but there was a surprise for me as I opened my door. “I’m sorry sir, but you have to remain here,” said a voice and I found standing in front of my door was a man dressed in a dark suit something like the rhino, his cold stare quieted any protest. “A guard?” I said to myself, “Why is there a guard in front of my door?” I wondered as I walked back wondering about this strange event, but now my mind was set I now needed to sneak out.

I waited for any sort of opportunity, but this came when I heard the guard outside the door suddenly give a small muffled cry, and I heard something heavy fall to the ground. I stood up from my bed as the door just then slowly opened, and I found standing there was a dark robed figure, “who are you?” I asked as it entered. “There is no time for talk, used the emergency exit, and go to your partner’s room,” the figure said. “What about…” I said looking at the guard that was now propped up against the side of the door, “he will be fine, but go now, but be back before sun raise,” the figure said. I didn’t know what to do and without a word I rushed into the darkness of the hall.

I slowly made my way down the hall, fearing at any moment that I would be discovered, all the time my mind was racing, who was that dark figure, why did he help me, and again why did I need a guard in front of my room in the first place? The slightest noise filled me with fear as I made it to the stairs and then slowly opened the door and into the giant waiting room, where anything looked foreboding, suddenly my heart quickened as I heard footsteps, I rushed to the roll of giant chairs and hide as I heard someone enter the room. I thought that my own breath would give me away as I heard the loud footsteps come close, but they just then stop, and I peeked around the chair leg to see a pair of giant feet and I recognized them as Alice’s. “Richard, are you sure that we have to do this?” she just then said in a whispering voice, “I afraid that we have too,” said the voice of the doctor, “you know that, it part of our law,” he added, and I felt myself tend up as I heard Alice sit down in the seat that I was hiding under. “It’s just that there something about them,” Alice said, “I agree with you, if I hadn’t actually seen that his partner was a dragon I wouldn’t have believe it neither,” Richard answered in there was a far-off tone to his voice. My heart threaten to fly out of my chest, they were talking about me as I heard Alice say, “I just feel like we’re doing something horrible to them,” in the same tone as Richard.

There was a moment pause before Richard spoke again, “Well, there no sense in putting it off any longer,” he said, and Alice stood up and walk to where the emergency door stood, and knelled down, and I saw the form of Richard disappear into it. Alice stood up and in I saw her put a hand over her heart, and lower her head as she said, “forgive me Richard, but I can’t do that to her,” and walked out of the room. I swallowed hard my mind trying hard to make sense of that exchange, what did Richard have to do? And what did it have to do with Selena and me? I wondered as I waited for Alice’s footsteps to fade before rushing out of the door, and down the silence hallway.

What happens when I get to my partner's room?
13121111221.title: I deicde to sneak out

131211112211.content:
I soon found Selena’s door, and found it slightly ajar, just enough for me to slip in, and make my way over to the bed were I found the same rope as before hanging there, and soon I climbed up onto it. I looked toward the head for the bed, and smiled as I saw Selena sleeping and I could see a sad look was on her face, “Selena,” I said softly walking over to her clawed right hand, “Selena,” I said patting one of her fingers, almost instantly Selena stirred and she opened her eyes. “Cain?” she said looking down and see me, I held a finger to my lips to tell her to keep her voice down, “Cain I thought you were going to sleep in the human ward tonight,” Selena said bring me close to her face. “I was, but something happened,” I said, “What?” she asked trying to keep a low tone, and I explained about the guard, the dark figure, and even what I had overhead Richard telling Alice. “What do you think it mean?” she asks, “I don’t know,” I said sitting in the palm of her hand, there was a moment pause, and Selena yawned, “Well, I don’t think there anything we can do about it tonight, we should probably get some sleep,” I said and she nodded.
Selena smiled as she placed me closed to her heart, and covered me with one of her claws like a blanket “good night Cain,” she whispered before with another yawned closed her eyes again, but this time a warm peaceful expression was on her face. “Good night,” I yawned as I laid flat against her soft chest, listening to her magnificent heartbeat, all my cares and worry seemed to disappear into it, and as sleep came to me it was almost like I slip into the beat and became a part of it.

I was awoken with a start, “Cain wake up,” I heard Selena’s voice, and I opened my eyes, I could see that it was still dark, but a noise at the door aroused me to full consciousness. “I need to hide,” I said, and Selena looked around as the sound of the doorknob turning seemed amplified, and Selena suddenly came to a decision, and brought me above the collar of her shirt. I didn’t have time to stay anything before Selena allow me to slip down the front of it, and I felt myself slide against her soft skin before falling in-between her large supple breasts. I couldn’t believe it, I could feel her warmth all around me as I was being held in place by her fleshly hills, I could feel Selena shifted a little as I heard the door open. “Alice?” I heard Selena say as I heard movement, “what wrong?” she asked, there was no answer till I heard the movement stop beside the bed, “I’m just checking up on you,” came the rabbit soft voice. “How are you feeling?” Alice asked just then, “a little tried, but ok I guess,” Selena answered her in a calm tone.

There was a pause for a moment, and then I heard Alice sigh and then the groaning of the bed as she must have sat down on it, “Selena, what do you remember?” she asked, “about what?” Selena ask a bit puzzled at the question, “about Cain and your childhood, what school did you go to?” Alice asked, Selena paused, “I knew that Cain when to school in his world before coming here,” she answered. Alice said her next question with a bit of surprise, “and where were you?” she asked, “I don’t know, I guess a part of his imagination,” she answered, there was an awkward pause. “What wrong Alice?” Selena asked, “Richard didn’t give him the shot,” she said more to herself then to Selena, “what shot?” Selena asked, again there was a pause. “Selena it’s a part of our law, all outsiders are given a special shot, that…” her voice trails for a moment before saying, “takes away their memories,” she finished.


“What?” Selena said, and I too nearly cried out but held my tongue, “Why!” Selena said. “Because, the Immigration Board believes it necessary, they believe that people should have only the memories from the world they live in,” Alice said, “That horrible! They can’t do that!” Selena said in outrage, Alice hissed to Selena to give her voice down. “I know, but it part of the law,” she said and then added, “but it appears that Richard decided not to give it, so Cain’s memories should be still intact,” she said, and I could hear relief in her voice. “Selena, you must not tell anyone that Cain and you remember the other world, if you do your be in danger, and so will Richard and me,” Alice said a deadly seriousness was in her voiced, “I promise,” Selena said quietly. “Alice?” Selena asked, “but how do you know about the shot? Does that mean Richard knows about the other world?” “Richard and I know that there is another world, but we don’t have memories of it,” she explained and then added in a wispy tone, “to us its just a fantasy,” and we heard her sigh. There was a pause, before Alice spoke again, “Selena take good care of Cain, you two are very special, and I can sense that you will do great things,” she said. I just then felt a shift, and suddenly I got a bad feeling, “but remember that you have a friend,” and suddenly I felt pressure as I was squished against Selena’s chest as Alice gave her a hug.
131211112211.title: I find Selena alone

choices: They take me back to Selena
1312111122111.content:
I coughed as I heard Alice just then stood, and her footsteps slowly faded as she left the room, “Cain,” I heard as I was gently scoop out of Selena’s cleavage, and brought to her face, where I could see panic. “This is horrible, they are stealing people’s memories,” she said, and I lowered my head that meant my family has already been given the shot, they would remember me all right, but our home, all our friends, they were gone. I sat down on Selena’s palm feeling an empty feeling, and I could see sadness on Selena’s face as well, “Cain I’m so sorry,” she said. I turned to her, and looked into her eyes and once again I felt comfort for I knew Selena truly meant that. “Thank you Selena,” I said with a smile, and I reach out and touch her nose, and she smiled as she gently hugged me again, just then I noticed the first dim ray of light in Selena’s window. “Selena I got to go back, before I’m missed,” I said, and she nodded as she stood up and brought me to the door which she open a crack so I could sneak out, and back to my room in the human ward.

I lucky made it back without meeting everyone, and was a little surprise to see no guard at my door as I entered and closed the door behind me. “Your late,” said a voice and from the bed I saw someone stand up, a boy about my age although I was surprise to see that he had silver hair. “Who are you?” I asked, “My name is Dirk,” he said in a cold voice, “I trust you found out about the shot?” he added looking at me, and I nodded, “I still don’t understand why they would want to take our memories,” I said looking at him. “Its so people will not want to go back to their world,” Dirk said crossing his arm, “So why did you help me escape?” I asked, “Because you are special, you hold a secret that could change the world,” he said looking at me. “What is it?” I asked, “We don’t know, but we know that the person will have a dragon partner, a rarity in this world,” he said walking toward me. “Here, this is for you, keep it safe,” he said and handed me a small pouch that was held shut by a sting, “don’t open it, till you really need it,” Dirk said as I examined the bag, “Now good luck to you,” he said and to my surprise he vanished in a blink of an eye.

I sighed as I looked down at the bag, “What have I got myself into?” I thought as just then the door open, and Richard stood there, he was holding a clipboard, “your up early,” he said. “Just got up,” I lied as I put the bag into my pocket, “did you sleep well?” he asked not noticing the bag, “fine,” I answered, “well then, let’s get you back to your partner, she probably is dieing to see you,” he said with a laugh as we walked out of the room.
1312111122111.title: Going Unnoticed

13121111221112.content: RIchard took me out into the hall way but instead of going to the exit (which I was expecting) he led me into a room across the hallway. When I saw the contents of the room, I knew there was something wrong. The room was a plain are with a cement floor and a chair with leather straps in the middle. I looked back at Richard, who to my horror was holding a shot full of purple liquid. "Alice thought I decided not to give you the shot but I knew you snuck out. Why should you be the one to remember the other world? I also had a life that I somehow know made me happy but now I can't remember any of it." He said very fast, his face was getting red. Suddenly, I remembered the bag Dirk gave me, as he back me into a corner, I took out the bag and opened it there were two kinds of pills and two mini swords. I couldn't decide which one to choose but one of them started glowing bright yellow so I grabbed it and threw it on the ground. Suddenly there was an explosion and a giant clawed foot broke through the ceiling. Richard didn't get squashed but he was thrown back against the wall and blacked out. "What's going one?" asked a familiar voice. It was Selena, she moved her foot back through the hole and noticed me. She put her big hand down and I climbed on it. "Cain, what's going on?" "I'll explain later, now run." She complied and broke out in a sprint. "We need to find the family," I said, hanging on for dear life on her shoulder now. "Ok, Alice gave me a map to the hospital when she was getting me ready to leave. Now tell me what happend just now, How did I suddenly appear there?" I explained about Dirk, the pouch and Richard. "Wow, so those who have forgotten the other world are rally sad and jealous, huh?" Selena said sympathetically, "This is a terrible thing to do to people," I said. We fell silent for a while so I started paying more attention to the landscape that selena was running through. We were in a town that had alot of buildings built for the giants but there were always human sized doors and windows. They must be like the caffeteria, how everything was had doubles in both sizes, I thought as I saw a young cat girl playing with her human in a yard. The town was farely modern but there were no cars or streets. I guessed it would be pretty dangerous to have small and large cars. "Hey, Selena why don't we fly, wouldn't that be faster?" I suggested,"Oh, I think you're right. I forgot I had wings, I've never used them before."
13121111221112.title: Something else happens

choices: an orchard with many different fruits.
some unsuspecting prey in a large clearing.
131211112211121.content:
I turn my head around to watch Selena spread her wings and start flapping them as she continues to run. She begins to rise slowly at first but our ascent gains speed in no time at all. I looked forward again to see that we were coming up on the edge of the city now and I saw the plains that surrounded the town. Selena continued to gain altitude as I considered what we were going to do to get to our family. I figured that the staff will warn the hospital where my family's at very soon if they haven't already.

Selena must have been thinking the same thing as she said, "What will we do about our family now? We can't just go straight to the hospital where they are or we might get caught and you'll be forced to take that shot." "We still have the map to the city where the hospital is. We should first go find someplace quiet to settle for now while things cool off before we try to get to our family," I yell, trying to be heard over the wind. "There's a forest up ahead. Maybe we can find a secluded area to rest and think about how we're going to see our family again," Selena says, apparently hearing me just fine, despite the wind.

"That's probably for the best. Are you getting tired from flying?" I yell to her. "No, I don't feel tired yet. I really enjoy flying though so can we keep going for now?" Selena says with a great amount of joy very obvious in her voice. "If you want to, so long as we find a clearing before we forget why we're flying in the first place," I yell, hoping they aren't tracking us right now.

Selena continues to fly getting closer to the forest and to the clouds above us. The trees in the forest were huge. I think the trees were about twice Selena's size on the edge of the forest but its hard to tell when we were so high up in the air. I look over towards Selena and notice a large smile on her face as she continues to flap her wings at a steady pace. We were pretty close to the clouds now and I'm beginning to wonder as to how I can still be breathing so easily at this elevation. My thoughts about how to breathe this air and survive are interrupted by a loud growling noise coming from behind me. I look again at Selena and notice she has a slight blush on her face.

"I never did get to eat breakfast this morning," she said, embarrassed. "I never did too, lets try to find something to eat in the forest," I suggest. Selena starts to descend and watch below for signs of potential prey or is she looking for fruit? "Selena, can you breathe fire?" I ask while she continues to look for something. "I don't know. Why do you ask?" "If we find meat, I won't be able to eat it unless its cooked or I could get sick." "Oh, well let me try." I feel her breathe in deeply as she continues to get closer to the trees.

I feel a rumble come from her as she breathes out and fires comes spewing from her maw. Thankfully she was looking at an upwards angle away from the trees at the time or she could have started a fire. "Wow," I say, completely blown away by the display as Selena looks proud of her accomplishment. Selena focuses again on the ground as she again looks for food.

We keep flying on and then we come across...
131211112211121.title: On the Run

choices: the staff come into the room
13122.content:
You woke up slowly from the weird dream, it felt like you had been hit by a truck. You sit up in bed and look around and freeze, you seemed to be in a hospital bed, but on either side of you were 2 other beds, and they were a lot bigger. You heard footsteps and walking towards you are 2 people that look to be a doctor and a nurse but they seem unfazed by the sheer size of where you are it looked like everything was made for a creature a mile tall.

"Oh good you're up" the doctor says, "Mr. Alex was it?" he continues.

"Uh yeah, I guess" you reply.

"Don't worry we found some identification on you although it was slightly burned, "heh" don't even have a driver's license and you're college age" he says.

"Shut up" you retort forgetting where you were for a second. The doctor smiles, "can you walk?" he asks. You tentativley step off the bed and you can stand and walk, the doctor nods, "good to see you're doing so well, you're the first one we've seen to fall through and almost die" he says.

"Fall through what?" you ask.

"Dimensional rift, well come along, we have to introduce you to you're partner" he says walking away. Not having anything else to do or knowing anyone else you follow the doctor.

"What do you mean partner?" you ask.

"You're in a different dimension, everyone here has a partner with which they are irrevocably tied" the doctor says. You try to get more out of him but he shuts up, you follow him out of the giant room into an equally sized hall, he counts door numbers as he passes them and you enter some sort of lobby. You looked around this seemed to be some sort of special hospital probably for those who suffered physical injuries as there was apparently a gym area with a pool and a spa if the signs you saw identifying the other 2 halls were correct. Unthankfully for you the doctor walks past those and heads down the hall marked emergency. You reluctantly follow and you hear voices coming from what you assume is the emergency room "she's stabilizing, that means he had to have pulled through too thank god."

"Uh who's that?" you ask.

"Those are the only 2 staff on hand right now, you were actually considered a quarantine case so this whole area was shut down except for us 4" the doctor replies. He walks through a smaller door cut out of a larger swinging one, and you freeze as you look up. There was another bed in the room the same size as the others but this one was occupied and standing on either side were 2 creatures that stopped you're heart. One was male and one female, the female seemed to be some sort of gazelle if you stood it up on it's hind legs and gave it hands and a more human face, standing on the other side was a lion. You could tell simply from the mane of fur on him and he was like the gazelle but that wasn't what stopped you're heart, they were both a mile tall. They look at the monitors and you start hearing a bunch of beeping before they look down and spot you and the other 2. "Doc settle him down" the gazelle says sternly, the doctor walks over to you, "settle man, they're just our partners" he says indicating him and the nurse. "They're, they're mile tall anthromorphs" you yell back.

"Duh, what did you....oh yeah" he says. He pulls out a needle and before you can do anything he inserted it into you're arm and pushed the plunger down, "sorry but you're endangering Mollie with you're fear" he says. You were about to ask who Mollie was when you felt yourself collapse and the doctor catches you right before you black out. You wake up slowly affected by the drug the doc injected. All you could tell was you were warm, and under something soft and furry, out of instinct you stretched and you heard a giggle, you tried to get up keeping you're eyes closed but you were gently pushed back down "just go back to sleep" a female voice says. You're mind was telling you not to after seeing the gazelle and the lion but the rest of you wouldn't listen, you just lay there for a bit before trying to stand again. You felt the same force but you reached up to stop it and much to you're suprise you felt the same weight finally when you were standing you dared open you're eyes. You froze at what was in front of you, it was a mouse's face, you could easily tell that much from the admittedly cute pink nose to her large ears and the whiskers as well as the gray fur, she smiles down at you, "you're finally up" she says. Instinct instantly takes over and you run in the opposite direction and you run straight into a wall but it felt soft, and furry. Much to you're suprise the wall shifted knocking you over onto what you realized was her palm and you were brought back to her face. "Hey, hey why are you scared" she says.

"Giant...talking....anthro" you reply not really wanting to upset her. She looks around before pointing at herself "you mean me" she says and you nod.

She seems to think about something for a second before she nods, "i'm sorry I didn't notice, even though you're my partner" she says. "I'm Mollie, and you're the one i've been waiting 18 years to meet" she says.

"Huh" you reply quickly realizing that she wasn't gonna hurt you.

"I'm known as an outcast, our kind who don't have a partner at birth because they ended up in a different dimension, that's what the rifts are for, to pull humans like you over so that we can finally be together" Mollie says. She starts to tear up "18 years of knowing you existed, but not being able to meet you, and now you're finally here" she says lifting her palm up and gently rubbing you against her cheek. You really weren't sure what to do until she gently presses you against her cheek, "please, just do something, I can't stand you just standing there" she says. At that instant you froze, it was like you felt Mollie's sadness and obviously you knew you were the cause, without fear you reached forward and hugged her cheek or well what you could as tightly as you could. Mollie started crying but you could sense they weren't tears of sadness, they were tears of joy. You just stood there like that until the tears stopped and Mollie turned to face you, she sits up and holds you at arm's length "so what do you think of you're partner?" she asks. Mollie was only wearing a hospital gown, you saw her tail behind her and you had to admit it did look pretty cute. Everything was pefectly proportioned so you could at least tell a few things about her, she seemed to be quite slim although you hoped it was from exercise, long arms and legs led up to her slim torso. She leaned forward and reached up letting you get a good look of her backside, even her butt was pretty cute "wait what did I just think" you mutter. She brings you closer and pushes the shirt down and that's when you see her chest, she was pretty modest probably only a b-cup compared to anyone else her size but to her they were gigantic, you really weren't sure of a comparison. You looked up at Mollie's face, at her cute whiskers that attached to that even cuter nose and her big beautiful ears, her eyes that radiated gentleness atleast for you and that pretty little smile. As you thought this Mollie got redder and redder before she finally turned away, "stop it, geez i've never had someone compliment me so much" she says.

You freeze, "can you read my thought?" you ask, she nods and much to you're suprise you hear her voice in her head, "of course silly, you should be able to read mine too" she says in you're mind. You try and you can actually hear them "ooh he's just so cute, I just want to protect him till the end of time" she says. As you hear this all you're fear of Mollie and this place disappears, you feel a serene sense of calm and all you can think is "as long as I have her i'm safe." Mollie smiles, "you bet you're little butt you're safe" she says lifting you up to kiss you....
13122.title: Other

choices: Wants to go meet some friends and introduce you
Wants to go on a date
131221.content:
You were just about to kiss Mollie when you hear the swinging doors and a gasp come from behind both of you and you turn around. Standing there was the gazelle in her nurse's outfit and the lion in his doctor's attire and on each of their shoulders was you're doctor and his nurse. The gazelle walks forward and puts him down near Mollie, "so I see you've finally gotten rid of you're fear" he says.

"Uh yeah" you reply standing back and you heard Mollie think "screw it" and you were pushed back into her palm as she kissed you. You were stunned for a second as Mollie's desires and thoughts hit you full on and then you felt a huge sense or relief and happiness as you kissed her lips. Mollie held it for a few seconds before breaking it and happily rubbing you against her cheek, "i'm so glad you're here" she says. "Glad you 2 seem to be getting along" the doc says and Mollie remembers they were there. Blushing she puts you down in her lap, the doc walks up after he spends a minute climbing her thigh, "well good thing is you're both now in perfect health. which means you can be discharged right now if you want" he says.

"Ok, where would we go?" you ask.

"Why home of course" Mollie says.

"Home?" you reply.

"Duh my house" Mollie replies. The nurse walks up and taps you on the shoulder handing you some clothes and the gazelle hands Mollie some. The gazelle picks the doc up and the lion picks the nurse up and they leave. You were thrown up for a second landing on Mollie's fur and you turned around to see her with the gown just over the top of her head, you froze as you could see her whole chest and she pulled the gown over her head and gave a squeak as she saw you. "You little perv" she says shocked but kind of happy and she gently pushes you and the clothes off her and away, "go get changed over there and don't you dare look again" she says. You quickly scurry over to where she was pointing and although she sounded really angry you felt some part of her wanted you to look but you didn't dare. You undressed but froze as you felt something like...embarassment, you turned to see Mollie looking down at you intently "hey" you say stepping back. "Sorry but fair's fair" she says giggling before turning around, you quickly got dressed in a red t-shirt and shorts, when you turned back Mollie was sitting there in a green tanktop and a set of jeans with a hole in the back which her tail popped out of. She smiles down at you, "well what do you think?" she asks.

"You look great Mollie" you say, "and i'm sorry I made you go that long all alone, I mean I didn't even know you existed" you say. Mollie smiles at you and lower her palm, you climb on and she lifts you up, "all that matters is that you're here now" she says gently nuzzling you. You hugged her nose and she giggled, "well come on" she says standing up. She gently places you on her shoulder and walks out the door. You find the staff waiting in what you assume is the lobby, they lead Mollie out the way you came from and Mollie stretches and sighs as the sun hits her. "Ahhh it's good to be free" she says.

"Yeah, of course you're ok with this much freedom, i'm more for a smaller area" you say. Mollie sighs, "you need to go out and see the world" she says.

"I do, I have no idea where I am anyways" you reply. Mollie nods, "well time to head home" she says. She started walking down the street and what you saw amazed you, you were essentially on a titan sized version of earth everywhere you saw titan anthros walking around carrying humans on their shoulder or in their palms, there were even cars. Mollie slightly swayed from side to side and you saw her tail match her movements. She seems very confident and you could feel the happiness roll off her like waves. "Is me showing up really that big a deal?" you ask. Mollie stops for a second, "yes it is actually, it's like i've been missing half of myself without you" she says.

"Alright, although I do have to agree with you, it just feels....right being near you" you say. Mollie leans over and you pet her neck and the part of her cheek you could reach. She sighs, "your so small but that feels so good" she says before starting to walk again. You laid back against her neck and just watched the scenery as Mollie walked, she made a few turns and then stopped, you turned and looked up at a 2-story townhouse. "Well this is where I live" she says.

"You live alone?" you ask.

"Yeah, all of us leave our families when we're young to be with our partners, but being that I didn't have one, I stayed home till I was 18 and then I moved out" she says.

"So how'd you end up in the hospital?" you ask.

"Last night I got a terrible migraine so I went to the hospital, I got there about 12:00pm and then I collapsed in the lobby" she says. You nod, as 12:00pm was when you fell asleep the night before. Mollie walks up and enters the house, she walks around showing you the modern kitchen, the living room with a plasma screen, and a king size bed in the bedroom. As well as the bathroom, which much to you're suprise had a tiny toilet and a miniature shower carved into one of the tiles. "So, what's with the stuff for someone my size?" you ask.

"Well, every anthro has a human partner, so all the houses obviously have facilities usable by you" Mollie says. You nod as it made sense, even though Mollie didn't have a partner till now. "Well i'm hungry, let's get a snack" she says. She walks to the fridge and grabs a wheel of cheese and you can't help but smile. "Guess some stereotype are true" you think and Mollie stares at you, "what do you mean?" she asks.

"Well from where I come from, a mouse's favorite food ever is well cheese" you say.

"What's wrong with cheese" she asks.

"Nothing, nothing, i'm just saying the similarity is funny" you reply. Mollie cuts off a piece of cheese, "you up for anything?"

"A grape" you reply, she reaches into a fruit bowl and pulls out a grape, thing is it was more a boulder then a grape to you. You sigh, "oh well at least i'll never go hungry" you laugh before digging into the grape. You take a chunk out of it before you step back, "you gonna finish that?" Mollie asks, you shake you're head and she pops the grape in her mouth. She lowers her hand and you climb on, walking over to the couch and she lays out and places you down on her stomach. You lay back in the soft fur and Mollie sighs, "hey Mollie you have a job?" you ask.

"Yeah, only part time, but I go to college for most of the day" she says.

"Oh crap college" you think laying back, Mollie lifts herself up "what's wrong with college?" she asks.

"Nothing I just don't have any money for it" you reply.

Mollie laughs "you don't need any money, you get to take all my courses for free" she says.

"Awesome free college" you think and she pushes you with 1 finger, "nothing is ever free" Mollie says.

"So, what are you're classes?" you ask.

"I'm trying to become a computer programmer" she says. You smile as that was you're desired field. Mollie lifts you up, "aren't you gonna ask?" she asks you.

"Ask about what?" you ask.

"What you're going to owe me" she says.

"Is my love enough?" you reply. Mollie smiles, "maybe, but you better truly love me" she says. You nod and sit down and look her up and down, you try to clear you're mind and just think about her and how you feel about her. Mollie looks down at you as you look up at her and a smile crosses her face, "ok I get it, you love me" she says pushing you over with 1 finger.

"Why? what did I think?" you asked her.

"You were, hugging me" she says blushing "and you were whispering everything you thought about me into my ear and it was all nice things and you were totally honest" Mollie says smiling down at you still blushing. She lifts you up and puts you down on her nose, "I love you Alex" she says.

"I love you too Mollie" you reply.

Mollie puts you down on her chest and you look up as she seems to have an idea.
131221.title: the staff come into the room

choices: They let you and Mollie leave to go on a first date
1312211.content:
"Oh my god Kate and everyone, I totally forgot about them" Mollie says sitting up.

You just grab onto her fur and hold on as she sits up, "Mollie you kind of forgot me" you say up at her.

"Oh sorry" she says putting her hand underneath you. You drop down onto her palm and she lifts you up onto her shoulder, "I really need to remember your there" she says.You sit down on her shoulder and Mollie stands up. She grabs a small purse (well for her) off a table slinging it over her other shoulder before heading out the door. You look up at Mollie "so do you all have a usual spot or something?" you ask.

"Of course, they'll be so surprised to see you" Mollie replies. You just sit back as she keeps walking, after a few minutes she makes it to what looks like a 7/11, standing there was a gator, a dragon both you could tell from shape and size were male as well as what looked to be some sort of female lizard. You could tell because of the 2 large orbs protruding out of a tight white t-shirt. Mollie walks up "hey guys how's it going?" she asks.

"Hi Mollie how's it going?" the gator asks.

"Fine, it's going great" she says, the 3 friends stared at Molly and suddenly you felt very self-concious hiding behind Molly's neck and just peeking out.

"Mollie why are you so happy?" Kate asks.

"Well because I....huh where'd he go?" Mollie replies feeling for you on her shoulder but unable to find you.

"Mollie I'm back here" you whisper.

"Excuse me a second I need to go to the bathroom" Mollie says walking past everyone, you just see the inside of the store before she turns into a public restroom and she locked the door behind her. You stepped out from behind her neck and jumped onto her offered palm "what's wrong?" she asks lifting you up to her face.

"I...I'm scared" you reply looking up at her.

"Why?" Mollie asks.

"The same reason I was scared when I first saw you, mile tall anthros aren't normal where I come from" you think at her. Mollie stares down at you "do you really think i'd let anything happen to you?" she thinks.

"Well, no but I'm still not sure" you say.

"Will you trust me?" she asks. You sigh and look up at her giant face "fine" you think. She smiles and gently closes her hand, she opens the bathroom door with her free hand before exiting the store.

"Feel better?" Kate asks as Mollie walks out of the store. Mollie raises the hand with you in it "I feel fine Kate thanks, although i'd like to introduce someone" she says. Mollie slowly opens her palm and you looked up at 3 titanic faces looking down at you with interest.

"So your partner finally showed up" the dragon says.

"Yep, his name's Alex, these are my friends Matt, Tyler, and Kate" Mollie says.

You just looked up at the titanic animals stunned "I really don't think I can do this" you think.

"Just calm down and say hi, they won't hurt you, and even if they tried I wouldn't let them touch a single hair on your head" Mollie replies confidently. You look up at her and she smiles down at you, you turn and look up at the 3 anthros "hi I'm Alex" you say nervously.

"Geez we're stupid aren't we, we should introduce our partners" Kate says reaching up to her shoulder. Matt and Tyler do the same thing and soon 3 specks which quickly turned into human shapes were brought down above and then next to you as 3 people were placed down near you. A girl runs up right into your face "hi I'm Janice and these are Mark and Brad" she says indicating the 2 guys walking over Mollie's palm.

"Uh...hi" you reply waving slightly. The 2 finally catch up to the girl "so your Mollie's partner, about damn time you showed up" one says.

"Mark that's not being very nice, imagine how scared he must be" Janice says.

"He doesn't look scared to me" Brad says leaning forward.

"Yeah well i've calmed down a bit, that and I think I still have some of that sedative flowing through my system" you reply.

"Hahaha they had to sedate you, holy crap they haven't had to do that in like years, hahahaha" Brad literally falls over laughing.

"Ignore him, seriously are you alright?" Janice asks.

"Fine, this isn't exaclty how I expected today to start out, but well it could be a lot worse, I mean I could have ended up like Mollie, knowing pretty much half of me that was missing was out there somewhere" you say.

"You have no idea what she was like before" Janice says staring up at the sky.

"Oh really?" I ask.

"Yeah she was all gloomy and depressed, we had to come and pretty much pull her out of her room, she was fun after that inital hurdle was jumped but well, look at her now, she's never come activley looking for us before" Janice says.

"Really? I couldn't tell from what I've seen" you reply.

Mollie lifts her hand up to her face, "Janice I know I can't blow you off but stop talking about me like I'm not here" she says sternly.

"Oh, sorry Mollie" Janice replies smiling up at the giant mouse. "So what about you? What's your home like?" Janice asks.

"Very....normal, no magic, giant anthros, future tech, it's just normal" you reply. Janice laughs "wow sounds you like a very boring life" Janice says.

"Yeah it kind of was, I mean it wasn't a bad life but yeah compared to one with titan sized anthros it's not as exciting" you reply. Janice laughs "I wouldn't think so, so what do you think of Mollie?" she asks.

"Huh?" you reply.

"Well as you've seen, the majority of us end up in same-sex pairs, girls with girls, guys with guys, pairs where it's a female anthro and a male human are very rare" she says.

"Mollie's great" you reply.

"Oh really? So you meet a giant cute mouse girl and all you can say about her is great?" Brad asks piping up for the second time.

"Ok fine she's the cutest thing i've ever seen, I think she's beautiful" you say. Janice smiles "there we go that's more the honesty I was looking for" she says.

"Janice" Mollie says reminding you for the second time that the anthros were still there, you looked up to see Mollie red as a beet. You snickered a bit and she raised her palm quickly "your not helping anything" she says sternly.

"So what am I supposed to tell then, that I hate you?" you ask Mollie. She just stares at you "no" she says sighing.

"Look Mollie I only said what's true, I've only known you a few hours and most of that was spent asleep, but I feel very close to you" you say.

"Awww" Janice says and Kate say together.

"Can you 3 take your partners?" Mollie asks, you felt a slight wind as Brad, Janice, and Mark who had finally stopped laughing were lifted off Mollie's palm. Mollie lifts her hand up to her face "so what are you going to say now?" she asks sternly.

"Anything you want "kiss" girlfriend" you say kissing the tip of her nose. Mollie pulls her hand away and just stares at you stunned "what did you just call me?" she asks.

"You don't want to be my girlfriend?" you ask sitting down and crossing your legs.

"Why so suddenly?" she asks looking down at you.

"Well let's see I've already got 4 guys for competition and as I said you're the cutest thing I've ever seen.....but I guess if you don't want to" you say. You were pushed back against Mollie's palm, "of course I'll do it" she says happily.
1312211.title: Wants to go meet some friends and introduce you

132.content:
You wake up drowsily, the unusual yet pleasing dream still in your head. It is dark, so you are sure that it is still night time. You grumble a bit when you notice that your boxers must have fallen off while you were asleep. You reach for your covers, and are quite confused when your covers feel more comfortable than usual. Your bed also feels unusually comfortable; extra soft yet supple. The mattress seems to be creating its own warmth, but you do not remember buying an electric blanket. Also, the mattress seems to be moving slowly up and down and up...

Suddenly realizing that you are definitely not in your own bed, you scramble a bit but can't seem to get out of the covers. That is when the whole bed starts to move, letting out an odd moaning sound, a strangely peaceful moan though. You feel yourself sliding across the mattress for what is much too far to be a normal mattress. Unexpectedly, you see a bright flash of light for just a brief moment of time before you are once again immersed in darkness. You could have sworn that all you had seen was a wall of greys.

In this new area, you can hear a very soothing sound. It sounds a lot like breathing, but you feel it more than you hear it. You try to move again, but are still stuck in place. The blanket moves again, and this time you behold an unbelievable sight.

An enormous maw opens up wide, showing glistening white fangs, its pink tongue lolling forward. The mouth closes revealing a black nose, which slowly turns to the side. You see the enormous half-open eye of an enormous wolf woman looking at you. You realize that you have become tangled in the fur of one of her fingers, since when she uses a huge claw to free you, you find yourself lying in the deep crevice of a knuckle. Her fingers must be the size of skyscrapers. However, what she says to you, in the most loving way you can imagine, is what amazes you the most.

"Good morning, my dearest husband."
132.title: Lupine Love

choices: "Well, I guess we should get out of bed now, darling."
"It's still a bit early, my love.  Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"
1321.content:
The enormous wolf's head draws closer and closer, until you are sure of her intention. And sure enough, her black curled lips engulf your body as your new wife gives you an amazing kiss. Her lips are moist but not completely covered in drool, and you stick to her lower lip like the tiniest bread crumb. Her lolling tongue gently sweeps over you; a single taste bud looks looks house-sized to you now. However, you are not scared now because you remember your dream, this wolfess was the gentle titan you dreamed about.

With a skyscraper-sized finger, you are wiped off from the wolf's mouth, and now you find yourself going under the covers. You stop sooner than you expect; it seems that your wife wants to do some snuggling. You are pressed against the top of her breast in a loving embrace, and you realize that this is where you were when you had just woke up. You look at the two monumentous hills; they are extremely huge to you, but probably even undersized compared to the rest of your new wife's body. Your wolf wife is making tiny moaning sounds of pleasure as she rolls around in bed a bit with you in her arms. It is very odd that you have just met this titanic lupine, yet feel like you have known her all of your life, as if she was meant to be with you. Also, you are positive that your wife feels that you were meant to be with her as well. Your wolfess love's body is beautiful and flawless, but you feel like her true feelings for you is her best attribute by far. From several miles above, you hear your wife's voice call down to you in the covers:
1321.title: Lucky Guy

13211.content:
Your massive wife swept the covers off from your bed, and, while still carrying you in her paw, rose into a sitting position. She gave a huge yawn and stretched her arms, which means you got to see how enormously long they really were. You find yourself being lowered towards a brown dot on the sole dresser in the bedroom, and notice that that speck is actually your closet, complete with a little bench for you to sit on and even all of your shoes. As you get dressed in semi-casual clothes, you get to watch your wolf wife get dressed, which is a real treat. You try to get a good measure of how big your new wife is, but it is very hard to do. Your best guess is that she is somewhere around five or six miles tall. You only wish that you knew her name. Until then, at least, you hope you can get away with calling her sweet names like 'sweetie', or maybe something more suited to her huge size, like, 'my precious little universe'.

Now fully dressed but still immensely gorgeous, the wolfess offers you her mighty pinky claw, and you kiss it passionately. You then grab onto a few strands of her silvery fur, and you were whisked away to breakfast.

Breakfast was an experience you have never done before. Your wife stuck an odd instrument into one of her sausage, like a hypodermic needle, and gave you the chunk at the tip to eat. Another instrument was dipped into her piping hot coffee and the spongy tip was placed next to your sausage. Apparently, your wife shares all of her meals with you. You take your first bite of sausage and first sip of coffee, and you feel like it's the best breakfast you ever had. You wonder how this life you have woken up in can possibly get any better.
13211.title: There's Time For That Later

choices: The kids go to school and you go to work
It's the start of summer, and your family is going to the park today
132111.content:
Midway through your breakfast, the kitchen suddenly starts to shake, and you immediately think that an earthquake had occurred. However, your wolf wife just smiles and says, "Wonderful, the children are awake!"

You suddenly get nervous having just learned that your a father, but at the same time you are happy, too. You look at the source of the clatter, expecting a giant wolf girl or two to come into the kitchen. However, you are completely blown away when FOUR lupine titans enter the room, each one definitely having gotten their good looks from their mother. You have no time at all to think about how crazy this is before the youngest wolf lowers her massive paw towards you. You automatically grab a couple strands of her fur, and then you are whisked to your daughter's chest. "Good morning, Daddy," squeals the nine year old with glee. Not knowing her name, you reply, "And good morning to you, my giant angel."

It is not long before you are eagerly snatched by another huge paw. Looking forward, you are stunned to find two matching faces stare at you from either side, and realize that you have a pair of fourteen year old twins. The show you their love for you, their father, by squeezing you affectionately between their furry cheeks. You end up a little tangled in one of your daughter's fur, but you are quickly rescued by your eldest daughter's helping paw. You are in for another surprise as well; running across the pad of this daughter's finger is a twelve year old human boy, eager to give you a high five. You return your son's gesture, then hug him too. Your eldest daughter of about seventeen joins you two tiny humans by bringing her slightly damp black nose to her paw and gently nuzzling you.

Another huge paw, your wife's, then picks you up and carries you to her shoulder. You watch as she gives out hugs to your daughters as well, and the warm fuzzy feeling inside you grows infinitely vast. She even brings your son up to her gargantuan black lips for a great big smooch.

You look at your offspring, and realize the irony that even though they tower over you like mountains, even your eldest daughter still looks up to you. You remember that wolves are very social animals, so having this many children suddenly does not seem so unusual. Plus, they all seem to be able to take pretty good care of themselves already, seeing as they are making their own breakfasts. Right now, you couldn't be more proud, and can't wait to find out what your first day in this new, perfect world has in store for you.
132111.title: Big Happy Family

choices: Walk; it's a beautiful day and it's not too far
Take a special kind of car suited for both tiny and mega passengers
1321112.content:
Your huge wife suddenly got out of her chair. "Excuse me, darling, I'm just going to get the mail. I hope that our kids got good report cards this year!" As she left the room, you realized how much of your childrens' lives you missed out on. You feel very bad that these huge wolf children and one human child love you, and you don't even know their names. You hope that the report cards do come in today; perhaps they will reveal the names of your children.

Before long, a series of earthquakes signals your wife's return, and you see gigantic, city-block sized envelopes clutched in her massive hand paw. Taking a seat near where you are sitting on the table, she starts to open the envelopes with the help of her several hundred foot claws. Sure enough, a cascade of report cards falls out of a fat envelope, and you can't wait to see the results. Your wife gently scoops you up in her paw so that you have a better vantage point, and you look at the gigantic typed words and letters, and make everything out in your head.

Your oldest daughter is Heather, and you are proud to see that she got straight As in her classes; she must be near the top of her class. It is a bit funny to you that the twins Dana and Lana have the exact same grades; B minuses in math and science and As everywhere else. Your youngest daughter Kate also has As sprinkled with some A minuses, and figure that she must also be pretty smart, or have helpful siblings. You are a little upset to see that your son Max got a C in history, but he did well in his other courses, a good mix of As and Bs. You notice that there is one class you do not recognize called "Gender Interaction". You guess that since all males seem to be extremely small compared to anthro females, there has to be a class in this timeline's schools so that boys and girls can learn to act appropriately without accidentally squashing the tiny humans. All of your children have As in this class, and Heather and Max both have A pluses!

"Wow, it looks like eveyone did a great job this year!" exclaims your wife, and you notice that your children are all huddled close together along with you and the massive lupine. "How about we all celebrate the good year with a trip to the park? It's a beautiful day, and we don't have anything special planned." The huge children all seemed very excited, and even Max looked ecstatic as he jumped around a bit on Heather's thumb pad. The children started heading straight to the front door, and you soon feel yourself rising a few miles as your wife gets up and simultaneously brings you to a comfortable seat right between her beautiful eyes. As she walks to the humongous front door and starts to open it, you settle in her soft gray facial fur a bit until you feel yourself sink in a few feet. You wonder how the family is going to the park today.
1321112.title: Proud Parents

13211121.content:
After you all get your coats on your wife places you on top of her muzzle while Heather lets Max ride on her shoulder. Once you set off you notice that the world is to the scale of the females; makes sense considering that it would be very awkward if it was the other way round.

As your wife and daughters walk down the street on the way to the park something occurs to you. Since you've only just awoken in this universe and there are some new elements of your lifestyle, aside from having a titanic wife and equally colossal daughters. You wonder how you're going to cope with all the new things this world is throwing at you. For instance you have no idea how you managed in your Gender Interaction classes.
13211121.title: A Small Problem

132111211.content:
"Um, dear, there's something that I have to talk to you about," you mutter, very embarrassed and afraid. The huge eyes before you focus in on you and look positively worried.

"Is there a problem, my love? You know you can tell me anything." she spoke softly, out of the range of the children, but loud and clear to you.

You hesitate, then ask, "Well, when I woke up today ... I don't know how to say this, but everything has been so new and unfamiliar to me today, I can't remember any of this. I feel like I have just met you, but feel like you've always been my wife at the same time." You start feeling terrible, and almost want to cry.

Your wifes huge head nods very slightly and slowly as you talk, and you feel like you're on a slowly rocking ship. "It's okay, my love, it's all right. I still love you with all my heart. Whatever happens will never change that." Her huge, skyscraper-sized finger gently pats your back, and you feel much better. You decide that now is the best time to ask what her name is.

"Sorry, my giant angel, I hate to ask you this, but can you remind me what your name is?"

Continuing to stroke you, your wolf wife whispers her name, "Veronica."

You love that name as soon as you hear it, and respond, "Thanks, ... Veronica."

Veronica smiles, which you cannot see underneath you, but you can read in her huge, soft eyes. "Veronica, while we walk to the park, can you tell me something about our past, to help me remember?"

"Of course, my little man, I would be delighted to," she speaks, and starts telling about your...
132111211.title: She Understands

choices: You all arrive at the park, back in the present
You're not at the park yet, so she tells you about your wedding
1321112111.content:
Apparently, you are in luck, as your lupine wife Veronica apparently can remember even the finest details of your life together. You listen to her story, and as she tells it, you do feel like you were actually there. These feelings could only be due to the fact that you indeed must have had the experience in this new world.

Your first kiss was with Veronica, during your third year of high school. You had known each other since your first year at Fur Valley High, but as good friends at first. It was at the school prom where you would realize that you were made for each other. You had asked her to be her date that night, and she accepted without any hesitation.

Apparently, Human Interaction was both of your strengths, as only those students with As in that class were allowed to actually dance with each other. This made complete sense, as if a female anthro was not perfectly coordinated to handle a male human, or if the male was not careful around the female, an activity such as dancing could prove disasterous. However, you two were naturals on the dance floor, her fluid movements and your stamina and footwork balancing each other perfectly. During one dance, Veronica performed a jitterbug, her hindpaws flying over your head at dazzling speeds as you danced underneath her. During the slow dance, you waltzed around her huge palm, her gigantic index claw leading your movements. You two were pronounced prom king and prom queen last night.

When Veronica carried you home that night, she mentioned how wonderful a time she had, her muzzle close to your body standing on her finger. "You know, this has been the best night of my life. I'm so glad that you invited me, my good friend, it wouldn't had been nearly as enjoyable with anyone else."

You then replied, "I'm so happy you had a good time. I wish that prom didn't have to end, just so we could be have fun and be happy forever!"

Her massive lips descended suddenly yet sensually, burying you in their softness. She felt you return her kiss, the tiniest warm wet spot on her lip, and her tongue lolled out, covering you in a fine coat of saliva. It was then that you knew that you would spend the rest of your lives with each other.
1321112111.title: First Kiss

choices: Your wife tells you about the day Heather was born.
13211121112.content:
Your wife tells you that one of the happiest days of her life was the day she married you, the others being the days her children were born. Yours was a traditional wedding, but as Veronica explained it in great detail, you realize that a traditional wedding is not what you originally considered to be traditional.

Both your families were there, but instead of one on the left and one on the right, they were mixed. The men sat in a aisle that was traditionally held in the paws of the groom's mother, which in this case was your mother. Her name was still Mabel and her personality sounded like hers, except now she had become a huge otter anthro.

Veronica was dressed in a beautiful flowing gown with a three mile trail, and she carried you down the aisle. She was crying tears of happiness that day, and she kept wiping her facial fur with tissues to prevent the 'wet dog' smell from messing up the wedding.

The wedding vows were different than what you remember; different tasks were directed to different genders. Your wife's were, "Do, you, Veronica, take Harold to be your lawfully wedded groom, to have and to hold, to protect and to care for, to love unto death?"
She, of course said, "I do." Your vows were, "Do you, Harold, take Veronica to be your lawfully wedded wife, to have and to be held by, to respect and be devoted to, to love unto death?" You also agreed, saying, "I do."

The exchanging of rings was different than you knew. Since it would take thousands of humans to lift a single anthro-sized ring, the ring-bearer, your cousin in this case, placed the ring on Veronica's huge finger. Veronica still placed the ring on your finger herself; an impressive feat for such a large being.

Of course, you then kissed your bride. This kiss was even more amazing than your first kiss, as true love and passion was put into it. As for the cake, Veronica just winks at you and says, "Let's just say that it took weeks to clean your tux." You do not hear anything about rice being thrown; very likely because that would be very dangerous for the humans.
13211121112.title: Wedding Day

132111211121.content:
You hear Kate cry with joy and all your other children expressing more controlled happiness. Looking up you see that you're now at the park.

"It's all right." Veronica informed you. "It's up to you whether we can sit and talk or if we'll take a break and join in the fun." You feel really relaxed by your titanic wife's democratic and reassuring words.

You would like to recap about your past in this world but you also don't want to disappoint your kids. What do you wish to do?
132111211121.title: What to do?

1321112111212.content:
"It's okay," You reply, "We can recap more later on." Veronica smiles happily and plucks you off her muzzle.

Your children are all looking expectant; each one wondering what they would be doing for a day. Your eldest, Heather, showed signs that she would take care of Max; so you have a choice between one or both of your twin daughters and your youngest, Kate.

Who do you wish to join?
1321112111212.title: Play with the Kids

13211121112122.content:
