You ask Veronica to hand you over to Kate, your charming nine-year old daughter, standing somewhere between four and five miles high; as you are carefully lowered into Kate's expectant paw you can easily comprehend that no girl could ever feel puny in this universe when they could hold all the men and boys in their extended families in the mighty space in which you now stood. Kate eagerly lifts you up to her eye-level, the great orbs shining with excitement and expectation.

"What shall we do then, daddy?" She asks you; getting to your feet on her paw pad you think for a moment as you wonder how a 'little' girl and her father could play together.

"Well," You reply, "I think you're old enough to decide for yourself, my colossal cutie." Kate sqeals in delight but the sound is forgivingly quiet so as to not make you cringe. Immediately you find yourself thrust into Kate's chest as her natural love for you pours forth.

"Oh, daddy," She says as you find yourself comfortably sandwiched between her T-shirt and her paw, "You're so brave and kind." You're somewhat surprised to hear your nine-year old girl make such an observant statement, considering how hesitant you first felt in putting your life into the paws of a schoolgirl. She then gets an idea "Can we play...?"
13211121112122.title: Quality Time with Kate

132111211121221.content:
You were a little nervous when she said swings but you really didn’t wonna disappointment your little girl do you agreed to go play on the swings. “Yay!” Your gigantic daughter quietly said as she made her way over to the swings. While your daughter was walking over you were trying to think of how this was going to work, you couldn’t possibly push her. “Ok daddy here we go” Kate said as she gently sat down on the swing then placed you on the top of her head. “Hold on tight daddy” Kate said as she pushed back off the ground and you both began to swing. You held on tight to one of Kate’s hairs but you couldn’t get a good grip and you went rolling down her head towards her muzzle.

“Kate help!” You screamed hoping your daughter would save you but she didn’t seem to hear your cries for help. You continued to roll off her head then down her muzzle heading straight for her nose which lead to a most likely fatal drop.

What happens next?
132111211121221.title: On the Swings

choices: Kate asks you to give her tips on putting detail in
132111211121222.content:
You wonder what kind of activities you can have with your parish-sized daughter in the park's sandpit, but you accept her suggestion and let her carry you over there. Upon reaching the sandpit Kate sets you down on a tiny platform at the edge; this makes it clear that this society has made every allowance for a almost fully integrated society in spite of the sheer difference in size between men and women. You look up at your mountainous child as she begins to pile the sand together with her paws alone; you are originally confused since you don't know how a girl can make sandcastles without a bucket and spade until you look below the platform and see the reason why. Although the world is generally at a size suited for the mega-anthro females some aspects, like this sand, is more on a man's scale.

Before you know Kate has used her advantage in strength to squeeze the sand into a rock hard sandstone-like constituancy and has successfully built a simple sandcastle. Now she turns to you and pops a question.

"What do you think, daddy?" You look at the castle, which is massive by your standards but still looks smaller than you'd expect compared to your youngest.

"Kate," You reply, "I'm speechless. Your design is wonderfully simple but it's so big for something made to my scale." You can tell how easily your daughter can read your compliments when she gives you such a sweet smile.

"Would you like to take a closer look?" Kate asks and, still in awe as to the giant world in which you now live, you accept her offer.
132111211121222.title: Super-Sized Sandcastles

choices: Kate Carries you to a Bench
1321112111212221.content:
As you are ferried through the air on the tip of Kate's little finger the enormity of her sandcastle becomes all the more apparent. With all the skill her mother had shown you before Kate sets you down on a set of steps leading to the entrance. After waving up to her you proceed to look at the interior of this sandstone castle. It stuns you to find human-sized doors where you'd think Kate could not reach for such precise sculpture; you wander around the central courtyard with Kate peering over the castle walls and can't help but deliver another compliment accompanied with another pet name for such a mighty child of yours.

You look through the corridors and into the various rooms, nearly every one of them having one of Kate's eyes peering in as she affectionately watches her tiny father admire her work. There's even replicated furniture in these rooms to give you an idea of which room is which. Once you reach what must be the master bedroom you stand before the window as Kate peeps in on you and you comment on how her eyes remind you of her mother.

You must've spent over an hour checking out Kate's work when you're sure it took her much less time to cosntruct it; now that you've finished you identify the highest tower and begin to climb the spiral staircase, thinking over everything that happened today and wondering at how patient Kate is with you. Once you're up on top you feel a light warm breeze wash over you; turning in its direction you are practically bowled over by your close proximity to Kate's doggy-nose.

"Do you like it, daddy?" She asks, lifting her head slightly so you can see the smug smile on her face. It's cute to you but at the same time it is also scary as you can see her titanic white teeth.

"It's a castle fit for a king, dear gigantic Kate." You reply as she rises even higher, wanting to sit more comfortably.

"Thanks dad; my art teacher did say that I had a bit of a flare for sculpting." Now you become all the more curious about your family's life.

"Say, Kate, my cute colossal girl," You ask her, "Would you like to talk about your school life with me." Kate is surprisingly happy to hear this from you. It makes you wonder how much you talked with her in the past. She snatches you up from her handiwork and sets you down on her muzzle.
1321112111212221.title: Kate's Creation gets the Once Over

1321112112.content:
You listen to Veronica as she details your wedding day; it's amazingly vivid to you, as though you were having a flashback.

You chose a traditional wedding, even though that doesn't necessarily mean Christian church. There were similarities, though, to your original idea of a traditional wedding but you found it to be no suprise that there were clear differences.

Although the groom still waited for the bride to come down the central passageway, he would wait in his mother's hand. Instead of the bride's father giving the bride away the groom's mother gave the groom away, quite literally placing him in the bride's hand.

You could see it all. Dressed smart, standing in your anthro-wolf mother's palm; watching the vast doors open and your titanic fiancée thooming down the central passageway, her train must've been over a mile long, probably exceeding two miles.

The congregation was set up in an interesting way. While it was still groom's friends and relatives on one side and the bride's on the other the men sat in an aisle held by the bride's mother or by the groom's sister/first cousin. The minister was a female, although male ministers were not unheard of. The marriage vows were also unusual.

"Do you, Veronica <insert maiden name here> take <insert name here>, to have and to hold, to love and protect, to cherish and care for, in sickness and in health, for bigger for smaller, for richer for poorer, till death do you part?" And yours were. "Do you, <insert name here> take Veronica <insert maiden name here>, to be kept and to be held by, to honour and respect, to admire and love, in sickness and in health, for bigger for smaller, for richer for poorer, till death do you part?"

The ring was also a different caper. Veronica still placed your ring on your finger; an amazing feat of delicate movement for such a vast lass. However you could not very well place her ring on her finger for it was the size of a major roundabout at the least to you; instead the best woman (one of your cousins) did it for you since she was on Veronica's scale.

The experience of being given away was breath-taking; your mother did not carefully lower you into Veronica's palm but instead dropped you into the vast plain of her hand.

At the end you and Veronica kissed; which nearly always ended up with you sticking to her lower lip, although sometimes you did end up on her upper lip.

You continue to listen Veronica describing your wedding...
1321112112.title: A Whopper of a Wedding

1322.content:
You wake up to find yourself lying upon a fuzzy surface; it's surprisingly soft and comfy compared to what you'd expect, first believing it to be a carpet.

Just then you feel a ripple move through this surface as you sit up and a low but soothing groan comes across the shadowy landscape that rises before you. Just then the 'ground' shifts beneath you, making you fall on your back; the impact is no more uncomfortable than a bouncy castle, without the bounce.

Looking up you see an enormous eye peer down on you; it is a massive orb of the most beautiful colour with a vast black edifice for a pupil, yet you can see your reflection in the giant peeper. Clearly you're riding upon the finger of a giant, but the furriness is surprising until you're held further away from the eye. You now have an unobscured view of a massive buck rabbit-anthro; a smile upon his muzzle that is not one of a cat who's got the mouse but of affection and kindness makes you feel safe and secure in this mega anthro's clutches. Then the rabbit speaks to you in a grand echoing voice that is still surprisingly soft and sooting for his size.

"Good morning, darling." He says.
1322.title: For the Girls

choices: He tells the story of how you got married and ended up with kids
13221.content:
You stared at the giant face of this huge furry being. His eyes peer down at you affectionately but you head no memory of such a grand being. Its even more shocking how he names you in such a loving way...but who can he be. You needed to answer back so he would have no strange suspicion of something is wrong. "Good morning to you too, honey," you said with a false smile. You watched as his face loomed closer till all you can see was his mouth. 132212.title: Young Love

1322122.content:
As Samantha lay upon Joseph's muzzle, looking up into either of his behemoth brown eyes, she suddenly became conciencious of the passage of time; she turned round in the hopes of seeing an alarm clock or something like that but all she could see was the simple wallpaper, the bedside lamp and her colossal boy bunny.

"Sammy," Joseph asked her with the concern in his voice all too clear, "Is something wrong? Did I embarrass you?" She turned back to his gigantic peepers and smiled reassuringly.

"Oh, no dear." She answered. "I was just wondering what the time was." The concern in his colossal eyes now shifted into relief and contentment.

"Why didn't you say?" His teasing voice made her all the more aware of their size difference and she cringed in the way that indicated that she wasn't genuinely embarrassed but happily submissive. "Go on," He continued, "Have a look." Samantha wasn't sure why he just said that but turned and now saw that he was holding an alarm clock in his paw. It was like looking at the clock of Big Ben from just fifty feet way when it must've been about three miles away.

"Is that the time?" She cried out, getting to her feet. Getting the hint from her miniscule form Joseph rose from the bed and returned the clock to the bedside table; his shift made Samantha tumble onto her back but she found it quite fun.

"Shall we get ready together," He asked, "Or would you like to do it on your own?" Samantha checked to see if he wanted to have her with him while getting ready; there was no plea in his massive eyes so she decided to do it in a way that seemed familiar to her.

---

It was rather a surprise to find a bathroom to her scale through a door on the wash stand. Having sorted herself out in here she found no clothes so she returned to Joseph's bathroom and was readily whisked back to the bedroom. Her clothes were in a pile characteristic of students but in the unorthodox location that was her great big bunny's English notebook. Neither of them could take their eyes off each other as they dressed; the giant rabbit's eyes almost permamently locked onto her tiny form and she was unable to admire his mighty physique as he put his T-shirt on.

Upon entering the kitchen Samantha was agog by the sight of it; everything had to be no less than a mile in its proportions; her mind wondered how easily she could fit into even the smallest gap. Before she could go too far into her wonderings she was set down upon the side.

"What would you like for breakfast, darling?" He asked. She did what she could to avoid thinking about being breakfast before settling for...
1322122.title: What's for Breakfast?

13222.content:
You wake up in what feels like your bed but there's a miss, your bedroom is not there; your furniture is but not your bedroom. All you can see is a vast light brown plateau stretching off into the distance until you are confronted with a very weird landscape beyond.

As you sit up in your bed you are totally confused by this setting. Just as you try to make out what your surroundings are you see a vast mountain rising in the distance with astonishing rapidity. It moves higher and higher and also seems to be moving sideways; it's a bewildering and terrifying spectacle.

The frightening sight now reveals its true form as it sits propped up against a pair of titanic limbs. You're witness to a mega anthro fox! This giant swings its mighty legs out of what you now recognise as a bed big enough to support your home town and its green belt and still have room to spare. As the mega-giant rises to its full height of something six miles, give or take a mile, you see that this super-sized anthro has a female appearance. She looks not only in your direction but right at you! You freeze with fear and awe, transfixed by being under the gaze of eyes bigger than houses. She takes a couple of strides and casts you in shadow; she then says something that is not deafening but instead is at a volume that is not disturbing but still commanding and gentle but still humbling. What she says, though, is more surprising than her vastness.

"Good morning, little bro."
13222.title: BIG Sister!

choices: Your Anthro Mother is making Breakfast
132221.content:
You're astonished. This mega-anthro fox not only addresses you with such familiarity but you also recognise her voice as being that of your sister, Fiona. You decide to address her as such.

"Good morning... Fiona." You did not address her too informally as her sheer sze was overwhelming. She seemed to be a might puzzled by your greeting.

"You're leaving off the teasing, then?" She inquires, you look a trifle baffled as you cannot see how a brother could openly tease a sibling the size of a city and live long enough for it to become familiar. "I do find it embarrassing when you call me 'Fi-fai-fo-fum'." She comments as she lowers a claw for you to climb on. That sort of nicknaming makes sense to you since her immense scale just cannot be ignored.

You ride Fiona into the bathroom, where she sets you down on the side of the sink. With great skill she fills a cup that is smaller than a thimble to her but is still a bucket to you. Once she sets it down you see that your toothbrush and toothpaste are set in the side of it. You fish them out and lean over the side of the cup so as to brush your teeth.

While doing so you can clearly hear Fiona brushing her canine teeth. The sound of her toothbrush scraping against her stalagtites and stalagmites for teeth is the sound of a large steam engine pulling out of the station. When the tap runs it is like the sound of a great unbroken waterfall tumbling into a gorge. When she takes water to rinse her mouth you hear the sound of a tsunami mixed with that of a hurricane in the distance. When she swills her mouth it is like great waves (the common beach ones) washing over one another and when she gargles it is like the sound of an erupting geyser over a rock concert speaker system.

Once you've finished brushing your teeth Fiona taps a particular space on the wall against the sink. You walk over to it and see that it's a shower door, conveniently at your scale. Looking up at your massive anthro sis you notice that she's preparing to remove her pyjamas and immediately go into the shower.

After the shower you feel around for your clothes, not wanting to expose yourself to your elder sister, especially at that size. You hear her familiar giggle and find one of her claws kindly proferring your clothes like it was a clothes peg. You take these and dress in a dry area of the shower alcove.

Once you are both fully dressed Fiona carries you downstairs to the kitchen.
132221.title: My Sister's a Giant

1322211.content:
As you enter the living room you notice that it's exactly as you remember but on an understandably much larger scale; Fiona swiftly ferries you through the room to the kitchen with a call of.

"Morning mum." You swiftly turn to look upon your mother, immediately bowled over upon seeing that she too is an anthropomorphic giant vixen; as of yet you cannot determine whether she's bigger or smaller than your sister.

"Good moaning." She teases in response; you smirk as you figure that it is still the mother you know in all those tons of fox.

"Good moaning." You answer her.

"You had better take your seats," She says, "Breakfast is nearly ready." With that Fiona turns to the breakfast table; at first you can only see two seats but, as Fiona settles into one, you see a much smaller copy of this table in the middle of the vast plain of beechwood.

"Morning dad." Fiona greets; you look around wondering where he is.

"Hey there, queen Kong." You hear him reply in a distant sounding tone.

"Oh, dad!" Fiona responds. You realise that he's already seated at the table as you notice a silhouette at one end.

"Morning." You call down to him. The response is a stifled laugh.

"She always stops you being late." He answers as Fiona carefully and successfully sets you down right in the seat opposite him just as your mother comes in, every step resonating through the floor and up the tablelegs. There is a plate for Fiona and a plate for herself holding a full English breakfast that could drown London, Birmingham and Glasgow combined and that's just your mother's. She then takes a strange utensil and takes a sample of everything from her plate and deposits it on your father's while Fiona does the same for you. As you look at what you and your father are having the titans now take a drop from their cups of tea and drip it into the boys' mugs. It is strange to eat just crumbs of breakfast but it will be more than enough for you; a bit of baked bean in a drop of tomato sauce, a crumb of toast, a bit of sausage meat, a bit of bacon, a piece of egg white, a piece of mushroom and even a crumb of black pudding.

Fiona then looks at her watch and then gives a look of surprise. "Uh-oh, come on bro. Can't be late on the first day of the school year." "School?" you ask. Then you realize something, you were going to be going to heading towards a school for giant anthros. You were going to speak but Fiona picks you up and places you on the shoulder as your dad lets out a laugh and turns to your mom.

"It's forty minutes until school starts," says your mom. "That Fiona. Always in a rush. Gets that from your side of the family." Your father gives a nervous laugh as you both put on your backpacks. "Bye Mom," you say. "See you later Dad." "Wait one moment." Says your Mom. Your Mom snatches you from your titanic sister's shoulder and smooches you hard, covering you in lipstick and fox saliva. Fiona's eyes pop as she continues walking. "Are you mental? We've always been this big. We're girls after all. I think your basketball team's last game had a worse effect than I thought." You give a confused look. "I told Dominique to be careful with her drink. One of the ice cubes hit you on the head."

So that explains your amnesia. But this was all too unreal. Before you can take another step further Fiona stops in her tracks. "Heads up little man." She says. Someone was coming forward and from the sound of it, it was another titanic anthro and it sounded like she was even bigger than Fiona. But what kind.

The irde on your ultra-titanic wife was mind-blowing. The table seems to stretch on for eternity; you could probably accomodate an entire city on its surface and still have room for all the farmland and sundry required for a first world city to function. "What?" she says staring back at you in shock.

"I can tell from how you're treating me that you care for me a lot, but I don't remember a single thing about you, all I remember is having a dream and waking on top of you" you say

You see tears start to well up in her eyes and a claw descends toward you, you stand there waiting for the end but it doesn't come. Instead you feel it come under you and she pulls you close to her chest and holds you there. After a few seconds she puts you back on her palm and says "my name is Cecilia dear, and if you can't remember anything i'll just have to remind you. You have 3 daughters, Lucy who's you're 16 year old sweetie, Jillian who's 14 and a bit of a problem but you'll never find a smarter girl, and Mary who's 8 and just an angel." She starts crying again as she realises that you won't be able to recognize you're own children.

You walk over and hug one of her fingers saying "Cecilia don't cry, just because I can't remember doen't mean my feelings have changed" you say. Wiping the tears away she says "Well dear it's about time we went downstairs and had breakfast, and it's time for you to get you're memories back." She gets up and places you down on the bedside table where a brown dot which you realize is a dresser sits, she then walks over to her own dresser and starts picking clothes. You try to compare how large you're wife is to yourself by comparing dressers and you make an estimate that she is around 6 miles tall. You quickly pick a long white shirt and a pair of slacks and you turn to see you're wife who is now garbed in a white dress creating a beautiful harmony with her silver scales. Cecilia walks over and offers you a claw which you grab onto as she whisks you up and places you on her shoulder. She walks downstairs into a large kitchen, about as large as some national parks. She places you down on a linoleum counter as she starts grabbing foodstuffs from the fridge and cupboards. "You alright with bacon and eggs dear?" Cecilia asks you.

"That sounds lovely" you reply as you feel the counter shake, "what's happening?" you ask.

"Oh good the children are up" she replies staring down at you with a smile on her face.

You turn and see three giant silver blurs rush down the stairs till they're all standing beside their mother. Lucy who was the oldest was only a bit smaller then her mother, Jillian is a head shorter then her sister and Mary was to normal persepctive maybe 1.5 to 2 feet shorter then Lucy. When you saw her shining eyes you knew why you're wife called her an angel. Each of them gives their mother a hug and then Lucy asks "Where's dad?"

"He's on the counter" she replies while tending to some bacon.

"I found him" Jillian cries looking directly at you, "morning Dad" she says with a smile on her face. "Morning Jillian" you reply although this causes a frown to cross her face. "Dad why didn't you call me you're little moon like always" she asks

"You're father isn't exactly himself today" Cecilia says.

"Daddy" Mary says and you turn to her, she offers you her claw which you climb upon and she hugs you close to her. "Morning sweetie" you say as she holds you there until you're eldest daughter puts her clawed hand forward and you're passed to her. "Morning dad" she says leaning down and giving you a kiss. "Morning Lucy, you're as sweet as ever" you say. She gently pushes against you making sure not to use the tip of her claw and you just smile. "Everyone you can play with you're father later, right now it's time for breakfast" Cecilia says carrying 4 plates of bacon and eggs to the table. Lucy places you down in front of you're mothers plate and you notice a little table and chair that's just you're size. Cecilia produces some kind of syringe device which she sticks into her bacon and then her eggs and then places the perfect sized proportions of food down on you're table. She then repeats the process with a glass of orange juice. You dig in along with the rest of the family and there isn't much talking at first.

"What's wrong with Dad, Mom" Jillian asks.

"What do you mean Jillian" Cecilia replies.

"He's not acting normal, and he's called me his little moon every day for years" she says.

"Well girls you see...." she then turns to you and stares at you with a look like, don't make me have to tell them
132222221.title: continue this storyline

1322222211.content:
"I.....well I can't remember anything" you say (you do keep you're memories of you're other life but you're not telling them that). You're three daughters look down at you stunned.

Lucy bends over and looks down at you with one 1 house sized eye, "you're definitley our father, so that means that what you just said was the truth" she says starting to break down as she says it. As Lucy breaks down so too do the other 2, Cecilia walks over and hugs them and you just sit there not really sure about what you can do at a time like this. Cecilia leads them into the living room where you continue to hear you're daughters weeping, even though you don't know them you feel really bad that you're causing them pain. After about 10 minutes Cecilia walks in with a stern look on her face and she lowers a claw down to you which you climb onto. She walks back into the living room and she sets you down and sits on the titanic couch in front of you with Lucy and Jillian on either side of her and Mary sitting in her lap.

"What exactly is going on?" you ask.

"Well dear since you can't remember you're life we'll just have to re-introduce you to it starting with the most important parts" she says. "You may have noticed that I as well as you're daughters are huge and not exactly human, well all females here compared to the men are gargantuan and we all are some kind of anthromorphic animal" she says. "As you already know you have 3 daughters they are each going to introduce themselves to you" she says as she gently pushes Lucy forward. Lucy still looks really sad, so you stand up and say "if it's really painful you don't have to go through with it." She shakes her head and lowers a claw down to you which you grab onto, the claw quickly raises to face level and she just stares at you for a few seconds.

She takes in a few breaths and begins, "dad you've always been supporting me ever since I can remember, even though mom had to do a lot of the things a father did I still remember you teaching me to read and write, even though it took you 5 minutes to make a readable a" she says laughing a little. "You were always the first and last to clap during any of my performances and you even comforted me after Brian rejected me." She says falterng for a moment but then trying to smile again. "So dad even if you say you can't remember anything I can accept that as long as i'm still you're "little" girl" she says. You see a tear run down her face and you say "Lucy can you bring me closer" she does so and you jump on top of her. You run forward until she has to go cross-eyed to see her and you hug her. "Lucy I may not remember anything but I can already tell you're a sweet, kind girl don't ever change that about you" you say. You're pulled back and ever so gently hugged against her chest "thanks dad" she says bending over and putting you back on the table. Jillian is gently pushed forward and she now offers you a claw which you take.

You can see sadness in her eyes and she gently hugs you before beginning. "Dad you were always trying to protect me even though you knew you were well way out of you're league. I remember the time you hid in my backpack and almost got fired to stop 2 girls from bullying me even though they could have killed you." she says. "You were always encouraging me to learn and read as much as I could even staying up late to read with me. So I just want you to know I love you Dad" she says. You get up and she stares at you for a second. "Jillian can you lift me up for a sec" motioning for her to bring you up to her cheek. You lean over and kiss one of her scales, "thanks Jillian" you say as she puts you back down on the table.

Finally Mary stands up and you grab onto her offered claw. "Daddy I love you" she says, "I love you too sweetie" you reply. She hugs you for a second before placing you down on the table and running off. You shrug but she comes back in a few seconds with a piece of paper and picks you up. You look down and even though the picture is in crayon you can tell it's supposed to be a picture of you and her with a bunch of hearts surrounding you 2. You smile up at her and she smiles back, "Thanks angel" you say. She lifts you up and you give her a kiss on the nose causing her to giggle as she hands you over to Cecilia.

"Darling you're children have reminded you about them now it's time to remind you about us." she says.
1322222211.title: You tell them

13222222111.content:
(yes this is pretty much gonna be one long quote with little quotes in it)

"Dear the day you and I met was in the first year of high school. Each girl was assigned a guy to watch over through their high school years, this was to make sure there weren't just a ton of random missing people but also to help get the next generation going. I remember when I picked you up for the first time you said "principal are you sure you want to create a beauty and the beast couple," it made me giggle and I think that's when I fell for you. After that we spent a lot of time together not only because of school but because as time went by we found we shared a lot of common interests. I remember when you asked me to be you're muse for art class, you were such a gentleman since the men were allowed to ask the girls to pose nude for them, all you ever asked me to wear were long dresses because "a princess has to look her part." you'd always say. When you first asked me out on a date I was overjoyed, even though you barely had any money, like the rest of the guys since they can't do much you insisted on paying for both of us. You did pretty well scholarly but the one class you and I both aced was relations class."

"Ok I definitley don't remember that" you say

"It's a course where girls and boys learn to be near each other, girls learn to watch for men and do normal activities around them like cook, clean, and dance. Boys learn how to treat a woman right and some other things" she says not finishing the sentence. "Anyways one of the happiest days of my life had to be when you asked me out to the prom, Only the students who advanced relations class were actually allowed to dance since there was such a chance of injury. I will never forget the slow dance, it was a waltz and even though you were dancing on my hand with my claw as you're partner you had a smile on you're face that everyone in the room noticed. At the end of the dance you asked me if I could take you to a certain tree at the back of the school. You confessed to me right then and there, and I raised you up to kiss you. You leaned forward to kiss me and I accepted it so readily I almost squished you," she says twiddling her thumbs a bit "Even after that and even though you're so small I've never felt a stronger embrace as you hugged me as I was apologizing to you, you said "it's ok beautiful, just don't make the same mistake on our wedding night or we may have a problem" with a big smile on you're face. At that moment I broke down a little bit and you chided me saying "hey now I don't ever want to see the woman I love cry, because that means i'm not doing my job right."

Next she tells you about you're...
13222222111.title: How you first met

choices: "Well it's summer so we can play"
The girls have their first dance on monday let's go dress shopping
132222221111.content:
(Yes pretty much another flashback/explanation chapter told from Cecillia's point of view, to make it easier after she says something within the larger quote it will say she said afterwards)

"The second happiest day of my life dear had to be the day we got married, second only to each day of my daughters birth" Cecilia says giving each of her girls a squeeze. "We had a very old fashioned wedding, I carried my father up to the altar while you were carried up by my mother and then handed over to me. While you were standing there my father shook you're hand and said "take good care of my daughter, I give you my blessing." "She'll be more taking care of me but i'll do my best father" you replied returning the handshake. My father was then taken over by my mother to where my sister was standing, she was holding all the male guests on a tiny wooden pew. You're mother was standing beside her and you assumed she was holding you're father she gave off the same feeling as you're mother but she had turned into a giant anthro bunny. The priest walked up to the mike and said "we are gathered here today to join these 2 in holy matrimony, if anyone has any objections speak now or forever hold you're peace." The church was deathly silent so the priest went on.

"Do you Cecillia dragontale take this man to have and to hold, to love and respect, in sickness and health, for poor or for wealth, to care for and watch over for the rest till death do you part."

"I Do" she said

"Do you Alex take this dragoness to love and to care for, to fawn over and love, in sickness and health till death do you part." the priest

"I Do" you said

"I hereby pronounce you 2 husband and wife" the priest said.

The exchange of rings was very interesting, my sister put the ring on my finger in place of you, but I still put the ring on you, you had to manouver you're hand a bit but when we were both wearing our rings the whole church erupted into cheers. I then leaned over and kissed you so hard I pushed you straight back into my palm, thankfully you were smart enough to lay back so you weren't hurt and you kissed me back with all you're might. The whole church erupted into cheers a second time as I held you it was one of the happiest moments of my life. We all came back here for the reception party and it was wonderful, although we did have to put the party on hold for a few minutes after you fell off my hand into the cake. I found you quickly and plucked you out of the cake. We ate the piece together and you were smiling the whole time, afterwards the champage was served and even though it was our wedding night you didn't touch the stuff. after the reception I was kind of tipsy from the alcohol you encouraged me upstairs and stroked my hair as I was sleeping. You watched over me for maybe 3 hours and I slowly woke up afterwards with a headache. "Geez you really went at that alcohol what did you need all that liquid courage for anyways" you asked me.

"I was hoping to make our wedding night memorable" she replies, you then leaned down and kissed one of my scales saying "Cecilia every day with you is memorable, now can I come snuggle with you or do I have to sleep on the cover on our wedding night." I picked you up and brought you close to my chest and held you there making sure you were safe. "Good night Cecilia my lovely dragon" you said "Good night lover" she said." Cecillia finishes talking and her eyes mist up as she remembers what you said.

She then turns to you and asks "so did you mean what you said on that night?"

"Of course I did, Cecillia you're the most beautiful dragoness i've ever seen, most men would kill to be near you and I was blessed enough to marry you and have 3 wonderful kids with you" you say, "yet I lost all that when I lost my memory, so if it hurts not having me able to remember you and if you wish it i'll leave" you say.

"Oh Alex" she says hugging you to her chest she then lifts you up to her face and her tongue gently rolls over you covering you in saliva she then sniffs the air and nods.

"What was that?" you ask

"You now have my scent on you, I forgot to do that on our wedding night even though it's a dragon's most important mating ritual" she says laughing a little. "That scent will last on you till you die and until then you're mine and my brood's alone, got that?" she says staring down at you with her gentle amber eyes.

"Whatever you wish beautiful" you reply, she raises you up to her face and you kiss her and returns the favour.

"Aww that's so cute" Lucy says.

"Dad I want a kiss next" Mary says.

Cecilia passes you over to you're daughter who gently kisses you and then passes you back to her.

"That's great dad but how are we going to get the rest of you're memories back?" Jillian asks.

"Is there something like a scrapbook we could use" you say.

"Sorry honey but I never had time to create something like that" Cecilia says.

"No offense girls but did I miss anything important like you're first kiss?" you ask.

They all shake their heads so you ask "so is it okay if I don't fully remember that stuff?" you ask again. They nod and you smile at the understanding of you're children.

"Is there anything I can do for my gorgeous wife and kids to try and make up for this?" you ask
132222221111.title: wedding

choices: You decide you want to go with the kids to their lessons
1322222211111.content:
"Well dad it's summer, so there's no school, that means we have the whole day to play" Jillian says smiling.

"So how do we play again?" you ask, "you know given the size difference."

"Oh don't worry dad i'll show you" Jillian says offering you a claw which you grab onto, she then runs up stairs into what you assume is her room. The room is entirely red with random stuffed animals littering the floor. You notice a tv with some sort of game system attatched to it opposite the bed and you think "damn I let my kid have a tv in their room, i'm awesome" smiling to yourself. Jillian places you on her shoulder and then rummages through a drawer producing a mini-tv, a mini game system, a controller and a single cord that was much smaller on one end then the other. She sticks the cord into the tv and quickly sets up the mini-system which as you watched must have taken an amazing amount of hand-eye coordination. She places you down on the tv, sticks a pair of headphones into the jack and turns the system on. You turn you're tv and system on and find that the 2 systems are linked. "Makes sense that they came up with more 'nano-tech' here given the size difference" you think. You are up against you're daughter in an anthro dragon ball z fighting game. You laugh to yourself given that the situation you were in would make a perfect anime. You pick the main character and quickly learn that the female opponents aren't super powered, they're just regular anthro size. Needless to say you get trounced, however after that first match you go hardcore and even though you were never that good at fighters, she kept under estimating you and you got a flawless victory each round for the next 10 rounds. You feel her breath on you're back and she's staring down at you "since when did you get any good at this kind of game, I used to go undefeated against you" Jillian says. You rub the back of you're head and say "Um....amnesia increases you're gaming skills." She just stares down at you and says "suspicious" and is about to question you more when Lucy pops her head in and says "Um...Dad can I play with you for a bit?" she asks.

You nod happy to get away from you're prying 14 year old and Lucy walks in and offers you a claw. You gladly climb up and Jillian just stares as you are whisked away. Lucy quickly reaches her room, which looked a lot more like a girls room, everything was neat and tidy and each wall was painted pink. There was a dresser on one wall and a larger bed then Jillians took up the center of the room. Lucy places you down on the bed and lays down next to you. "So Lucy what do you want to do, for Jillian it was video games" you say smiling up at you're titan sized daughter.

She blushes a bit and says "Dad would you mind rubbing my back?"

"Huh?" is all you can say in return.

"You used to do it whenever I felt sad" Lucy says starting to tear up.

"Ok, ok" you say, "yay" she yells quickly scooping you up with a claw and placing you on her back. Shrugging you start rubbing the scales although you really didn't think you were doing all that much as it took you a minute to cover what you assumed was a centimetre on you're daughters back. Yet she gave off a happy somewhat roaring sound the whole time, after half an hour and you giving it you're all you assumed you covered maybe a quarter of a city block, and you sit down panting absolutely exhausted. Lucy gently turns over so you slide off her back, she then scoops you off the bed and says "thanks dad" before gently giving you a kiss. You blush a bit and reply "no problem sweetie, although I may have a few kinks to work out now." You pull you're arm back and actually hear a slight pop, it seems Lucy heard it as well as she giggles a bit before walking out of the room. She takes you into Mary's room which although it was a younger child's room looked very neat, everything that wasn't being used was put away and you smiled knowing how good a girl you're angel was. Lucy taps Mary on the shoulder and she turns and quickly spots you. She cups her hands and you're gently passed over, you're daughter stares down at you with a giant smile on her face and she gently hugs you.

"So what do you want to play Mary?" you ask her

"I want to play house" she says. You shrug and she quickly sets up a bunch of toys. "I'll be the mom, you be the dad, and mr.fluffers will be our daughter" she says indicating a stuffed rabbit many times you're size. It went along quite smoothly although there was one instance where she ran into Mr.fluffers and you just barely dodged getting squished. You then spent the next few minutes trying to calm her down and show her you were ok as it had really upset her that she well had almost ended you. After maybe an hour of playing with Mary you hear Cecillia yell "Kids it's time for lunch, get you're father and come downstairs." You grab onto Mary's claw and she holds you tight as she runs down the stairs. She places you down on the kitchen table next to Cecillia's spot and you're wife smiles at you. "So were the girls well behaved sweetie?" she asks.

"They were great, they took very good care of they're father" you reply. Cecillia smiles and you look over noticing that lunch is something more simple, just peanut butter and jelly sandwhiches. You look up at you're wife with a quizzical face and she smiles, she cuts off a piece and just places it next to you. "Eat up hunnie" she says although you can see her vibrating from the laughter as the piece she cut off although miniscule to her was easily 20 times you're size.

"Whatever you say" you reply before digging into the giant piece of sandwhich, after you're full you lay back and Cecillia says "girls don't you remember you have swimming lessons this afternoon." They all groan and Lucy says "but mom we want to stay with dad," you see a hint of a smile creep over Cecillia's face and she says "don't worry you're father will be fine here with me, we'll both be waiting for you when you get back."
1322222211111.title: "Well it's summer so we can play"

choices: You don't tell them the truth, you go to the beach instead
13222222111111.content:
"Girls listen to you're mother" you say adding an authoritative tone, shocking yourself. They respond in kind bowing their heads and saying "yes dad." "I knew that father in you hadn't disappeared" Cecillia says before hustling off the kids. You hear the sound of a motor and then silence for 15 minutes, you're first thought is "alright I can totally handle having a ginormous dragon wife and kids" however you quickly realize you're stuck on the kitchen table and then you're not so sure. You sit there for another 20 minutes until you hear the sound of a car pulling up and a door opening and closing. Cecillia walks in and sits down next to you. "So now that the kids are gone we have the next few hours to ourselves" she says.

"That's great to hear" you say smiling, Cecillia offers you a claw and you climb on, she lifts you up and gently gives you a kiss. You smile and she puts you down on her shoulder before heading back upstairs. She places you down on the bed and lies down next to you. "So how much do you actually remember?" she asks.

"Not very much you reply....except my other life" you whisper the last part to you're self. Thing is that dragons have really good hearing so Cecillia asks "what was that last thing you said?"

"Um.....nothing, nothing at all" you say. Cecillia lowers her head and moves forward so she's right over you "I heard you say something, dear you don't want me to get angry do you?" she says letting you see the glint of a fang. You knew that she cared for you but you weren't sure about a husband who had "amnesia" plus there was the whole you were like a grain of sand to her thing. She gently pushes you over with a claw and traps you under it. "Dear i'm not letting you out until you tell me what you whispered" Cecillia says with a stern look on her face.

"Ok well I have 2 options here, her getting mad at me for not telling her which is a sure-fire thing and her maybe getting mad at me for telling her the truth" you think. "Geez I really wish there was a third option right now," you actually wait a few seconds hoping for a doorbell or something but no such luck so you sigh and say "fine i'll tell you what's up." Cecillia lifts her claw off you then scoops you up with it and brings you up to face level. You walk onto her palm and sit down, she positions herself in a sitting position as well and stares at you expectantly. "Cecillia when I said I didn't remember you that was the truth, the thing is I don't have amnesia" you say, she looks at you strangely and says "what do you mean you don't have amnesia?"

"Well, this is going to sound weird but I am the man you married but i'm not, I fell asleep in my bed, last night and woke up sleeping on top of you, so in short i'm from a different reality or dimension" you say. She just stares at you dumbstruck for a second then a smile crosses her face "wow that's a pretty far out joke darling, you know I have a weird sense of humour but that's a little weird even for me" she says turning away.

"I'm not joking Cecillia, I really came from a different reality, I probably shouldn't be telling you this because you'll hurt from it but I will not create a relationship with you and you're daughters based on a lie" you say. She turns toward you and you see tears streaming down her face, "so what happened to my Alex?" she asks you. "He probably replaced me, I mean my life is the exact same as this one, except the women aren't over a mile tall or anthromorphs" you say. "There isn't a way to reverse this is there?" she asks, "no I don't think there is" you say. As you say this she breaks down and gently hugs you to her face, you can't do anything but hug her as she lets out her feelings. She cries for a good few minutes but eventually settles down and then she looks down at you and says "you're never going to see you're family ever again why aren't you crying." You shrug and say "you and my girls are the same as back home, so I never actually lost my family, besides from what i've heard of you're husband my wife and kids are in good hands" you say. "Although he's gonna have to get used to working every day" you say smiling a little. Cecillia looks down at you and slowly a smile crosses her face "you really are like my little treasure" she says, "for all intensive purposes I am you're treasure" you say. "There aren't any differences between the 2 of us, from what i've heard of him except the culture, even how I met my wife was similar." you say.

She lifts you up to her face and just stares at you for a second, she seems to make a choice and she raises her claw up. She pushes it toward you and gently gives you a poke with the curved part, "I need you to answer 3 questions for me" she says.

"Sure" you reply.

"What do you think of me?" she asks.

"You look very beautiful Cecillia, plus you're eyes just radiate gentleness" you reply.

She nods and asks "if you're there father will you take care of our girls?"

"Of course, as my own brood" you say smiling. She raises you straight up to her eye and stares at you for a few seconds and finally she asks "will you marry me?"

"What?" you reply.

"Well if you say yes, you'll become mine and mine alone" she says giving you a smile.

"Of course the answer is yes, although aren't the words till death do you part?" you say.

"I don't think it ever talked about people switching lives" she says, she leans down and gives you a gentle kiss "you may kiss the bride" she says pursing her lips and holding them above you expectantly. You lean up and kiss her putting you're whole heart into it trying to let her know you want to make this work. Strangely enough in you're minds eye as you do this you see him kissing you're wife with you're kids watching and they clap as the 2 break the kiss. Other you turns and you actually make eye contact with the guy, he mouths the words "take care of her" and the you nod, the vision then dissappears. You break the kiss and say "Cecillia, I just saw you're husband, he seems fine and did the same thing we did." She nods and you can see the joy and relief on her face, she then lays down on the bed and places you down on her chest. You sit down and ask "so what are we going to do about the girls I think Jillian suspects that there's something more different then just amnesia" you say.

"Oh well that could be bad" Cecillia says.

"Should we hide it?" you ask, "my family didn't seem to mind."

"I'm not sure" Cecillia says, she snuggles you close to her and says "so since we just got married I should know a bit more about you" she says.

"Well I love reading, video games, always wanted a family" she nods as you speak and seems to push you on "what else is there?" you ask.

"So far the 2 of you match up perfectly, but I want to give you a hypothetical" she says. "You have an important buisness meeting in a day but the night before you find out one daughter has her finals the next day and one of you're daughters is getting bullied what do you do?" she asks.

You think for a second and say "Of course i'd help one daughter study, and i'd probably skip the meeting to at the very least go see the principal of the school, if that doesn't work well more drastic measures would need to be taken." you say, you were confident in you're answer as you had done the exact same thing and nearly gotten fired for it. Cecillia smiles and says "you passed with flying colors."

"Oh yeah, for the sleeping arrangements i'll just sleep on the night table" you say.

You see a frown appear on her face and she says "you're my husband and you're sleeping with me" she says.

"That's ok, you don't fully know me yet..." you are cut off as she slices into the back of you're shirt with the very tip of one claw and lifts you up. She brings you closer to her and gently licks you "You are my dear little treasure, but you will do as you're told, understood?" she says

"Whatever you say hot stuff" you reply causing her to burst into a smile. She places you down on her collarbone and she lays her hand over you so tat her claws cover you but don't insert any weight on you. You lay like this for a bit till you ask"so Cecillia, no offense but how exactly do you fall for someone about the size of a speck to you?"

"Well they have to be really cute, and a kind person just like you hunnie" she says. Cecillia starts singing and the song is so enchanting and soothing, "you have a lovely singing voice Cecillia" you say.

"Aww thanks" she says giving you a little snuggle. (hehe pun) You lay like this till Cecillia looks up at the clock and says "oh the girls swimming lessons are over i'll go get them." You hear her walk downstairs and head out the garage door, you sigh in relief as things had gone easily better then expected. In about half an hour you hear the door open and you hear the girls run in. Cecillia comes in and you talk about wether or not you should tell the girls the truth. You come to a decision and Cecillia calls her brood upstairs, they all sit on the bed and wait expectantly.
13222222111111.title: You accept you're wife's wishes

choices: Cecillia says she should take the kids up to bed
There's a knock at the door
132222221111111.content:
"Girls they're something I have to tell you" you say. They lean forward and stare down at you. "I'm not you're real father" you say looking down.

"Aha I knew there was something wrong, dad sucked at video games" Jillian says.

"You're father's not finished talking Jillian" Cecillia says.

"Didn't he just say he's not our father?" Jillian asks.

"That's true yet not true at the same time" you say "i'm not the exact man you're mother married, i'm him from a different reality" you say. They all just look at you and Lucy says "ok mom stop joking, we'll just remove this imposter and you can show us " she says reaching for you. You feel Cecillia's tail wrap around you and pull you backwards. She lifts you up to her shoulder and places you down, "you will do no such thing" she says and you can feel the anger in her voice. Instantly her girls stop and she says "this man has graciously offered to be you're father and you will treat him as such, just as our Alex has offered to take care of his family."

"Wait so you mean this guy really is dad, and that dad is where he should be?" Lucy asks. Cecillia nods and she just sits there dumbfounded.

"You didn't seem to mind when you thought I had amnesia" you say.

"Yeah but that's because we thought you were still the same person" Jillian says.

"I am the same person" you reply. Throughout all of this Mary had been sitting there quietly you assumed because most of what you were saying was going over her head. She sits up and crawls over to her mother and offers you a claw, you look up at Cecillia who nods and you climb on. You're placed on her palm and she gently hugs you close to her.

"You give off the same warmth Dad does when I hug him" Mary says, she looks down at you for a second with her sparkling eyes "you are my Dad' she says before gently hugging you again. You smile like you never have before and Jillian and Lucy just look at their sister in shock.

"I knew my angel would understand" Cecillia says, she then turns to her 2 other daughters, "so what about you 2?" she asks. Jillian scootches over to her sister and offers a claw, you admit you were a bit apprehensive of taking it simply becuase you knew they didn't totally like you and could end you in a second. You walk onto the offered claw and you're quickly lifted up. You're daughter just stares at you for a bit Suddenly you're splashed as a giant tear hits near you and, she looks down at you and all she asks is "why>"

"Why what?" you ask back.

"Why'd you take our father from us?" she asks.

"I didn't take anyone from anything" you say getting a little peeved "look I was brought here just as you're dad was brought to my family, the thing is none of you has changed, sure there's some differences like taking 5 minutes to draw a letter but each of you are my family" you say. Jillian looks down at you for a minute and gently reaches down and lifts you up, she places you down on her nose and you walk it's length and sit between her eyes. "Look Jillian I know this has to be really tough for you, having some guy who is you're father but isn't just suddenly show up, but I promise you I will take care of all you girls and you're mother as my own family becuase from now on you are my family" you say. She gently picks you up and says "thank you, but we don't even know you're name."

"Well I am you're father so you can just call me dad, but my actualy name is the same as you're father's Alexander."

"Well dad looks like you still have 1 girl to talk to" Jillian says passing you over to Lucy.

You're eldest daughter looks down at you, and you can see a mix of fear, anger and sorrow in her eyes.

"So um...Dad what do you think of me?" Lucy asks.

"In what way?" you reply.

"Well how do I look?" she asks.

"You look very beautiful Lucy" you reply.

"Um...thank you, I was expecting you to say something different" she says looking at you.

You just stare up at her when the realization hits you "Lucy don't worry, you're father isn't going to oggle you" you say,

"But you're not our father!" Lucy replies quickly.

"Officially not yet, but as soon as Cecillia told me who each of you were you became family" you reply.

"Geez that's cheesy" Lucy says a weak smile crossing her face.

"Can't help it if it's true" you say.

"Fine you have to prove that you're father material" Lucy says.

"Fine" you say with a smile on you're face.

"I was just dumped by my boyfriend and come to you crying, what do you do?" she asks.

You pace back and forth a bit thinking then say "well first i'd probably give you a hug then let you cry out all you're emotions, then we'd probably talk for a bit and i'd tell you about how you deserve better or that you shouldn't give up if you truly do care for him, then probably some comfort food or something." you say grinning.

"Wow that was perfect" Lucy says.

"Perfect for what?" you ask.

"That was exactly what happened when she was dumped" Cecillia says.

"So I guess you pass" Lucy says, "but if you make my mom or sisters cry I won't forgive you" she continues.

"Understood" you say snapping to attention.

You're passed back over to Cecillia's who puts you down on her shoulder and says "so girls is there anything you want to do, I mean this has to be a big shock for you."

"Well we just kind of spent the last while getting over that shock, so i'm not sure." Jillian says.

"Cecillia I gotta ask, in this society do men work?" you ask.

"No they don't due to the amount of danger" Cecillia says.

"Damn well that's that idea out the window" you say.

"What?" Cecilia asks.

"Well I thought we could go out to eat" you say.

"We could do that, but the only place in the city currently set up for that has a waiting list" Cecillia says.

"Oh come on, it's not like this just suddenly happened did it" you ask.

"Well no, actually for thousands of years up till the 1800s men have been little more then slaves and objects for women" Cecillia says.

"Wow seriously" you ask. Cecillia just nods in reply, "anyone have any ideas?" you ask.

"Well we could play 20 questions" Jillian asks smiling.

"If the history's different that's a bit of an unfair advantage isn't it?" you ask. "Sorry dad but it's kind of hard to think up games given the whole size difference thing" she says

"Being small kind of sucks" you say feeling a little down.

"It's not all bad" Cecillia says gently picking you up and giving you a hug.

Lucy sits up and says "I know why don't we just start a fire and just snuggle up together."

"Lucy I don't think we've done that since Mary was 1" Cecillia says.

"What's the harm?" you ask.

"Fine" Cecillia says giving a sigh, "but you stay close to me, I don't want anything happening to you" she says.

The girls run downstairs and Cecillia walks down after them, Cecillia walks up to the fireplace in the living room and fills it with wood, yet you don't see any turn on for the gas.

"So you gonna use matches or what?" you ask.

"You'll see sweetie she says, she scoops you off her shoulder then leans over and light the wood with a breath of flame.

"Wow that was awesome" you say.

"What dragons can't breathe flame where you come from?" she asks.

"Well they can, but I thought you would have like evolved out of it, because they only use it for defense" you say.

"Well there are still male dragons" Cecillia says.

"Touche" you say, she giggles a bit and sits down in front of the fire. You lay against her neck, Mary and Jillian each lay down using 1 of their mom's legs as a pillow. Lucy grabs some blankets and covers each of her sisters in one before snuggling up in the center and covering herself with a blanket. The 3 girls quickly fall asleep leaving you and Cecillia as the only 2 up.

"Cecillia" you say, she turns to face you "yes darling" she answers.

"Do you think I was right telling you and the kids about me or should I have just let you believe the lie" you say,

"Well worrying about it isn't going to change anything, besides I always loved the honest and caring part about you" she replies.

You lay like this for a while until....

1322222211111111.content:
"I think the girls should go up to bed, they've had to hear a lot today" Cecillia says.

"That sounds like a good plan" you reply. Cecillia gently moves so her daughters heads gently fall to the floor. She scoops Mary up in her arms and heads upstairs, she enters Mary's room and places her down on the bed and tucks her in. "Cecillia can you put me down?" you ask. Figuring out what you wanted to do, Cecillia gently picks you up and places you down on Mary's cheek. You lean down and give her a kiss before saying "good night angel" and climb back onto Cecillia's claw.

"I knew you'd take care of them" Cecillia whispers as she puts you back on her shoulder and heads downstairs. She gently picks up Jillian and carries her up to her room. She tucks her in and puts you down, you give her a kiss and stroke a white hair. Cecillia picks you up and heads downstairs, she lifts Lucy up and whispers "ooh, she's getting a bit too heavy for me to carry."

Cecilia carries Lucy upstairs and tucks her into bed. You're placed down again and whisper into her ear, "have a good sleep sweetie" before kissing one of her scales. In response she turns over a bit and mumbles "thanks dad." You smile at the comment and grab onto Cecillia's offered claw. She walks back into her room and closes the door before turning the light on. She places you down on the night table and you change into a pair of red pajamas, you couldn't help but take a peek behind you as Cecillia changes, making you feel a tiny bit guilty. She flicks the light off and lays down on the bed and reaches over to get you off the night table.

"It's ok Cecillia as I said i'll just sleep here tonight" you say. She flicks a lamp on behind you and looks down at you.

"You're sleeping with me dear" she replies smiling.

"No it's ok, you probably need some time to get adjusted" you say curling up. You feel something brush against you, and you look up and see her still looking down at you but there's something different, all you can see is gentleness and caring in her eyes.

"How am I supposed to go on without my little treasure?" she asks lowering her head and focusing her gaze you.

"Fine, I guess i'll sleep with you" you say smiling as you step onto her offered hand. She raises her hand to her face and just stares at you.

"Pretty defiant aren't we?" she asks,

"It was always one of my problem traits" you reply. She gently licks her hand with her tongue getting you stuck to it then picks you off with 2 fingers and puts you back in her palm. "What was that for?" you ask.

"You weren't listening to what I said dear, and I get a little peeved when you do that" she says.

"I'm sorry Cecillia" you say.

"Well if you're sorry you can give me a kiss" she says lowering her head and pursing her lips.

"If that's what you want hot stuff" you say standing on you're tip-toes and giving her a kiss. She slowly lowers her hand to her chest and you climb off, you just lay down for some reason having complete trust in the 6 mile tall dragoness surrounding you and try to go to sleep. However you feel something push against you and look over, you notice Cecillia looking down at you and she pushes against you with a finger again.

"What?" you ask.

"Well normally we'd always play a little before going to bed" Cecillia says blushing.

"I have no idea how to do that" you say curling up again hoping she'll just let you go to sleep but you feel a weight push against you're back again a moment later. Sighing you stand up and say "ok fine, if it's what you really want."

"Good, because you owe me for all you're put me through today" she says, you had to admit she was right. She lifts you up and you notice that the white thing you woke up on that morning was one her breasts, she places you down in front of her nipple and gently gives you a push towards it. "Just do what you did this morning, it felt great." Shrugging you walk up the structure and begin rubbing, you weren't even sure if you're efforts were doing anything until you hear a faint moaning sound surround you. You keep rubbing until Cecillia gently pushes you back and scoops you up before placing you down on her other breast. You rub it for a while and you see her start to smile, you look over and notice she's digging her claws into the bed probably to just let you do you're duty and not take over. You stop after 5 minutes, physically spent and she gently lifts you up.

"Thank you hunnie" she says giving you a gentle kiss, then placing you back in her hand after you get stuck.

"You're welcome, although next time you don't need to hold yourself back" you reply.

"What are you talking about?" she says blushing crimson.

"I saw you gripping the bed holding yourself back, if i'm not enough it's ok" you say, "Cecillia can you lower me down" you say. She does so and you jump off curling up surrounded by her mini-mountains. She pokes you and you look up "i'm sorry, you were more then enough" she says smiling.

"Hey it's not like i'm mad, I mean you're the one who's stuck with me" you say smiling, "now just go to sleep, i'm sure the girls will be more of a handful tomorrow" you say curling back up. Cecillia picks you up and places you down, you open you're eyes for a second and notice the area under you changed from silver to white. You just close you're eyes and feel something scaly yet soft drape over you and suprisingly you feel no pressure and barely any weight come from her. "Wow she is good" you think falling asleep.

You wake up and stretch to the sound of birds and a beam of sunlight. You don't feel Cecillia's hand covering you so you look up and see her smiling down at you.

"Good morning dear" she says.

"Good morning" you reply.

"It's really early, we probably have a few hours before the kids get up" she says.

"Well then i'm going back to bed" you say curling up again but you feel her give you a poke.

"You have a beautiful dragoness laying in front of you and all you want to do is sleep?" she asks.

"Well when you put it that way......yes" you reply. She gently picks you up between her index finger and thumb and raises you up to face level. "Darling since you did so much for me yesterday I think it's only right I do something for you" she says smiling.

"That's ok, i'm perfectly content with just being able to be near you" you reply.

"Aww that's sweet" Cecillia says, her tongue snakes out and she licks you're face with the very tip of it "you always were a little charmer, although I always was in control" she says. She places you down on the bed and lays out in front of you, she turns her head so you can climb on and you take her cue. You climb onto the top of her head and she quickly sits up getting you tangled in her white hair. "Oh sorry" she says fishing you out, she places you down on her nose and you just sit there. "So darling is there anything I can do for you" she says while laying down but never once letting her eyes leave you.

"I'm perfectly fine Cecillia thanks" you reply.

"Are you sure there's nothing I can do for you, no wants I can fufill" she asks again.

You quickly realized what she was asking so you decided to tease her a bit. "Cecillia there is one thing you can do for me" you say turning to her.

"Yes darling" she says, her eyes lighting up.

"I think my pants are a bit tight, but it's probably i'm just a bit larger" you say. She quickly but carefully scoops you off her nose and placing you down on the bed.

"Um I need you to get undressed" she says blushing.

"Why, it's just a tight pair of pants" you say.

"Um...well...you see" she says mumbling.

Deciding to end the charade you say "Cecillia I know what you want to do, but it's really ok, the vows were to fawn over and love, and I respect them even if I didn't say them" you say. She gently pushes you over with one finger and says "please Alex just get undressed" you do so and she looks down at you. "Aww you look so cute like that, I just want to hold you forever" she says before gently hugging you. You had to admit being surrounded by her warmth did feel really nice, she doesn't do anything too radical she just runs a finger gently over you gently pushing you into her. You had to admit it felt really nice and after a bit she slowly sits up so you slide off her onto the bed and grab you're clothes. "I'm really glad I trusted you" she says.

"Huh?" you reply

"Well you could have done things to me that I might not have wanted but you were such a gentleman and let me take the lead" Cecillia says.

"I could have taken advantage of you how?" you ask.

"Contrary to what you might think in dragon tradition the wife must serve the husband no matter what" she says.

"So you're saying if I told you to let me do something indecent you'd have to let me?" you say. She just nods in response, "well then all I want from you Cecillia is to be yourself, an dif you ever trust me enough to be willing to take the next step then take it" you say.

"Thank you" she says tears welling up in her eyes she kisses the spot where you are on the bed pushing you back into the sheet.

"Hey at least let me put some clothes on first" you say as she lifts her head up.

"But I didn't want you to be wearing clothes when I did it" she says in a cute voice. You get dressed and....

13222222111111112.content:
The bedroom door bursts open and in run you're 3 girls, Cecillia covers you with one hand and they all jump onto the bed.

"Hey mom where's dad?" Lucy asks, Cecillia turns her hand over scooping you up. "He's on my palm" she replies smiling. The 3 girls lean forward and you smile saying "good morning girls."

"Good morning dad" they reply in unison, Mary reaches forward and offers you a finger which you climb onto, she hugs you gently and you're passed to Jillian and Lucy who do the same thing. Lucy just stares down at you after the hug and slowly leans forward, she stops near you and smiles. You smile back and she says "oh come on Dad are you really too old to give you're daughters a good morning kiss?" You walk up and kiss one of her scales "happy?" you ask. "Yes now you just have to give one to Jillian and Mary" Lucy replies passing you over to Jillian. Jillian gently leans over and lets you kiss one of her scales "hey dad, mind giving me a rematch since you beat me so badly yesterday?" she asks. "Sure, i'll just beat you again" you reply. Jillian smirks and passes you over to Mary, she lifts you up to her nose and taps the end, you walk forward and kiss her nose. Mary giggles and says "thanks Dad, it's been a long time since you last gave us a good morning kiss, I missed them".

"Well i'm glad I started again" you reply, you're passed back over to Cecillia.

"Everyone up for blueberry pancakes?" Cecillia asks. You join you're girls in yelling "yeah" and they all bolt downstairs. Cecillia slowly gets up and says "I knew you'd be able to take good care of my girls, although you are kind of gullible" she says.

"Yeah but if you don't put trust in you're family then who can you trust?" you reply. She smiles and walks downstairs and walks into the kitchen, you're daughters are already at the table and Cecillia puts you down on the table before going to make pancakes. You're girls quickly surround you and Jillian leans over staring down at you.

"Hey dad what do you think we should do today?" she asks.

"Can't we have a laze around at home day?" you ask.

"Oh but that's no fun Dad, besides there's so many things we could do like swim, play baseball, really anything" Lucy says.

"I think you're fathers a little too small for that kind of stuff" you reply.

"Are you too small to read us a story?" Mary asks.

"Hmmm, you know I don't know" you say, Mary runs off and Lucy and Jillian lean forward.

"You can read Mary a story but not play with us, playing favourites much Dad" Jillian says.

"Fine what do you 2 want to play, and sorry but you're dad just can't play any sports with you" you say.

"I already said I want a rematch dad" Jillian says, Lucy starts fidgeting and says "um Dad would you mind showing me how to dance with a boy?"

"Jillian you're on and Lucy i'd be more then happy to teach you how to dance" you say. "But why so suddenly, won't they teach you in relations class?" you ask.

"Well I kind of want to impress the boy i'm with" she replies quickly

"Oh I see, i'll teach you to sweep him off his feet literally or figurativley you're choice" you reply smiling. Mary runs in holding the first book of the harry potter series, "you were reading this to us last" she says as she runs up. She opens the book and holds it up and suprisingly you can read the letters, heck it was like reading a giant neon sign.

"I'd be happy to read that to you Mary" you reply smiling.

"Pancakes are done" you hear Cecillia say as she starts placing plates of pancakes at each of the girls spots. She places her plate down and rips off a tiny piece which she places down next to her. You reach over and start eating, not noticing Cecillia smiling as you dig into the blueberry. You quickly eat you're fill and Cecillia spears the rest with the tip of her claw and eats it, "can you not do that?" you say.

"Aww you look kind of cute when scared" Cecillia says smiling.

"No I don't" you say letting you're heart settle, "ok getting used to some things are gonna take longer then others" you think to yourself. It takes everyone else a little longer to eat since their portions weren't bigger then they were, Cecillia smiles down at you and asks "so have you got the day planned out?"

"Yeah, Jillian wants a rematch, Mary wants a story read to her and Lucy wants me to teach her how to dance" you say. You see a frown spread over Cecillia's face as you mention Lucy and dancing.

"I think that's wonderful, but stick to the tamer dances, Lucy kind of has 2 left feet, you'll be safer that way" Cecillia says.

"Mom" Lucy yells across the table, you look over and she's blushing.

"Lucy don't worry about, besides guys don't mind doing dances like the waltz gets them closer to the girls they like" you reply. Lucy flares bright red as you say this and she quickly starts eating her pancakes again. Jillian starts laughing and Cecillia says "you sure know how to embarass you're daughter."

"But it's true, slow dances are the best becuase they get you close to a girl and create a good mood for a kiss" you say. Cecillia gently pushes you over with one finger and says "Dear I think you should stop, otherwise Lucy's gonna faint from all the blood in her head."

"Ok fine" you reply. Everyone quickly finishes and Lucy's quickly standing behind you and says "Dad i'm ready for my lessons."

"Cecillia i'm gonna need you're help with this" you say as Lucy offers you a claw which you climb onto.

"Don't worry you'll be fine just guide her as best as you can" Cecillia says. Lucy moves you onto her palm and runs upstairs to her room shutting the door behind her. She slowly lowers a claw and you do you're best to teach you're daughter the dance. You first go over the steps with her and then you tell her to move her claw up right near you. You grab onto the it and she almost moves back, startled that you'd grab right onto her claw and pretty much hug it.

"Woah, woah" you yell getting her to stop "do not pull back, at this size that could result in some very serious injury, and i'd really rather not hear you hurt someone especially if you like them" you say. She calms down and you guide her step by step through the dance counting "1,2,3." You dance for a good 15 minutes with you're daughter before letting go and bowing to her. "That's the waltz, you did really well Lucy" you say.

"Thanks dad" she says gently kissing the spot where you are on her palm. "Glad I could help" you say, "although will I ever meet this boy?" you ask wondering what the guy is like.

"Um....well he doesn't even know I like him yet" Cecillia says fidgeting.

"Well then tell him, I mean it should be easy for the girl to confess, it's not like you can't just walk off into a corner or something" you say.

"But, but what if he rejects me" Lucys says.

"Well then he's a damn fool to reject such a wonderful girl as you" you say, "hey you're other boyfriend was ok after he rejected you right?" you ask.

"Yes he was Dad, don't worry" Lucy replies.

"Ok well where does this guy live?" you ask.

"Um about a 5 minute walk from here" Lucys says.

"Ok well since it's summer, you might as well go see him right now" you say.

"But I can't Dad, i'm so nervous, what if he doesn't like dragons, what if" Lucy says.

"Lucy, settle down, if you're that worried about it i'll come with you" you say.
