"Ok fine i'll go, you better be right about this" Lucy says.

"Would I ever lie to you?" you ask.

"Weren't you before?" she asks.

"Yeah...well that was because I was put in a very strange situation" you say. Lucy smiles and heads downstairs.

"Mom i'm going to Jamie's house and i'm taking Dad with me" she yells.

"Take good care of him" Cecillia yells back. Lucy puts you down on a table and puts on a pair of track shoes designed for a dragon, She picks you up again and heads outside, she walks for a while but soon starts jogging.

"I didn't know you were on the track team" you say.

"Well you never really asked" Lucy replies.

"Well now that I know, you should tell me when you have a race so I can come watch" you say.

"Aww that's sweet dad but you don't need to come watch, i'm actually the slowest on the team" Lucy says.

"So, doesn't mean I can't support my daughter" you say smiling.

"Oh....look we're here" she says and you look up and see a normal townhouse. Lucy jogs up to the door and knocks with her free hand, a vixen wearing a scarlet read dress that's about Cecillia's height opens the door and says "hi Lucy."

"Hi Mrs.Conners is Jamie in?" Lucy asks.

"Oh yes he is" she replies, she looks down and notices you "afternoon Alex" she says smiling.

"Afternoon" you reply, not knowing her first name.

"So are you here to watch over you're daughter?" she asks.

"Yeah I am, she kind of has cold feet" you say.

"Well that's good, i'm glad you and Cecillia got together during high school, you 2 were driving me insane with you're dilly-dallying" she says.

"Well you can't rush true love" you reply smiling.

"Ahem if we can come in Mrs.Conners" Lucy says.

"Oh yes yes come in, you'll find Jamie upstairs at his computer" Mrs.Conners says.

"Thank you" Lucy says entering the house, she walks quickly up the stairs and heads directly for one room telling you she had been here before. She opens the door and you look around, you just notice a bed, desk, and a figure hunched over a computer set up in the far corner of the room. Lucy slowly walks forward and you see the figure turn around, you smile as you see the guy he reminded you a lot of yourself when you were younger. Average sized kid with glasses, somewhat tall, he seemed somewhat tired but you saw that familiar spark of inquisition in his eyes. Lucy walks forward and sits down on the floor facing the figure.

"Hi Jamie" she says

"Hi Lucy, what are you doing here?" Jamie asks.

"Actually i'd like you to meet someone" she says. She plucks you off her palm with 2 fingers and places you down in front of the boy "this is my dad" she says.

"Hi" you say smiling.

"Hi Mr.dragontale, what are you doing here?" Jamie asks.

"Oh well you know nothing much just came to check out the guy my daughter has a crush on" you say smiling.

"Dad" Lucy yells, you see Jamie turn a faint shade of red as well.

"Well fine you tell him then" you say stepping back and to the side.

Lucy leans forward till the end of her snout is pretty much poking Jamie in the chest. "Um Jamie....I welll.....my dad kind of wrecked it but I like you" she says smiling. You see Jamie grow even redder "well that's great Lucy because I like you too, I fell for you the moment I saw you, you just looked so elegant with you're silver scales and I always thought you're wings were cute, and..." he trails off.

"Well isn't this nice, you two like each other, so Lucy you gonna ask him?" you ask.

Jamie looks at Lucy in confusion and she says quietly "um would you like to dance?"

"What I can't hear you?" you say.

"Would you like to dance?" Lucy yells.
'
"Sure but we haven't taken dance classes yet" Jamie says. Lucy lowers her palm and Jamie climbs on. "Actually that's why my dad's here" she says raising him up to face level "he's here to supervise because he was my teacher" she continues.

"Oh well what a coincidence, my mom was the one who taught me" he says smiling. You feel footsteps and you look over and see Mrs.Conners in the doorway "well aren't you 2 just a lovely pair" she says standing there. She walks into the room and sits down next to you, "well show us how much you're learned" she says. Mrs.Conners lowers a paw to you and you climb on, she holds you up so you can see. You both sit there and watch Lucy and Jamie waltz for a half an hour before you hear a beeping sound. "Oh sorry that's my phone" Lucy says, she reaches into a pocket and pulls a silver phone out of a pocket and hits the talk button before holding it up to her ear.

"Yeah....ahuh.....he's with me.....I guess if it's really important.....no that isn't important look i'm kind of busy right now.......fine i'll bring him home" she says. She shuts the phone and puts it back in her pocket. "Sorry Jamie that was my younger sister she wants me to bring Dad home right now" she says looking kind of sad.

"Hey don't end it becuase of me i'm sure Mrs.Conners would be more then happy to take me home" you say. You see Lucy instantly brighten up and Mrs.Conners says "do you kids mind putting it on hold for a minute or 2 while I run him home?" they both shake their heads and Mrs.Conners stands up. She walks downstairs still holding you in one paw, she opens the door and shuts it, she stares down at you somewhat angrily and says "ok who are you?"

"What are you talking about?" you ask.

"Look I don't know who you are but all my close friends call me vixi, and you don't smell like Alex normally does, you don't smell dragoney enough" she says.

"Augh so she can smell that well" you say, "look I really don't want to explain this" you continue

""You better start explaining yourself fast or else down the hatch you go" Vixi says snarling. "Ok ok, I am Cecillia's husband, i'm just from a different reality, one where women aren't titanic sized animals, you're victoria right. You're Cecillia's best friend that kept trying to hook me and her up all through high school, even going so far as trying to seduce me once to get her jealous" you say. Vixi turns a bright shade of red "how did you know that, are you some weird stalker or something" she says getting even angrier.

"You know I just might be telling the truth, now could you please take me back, that was probably Jillian wanting a rematch already" you say. She just stands there and keeps staring at you with a snarl on her face.

"Look Vixi if you don't believe me fine, kill me, eat me, whatever but you're the one who's going to have to deal with their suffering" you say. "Oh and no offense but if Jamie makes Lucy cry I will personally make sure he regrets it" you say sitting down. You feel her tongue against you're back and think "well I guess i'm dead" but she just knocks you over with it. She looks down at you with a sad look in her eyes and she pushes against you with her nose. "You really are Alex, only he would stand up for his family like that to me, heck it was why I couldn't seduce him" Vixi says.

"Well i'm glad you believe me but can we head back already, I know Jillian will be getting impatient and Lucy and you're son will probably be getting impatient too" you say. Vixi starts walking and says "i'm sorry, I was going to hurt you and you were telling me the truth, so how did it happen?" she asks.

"I have no idea, you also have no idea how weird it is to wake up sleeping on a 6 mile tall dragoness or well talk to a 6 mile tall anthro vixen for that matter" you say.

"So what's different about you're reality" Vixi says.

"Well women are the same species and same height as males, the earth is probably smaller too" you say.

"So are you going to tell Cecillia what I did?" Vixi asks.

"Why, you had mostly every right to do what you did, the whole eating thing not so much" you reply.

"Oh please don't tell her" Vixi says.

"Fine I won't, but if Lucy ever does get married to Jamie I want you to watch over her" you say. "Deal" Vixi replies.

"You're not gonna tell anyone i'm not the Alex you know are you?" you ask.

"I won't but I know atleast one other person has a strong enough nose to sniff you out" Vixi says.

"Thanks" you reply.

Vixi walks the the rest of the way back in silence, she opens the door and you see a silvery blur speed down the stairs......
132222221111111121.title: She goes

choices: It's Jillian looking for you for her rematch
1322222211111111212.content:
"Daddy" Mary yells running up to Vixi, she holds her hands out expectantly and you're transfered from one palm to another. "So what did you and Daddy talk about Mrs.Conners?" Mary asks.

"Oh nothing much dear just our time in high school" Vixi replies winking at you. Mary shrugs and runs upstairs to her room being very careful not to drop you, she sits down on the bed and puts the first Harry Potter book in front of you. You start reading it to her and for a while she stares down intently until you get to the part about Voldemort killing Harry's parents. Mary wrapped one clawed finger around you and gently gave you a squeeze.

"Mary what's wrong?" you ask.

"It's scary, Voldemort's not a very nice man is he?" Mary asks.

"No, no he isn't but don't worry Mary i'd never let him hurt you" you say.

"But then he'll get you like he got Harry's parents" Mary says slightly scared.

"I don't think Cecillia would let him" you say smiling. Mary however wasn't convinced and for the next hour as you read to her she kept one finger wrapped around you giving a squeeze every so often when it reached a scarier part. Finally she tries to hide behind you very much unsucessfully but she pushes you over with her nose. "Mary are you scared?" you ask her already knowing the answer.

"No, of course not i'm a big girl" she says nervously.

"Mary you are a big girl but it's ok to be scared" you say patting one of the scales on her finger. She nods and says "daddy can we stop for a bit, i'm scared" you nod and jump onto her finger. Mary closes the book and brings you up to her cheek. You walk up and kiss one of her scales "i'm so proud of my girl, being so brave" you say. Mary giggles and gently hugs you to her cheek.

"So dad what was you're other family like?" Mary asks.

You're shocked that she asked "they were the same as you all except more my size" you say smiling. "Jillian was still kind of tomboyish, Lucy was a very refined young lady and you were still my "little" angel" you say.

"I'm more you're big angel" Mary says smiling.

"Yeah so you have to watch over you're little Dad ok Mary" you say.

"Of course Dad" Mary says. She lays down and just stares at you for a bit, "Dad why are you and all the other guys so small compared to us girls?" she asks.

"I have no idea, it does have a lot of disadvantages but the advantages greatly outweigh them" you say.

"Like what?" Mary asks.

"Well there's so much more of my little girl to love" you say patting one of her scales.

"You're silly Dad" Mary says while giggling. She lifts you up and places you down on her head near one of her ears. "Dad I have an an itch can you scratch it for me?" Mary asks. You walk up to her ear and start scratching, she lowers it and you climb up till you reach the tip which took a few minutes. You scratch the tip of her ear and you hear Mary sigh, you scratch for a good minute before Mary plucks you off her ear and puts you down on her nose.

"Hey if you could reach why didn't you get it?" you say.

"I wanted you to get it Dad, you always take such good care of us" Mary says.

"Fine" you say while sighing.

"Dad can we play house again?" Mary asks.

"Sure although can we use some smaller toys this time" you say.

"No, Mr.Fluffers is you're daughter and you will love her" Mary says.

"But you just called it Mr.Fluffers" you say.

"Fine she's Mrs.Fluffers now" Mary says. You sigh and spend the next half an hour playing with Mary and the new Mrs.Fluffers. Everything went very well, although you think Mary might have taken things a bit too far as she had you kiss you're 'daughter.' Mary smiles and giggles as you kiss the rabbit doll, "Dad you're so funny, you didn't actually have to kiss her" Mary says.

"Could have told me that before" you say. Mary giggles again and picks you up, she runs downstairs holding you tightly you assume looking for Cecilia. Mary finds her in the living room watching tv and she runs up to her. Cecillia smiles as Mary runs up "Where's you're father?" she asks. Mary holds her hands out and Cecillia smiles as she sees you. "Hello Darling did you take good care of Mary?" Cecillia asks.

"It was more the other way around" you say smiling.

"He took good care of me, he protected me when I was scared" Mary says.

"Well aren't you such a good father" Cecillia says picking you up and placing you down on her palm.

"It wasn't much" you say as it wasn't. Mary sits down next to Cecillia and lays down next to her mother using her lap as a pillow. You smile and you sit back, you hear Mary's breathing slow down and she's soon asleep. You feel a tap on you're back and you look up at Cecillia who's smiling.

"Yes dear?" you ask.

"I'm glad I finally got some time to be with you, you've spent some much time with the girls lately i've only seen you during meals and bedtime" Cecillia says.

"Such is the life of a father" you say smiling. Cecillia gently knocks you over with one finger and smiles.

"Yes well it's also a husbands job to watch over his wife" she says.

"Well that's true" you say and you see a smile cross her face.

"Well then how about I hire a babysitter tomorrow and you and me can go out and enjoy ourselves" Cecillia says smiling.

"I don't know I mean I really should see as much of the girls as I can before school starts" you say.

"I'm glad you care so much for the girls but you shouldn't neglect you're wife" Cecillia says knocking you over again. Cecillia lifts you up to her face and picks you up before gently kissing you, she smiles as she pulls you off her lip then she licks you.

"Blech why do you keep doing that?" you say.

"It tells others that you're mine" Cecillia says.

"You might need to do that a bit more, I apparently don't smell dragoney enough" you say. "Oh crap" you think.

"Why's that hunnie" Cecillia asks.

"Well Vixi found out about me after there was an "ahem" incident" you say.

"What kind of incident?" Cecillia asks.

"Let's just say i'm really glad I was able to convince her who I was" you say. Cecillia frowns and starts to get up "No, no no, Cecillia I promised her I wouldn't let you know" you say and she sits back down making sure not to wake Mary.

"Why?" she asks.

"Well she threatened to eat me but I got everything resolved" you say. Cecillia looks down at you shocked before hugging you to her cheek, "i'm so glad you're ok" she says.

"I am too, Vixi said there was someone else who'd be able to sniff me out do you know who that might be" you say.

"Cheryll since she's a wolf she'd probably be able to sniff you out" Cecillia says.

"Wait, you mean Cheryll the bookworm, the girl who spent more time in the library then anywhere else?" you ask.

"Yeah it's kind of funny" Cecillia says. She lays down on the couch so that Mary was still sleeping somewhat in her lap and she puts you down on her chest. "Since you'd down there can you give rub my tummy?" Cecillia asks.

"I can try" you reply. You lay down and stroke her stomach through the white dress, much to you're suprise it wasn't covered with scales all you felt was soft flesh. "Guess they really are like dragons" you say. You rub Cecillia's stomach for a good half hour and you hear her sigh the whole time probably stifling herself when she wanted to let out a more audible sound as Mary was nearby till you hear a sound.....
1322222211111111212.title: it's Mary and she want you to read to her

13222222111111112121.content:
You heard footsteps coming downstairs and Cecillia lifts her head up. She picks you up and you see Jillian come down the stairs and Cecillia tries to shush her "Jillian be quiet Mary's sleeping" she whispers quickly. Jillian keeps walking down but softer and she looks at Cecillia, "do you know where dad is?" she asks. "He's right here with me hunnie" Cecillia says holding you up for her to see. Jillian runs forward "mom do you mind if I borrow dad for a bit?" she asks.

"Fine" Cecillia says sighing, she places you in Jillian's outstretched hands and Jillian smiles down at you before turning around and quickly but silently running upstairs. She runs into her room and shuts the door, "well up for our rematch Dad" she says. "Sure" you say but instead of heading for the TV Jillian heads for her bed, "um Jillian didn't you want a rematch?" you ask.

"Yeah, but you already showed you can beat me in video games" Jillian says, she puts you down on the bed and says while smiling "so now we're going to play something else." You really didn't like her smile it looked too weird, she reached under the bed and pulls out what looks like a blowtorch. "Um Jillian what are you doing with that?" you ask the fear showing on you're face.

"You're not my real dad, you're just some replacement, so maybe if I get rid of you, he'll come back" Jillian says lighting the torch.

"N...now let's not be hasty, even if that does work, how is that fair, my family will be left without a father" you say backing up as she stood up.

"I don't care, I just want my dad back" she says her face filled with sadness. She moves forward and you can easily feel the heat from the torch. "Jillian, stop" you yell in the most authoritative tone you can muster. Much to you're suprise she does, "now shut that off and put it down" you say in the same tone and she still does as told although you weren't sure why. She stands there looking at you like she's waiting for an order, "explain yourself" you say standing there arms folded.

"Well I just.. I wanted Dad back, you're not him, you'll never be him" Jillian yells before getting up and running out of the room and you heard her feet on the stairs. You fall back the fear finally setting in "holy shit I just about died" you think to yourself as you lay there. In a minute Cecillia was in the doorway, "Alex are you ok" she asks seeing you laying there.

"Peachy" you reply, "oh and you might want to look on the floor" you say. Cecillia walks in and looks down and notices the torch, she picks it up "why is this here?" she asks.

"Jillian thought if she got rid of me you're version would come back" you say still laying there.

"What?" Cecilia asks shocked.

"Jillian thought if I died then the switch would reverse and you'd get you're version of me back" you say. Cecilia looks down at you still shocked "so wait Jillian just tried to kill you" she asks.

"More or less, but she stopped when I said, which I think says she's confused and scared" you say but you're words seemed to fall on deaf ears. Cecilia looked pissed, but not normal pissed. she looked like well i'm a mother dragon and you just messed with my eggs kind of pissed. "Jillian" she yells although it was more of a roar than a yell, you heard footsteps and you see Jillian poke her head in "y.y.yes Mom" she says literally shaking from fear. "Come here, you're father's told me an interesting story, care to elaborate" Cecilia says. Jillian slowly walks forward and looks down "he's not my dad" she mutters.

"What was that?" Cecillia says.

"He's not my dad, he might seem to be the same person but he didn't see me be born, or grow up, or anything" Jillian says.

"Jillian that does not give you the right to do what you tried to do" Cecillia says.

"Of course it does, if he's gone then Dad might come back, and even if it doesn't atleast we won't have this fake" she says indicating you.

"Jillian take that back" Cecillia yells and it soon becomes a yelling match between the 2.

"Stop" you yell and both stop and look at you. "Cecillia she has a point, I didn't see her be born, grow up, or anything a normal father sees, I saw my daughter be born and grow up, and you know what you're the god damn exact same being" you say. "Jillian, you're just scared, and you feel hurt right now, you're father was a big part of you're life and you're worried if i'm not, you won't be able to hang on without that support" you say. Both of them stare at you shocked, "what, i'm really small not stupid" you say. Jillian just stares at you for a bit before slowly walking forward, she stares down at you and kneels before scooping you up to her cheek. "Dad" she says rubbing you against her cheek "i'm sorry" she says starting to cry.

"Shh, shhh, Jillian just let it all out, you've been a strong enough girl to hold it in this long, so just let it all out" you say stroking one of her scales. Jillian cries her heart out for the next 5 minutes, you felt Cecillia wrap her arms around her daughter and you just stayed up against Jilian's cheek trying to soothe her. Slowly she stops and lifts you away from her a bit "why?" she asks.

"Why what?" you reply.

"I...I just tried to kill you, shouldn't you hate me, you don't owe us anything" Jillian says.

"I could hate you, I could just leave as I actually don't owe you anything, but you know what i'm not going to. I need you as much as you need me, besides I love you all and what kind of father would I be if I just left" you say. Cecillia smiles at you and gently picks you up "that's my mate" she says gently rubbing against you. You turn to face Jillian "well? are you ok with me now, because i'd really rather not have something like this happen again" you say.

"Yes dad" Jillian says. You smile and Cecillia puts you down on Jillian's snout. You run it's length although it took a bit and you kiss and hug the area between her eyes "Jillian I love you, in any form, don't ever forget that ok?" you say. You were sure Jillian smiled as her snout moved and she gently picks you up and puts you down in her palm, "don't worry dad I won't" she says smiling at you. "Thanks, now if you don't mind, I think that was just a bit much for me" you say and you pass out. You wake up to see Cecillia looking down at you concerned, "are you ok?" she asks as she sees you wake up.

"Y...yeah, just overwhelmed by the the mind-numbing fear of death and knowing how small I really am" you say. Cecillia still looking concerned lifts you up saying you were in her hand, "I have a proposal" she says.

"Let's hear it" you say sitting up.

"I don't want you to leave my sight, you are to stay under my supervision and on me at all times" Cecillia says.

"Cecillia i'm a grown man, I'm sorry but I humbly have to decline" you say. Cecillia gently lifts you up "oh and how are you gonna stop me" she says placing you down on her chest.

"Well I can't" you say standing there looking up at her, "but why?" you ask.

"Why? you're own daughter tried to kill you" Cecilia asks.

"Key word is try" you reply. "I'd love to be with you every moment of every day, but I think even i'd probably get a little tired of it" you say.

"But...but I don't want to lose you" Cecillia says.

"You won't, now do you trust me?" you ask.
13222222111111112121.title: It's Jillian looking for you for her rematch

132222221111111121211.content:
Cecillia looked down at you and a smile spread across her snout, "I trust you" she says lifting you up. You motion and she moves you over to her cheek, you lean over and kiss her on the cheek "thanks hot stuff" you say. Cecillia turns as the doorbell rings, she nods, puts you down on her shoulder and smiles at you "thanks" she says before you head downstairs. Cecillia opens the door and you freeze as standing in the doorway is a timber wolf in a douty outfit, spectacles, and an upturned smile on her mouth. "Cheryll" Cecillia says happily, "hello Cecillia" Cheryll replies, and she turns to you. She sniffs once and starts growling "who are you" she says visibly irritated as her fur was standing on end. "Cecillia's husband, you're Cheryll the bookworm, more accustomed to the library then anywhere else" you reply. Taking an educated guess from an experience you had, "and I saw you're panties once in 10th grade as you tried to dodge me and tripped spilling books everywhere" you continue. Cheryll freezes and she visibly flares red "how, how did you" she says.

"Educated guess, look this will sound crazy but I am her husband" you say pointing to Cecillia, "just not from a dimension where women are 6 mile high animal people" you say. Cheryll much to you're suprise nods, "that makes sense, you don't smell dragoney enough" she says.

"....You believed that?" you ask stunned.

"It makes sense, no one but him would know about that incident, although just to prove it what type were they?" she asks.

"Pink with little ducks on em" you reply and she flares even brighter, "alright you really are legit" she says. You heave a sigh of relief, "so why'd you show up?" you ask.

"Oh well it's Vixi's birthday on Saturday and we're holding a party at my place at 6:00 and I thought i'd invite you 2 over" she says.

"Thanks Cheryll" Cecillia says.

"Anyone with as good a nose as you 2 gonna be there?" you ask, "i'm getting sick of explaining this to people" you say. Cheryll thinks ofr a second, "No I don't think so, but maybe call Vixi and have her explain it to everyone including the kids, might be worthwhile" she says. You nod and Cecillia smiles, "thanks Cheryll, we'll be there" she says before shutting the door. She turns to face you, "so what's this about you seeing her panties? and why pray tell do you remember what they look like" she says.

"I remember because i'm a guy, heck the panties you were wearing when we first met were yellow with 2 strings in bows holding them up" you say. Cecillia flares red, "how, how did you" she says.

"I saw my wife's by accident, he probably just had to look up to see them, look it's just something us guys remember, as for the incident well I could describe my version, not really sure what happened with yours" you say. Cecillia looks down at you and sighs, "fine you're off the hook for now, but there better not be any other incidents you haven't told me about" she says.

You sigh as those were the only 2 you could remeber."Yeah there's nothing" you say, Cecillia walks around and you find Mary still asleep on the couch. Cecillia puts you down on her cheek and you lean down and kiss her "aren't you just a big cutie" you saw stroking one of her scales. Cecilla leaves to go find Jillian and you heard the front door open, "i'm home" Lucy yells. "In here" you yell and Lucy runs into the room, she spots you on Mary's cheek and gently picks you up, "ooh thank you dad" she says lifting you up and smiling at you.

"Everything went well I take it" you say. Lucy nods and sighs, "oh it was wonderful, we were in perfect armony, our class is gonna be so suprised when fall comes around" she says.

"Good the kid's okay" you sigh in relief, "what you thought i'd hurt him" Cecillia asks.

"No I thought I wasn't a very good dance teacher" you reply. Lucy laughs "dad you're a great teacher as soon as Vixi came back she applauded us and smiled although something she said was weird, she said "good thing this one's as good a teacher", why would she say that?" Lucy asks.

"Oh no big thing, she just knows is all, as well as an old friend of mine from high school" you say. Lucy looks down at you worried, "you're ok right, come on let me see" she says pulling at you're clothes. "Hey, hey" you say pushing her claw back, "Lucy i'm fine, that and i'm you're father I really don't want you seeing anything of that" you say.

"Oh come on dad we've had sex ed, it's not like I haven't seen it all before, at a size I can actually see it" she says.

"Don't care, that's a hands off area" you say. She giggles and starts pulling again, "Lucy stop" you say somewhat growling. She does and you point to the stairwell "put me down and upstairs to you're room, you need 5 minutes to settle down" you say. She looks down at you shocked, and you're shocked as like Jillian she obeys and puts you down on the table and walks upstairs and you hear her door shut. Mary at this time stirs and looks at you, "hi daddy" she says wiping sleep from her eyes.

"Hi Mary" you reply, Mary picks you up and cuddles you against her cheek, she stays down on the couch and lets you sit on her cheek. In a few minutes Cecillia comes back with Jillian "I found her in the backyard" she says before the each sit in a chair. In another minute Lucy comes downstairs and sits down next to Mary, "where were you?" Cecillia asks.

"Dad sent me to my room" she says pouting.

"Oh really, what for?" Cecillia asks.

"Invasion of personal space" you reply not wanting to elaborate.

"What's that?" Mary asks.

"It means.....she was bugging me" you say really not sure how to explain. Cecillia stands up and picks you up in her palm, "if you'll excuse us, we need to have a talk" she says. Cecillia walks out the back door and shuts it, she sits down and looks down at you "what do you mean invasion of personal space?" she asks.

"She pulled on my pants twice, first time was to check on me because I told her about Vixi and then Cheryll knowing who I was, but then I don't know" you say. Cecillia looks down at you and laughs, "hey this isn't funny" you say.

"Of course it is, it's not like she could see anything" Cecillia says.

"Bull, crap, you can see me just fine" you say.

"No we can't, you're all just little dots" Cecillia says.

"What's my eye color?" you ask.

"Hazel of course" Cecillia says before stopping "damn, you got me" she says.

"Ok so why is this supposed to not be a big deal?" you ask.

"Um...you see back when dragon men atleast were the same size as women, that's kind of how we learned, we observed our fathers and brothers, and that's in a small part still taught in schools, I kind of did it to my dad" Cecillia says flaring red.

Cecillia walks back inside and you find Lucy waiting there, she looks down "um...Dad, i'm sorry about what I did" she says.

You sigh "Lucy as long as you don't do it again" you say. She smiles and you're passed over and she gently kisses you, you move to have her lift you up to her ears "oh yeah and tell me when you're sisters take sex ed, I would really rather not go through that again" you whisper. Lucy lifts you back and nods before giving you back to Cecillia.
132222221111111121211.title: She trusts you

choices: "Well you should go talk with her then"
1322222211111111212111.content:
"Come on Cecillia we're going to be late if you take much longer" you say staring up at her as she affixes an earring. Cecillia laughs "you can leave for the party any time she wants, but if you actually want to get there within the year you'll just have to wait a few minutes" she says. You sigh and sit back "sorry, it's just that this is my first time doing this and I'm kind of nervous" you say. Cecillia finally puts the earring on and lowers a hand which you climb onto and she lifts you up "there's nothing to be worried about, you'll be fine, you don't think I'd let anything happen to you? Now do you?" she asks.

"Well no, but still" you say, one of her claws curls around you pushing you against her finger "It'll be alright" she says gently, you nod and she smiles "well now that that's settled, how do I look?" she asks holding her hand out.

You couldn't help but smile, Cecillia looked beautiful wearing a pure white dress that cascaded down to her feet, she smiled down at you "you look beautiful Cecillia, a better looking dragoness doesn't exist" you say. She giggles and lifts her hand up to her shoulder gently depositing you on it "thanks, although you could have gone a little less heavy on the shmooze" she says starting to walk downstairs.

"Hey I don't shmooze, I tell the truth" you reply. She giggles and smiles as she sees Lucy "alright now we're trusting you to take care of the house while we're away, make sure that Mary gets to bed on time alright?" Cecillia says.

"Of course mom, you and dad have a good time at the party" Lucy replies. She leans over and you pat the front of her snout "be good and remember there's money for pizza just in case you need it" you say. Lucy nods and steps back and Mary runs up and gets a hug from Cecillia before the 2 oof you head out the door. The night air was cool and felt quite good, "good thing we have the same body type" you say as Cecillia walks.

"Yeah, it'd be kind of funny if you didn't fit in the suit" Cecillia replies. You can't help but nod "so I know Vixi apparently told everyone, but do you really think she did, I mean she did know how to keep a secret" you say.

"She told everyone, especially since I told her that you blabbed on her" Cecillia replies.

"You what?!!" you shout and Cecillia stopped and held her ear.

"Ow, just because your small doesn't mean that still doesn't hurt" she says.

"Sorry, but why'd you tell her? She's going to kill me" you say.

"No she won't, it's her birthday" Cecillia replies.

"That is true, is it still murder if a girl kills a guy?" you ask.

"Of course it is" Cecillia replies sounding quite shocked.

"Sorry for the grave question it's just kind of tough, it's only been a little more then a week since I came here and I haven't really had any good memorable moments with anyone save for you and the girls" you say. Cecillia stops for a second and ever so gently pats you on the head "Vixi's very nice and you know she won't hold something like that against you" she says. You nod and look up as the 2 of you had made it to Vixi's house, loud music blared out an open window and Vixi answered the door after Cecillia knocked.

"Hey you two, glad you could make it" she says smiling.

"Hey Vixi......so look I'm sorry that I kind of blabbed to Cecillia" you say looking down. You were suprised as Vixi laughed "I didn't actually expect you to keep your mouth shut, I mean she's the one you trust most right? Stuck in a weird place with only one being to turn too of course you'll tell them" she says smiling.

"So you have no problems?" you ask.

Vixi shakes her head "just forget about it, get your butts in here your letting the cold in" she says. Cecillia walked inside and you were surprised, the house looked totally different covered in streamers and balloons, much more festive which was a good thing. Cecillia walked over to a punch bowl and scooped some up into a glass "want some?" she asks.

"Sure, how?" you reply. Cecillia smiles "you probably won't like it" she says.

"Cecillia I don't think I'll mind" you reply. She looks at you and smiles "alright" she says 2 claws pinching together on your back you were hoisted up and she carefully lowered you to above the drink "just dunk your head in" she says. You looked up at her titanic form for a second before plunging your head into the drink and drinking your fill, you were then carefully lifted back up Cecillia's shoulder and she downed the whole cup in one gulp. "Ok I really don't think I'll ever get used to seeing that" you say.

"Aw come on it's not that bad" she replies.

"To me you just swallowed a small town or an entire lake in one gulp" you reply, she stares down at you stunned then giggles "well you better not make me mad then" she says.

"Don't even joke about that" you reply.
