"Oh come on, you and I both know you love sleeping with me" she says smiling.

"Well fine, then can I sleep somewhere where I won't fall too far even if you turn" you say. You see a very mischevious smile cross her face "ok, one safer spot coming right up" she says. She picks you up between 2 fingers and places you down between her breasts, "there now you'll have a smaller fall and you'll atleast have a soft landing" she says still smiling.

"Fine, I guess i'll sleep here from now on" you say smiling back. You look down and notice that there her chest atleast to you're eyes seemed to be protruding a bit. "Hey Kyra have you been eating any fatty foods?" you ask.

She gasps "I always take excellent care of my figure, I have to look my best for you" she replies smiling.

"Oh, well I might not be a doctor, but I think you're pregnant" you say.

"EEEEEEEE" she squeals and she gently picks you up and puts down on the bed and runs into the bathroom. You hear rummaging and you don't hear anything else for a minute until you hear another squeal come from Kyra. She runs back into the room and smiles down at you, she leans forward till her nose is pretty much touching you and she just stares at you for a few more seconds. Without warning she pushes forward kissing you and then pulling you off her lips as she lets go, she puts you down in her palm and says excitedly "you're a daddy."

"That's great news, now I just need to know how to raise a kid bigger then I am" you say.

"Oh I bet you'll be an excellent Dad" Kyra says smiling, "ooh i'm so excited, now i'll have more then 1 little guy to watch over, hmmm I wonder if I can practice by mothering you" she says smiling and you could tell much to you're own chagrin she was serious.

"Oh heck no, no way" you say. "Kyra you'll be an excellent mother wether you have practice or not" you say.

"You're right I will" she says smiling.


About 9 months later

You weren't sure fully what was happening. You had already called the ambulance as Kyra collapsed after saying that it was time. You hear the front door open and you yell downstairs and then hear and feel footsteps, in run 2 emts carrying a gurney, one picks you up and puts you on their shoulder while the other lifts and straps Kyra onto the gurney. The 2 of them head downstairs as quickly as they can and they load Kyra into the ambulance. The emt who strapped her onto the gurney jumps into the back while the one who's shoulder you were sitting on heads to the front. She gets in and starts driving and asks "so how are you feeling?"

"Pretty scared, it's not a good feeling being unable to help the one you love" you reply.

"Don't worry we'll take good care of her" the emt says. The ride to the hospital lasts ten minutes and when you get there 2 nurses and a doctor run out with a stretcher. Kyra is quickly transferred over and you're passed over to one nurse while the other one and the doctor wheel her in. You expect the nurse you're with to follow but she slowly walks into the hospital and walks up to the front desk, "hey Clarisse this man's wife is giving birth can you get the necesscary paperwork?" the emt says before placing you down on the counter. The woman at the front desk nods and grabs using a pair of tweezers a tiny set of papers that she passes to you and then she passes over using the same tweezers a tiny pen.

"Sir I just need you to fill these out, this is just standard information that we'll need when we discharge her" she says smiling. You quickly get to work, writing down information, signing on dotted lines and you soon have the paperwork finished. "May i go see my wife now?" you ask.

The woman types at a computer for a bit before answering you "she's probably in the middle of giving birth right now and only medical staff are allowed in at that time" she says. You start pacing back and forth for 10, 20, 30 minutes finally the receptionist gets annoyed and hands you a magazine which you sit down and start reading. 10 minutes later the nurse you saw before walks up and says "Mr.kittendale."

"That's me" you say standing up. She lowers a paw to you and you climb on. She walks quickly to a room with a sign over it saying "delivery room" and she opens the door. A smile instantly breaks out over you're face as you see Kyra laying there holding 3 bundles each one normal child baby size to a female. The nurse walks over and puts you down on her shoulder. "So I have 3 lovely baby girls" you say beaming.

"Actually not quite true Mr.kittendale" says another nurse, she leans forward and you notice a tiny bundle on her finger. You climb up and grab the bundle before climbing back down. "Ok I stand corrected 3 girls and a boy" you say still beaming.

"Oh Alex i'm so happy" Kyra says leaning over a bit.

"Yeah me too, I know it's kind of sudden but do you have any names picked out?" you ask.

"Well I have all the girls names picked but I wasn't sure about a boy's name" she says.

"How about Zack" you say.

"That's a great name, are you ok with the girls being named Clarisse, Betty, and Danielle" she asks you.

"They're wonderful names, very cute just like their mother" you say smiling.

"Oh you big softie" Kyra replies. You wait around and in a few hours Kyra is discharged from the hospital.
1322222221111.title: It worked

choices: non family so guests and the like
13222222211112.content:
16 years later (yeah I know big time skip)

You weren't sure how you had done it but you had. It was finally you're you're kids 16th birthday, you woke up slowly as Kyra's chest was still the comfiest bed in the world. You move a bit so you can see the clock and it blazes 8:30am down at you. That's when you hear the sound of three earthquakes. The bedroom door busts open and in runs Clarisse, Betty and Danielle all smiling. Betty was the first onto the bed always being the athletic one, you weren't sure how many trophies for track meets and the like you had for her. Danielle was next and she was definitley the brains of the family, at 16 she was already asking questions that stumped you and that was saying something. Finally Clarisse slowly walked up to the bed, even though she was the shortest and shyest of you're daughters she was just so kind and gentle that it didn't matter and her hand eye coordination was amazing. She could pour you a glass of juice while everyone else including Kyra had to dunk you're glass in. You turn back to the nightstand and you see Zack sit up in bed. He had slept with his parents all his life, mostly because you were the one who worried about him as you had mainly taken care of him. Since Kyra was usually so busy taking care of Danille, Betty, and Clarisse it fell onto you're shoulders to take care of you're son. You did all the normal things play catch, joke about, you even showed him how to use a computer once you learned there were ones male sized (nano tech much). Kyra stirs and sits up prompting you to grab onto her fur "morning mom" the three girls say.

"Morning girls" Kyra replies.

"Ahem, a little hand" you say as Kyra stretches.

"Oh, sorry" Kyra says lowering a hand to just below you letting you drop onto her palm.

"Morning Mom" Zack says standing near his bed as Kyra leans over to put you down.

"Morning sweetie" Kyra replies gently picking Zack up and giving him a kiss before setting him back down.

"I still can't believe after 16 years you can't remember that i'm there" you say.

"Sorry" Kyra says.

"Sorry, it was a bloody miracle I survived the first few years as you'd bolt up whenever you heard one of the kids crying, thank god I can apparently fall onto the bed from that height" you say.

"Dad, stop bugging Mom I mean today is a special day" Betty says smiling.

"Oh and what day would that be, let's see it's not a national holiday..." you trail off as you pretend to think.

"Dad it's our birthday" Zack says.

"Oh yeah that's right happy birthday" you say hugging Zack.

"Hey no fair I want a hug" Danielle says moving near the table and reaching a hand out, you step onto her finger and she holds you up to her cheek where you hug her.

"Happy birthday sweetie" you say. You're passed over to Betty who hugs you a bit too eagerly and then you're passed over to Clarisse who hugs you so gently you had to hug her back instantly just so she'd hug a bit more. Finally you're passed back over to Kyra who by now was holding Zack on her palm pad.

"Come on girls it's time for breakfast" Kyra says, there was no work as luckily you're kids birthday ended up on a weekend. You're daughters run downstairs while Zack sits next to you waiting for Kyra to get moving.

"Morning Dear" Kyra says.

"Morning Mrs.Fluffy" you reply.

"I told you to stop calling me that" Kyra says.

"But it's cute mom" Zack says.

"See he likes it" you say smiling.

"No you have to come up with something else, and until then no breakfast for anyone" Kyra says pouting.

"Aww come on Kyra is it that big a deal" you say.

"Yes, now hurry it up you're making you're kids hungry" Kyra replies.

"Kitten can we please just go have breakfast" you say.

"What'd you call me?" Kyra asks.

"Kitten, it's short for Kittendale" you reply.

"Ooh it's so cute, thank you dear" Kyra says gently kissing where you were on her palm pad.

"Not to interrupt but can we go have breakfast now" Zack says.

"Sure" Kyra says getting up.

"So Jack how's school going" you ask as Kyra walks down the stairs.

"Good, good" he says.

"So got anyone you like yet? How about that Mare that's assigned to take care of you, what was her name again/" you ask.

"Elaine" Zack says blushing a bit.

"Well what do you think of her?" you ask.

"Dad, that's embarassing" Zack says.

"Oh come now we're you're parents, you want to hear right Kyra" you ask her ears pointing towards you.

"Of course I want to know who my little guy likes" Kyra says before you enter the kitchen.

"Look Dad i'll tell you later, I don't want my sisters to know they already have the size advantage over me" Zack says as you enter the kitchen.

"Alright" you reply. Kyra puts you both down at the mini table you had on the larger one. You're 3 daughters lean in and smile at you.

"Hey dad what were you and Zack talking about" Betty asks.

"Damn super cat hearing ability" you think, "nothing Dear just guy stuff you know birds and bees that kind of thing" you say.

"Oh so does Zack like someone" Danielle chimes in.

"No we were talking about the more technical side to birth" you say.

"Eww" they all say and go over to Kyra.

"Thanks Dad" Zack says.

"No problem, although I am gonna have to tell you how to do that eventually, I really hope that days a ways off" you say sighing a bit. "So what do you think of Elaine" you ask again prying.

"She's very nice, she takes good care of me and she seems to like me, like that time..." he trails off and blushes a bit.

"Like what time, come on i'm you're father" you say leaning over.

"Well one time she put me down on a counter and it seemed like she forgot me as she dropped a pencil, she leaned down to pick it up and well she wasn't wearing any underwear and I got a full view of her lower regions and i'm sure I saw her head turned around watching me and she smiled" Zack says.

"Good, I remember the first time I learned Kyra was interested in me let's just say she was a lot more direct, and it ended up with 1 or 2 scratches on my body" you say.

"What are you saying about me Dear?" Kyra says walking up with plates of toast and eggs.

"Oh nothing, just telling Zack about how met" you say.

"Did you mention the part where you showed up with you're mom as the driver" Kyra says.

"Well no" you say.

"Really dad" Zack asks.

"Yes you might not have been able to tell it but I have a bit of a vision problem which prevented me from getting my Driver's so it was that or show up by bus" you say trying to defend yourself.

"Oh dear it's not that bad I thought you were quite cute" Kyra says.

"Yeah sure" you say, you're daughters giggle and so does Zack. "Fine so you're fathers kind of lame when it comes to romance" you say.

"You were able to get me weren't you" Kyra says.

"Yes Kitten" you say starting to eat. Breakfast was pretty silent except for you're daughters talking about boys, and school, and girl things which didn't really interest you that much. Within a half hour everyone was finished eating and it's time for you're kids birthday party.
13222222211112.title: skip to some important event, first day of scho...

choices: Danielle wants to talk with you
132222222111121.content:
The girls had specifically asked for a family party for their 16th birthday as you always described their other parties as, "much too dangerous for the men of the world." Kyra picked you and Zack up and everyone moved over to the living room. "Alright so what does everyone want to do first?" you ask.

"Presents" the 3 girls yell.

"Fine, fine, might as well get that out of the way first" you say. You turn to Zack, "Zack i've been watching over you for 16 years, i've watched you grow up into a fine young man so it might not seem like much" you say as you take off you're high school grad ring. "Take it, I know it won't fit on the finger of the girl you like, but well it'll do well enough as a proposal" you say handing him the ring. Zack stares at you shocked "but Dad I can't take this, isn't this what you "gave" Mom?" he asks.

"Don't worry sweetie i'm fine with it" Kyra says.

"Zack just take it, I'd rather you had it when I can see you wear it with pride and happy then when i've passed on you say smiling.

"Thanks Dad" Zack says running up and hugging you. You heard you're daughters go "aww" and you smiled hugging you're son back. Kyra pulls a small box out of nowhere although you were sure she just hid it in the space between the couch cushions. Kyra hands the box to Zack and he opens it, inside is a gold plated watch with Zack's name engraved on the back "Zack Kittendale" yeah the kids took Kyra's last name not yours but you didn't mind. Zack stares up happily at his mother and she lowers her cheek to him and he runs up and gives her a hug. Kyra lowers her paw to the couch and you and Zack are deposited on the couch cushions, Kyra walks into another room and comes back carrying 3 boxes in her arms, she hands one to each girl. All 3 of them rip into the boxes and each pulls out a set of matching earrings and a ring, "the earings are for you to to catch the eye of any boy you might like, the ring is like you're father's idea to be able to propose to them" Kyra says. You're 3 daughters run up and hug Kyra and you went "awww" at the nice moment. Each girl puts their earrings on and they all turn to stare at you.

"So dad what's you're present" Betty asks.

"Crap, this is the moment i've been dreading for 16 years" you think. "I don't have a present for each of you, well not a material one anyways. All I can offer each of you, as my daughters, is my support, if you ever need someone to hold onto you're secrets, a shoulder to cry on, or just someone to laugh with well i'll always be available no matter what" you say. Clarisse slowly walks up and smiles down at you, she lifts you up on one finger till you're facing her for the most part face to face. "Thanks dad" she says before nuzzling you.

"You're welcome" you reply and you're other daughters seeming to get jealous each gently pick you up and hug you in turn. Finally you're sitting on Becky's palm pad, "Dad can I well use you're present now?" she asks.

"Sure" you reply.

"Me and dad are going to go talk" Betty says turning and running out of the room, she runs upstairs to her room and shuts the door. You always marveled at how many trophies, medals, and the like adorned the walls and shelves of you're daughters room. Not to say it wasn't a bit girly as there were a few of her favorite stuffed animals still scattered around. Betty walks over to the bed and sits down before placing you down on her shoulder. Betty sighs "dad, i'm not sure I can tell you this" she says nervously.

"What? I won't judge you no matter what" you say already expecting what she'll say.

"Dad there isn't a boy I like, I mean there's the boy I take care of and he's nice, but I don't like or love him, i'm a lesbian" Betty says looking away from you.

"So?" you reply.

She turns and stares at you shocked "you're...you're not mad or anything?" she asks.

"No, so who's the lucky girl my daughter has her eyes on" you ask.

"Well dad, actually she's a dog anthro, her name's Janice and she's on my track team" she says.

"So what's the problem?" you ask.

"Well isn't it weird that I like girls instead of guys?" Betty asks.

"Nah, but i'll say 2 things, do you feel any weird urges about you're family member" you ask, betty shakes her head. "That's good, also i'm glad you like this girl, but if she's not a lesbian, then you shouldn't force her ok?" you say. Betty nods "actually dad, she's kind of the reason I found out I was a lesbian" she says.

"Oh well then I hope the 2 of you can make each other very happy" you say. You swing you're legs for a bit "so is it ok if I tell the rest of the family?" you ask.

"What? why?" she asks confused.

"Well I think it's better if they learn this now rather then you're girlfriend just showing up at the door" you say.

"Alright Dad, but can I be the one to tell them" Betty asks.

"Sure" you say. Betty walks out of the room and she heads downstairs. She makes the announcement and much to her suprise but not yours everyone was very accepting. Kyra walks up and gives her a hug "Betty i'm glad, you always seemed like you had something on you're mind, and now we know what it was" she says.

"Thanks mom, thanks so much dad" Betty says.

"No problem, it's what i'm here for" you say. You heard what sounded like a whisper and you see Clarisse staring at you "um...Dad can I borrow you for a sec?' she asks. "Sure" you say. Clarisse gently picks you up before heading upstairs, you reached her room quickly and you sighed as you entered. Clarisse's room always calmed you as she based it off a field putting down a green carpet at the shock of Kyra and giving the room sky blue walls and ceiling. Clarisse gently sits down on the bed and lifts you up to eye level. "So what do you want to talk about?" you ask.

"Well there's this boy I like" she says and you nod. "He doesn't even know I exist even though i'm near him all the time" Clarisse says.

"He the kid you're supposed to watch over?" you ask.

"Yes, his name's Rick and he's just the cutest little person" Clarisse says.

"Hey I thought that was my position" you say getting a small smile to cross her face.

"You're still cute dad but he's cuter" Clarisse says.

"So the problem is even though he's near you a lot, he doesn't seem to notice you" you say.

"He won't even look up at me, and everytime I try to talk to him he just turns away and looks out into space or does something else" Clarisse says.

You can't help but crack a smile "Clarisse he knows you exist he's just as shy as you are" you say.

"What?" she asks suprised.

"You silly cat, I know this will seem weird for you but you need to be kind of forceful. Lift him up so that he can't help but face you before starting a conversation, it's not like us guys have a lot of options once a girl's decided on a course of action" you say,

"I'll try Dad" Clarisse says. She gently nuzzles you for a bit before getting up and heading back downstairs. Everything seemed to be going well, everyone was joking and having fun including Zack which made you smile.
132222222111121.title: Family party

1322222221111211.content:
Danielle walks up and smiles at you "Dad, can I talk to you?" she asks.

"Sure Danielle" you reply.

"Alright everyone, it's time for cake" Kyra says.

"Wait, no Kyra can't you wait a bit, this'll only take a minute" you say. She smiles and Danielle takes you upstairs, she heads into her room which always mystified you. All along the floor were cables attached to computers, other then the bed only the night table and the immediate area around her closet were cleared of items be it technical or scientific. Danielle sits down on the edge of the bed and looks down at you. "Dad, you and mom aren't normal" she says.

"Hey, I mean we're not the average parents but that doesn't mean we aren't normal" you reply.

"No I mean you and mom have never gone on a date, you're always wary, at our events, and it's never been just you at parent-teacher conferences. You always look at us, well with a reverence in you're eyes" she says.

"Of course, I can't believe how big my little girls have gotten" you say.

"Mom's always looking for you, I see her eyes dart from side to side trying to lock onto you, and when she does they instantly soften, you never dance, swim, or do any of the other stuff we were taught as basic things in relations class" Danielle says.

You sigh, "Danielle you're a very smart girl, but you're mother and I have kept some things from you and you’re brother and sisters for you're own good, it's part of our past and it doesn't need to be told" you say.

Danielle lifts you up and frowns "dad, please tell me, you really want to keep secrets from you're own daughter?" she says.

"Fine Danielle I’ll tell you," you say. She lowers you onto her palm and stares intently.

"There's a reason me and Kyra never do stuff like that....we don't know how" you say. Danielle cocks her head confused, "this will sound insane, but we're from a different dimension, and we seem to have transformed to fit this one. Kyra used to be my normal sized 5ft 6in wife, she was not a cat, or 6 miles tall" you say. Danielle stares down at you shocked, "but, that can't be true, you were always so accustomed to us" Danielle says. You nod, "well it's a hard thing to hide, but it was easy as I saw all of you and Zack grow up, I excepted my responsibility as you're father readily....even if it meant my life" you say looking at her. Danielle lifts you up, "what do you mean you're life?' she asks.

"I've had so many near death experiences it's not funny, but i'd face them all again and 100 times over if it meant I got to stay with my wife, loving son and my precious daughters" you say. Danielle lifts you up and her eyes were misting "oh daddy" she says gently cuddling you, "Danielle it's ok, although I need you to keep this a secret now" you say. Danielle smiles and stands up "sorry dad, I can't do that" she says. She walks out of her room despite your protests and walks downstairs, you find the rest of the family in the kitchen and much to you're shock they had eaten the whole cake, "sorry but we were really hungry" Kyra says as Danielle walks in. It wasn't like you were going to eat any cake anyways as it was made of cat treats but you were still suprised. Danielle sits down and smiles, "so mom, dad told me all about you 2" she says.

"What do you mean?" Kyra asks freezing.

"Your and dad's secret" Danielle says moving you over and placing you in Kyra's palm.

"I knew it, I am adopted" Zack says.

"Your not adopted" you yell back "Look, she's right we have been hiding something from all of you, but it shouldn't really effect anything. We're not from here, we grew up in a dimension where women were the same size as men and not animals. It's why we didn't do a lot of stuff, as well, I didn't know how" you say looking down. "So that's our secret" you say looking up at Kyra. Zack as well as you're other 2 daughters stared at you and he shrugged "so what?" he says.

"Really? You don't care?" you reply.

"Well it's interesting news, but it's better then learning your adopted" he says cracking a smile. You would have hugged him if he wasn't sitting at the other end of the table. "So is that why you were always so careful, I mean I honestly don't remember you ever lut us play with Zack when we were younger" Betty says.

"Well, that was more a father's instincts, that and yeah it was a little part of that, I love you girls with all my heart, but I know what kids my size could do, and you're like 5,000 times that" you say. Clarisse looks down at you and, "wow you're pretty brave dad, so what was it like finding out Kyra was so big?" she asks.

Kyra tries to hush you but you stop her, "back then she was kind of a prankster, I still remember the first prank you played on me here, what did you call me again...oh yeah my little treat" you say looking up at her. Kyra blushes, "yeah well you got me back pretty good" she says.

"I made you take a shower, suprised the neighbors didn't come running from your yowl" you say smiling. It was really freeing, finally being able to talk about this kind of stuff without worrying about what your kids would think.

"So...dad, how'd you 2, ya know, learn to make kids?" Zack asks. You just stare at him across the table you're mouth wide open, "uhmmm...tv, videos, and well look this isn't something we should be talking about" you say.

"Oh come on, you were a little explorer in there, even went down the wrong way once if I remember correctly" Kyra says and now you as well as your daughters were blushing furiously.

"Can we please change the subject" you say.

"Fine, but you have to rub my head" she says picking you up and gently dropping you on her head. You start petting her and she instantly starts purring even though the actual area you were petting was so small to her it was laughable. "I never asked, can you really feel this?" you ask Kyra.

"Of course, it feels so good, you're hands running through my fur, over me, even though you're so small they're so warm and comforting" Kyra says laying forward with her chin on the table.

"Dad, you said that you can't do anything like dance that kind of thing" Clarisse says.

"Well I mean we can each individually dance given ample room between us, but not together" you reply. Clarisse smiles down at you, "do you want each of us to teach you, Danielle hear from her tech club we're even coming out with computers made for males, although they're not that strong" she says. You were shocked, it had been 16 years since you had graduated college and you really weren't sure if you could get back to it. "Oh, that seems to have sparked your interest, so what do you say dad? Betty and Clarisse can teach you the more physical stuff and i'll teach you computing if you'd like" she says. You were overcome with emotions so you looked down, "how did I ever get blessed with such wonderful daughters" you say on the verge of tears.

"Hey" Zack yells.

"Plus a wonderful son" you yell back and that seemed to make him happy.
1322222221111211.title: Danielle wants to talk with you

choices: Follow the rest of high school
Skip to the day the kids go to college
13222222211112111.content:
"I think we should go with the things like dancing first, I mean I've gone 16 years without computers, I can go a bit longer" you reply. Clarisse nods and gently picks you up "alright Mom you and Dad need to come with me" she says gently putting you down on an open paw. She walks up to her room and puts you down on a dresser as her and Kyra push her bed off to the side temporarily leaving a size-able floor for the 2 of you. "Alright Mom I want you to pick up dad" Clarisse says, Kyra gently picks you up and puts you down in a paw. "Alright you two, the first dance we'll be doing is the waltz, both of you know the steps right" Clarisse asks. Both you and Kyra nod and Clarisse smiles "good well then mom you need to put one of your fingers near dad" she says. Kyra does, actually pressing the digit against you gently to make sure that she got it right, "alright Dad now you need to hug Mom's finger" Clarisse says.

"Are you kidding me?" you reply looking up at her but she shakes her head, you sigh and hug pretty much just the claw of Kyra's finger. "Alright now you 2 jus follow the steps, mom you just need to move your finger accordingly along with your feet, don't worry since dad's attached himself to your claw there's no chance of you hurting him" Clarisse says. Kyra slowly stared following the steps with her feet before her finger started to move and you moved yourself along with it. It was actually quite nice although it did feel a bit weird hugging a claw but otherwise you thought it went very well. Clarisse claps furiously as Kyra and you stop moving "that was perfect, I've never seen a guy and girl do that so well first time" she says.

"Well what can I say my little man is talented" Kyra says smiling down at you "back at you kitten" you reply.

"Alright well we should also teach you 2 how to do some of the more, romantic dances" Clarisse says. Kyra moves her claw back and stares at Clarisse "you mean like the tango?" she asks.

"Yes like the tango, although dad I'm sorry but you'll have to be in the female roll" Clarisse says.

"What?" you reply

"Well dad do you really think you can dip Mom's claw, I mean all you have to do is hold on and fall back" she says. You sigh and look up at Kyra who giggles "oh don't worry cutie, I'll take good care of you" she says.

"Oh ha ha" you reply standing up and hugging her claw. The tango along with a few more dances went over very well so much so that Clarisse was happily clapping by the end "you 2 are great, you're not bad at this kind of dance atleast just not very accustomed to how it works" she says. You nod and Clarisse gently picks you up and puts you down on the floor, now for the other kind of dance, don't worry we'll start it slow, just one of those old fashioned kick dances, this one you just need the right distance for" Clarisse says. Kyra stared down at you and you looked up at her "don't worry, I trust you" you say.

Kyra nods "alright let's try" she says, everything was going well, that was until Kyra tripped, it was like time slowed down as her body fell towards you, you saw her try to shift her weight but you knew that wasn't going to work, you closed your eyes waiting for the end and nothing, you opened your eyes and you saw light although it was filtered through something, must have been Kyra's dress. In a second you heard Clarisse "oh god, oh god oh god, mom don't move, don't move you might have missed him" she says. In another second you heard paws on stairs and then a scream as you guessed everyone see Kyra on the ground and Clarisse in hysterics, "Hold it" you shout and the room became very quiet.

"Dad, are you ok?" Clarisse asks.

"Fine, kind of glad I got you signed up in those aerobics classes now Kyra" I say chuckling a bit. "Alright now Kyra you need to slowly stand up and no one on pain of death get anywhere near where her dress is till she's stood up" you yell. Kyra slowly stood up and then quickly squatted looking for you "down here" you say waving your arms. She quickly locks onto you and 2 claws pinch your shirt and lift you up "your safe, your safe" Kyra purrs ever so gently rubbing against you.

You spun around and looked at Clarisse "I ah think we'll stick to the other dances" you say. Clarisse nods "well I think we've done enough for today, what with that scare, we should go to sleep" Kyra says as you hadn't noticed but a couple hours had passed since you began. Everyone nods and Kyra hands you over to Clarisse and goes and gets changed into her pajamas first before coming back, she takes you and Zack into your room and turns as the 2 of you change. She then gently picks Zack up "good night my cute son" she says giving him a small kiss.

"Goodnight mom" he replies as she puts him down near his bed and he climbs in. Kyra shuts the lights off before sitting back down on the bed she reaches over and gently picks you up and kisses you "I am so happy your safe" she says before gently putting you down in the groove between her breasts. You felt her breathing space out but you couldn't get to sleep, I mean you knew that you could die at any time here but this was the first time you had ever gotten close to dying. You just laid there for probably half an hour till you sighed and started to gently push against Kyra's chest. "Mmm not now hunny I want to sleep" Kyra mumbles.

"Kyra you lazy cat get up, I need to talk" you whisper. It took you another minute of incessant pushing and whispering to finally get her to lean herself up and hold you up to her face in her paw "what's wrong?" she asks.

"I...I realized something today" you say.

"What's that?" Kyra asks.

"I....I'm powerless here, me, Zack, every guy in this whole world exists because you girls let us, because we serve a purpose, if you could recreate without us you'd probably just get rid of us like you would bugs" you whisper looking away.

"Never, I love you" Kyra whispers back.

You turn to look at her "Kyra I'm a speck, I'm less than a bug compared to you" you whisper.

"Hey, you might be a speck, but your my cute speck" she replies her tongue snaking out and the tip gently licking you. "Now what's wrong?" she asks.

"Sorry, I think I'm having a kind of mid-life crisis, I realized that if I can't even protect myself how am I supposed to protect my son" you say sighing. Kyra gently lifts you up to her cheek, "don't worry he'll be fine, I'm sure about it" she says.

"Yeah as long as he keeps her happy, Kyra if us guys ever had you mad at us you could just squish us without a second thought" you you say.

"Never, I mean I've been mad at you plenty of times, like that time you skipped work and got yourself in trouble because you went to Clarisse's school to confront her bully" Kyra says." You look up at her and smile "sorry It's just I was most scared about what would happen if I had died, I mean I would have been no more then a tiny stain on you and that's well about it" you say. Kyra gently cuddles you to her cheek "your a lot more then that, your a loving and devoted father and the best husband I could ever ask for, now stop worrying and go to sleep" she says gently putting you down on her chest. She started to gently purr and sing a soft lullaby, you just laid there and were soon put to sleep by the love your wife showed for you.
13222222211112111.title: Clarisse (dancing)

1322222222.content:
You wake up to a beeping sound and let out a groan. "What happened?" you asked. You then grunt and put your hand to your head. You feel your forehead to see that your head was wrapped in bandages. Your arm was covered in similar bandages but it didn't seem broken. "What?" You then look at your surroundings to see you were in what looked like a hospital bed. "Oh good," says a voice. "You're awake."

You get up and then you let out a gasp. Standing above you was a really large anthromorphic ibex dressed up like a nurse. You let out a slight scream. "Where am I? What's going on?! Why are you so big?!" The nurse waves her head to shush you before lowering her huge face right above you. "Calm down. You just recovered from a serious injury. That head of yours took quite a whallop." "Yeah," you thought to yourself. "It must've." This couldn't be real. The ibex nurse then picked you up and inspected you as you crouched down in fear. "Good news," she said. "Your injuries have completely healed up. I've already called your girlfriend to take you home."

"Girlfriend?" you asked. You turned your head and looked in shock and fear. Into the hospital room walked an anthromorphic hyena woman. She was dressed in a black leather jacket with small tight black shorts, fishnet stalkings and she had a vicious looking smile on her face that showed her razor sharp teeth. She also had bright scarlet slicked hair that reached past her waist. But what really frightened you was that she was as tall as the giantess nurse, if not taller. The nurse handed you to this hyena woman who smiled down at you. This hyena was your girlfriend.
1322222222.title: Head Injury

choices: Summer puts you in her "Front compartment" Wink, WInl
Summer places you in her back pocket and zips you in
13222222221.content:
The nurse told you this hyena woman was your girlfriend, but for some reason you don't even remember having one, especially not a hyena who had to be several miles high. You try to walk back but she puts her fingers over you to block any chance of escape. "Ah-ah," she said. "Don't you want out of this dump. Thanks for taking care of my man, the little guy's always getting into trouble." "Men," said the nurse with a laugh. "Don't I know it. Just make sure nothing else happens to him." Your hyena girlfriend nods her head but looking at that toothy smile and those mean looking eyes make you think you were better off in the hospital.

Soon that giant hyena is walking you out of the hospital stroking you with one of her skyscraper sized fingers. You tremble in fear and she immediate notices. "Don't tell me you're afraid to see your sweet Summer," says the hyena as she shakes her hips and looks down at you with a seductive smile. "You know I'd never hurt you." She says that like she wouldn't, but her appearance suggests otherwise, especially with her long pierced tongue. "Yeah right," you say. "Put me down. Stay back. You can't be my girlfriend!" You gasp and realized you probably shouldn't have said that. You are so dead. Or not, instead, Summer simply felt your head with her thumb as she shook her head. "You must've got whomped worse than I thought. Don't you go getting amnesia on me now. You dig?" You don't know if this is supposed to be a good situation of a very bad situation.

As Summer is taking you downstairs, you see more animal giants, all female. The receptionist is an anthromorphic chameleon woman, in the waiting room is a serval woman and you see a water buffalo nurse carrying a make doctor on her shoulder, a male human doctor. You could not believe this. But before you could ask questions Summer walks you outside up to her motorcycle. At this point you're beginning to think maybe this situation isn't so bad. A biker chick. Nice choice. But then Summer rubbed her chin. "Now," she said. "Where to put you. Can't have you getting double amnesia." Summer lets out a sinister laugh as you tremble in her grip. Where are you riding?
13222222221.title: In Hyena Hands

choices: "...Just chill out at my place for a bit."
"...Hang out with some of gal pals. That cool?"
132222222211.content:
"I think you're gonna enjoy this. You've always liked my 'front compartment', haven't ya, babe?"Summer winked down at you as she titled her hand downwards, sending you tumbling across her palm and scrambling to find a foothold or something to latch onto to keep gravity making you go splat. You zoomed past strands of fur as thick as tree trunks, a pad of skin that could've been a wasteland as black as coal, and yet you couldn't grab onto anything because the hyena girl had inched her hand ever so gently away from you, that one inch too far for you to grab onto anything. Summer obviously knew how to handle tinies like yourself, she had done this to you before, or, that's what you think. Your mind's still blank and reeling at the fact of the multi-mile high giant anthros everywhere.

As you left the safety of her palm and began to free-fall through the air, spinning and flailing your arms wildly in hopes that you could act like a bird and stay aloft, you looked down, finally understanding the meaning of Summer's 'front compartment' allegory. Protruding proudly from her chest like two bulbous mountains, clad tightly in leather, Summer's breasts came together into a luscious line of cleavage, eagerly awaiting to catch your minute self. You fell faster and faster, almost like a careening rocket, only to land not too roughly in the V formed by her breasts, causing you slide downwards until you were firmly planted in between her bosom."There we go!"She cackled so high above, her booming laughter ringing in your ears."Ya comfy babe?"She asked as she adjusted her top, wiggling her chest around to make sure you were deep in there, nice and snug."Yeah...I'm...good."You replied, blushing slightly, but almost enjoying the feeling of the enveloping soft warmth around you.

"Good!"

She cackled once more before getting on her bike, revving it up and zooming off down the street. You didn't even feel a hint of vibrations from the vehicle you were so deep in her chest. At least that meant you were safe. But as you began to survey your limited perspective of your surroundings, you found that you couldn't move. You were sandwiched between two immovable objects, no matter how soft they be, they were much, much larger than you. With a sigh, you simply laid back and enjoyed the ride. Summer's fur was that of a rustic brown, speckled with black spots here and there, and you could even make out distinctions of orange coloring in the fur. You took it that since you were small you could make out those kind of details.

The ride continued on for a while, interrupted occasionally by Summer's incessant laughter. Did she have to do that because it was a hyena thing? You guessed so, but you didn't want to bring it up. Getting on the wrong side of your supposed girlfriend would be a bad idea. Getting on the wrong side of your gigantic, dozen-mile high girlfriend with razor-sharp fangs was the worst idea.

Eventually the bike slowed down and stopped. Summer reached into her cleavage and popped you out, settling you on her fingertip. She brought you up to her eye, her massive pupil staring down at you with a hint of glee and playfulness."Alright hon, we're gonna...."
132222222211.title: 'Front Compartment'

1322222222111.content:
"Uh, that's fine." Summer barks her motorcycle in a parking lot in back of an apartment building before walking into the building. Summer places you safely in her breasts again and makes sure you're in nice and tight before walking in herself. As she is walking forward, she passes by another anthro girl, this time a lioness anthro listening to headphones who simply waves to Summer before going on her way.

Summer soon reaches her apartment and unlocks the door before walking inside. She takes you out of your cleavage and places you on the coffee table before your giant hyena girlfriend hangs up her coat. You look around the place to see that it's surprisingly neat. You thought that the place would've been messed up given how Summer was a biker chick. Guess you can't judge a book by its cover. Then you look on the mantle to see a photograph of Summer as a teenager, except her hair was neater and she was wearing an outfit you'd expect from a schoolgirl with pink highlights instead of the black leather jacket and pants she wears now. What the heck happened with her.

Then you notice that in the photograph Summer is with another hyena anthro that looked taller than her. You take it that was her mom, but what was weird was that Summer's mother had a human on her shoulders that looked around her age. You take it that was Summer's dad. Not much of a stretch given Summer was apparently your girlfriend. Then again, you haven't seen a single male giant anthro. You were in a world where men were the lesser sex in more ways than one. It was frightening.

Before you can wrap your head around this, Summer lifts you in the air again and places you on her shoulder. "Come on Babe. I better get something cold for that wounded head of yours." Summer then walks into the kitchen and you have to hold onto the hairs on her shoulder so you don't fall a dozen miles to the hard ground below. You're nervous about how she is taking you everywhere. "Come on Summer," you say. "You can just leave me on the table." Summer shakes her head. "Bad idea little dude. Last time I left you out of my sight, you wind up in the hospital." She had a point there, you had just gotten out of the hospital and from what Summer said, it was due to your own actions. You couldn't imagine yourself doing something so crazy, but then again, you didn't know what you were like before getting hurt like that.

Summer places you on the kitchen table and roots around in the fridge as you're given a few of her moon sized leather clad ass with her tail wagging around. You gotta admit, for a twelve mile high hyena, she was a total hottie and very caring despite her intimidating appearance. You're glad she's your girlfriend. Soon, Summer produces a bottle of soda from the fridge and pours you a small thimble of the drink before sitting down at the table herself. You nervously drink your soda as Summer takes a small piece of ice to apply to your head.

"Feeling better babe?" she asks as she smiles and shows her terrifying teeth. "Much. Thanks uh Summer. Just one question given I probably have killer amnesia right now." "I could tell," said Summer with a hint of worry. "You haven't been yourself lately. So, what's your question sug?"
1322222222111.title: House of the Hyena

13222222221111.content:
"How exactly did I wind up in the hospital in the first place Summer love?" Summer takes a sip of her soda before answering your question. "It was your own dang fault babe. All because of some stupid dare." You let out a scoff. "That's crazy, I'd never agree to any dare. I'm not the kind of guy who would risk my life." Summer sips her drink again and lets out a loud belch that forces you to cover your ears before she speaks to you again. "Who are you kidding? That's exactly the kind of guy you are, or rather were. I even warned you not to do it."

She didn't sound like she was lying based on the look on her face. According to your giant hyena girlfriend you were some daredevil. Given your girlfriend was a biker, it would make sense. Summer then puts her knee to the table as you climb her stocking covered leg and takes you up to her face. "What exactly was the dare?" Summer let out a grunt and slapped herself in the face. "You were lucky you weren't killed. My dingo friend Billie, she dared you to ride one of her hubcaps down Dark Side's Drive, the most dangerous road in the county. Big surprise. The hubcap came off. Billie hadn't gone to the mechanic like Annabeth told her too."

You gulp. You took a dare that could've killed you. You couldn't believe you were like that. Thank goodness you were still alive. It looked like Summer really cared about you as she places you on her nose big enough to land a plane on. "You know men shouldn't ride down Dark Side's Drive." "What's that supposed to mean?" you ask. "Men aren't good enough to drive down Dark Side's Drive?" "Men aren't BIG enough to ride down Dark Side's Drive." Says Summer in response.

"Huh, that's what I thought. So all men are my size?" "Yep," says Summer right before she breaks into laughter. "My Dad was once stuck between my Mom's toes for three days." Then you realize something, if Summer's dad was a human, that meant your mom had to be an anthro since men were the size of germs to the anthro women in this world. "Summer, what am I?" "Huh?" "You know Summer. What kind of anthro is my mom if children in this world are the same species as their same sex parent." "Oh," says Summer. "That's easy."
13222222221111.title: A Stupid Dare

choices: There's a Knock on the Door
132222222211111.content:
"As hard as it is to believe," says Summer. "You're a type of herbivore. Your mom's a zebra." Your eyes pop at that, that technically meant you were a zebra even though you were human. You were a type of species that Summer's species would prey upon if the animals in this world weren't anthros. "Wait, so I'm a herbivore and my girlfriend is a carnivore. I'll bet my parents hate you something fierce." Summer laughs again and then coughs as she swallows her drink the wrong way.

"Actually," says your hyena girlfriend. "Your parents are actually fond of me. It's my folks who aren't fond of you." Huh? That's odd, you'd think it would be your family that wouldn't be wild about you dating a biker, but if Summer's high school picture was anything to go by, she wasn't always like this. From the context, you must've turned Summer into the biker chick she is now. That would make you the wild one. You must've hit your head harder than you thought.

"Summer, does it bother you that I'm technically a zebra." Summer shakes her head and places you on her shoulder as she rubs her cheek against you. "Relax babe. I've seen stranger couples. My paternal grandmother was a sheep." "This world is crazy." You say. Summer then licks you on the cheek and you shake before Summer lets out a sigh. "I sure hope you get your memory back soon babe," says your titanic hyena girlfriend. "You used to love it when I licked you."

What happens now?
132222222211111.title: An Odd Match

1322222222111112.content:
Summer gets up from her seat but places you down in the spot where her butt was recently planted. “I’ll be back in a sec babe just gotta go change.” Summer said before leaving you alone on the couch.

You were beginning to sweat due to the intense heat that was left on the sofa where summer was sitting. “God How doesn’t her body heat burn me to a crisp?” You wondered.
1322222222111112.title: You two watch a movie

choices: Summer hands you to Annabeth and then confronts the two fighting
Summer ignores them and takes you up to the bar table next to the wolf
1322222222112.content:
"Uh yeah," you say nervously. "That's cool beautiful." As Summer takes you in her hand and walks you up to what looks like a bar you're scared half to death. What were you thinking. Summer was going to take you to her friends and if they were half as wild as she was, you could be in big trouble. But as she walks in, Summer strokes your head again and gives a slight frown. She was worried about your head injury. You figure that even if she's a giant hyena, she's still your girlfriend. It's unlikely she'd put you in any danger. Maybe this won't be so bad.

Summer opens the bar door and you look in fear at the type of anthros inside. There were five of them dressed similarly to Summer and on the backs of their jackets written in bold red letters were "FIRE HOUNDS". You were looking at an all girl motorcycle group. Either a very good situation or a very, very bad situation.

First there was a tall black furred jackal woman (even bigger than Summer) with silver colored hair playing a game of billiards. She even looked like she was wearing an eyepatch. You cringe as you watch her and even try to hide up Summer's sleeve. There was also a wolf woman with brown fur and long black hair. She was noticeably overweight and was half drunk at the bar table. At another booth there were two anthros; a tall fox woman with curly dyed cyan hair and a beauty mark playing a card game with a green haired dingo girl who was wearing a pair of shades as she looked at her cards closely. The fox was quickly losing patience from the expression on her face. Finally, by the jukebox was a blonde haired coyote girl who was picking at her fangs with her claws. You thought to yourself that Summer must hang with a rough crowd.

You tug on Summer's fur slightly and Summer pulls you up to her ear realizing you wanted her attention. "Summer," you say. "I don't know about this." Summer let out another laugh. "What are you afraid of babe, they like you." That's exactly what you were afraid of. As Summer walked in, her footsteps alerted the jackal woman who turned around and gave a closer look.

This jackal girl smiled and showed her huge teeth that you hope you never have to see up close. "Summer," said the jackal. "I haven't seen you round here in days. I hear your boyfriend just got out of the hospital." Summer let out a laugh. "Sure did. Come on babe, you remember Annabeth don't ya?" Summer holds you out and you tremble in fear as Annabeth looks down on you and smiles. You expect her to hurt you but instead she waves down and then takes a closer look. "That's one nasty knockin' he took. Maybe that'll teach him to be more careful." You couldn't believe this. You may not have remembered anything regarding your hospitalization but these colossal canine chicks were making it out like it was your fault.

Summer then let out a sigh. "I think he might have amnesia." She said. "I gathered that part," said Annabeth. "He hasn't made his crack about my breath yet." You don't imagine how anyone could taunt a biker chick the size of a city and survive. "I believe it was usually something about being able to turn men into stone." You hold your mouth because Annabeth wasn't kidding. She was breathing hard on you and it was terrible. You assume and at least hope it was the stench of alcohol." Summer pulls you away from Annabeth and gets you away from that jackal. She didn't seem to appreciate her breathing her rancid breath on you

Suddenly you hear a crashing noise and Summer and Annabeth turn to see the fox and dingo girl wrestling on the ground. "Billie you no good cheater!" yelled the fox. "You were hiding cards up your sleeves again." "Get off my case Carmen," said the dingo in an Australian accent. "You're just a sore loser is all."

Annabeth let out a groan as you tremble in Summer's hand. This was bad. A cat fight just broke out. A giant catfight. You really hope you don't get mixed up in this. "There they go again," said Annabeth. "Always fighting." Summer let out a growl and eyed both of those canines. You hear that growl and your knees knock. You almost dread what might happen next.
1322222222112.title: Fire Hounds

13222222221122.content:
Summer shakes her head and walks by the two dog girls fighting. "They ain't worth it. Ignore those two babe. I'll bet you're thirsty after that trip to the infirmary." "Uh yeah," you say. "I could use a drink, a good tall drink." You let out a sigh and look around the bar. The dingo girl turns up the jukebox as Billie and Carmen keep fighting and Annabeth runs up to her.

Summer takes a seat next to her wolf friend and places you on the bar table. The wolf woman lifts her head and then rubs the side of her face and lets out a cough. "Oh," she groans. "I feel terrible." "Hey Rahne," says Summer. "I see you already got hammered. How many beers did it take this time." Rahne lets out a sigh. "Only one." Summer laughs loud and you run in fear that she'll pound the table, but all she does is grab herself by the chest. "Geez. You can't hold it." Rahne just lets out a scoff. "Hey, I do better than that Fireball of yours." "Fireball?" you ask. "What's going on Summer?"

Before Summer could say another word Rahne pushes her off her stool and holds her head up to you, coughing as she holds her stomach. "You know what I'm talking about small fry. How do you think you got in the hospital in the first place ace. It didn't even take one beer and you... you really did it.. you... oh," Rahne holds her stomach and walks away as Summer gets up.

"That Rahne," she says with a laugh. "Hey Annabeth! Did you remove her wheels yet." Annabeth then knocks Carmen and Billie's heads together before she opens her mouth and reveals a wrench hidden under her tongue. Summer then snaps her fingers and the barkeeper comes forward. You look up to see the bar hostess was a titanic anthro cobra girl with a ruby in her forehead and a bald head with pierced fins at the side of her head. "We'll take an order of cokes Manjula. Can't take any risks with my little man." As Summer is talking with the barkeeper, she rubs your head with her oversized finger. You close your eyes but you should realize by now that Summer would never hurt you.

The barkeeper nods her head and gives Summer her drink before she holds out a finger. You see she is carrying a human sized glass and you take it before she takes a eye dropper. Too bad Manjula misses and splashes soda over you." Summer tries to fight the urge to laugh but then she loses it and cackles at your predicament. You let out a grunt and then Summer brings you up to her lips and licks off the soda, bathing you in her saliva. "Hey!" you yell. "Hey! Hey! Don't lick! Hey!" Summer gives you another look of concern. "You always like it when I lick you baby. I'm worried about you."

You let out a sigh as Summer places you down. You don't want to worry your girlfriend anymore than you already have, so you smile and drink your soda and Summer smiles back and then proceeds to drink her drink as well. It was sort of scary. Summer's glass was big enough to hold an ocean to you and she was swallowing it down. You doubt she'd eat you, but with those sharp teeth and the fact that she claims to lick you on a regular basis, it was unnerving. But then you swallow your fear.

"Uh Summer," you say. "I know I haven't been well...." "Acting like yourself?" asks your hyena girlfriend as she rolls her eyes towards you. "Can I blame you? You suffered a major head injury. It's sort of better this way that you're not yourself." Summer was making it out like you were some kind of troublemaker. Why would she think that, she was the size of a city to you? You decide to ask more on the matter. "How come I'm the only one in the room who isn't... you know, a colossal beast?!" Summer spews her drink back into her glass and breaks down laughing. "Duh-uh!" she yells. "You're a man ain't ya." "You mean all girls in this world are as big as you are!?" "Big? Are you calling me fat?" Summer asks as she shows you her teeth. You shiver and shake. You might've accidentally insulted a dozen mile hyena.

You flinch but then Summer lets out another laugh before she rubs your back with her pinky finger. "I'm just messing with ya sug. Yeah. That's how it works. Men are tiny and chicks are huge. Needless to say, we gals rule the roost." Then you get a horrific thought. "If that's true than how do we..." "Well," said Summer. "Let's just say it involves a bathing suit." "Let's change the subject. Why can't I remember a thing about this crazy world." Summer gives a sad look and then lets out a sigh. "So you really want to know..."
13222222221122.title: A drink with Summer

132222222212.content:
"No freaking way," you say. "You're not sticking me in your back pocket. You're insane." "Ah-ah babe," said Summer. "You know I don't like to take chances, that is when it comes to you. You'll be safest in there. It's either that, or the mouth." Summer's huge teeth and long gaping tongue were what finally got you to comply. It wouldn't be a good idea to tick off a twelve mile tall hyena, especially one of questionable sanity. "I'll be good." You mutter. Summer lets out that cackling laugh of hers again and forces you to cover your ears with your hands.

"Good. Oh, almost forgot." Summer reaches into her jacket pocket and takes out what looks like a helmet just your size. "Can't be too careful hon." You put the helmet on and Summer places you in her back pants pocket before zipping you almost all the way in. She left a little bit open so you could get some air, but not enough for you to fall out. "Comfy?" "Uh-uh-yes." "Good." Summer laughed loudly and revved up her bike as you got on. You grab onto the fabric of her pocket quick, because you're probably in for one wild ride.

Summer took off at high speed and even at your small size, you could feel the vibrations. This was humiliating. You're riding in the tight pants of a giant hyena who you're told is your girlfriend. If that was true, you really needed to rethink your taste in girls. You decide to climb up and look out the hole to get a closer look at this new world. You see just how tight you're in. Summer's backside had to be the size of a couple of moons at your size and you could look up to see that her red underwear was showing. You don't like the situation you're in but at least you can whistle at the nice view.

But it wasn't just Summer that you were interested in. Everywhere you look you see more and more giant anthros down the street and if that weren't curious enough, every last one of them was a girl. You remember some creatures had strange sexual dimorphism but this was too weird. Before you could see anything else, you let out a grunt and Summer's tail bludgeons you in the face, knocking you back into the pocket tumbling. As you finally reach the soft bottom, you thank your lucky stars you were wearing a helmet. Heh, guess giant monster or not, Summer was looking out for you. Maybe this wasn't as bad as you thought.

But before you could think anymore you feel a skid and get further shaken up. Summer must've stopped the bike. Summer got up and reached in to fish you out of her pocket. Your head was still spinning as you looked up at Summer's smiling face. One look at those sharp teeth again makes you scream and you even grab your chest. "Enjoy the ride hon?" asked Summer. You let out a grumble but you manage to hide your irritated face from your giant girlfriend. You're just glad the ride's over. "Did you have to drive so fast?!" Summer just nudged you slightly with her thumb and knocked you back before pinning you down and stroking you a few times. "Settle down Fireball," said Summer. "We're here."

Oh great, where did that crazy hyena take you?
132222222212.title: Riding in the Backseat

13222222222.content:
You wake up groggy holding your head. "What happened?" you asked. "Where am I?" You try to get up, but you find that your legs are trapped in some weird kind of opening in the ground. "Huh?" You feel the ground and find that it's soft and scaly but it was also large and that was what was trapping your leg. "What is this?" You ask. You manage to pull yourself out and then you see something really weird. The scaly green ground appears to twist and turn and go for miles. You decide to walk out and see what's going on. You walk for what you assume to be ten minutes, but you still don't get anywhere. You just keep walking for whatever reason and wonder what kind of ground it was beneath you. It definitely wasn't grass or dirt and it was too soft to be rock.

Suddenly you feel the ground moving and let out a scream. What was that, an earthquake? You hold on tight and then see that the end of this 'road' is sticking up in the air. "What's going on?!" "Oh," said a female voice in a slight British accent. "You're awake love. It's about time." "Huh?" That voice sounded strange, almost as if it was hissing. "What's going on?" The voice let out a sigh. "Good grief. I've been with you for years and you still can't get used to me? And to think you faced your fears to make it this far. Come on dear. The part of ground you're walking on suddenly lifts itself up into the air. You look up and see that the road is connected to what looks like a torso, humanoid and definitely female judging by the cleavage and with crossed arms. As you continue to be lifted up, you see something that scared you.

You were looking at a giant's face. A female face that almost looked human if it wasn't green and scaly. You saw snake like eyes and long purple hair along with a red tattoo of a third eye on the side of her face. It then hit you, you were looking right in the face of a gargantuan anaconda woman. And with you afraid of snakes.
13222222222.title: A Scaly Encounter

choices: Your mother comes for a visit
Your seven year old daughter wakes up
132222222221.content:
As you take a closer look at the anaconda's face, you begin to recognize her. "Jennifer?" you ask. "Oh, so you remember my name," says the anaconda as she flicks her forked tongue in her face. "That's my husband. You're so absentminded."

You couldn't believe this as your wife puts you on her shoulder. You were scared to death of snakes, but now you were married to one. At least Jennifer was as understanding and patient as you remember. Your snake wife slithers up to the table and places you in the center before teasing you slightly with her enormous tail. "I'll just go get breakfast ready love." Jennifer bends over and kisses you with her enormous lips, drenching you in her saliva. If she sucked harder, you'd be in her mouth. You even have to inhale for air as she takes her lips off of you.

As your wife toils to make breakfast you look around and spot a wedding photograph of the two of you. Even then you look scared. But why didn't you remember any of this? Before you can do anything, Jennifer places an omelet in front of you and breaks a piece off to place on a plate your size. "There you are love." You smile and then eat away at your omelet as Jennifer eats hers.

You notice some loose piece of skin on Jennifer's face and gesture to her. You rub your face and she sees you and then peels off the loose skin. "Dreadful time of year this shedding," she says. "You always have a good eye for those things dear." You let out a laugh and then you scream slightly as Jennifer licks your foot with her tongue. Being married to a snake was going to take some getting used to.

What Happens Now
132222222221.title: Jennifer

1322222222211.content:
Suddenly, you hear the doorbell ring and then Jennifer realizes something. "Oh bother," she says. "It's that battleaxe mother of yours." "Hmph?" "She said she was going to visit today. Unfortunately." You take it that Jennifer and your mother don't get along. You guess that's what in laws are for.

Then you realize something. "Wait, refresh my memory Jennifer honey, is my mother like you." Jennifer lets out a sigh. "Of course not you silly goose. She's not an anaconda. She wishes. That's why she and I don't get along. Boa hater." Jennifer then walked or rather slithered up to the door to see what was going on and she didn't like the idea of her mother in law visiting.

Exactly what kind of anthro is your mother?

Jennifer extends her tail as you wait on the table and she wraps her tail around the doorknob to open it up and you look in to see that your mother is a titanic anthro, from the looks of it she was taller than Jennifer at twenty-five miles high. Though she wasn't long like your snake wife. Your mother was an enormous crocodile anthro with bright teal scales and black tattoos on her yellow underbelly. Your mom was also hourglass shaped with short blonde hair in a Bob haircut that was already beginning to gray. You knew for a fact your mother was in her late forties but she barely looked like she was older than Jennifer.

Your mom looks at Jennifer and glares slightly. "Hello Jennifer," she says as she shows her skyscraper sized fangs. "How nice to see you." She was being sarcastic as she said that. Jennifer gives a glare back and lets out a hiss. "Hello Emma. You oversized handbag." Yikes, you knew some in-laws didn't get along but your mom and your wife seemed to hate each other. "I still don't know why Stevie married a legless freak like you. I'd rather have him hooked up with an herbivore." "At least he's picky that way," said Jennifer. "Unlike his old man."

Both your Mom and Jennifer give cross looks at each other before you clear your throat. "Uh Mom?" you ask. "That you?" Suddenly your crocodile mother switches her scowl to a smile and turns to you. "Oh," she says. "Hi there Sweetie. Just came in to check up on you. After all, a mother cares when her son gets hurt on the job." "Huh?" you ask. Then you realize something. The reason you didn't remember the giant anthros was because you must've had a work related injury the day before. What the heck happened?

Then you hear tremors and see that your crocodile mother is walking right towards you and lets out a coo. "Hello there Stevie," she says. "Give your Mama a kiss. Your mother picks you up and much to your wife's chagrin takes you to her large crocodile lips to kiss you. You're covered from head to toe in your mom's saliva and even gag on it. But it's one thing if you were married to a snake, but for a crocodile to give birth to you? In this world women were giant beasts. But you couldn't remember anything. Should you tell your mom and wife you have amnesia? But do you really want to worry them?

Your crocodile mother then realizes you're scared and confused and steps back. "What's the matter hon? You're not acting like yourself." Jennifer slithers forward and she lowers her head. "Now honey," she says in disappointment. "I know I've been putting on weight as I get older, but I'm not that big." "Jerk!" yelled Jennifer. "I go to the gym once a week."

You decide to ask Jennifer about...
