You're guessing it is with the thick fur-like foliage covering the tip and then you look up the mountainside to see that there is a purple star on the side.

You inch forward and then begin to climb the mountain and find that its surprisingly soft. "What kind of mountain is this?" you ask. You just keep on climbing and climbing for three hours, only to huff and puff in exhaustion because you're not even a fraction to the top. But as you look up, you see the mountain turning from white to black, but it looked more like fabric. "What's going on. Ah." Suddenly something grabs you by the back. You turn and see what appear to be giant pale white fingers grabbing you by the shirt. You try to shake free, by the fingers hold you tight as you are taken to the other side of the bountain and then you see something weird. These giant fingers were attacked to a giant arm that was covered in a purple and black striped sleeve and you're brought around to see what looks like a pair of breasts big enough to build several cities, on just one.

The breasts appear to be wearing a black shirt not attached to the sleeves and the shirt appears to have nylon fishnets underneath, visible at both the cleavage and the sleeves. Beneath these breasts appear to be a huge sagging belly with a double pierced nipple. Then you're brought higher and scream in fear because you're looking at the face of a thirty mile high hippo woman. She had chalk white skin and long black hair with a purple streak in it. She has black mascara and lipstick and her left nostril is pierced. You look down to see this hippopotamus goth giantess is very obese even for a hippo. If she were human sized she would weight one thousand pounds and it showed as her leather skirt appeared to be ready to snap apart. However the hippo girl just smiles at you.

"Hey little man," she says. "I felt you crawling on my cheek. Believe me, it would take a month for you to get a quarter of the way up. You men are teeny but oh so scrappy." "Put me down," you say. "What's going on?" "Oh," says the hippo girl. "You silly. Is that any way to speak to your fiancee?" "Fiancee?" you ask. You then look down to see this hippopotamus was wearing an engagement ring and you were wearing one yourself. You stutter and stammer and the hippo girl lets out a giggle you wouldn't expect from a hippo even if she wasn't thirty miles high. "Don't worry. You've still got six months before the ball and chain. But in the mean time, I think you need more rest. A few more hours will do."

Then your gothic hippopotamus girlfriend reaches back and pulls back her panties before dropping you back in. You let out a grunt and yell as she snaps her panties and places you cramped but safe between her titanic cheeks. Being engaged to a hippo goth will take some getting used to.
132222222222222.title: Goth-Opotamus

1322222222222221.content:
You then recognize this hippopotamus goth girl. She really was your fiancee, her name was Ingrid and you've been dating for five years now since you met her in high school. You remember that she was a goth and that she was on the heavy side so her being a hippo wouldn't be too much of a change given the weight you remember her being at. But why was she thirty miles high? Unless she was always this big and you just didn't remember it. But you knew it had to be Ingrid since you distinctly remember that star tattoo on her right butt cheek. You saw it every day since you started dating her.

You decide to get to the bottom of this literally as you wiggle in her crack. Your hippo goth girlfriend stops in her tracks and scratches her backside, squeezing you in the process before she squeezes her cheeks together to pop you out as you grab hold of her panties. Then she puts a fingernail close to you. You recognize her purple painted fingernail with skull decorations on it and jump on before she lifts you up in front of her large snout. "Something wrong baby?" she asks.

"You are Ingrid right?" you ask. Ingrid rolls her eyes and lets out a sigh, showing her skyscraper sized teeth and her city sized tongue with a piercing in the center of it. You step back to avoid the risk of falling into the hippo's mouth and getting swallowed. "You're still not feeling well are you sweetie," says Ingrid. "You were sick for some time." "Sick?" you ask. You must've had a fever so bad it effected your memory.

Ingrid sits down on a bench to speak with you, causing the steel bench to bend in the center under her massive weight. "Yes," says the titanic hippo goth. "My name is Ingrid and yes I am your fiancee. You act like I forgot I was a hippopotamus." "I remembered you being as big as a hippopotamus but not being thirty miles high." "What do you expect? I'm a girl." "So all girls are big enough to live on in this world." "Yes they are," says Ingrid. "And you do live on me. You live in my belly button. Your fever must've wiped out your memory."

"But I remember meeting you in high school. I remember opening the door for you." "How could you?" asks the hippo in disbelief. "You're so small, you could live underneath my toenail." You then give a look of disgust. "So why was I in your butt." Ingrid gives a worried look. "I thought you liked it in there. Perhaps you'd prefer a ride in my mouth today."

"What?" you ask. "Hey." Ingrid places you in her mouth under her tongue and then strokes the top of your head with her tongue as you scream. "Relax little man," says the hippo giantess. "I'm not going to eat you. You are going to be my husband in six months. Besides, you've been in there hundreds of times." With that she slams her mouth shut.

You shake with every step your thirty mile high hippo fiancee was taking and you fall face first into saliva. You shake your hair off and you have to hold onto her gums. But then she tosses you in the air with her tongue and you have to grab onto her stud. According to her, you enjoyed being in her mouth. You were probably better off in the other end. Suddenly Ingrid's stepping stops and her mouth opens and you see she has arrived...
1322222222222221.title: Ingrid the Giant

choices: You both decide to go out
Ingrid's roommate wakes up and walks down
13222222222222211.content:
You look out of Ingrid's big mouth and see a large door. You saw the numbers on the side and then recognized it as Ingrid's apartment. You've been in before, but you didn't remember the scale. "Here we are sweetie," says the giantess hippo as you cover your ears before her mouth closes again. You stand on her tongue piercing as you hear your fiancee take out a key and unlock the door. It was frightening to be on this silver island in the middle of a pink ocean inside of a hippo's mouth.

But Ingrid told you she wouldn't swallow you. Besides, hippos were herbivores. Ingrid walks inside and then she opens her large mouth and hold out one of her purple fingernails right up to you as you walk on top and your hippopotamus fiancee takes you out of her city sized mouth. You were relieved as the fingernail big enough to build a town on was taking you away from your fiancee's mouth. But surprisingly, her breath was very sweat, sort of like peppermint.

Ingrid places you down on the coffee table and then she sits down on the couch, her entire massive rear taking up the whole love seat before your girlfriend smiles at you and waves her black hair with the purple highlight. You begin to drool but wipe your mouth. A BBW goth girl the size of a city and you two were engaged. "Feeling better baby?" Ingrid asks. You give a smile so as not to offend your thirty mile fiancee. "I'm okay Ingrid. Thanks for... you know, not eating me. Kinda weird to be in my girlfriend's mouth." Ingrid lets out a laugh as her huge stomach jiggles. "Relax. I wouldn't eat you and even if I did you'd be safe. Men are immune to women's acids. Remember that time you fell into my beer at the bar and it took you three days to climb back up."

You shake at that thought. "Not funny Ingrid." Then you both hear a snapping noise and Ingrid looks to see her skirt broke off much to her dismay as the hippo giantess lets out a sigh. "Not again." She moans as she reaches for a stapler. "When are they going to start making hippo sized skirts." As Ingrid was fixing her skirt, you look around to see the gothic decor. The curtains were black, there was a rug shaped like a dinosaur skeleton, the lamp had a monstrous face on it and the walls were painted in a patchwork style as you whistle.

Then you look to the mantle to see several photographs. There was one of Ingrid and her roommate, Lilith. You remembered Lilith. She was a goth girl like Ingrid and the two of them were best friends since high school. Though Lilith was a little weird at times. From the photograph, Lilith was also an anthro now. An anthro mammoth who was just as fat as her roommate. Then you see a photograph of Lilith's parents. While her mother was a hippo anthro like her daughter, she wasn't as pale and had long blue hair. Ingrid's father, a human like you was sitting on his wife's shoulder, proving that it was only girls who were giant anthros.

Then you saw your prom picture. You were on Ingrid's shoulder and Ingrid was wearing a black sparkling evening dress with black roses as she smiled at you. You smile because you had a good girlfriend here, even if she was a titanic hippopotamus. "So sweetie," says Ingrid with a smile. "Now that you've recovered, what do you want to do now?" You actually had to think about this.
13222222222222211.title: Girlfriend's Apartment

132222222222222112.content:
Before either of you could say anything, you heard quakes and then you look forward to see Lilith, Ingrid's mammoth roommate walking down as she let out a yawn. She still looked tired. Lilith was a mammoth with grayish fur and large ears that were pierced with skull shaped earrings. Her hair was long and black but looked like it was dyed. She was wearing a black jacket and a shirt with a bloody knife on it and long black and white striped pants.

"Oh Lilith," says Ingrid to her mammoth roommate. "You're awake. Lilith rubbed her forehead with her trunk that you saw had one pierced nostril. "Oh hi Ingrid. Hi there Eric." You take it Eric was your name. Lilith then grabbed hold of her trunk and begun to hack. "Are you okay Lilith?" asked Ingrid. Lilith let out a sniff. "I think I caught whatever your fiance had." That's right, Ingrid did say you had been sick and your illness may have affected your memory. But it didn't seem to affect Lilith's memory. But then again, Lilith was several thousand times bigger than you just like Ingrid was.

Ingrid let out a scoff. "You're being ridiculous you woolly mammoth," she says. "Eric's been sick, but he got so sick it affected his memory." Lilith just sniffed and rubbed her trunk with her black fingernails. "I still don't see why you're not even married yet and your boyfriend already lives in your navel." Your hippo fiancee laughs loudly and shakes her large protruding gut. "Come on Lilith. Don't you like the idea of having a little man crawling all over you. It's especially fun when I put him in the backseat. It tickles. You should get a boyfriend Lilith.

Lilith lets out a huff and then she begins to gag and lifts up her trunk. "Uh-oh," says Ingrid. "Take cover quick sweetie." You look up and see that Lilith is about to sneeze. Before you can get to cover, the mammoth goth giantess sneezes and you get caught in a gust of wind and yell.

"Eric!" yelled Ingrid. "Are you okay." "I'm fine," you say. "But I think I'm in somebody's mouth." "Who's?" asked Lilith. "Please be in Ingrid's mouth," said Lilith. "Last time I swallowed you I had to deal with you walking on my spleen for three days straight." Swallowed? Lilith and Ingrid had both swallowed you before? Given their size it was unavoidable and you guess that men were immune to the anthro giantess's stomach acids. But you weren't in a stomach. The sneeze blew you into either your hippo girlfriend's or her mammoth roommate's mouth. But who's big mouth were you in?
132222222222222112.title: The Mammoth

1322222222222222.content:
You wake up and see that there's something on top of you. Something big as a mountain, but surprisingly soft, like a quilt of some kind. "Huh?" you ask. "What's going on." Then you hear a door moving and then a female voice. "Don't worry Mistress Callie. I'm sure he's over his cold." "Callie?" you ask. That was your wife's name. Where was Callie and who was she talking to?

Suddenly you hear loud tremors of some kind. You manage to get out from under the big object that you're under and you stand up, but then you see the ground beneath you is bright blue. It's also unusually soft for some reason. You look behind yourself to see a pillow right behind you and it was huge, it had to be a mile tall. Before you knew what happened, you see a shadow over you and look up to see a giant gray and white furred husky girl with a wart on the side of her face. She was a pear shaped thing with bright blue eyes and she was dressed in a maid's outfit as she looked over you.

"Good morning Master." She says. "Master?" You ask. "Wait I... Callie." You grit your teeth. "When did Callie hire a maid?" you ask. "How can we afford a... wait a minute... why am I complaining about the maid and overlooking the fact that she's a giant freakin' husky." Before you can say another word, your canine maid picks you and places you on her shoulder. Each strand of her fur is as big as the world's biggest tree and as you look down on her monster sized butt, you see that she had to be at least eleven miles high. She was a titan. A giant canine as your maid.

You rub your head. "Mistress Callie was very worried about your fever sir?" "Fever? Listen M.." "Janet. I've been working for you and your wife for years now. She hired me to keep an eye on the house and you while she's at work." "Wait, wait, wait. I have a job." "A computer job where you work at home sir?" "Exactly why do I need a babysitter?" Janet lets out a barking laugh. "Because you're a man." You gave a look of shock and then you smell something cooking as your maid reaches the kitchen. That smelled like Callie's pancakes

You run and move the strands of Janet's fur and you see something really strange. In the kitchen cooking pancakes was a collie anthro your age. She was even more pear shaped than Janet and with a bigger rear that her long red and white hair reached down to. The collie turns and reveals she is wearing a pair of glasses. Janet smiles at the collie girl. "He's alright Mistress Callie. But I think his fever left him with minor amnesia." "Callie?!" you yell. "Hey honey," says Callie. "You feeling alright?" "Uh Callie," you say. "I knew you had thunder thighs, but why are you a seventeen mile high collie? And why do we have a humongous husky as a maid?"
1322222222222222.title: Maid Malamute and Collie Colossus

13222222222222222.content:
You wake up and you see that the area is dark and the ground feels funny. It feels both squishy and leathery and you look to see that the area is in fact a lightish shade of gray. "Uh?" you asked. You then look forward to see a light, as if you were in some kind of cave. You then hear loud vibrations and crashing noises. You let out a grunt. "I'll bet that's Trini stomping about." You were referring to your younger sister. You remember having to stay with her in her house because you couldn't find any apartment open after you graduated.

You didn't mind living with your sister, but she had a tendency to make a lot of noise. "Trini!" you yell. "Keep it down, it sounds like an elephant out there." "Well duh," said Trini in an unusually loud voice. "What do you expect? That's what you get for sleeping in my navel." In her navel?" "What are you talking about?" "I thought I was being nice letting you sleep in there after you were in that wreck. I told you not to let your friends drive you to work. They're all a bunch of drunks."

You hold onto your ears. "Trini, I'm in a cave, how can I be in your belly button." Trini lets out a laugh. "You've got to be kidding big brother," she said. "After all, yo shouldn't have amnesia given your heritage." Then the cave gets dark and you are sucked into a strong vortex as you scream. As you're sucked into the vortex, you feel the vortex lifting you into the air and holds you up.

You see that your sister's house was magnified in size. It looked like whoever was living here was exactly seventy miles high. You look and see your sister Trini has transformed. She was now a seventy mile high Asian elephant girl with long black hair with yellow highlights and yellow lipstick. You remember your sister was fat and it showed with her huge belly. She was wearing black leather pants and a yellow jacket with a black and white shirt.

You gasp loudly. "Trini! You're an elephant." Trini nodded her head. "That's mom's side of the family big brother. You take after dad." You couldn't believe it. Your little sister was big enough for you to live on.
13222222222222222.title: Elephants Never Forget

132222222222222221.content:
Trini then put you on her shoulder and then she trumpets. You couldn't get used to the fact your sister was a seventy mile high Asian elephant. "You feeling okay big bro? I think that car accident shook a few of your brain cells." "Big brother?" you asked. "I'm less than a flea to you. Exactly why is my sister an elephant." Trini rolled her eyes. "Because our mother is an elephant. Duh. You'd think that you men would be used to being so teensy." Then Trini lowers you onto the table as the telephone rings. "I'll get it." She says.

Every step your Asian elephant sister makes shakes the ground. You then look to see a photograph of you as a child playing with a baby Trini. You were on her head as she raised her trunk in the air. You then saw a photograph of you both with your parents. Your father was a human your size but your mom was an Asian elephant giantess like Trini. The only difference in their appearance was that your mother was wearing glasses.

Then there was one photograph of you and Trini and another elephant giantess. This giantess was a tannish skinned African elephant with large tusks and long brown hair and orange highlights in the hair. She was holding you with her trunk. You take it that African elephant girl was your girlfriend. From the photograph she was even bigger than Trini, but African elephants were even bigger than Asian elephants.

Trini is talking on the phone and nods her head. "Don't worry. He's alright. He actually got the best out of the crash. The other guys are all in the hospital. You'll be over soon. Okay, bye." Trini turned to face you and you give a worried look. "Who was that on the phone Trini?" you ask your elephant sister, Trini simply lowers her trunk and you step into the right nostril as she picks you up. "That was just Erica." "Erica?" you ask. "My head still hurts." Trini lets out a trumpet. "Even you can't forget Erica little big bro. Erica is your..."
132222222222222221.title: Not so Little Sister

132222222222222222.content:
You slowly make a left turn with your car into a large driveway which led to a very large two story house. And as you came towards the end of driveway you saw looked around a little bit before you saw a small human sized garage which was already open and waiting for your car. Once you had drove your car inside you turned the key thus turning the car off. You then proceeded to get out of the vehicle and walked towards the trunk of your car to get your bags out of it. But while you did this you began to think back on how you ended up at this giant house in the first place.

It was a few months ago when you received a job at a local college to be a librarian of sorts for the school. When you got the job though you were a bit worried that due to your small size compared to the anthros that it was going to e tricky being in charge of library. However, once you had entered the large room though and asked one of the other librarians where your workstation was (just in case you had one) the giant anthro bear picked you up and took you a large table. And upon being get on the table you were taken aback when you saw a human sized desk and chair with a computer and telephone on top of it. (just in case you had to call a student to remind them when their book/books were due)

Seeing this prompted you to ask the bear who had made or gotten those items for you. You were once again surprised when you were told that a professor by the name of Tim had made these things for you. Along with that you also found out that he was in charge of the home education classes. And so once you had found the number for the home ed room you dialed the number and waited for the professor to answer. To your relief there were only two rings before a deep voice answered from the end. Hearing this prompted you to ask if you were speaking to Professor Tim? When he answered yes you told him that you were Will and that you just wanted to thank him for taking the time to make all of these things for you. You heard the professor let out a light chuckle as he told you that it was no problem. Once this was done you were about to say goodbye to him, (just so that he could get back to teaching his class) but before you could he stopped you when he said that he wanted to meet you after his class was done. You agreed to this before you both hung up your respective phones.

It was midafternoon when you looked up upon hearing one of the doors to the library being opened. Once you had done this you felt your heart skip a beat when you a giant and well muscled anthro whit rat look around a minute before his bright blue eyes saw you. After that day the two began to talk whenever the rat wasn't teaching a class, and if you weren't that busy either. And as you did this you both found out that you had quite a bit in common whether it was movies or active/hobbies that you part took in when not working. And last week was when the two of you decided to go from just friends to boyfriends. Which of course led you and Tim to put a side a weekend to hang out together at his place. (which he had promised would have everything you needed)

You quickly broke out of your memories as you took out your bags and proceeded to walk towards a door in the small garage. Upon doing this you now found yourself in a giant garage. Not really knowing how long it would take you to get to the front door of the room. To your relief you saw a human sized phone next to the door you had just left. Once you had grabbed it you dialed Tim's house phone number, and after a few rings you heard the muscled rat's voice when he asked, "Hello?"

"Hi Tim, it's Will. I'm here for our weekend together." You replied, as you rearranged the phone putting it a bit closer to your ear.

"Oh, good I'm glad you're here. Hang on, I'll be come out to the garage to get you." The rat stated, before you heard the phone on the other end go quiet.

You let out a light laugh as you hung up the phone and waited. Thankfully though you didn't have to wait long though as the front garage door opened up to reveal the giant white rat. But when he walked towards you, you couldn't help but blush deeply upon seeing that he was wearing nothing other but a towel which made you assume that he must have just gotten out of the shower. And once he was only a little away from you, Tim got down onto both of knees so that he could see you better. Once he had done this you saw his usual warm and kind smile as he asked, "I'm glad you got here without any trouble Will. So are you ready to spend the weekend together?"
132222222222222222.title: The Start To A Very BIG Weekend

133.content:
You wake up feeling refreshed and renewed, yet quite hungry. You hop out of bed ready to make your breakfast. However, when you got down, your little brother stopped you.

"Dan, Mom and Dad said that the Threshers invited us to breakfast today. You should change out of your pajamas!"

Confused, you go back to your room and put on some clothes. Who were the Threshers? Could your brother have misheard your parents? After you finish tying your shoes, you ask your mother, who is checking the mail. "Mom, Billy said something about the 'Threshers' inviting us to breakfast."

"I know, isn't that kind of them? We're lucky to have such friendly neighbors."

So, the Threshers were your neighbors. However, the last time you checked, your neighbors were the Hendersons. You decide to go to your father, who is thumbing through the newspaper. "Dad, do you know when the Threshers moved into the neighborhood?"

"I don't know, Daniel, we moved into their neighborhood. Surely you remember that day; Mr. and Mrs. Thresher introducing us to the neighborhood, and you and Billy became friends with Monty and Hillary ever since you met!"

You do not remember any of this, but at least the Threshers sound like nice people. Suddenly the doorbell rang, and your mom exclaimed, "That must be Hillary, she said she would be picking us up."

You do not know why you would need to be driven next door, but your join your family anyway. You are confused when you see nobody outside, just a lumpy green wall that moves very slightly.

You are suddenly very frightened. Looking up, you see an extremely long curved surface attached to the green wall, much higher up than your house, and the surface extends to far behind your house. The surface lifts up a hundred feet and moves back several hundred more, and you see that it is a toe, a raptor's claw. Before you know it, your family is quite literally picked up by a teenage raptor girl, namely Hillary Thresher
133.title: The Threshers

1331.content:
"Good morning Mr. and Mrs. Smith, Daniel, and Billy!" spoke the monolithic spectacle of a teenager. Hillary has a relatively thin build covered by a tank top and gentle facial features, and you guess that she is a few years older than you. You don't know how she managed it, but she had just scooped up your entire family in one of the talons of her fingers without completely smashing anyone to pieces. The rest of your family waved back at her, but you are too shocked to do anything. "Oh, Daniel, you don't look so good," Hillary spoke, "I hope you haven't gone down with anything."

"Daniel's just fine, right?" asked your father.

"Yeah, I guess," you reply uneasily. Hillary still stares at you a bit concernedly, but continues stomping towards a humongous yellow painted two story house. You are amazed at the size of this house; your own house could probably slip under the front door! Not only was it huge for its size; it probably had more rooms than your house as well. The Threshers must be pretty well off for raptor anthros. As Hillary takes one step onto the porch, you realize why your family couldn't have come themselves; no human could ever make that step without a helicopter.

Hillary reached out one of her huge clawed hands out and grabbed a T-Rex shaped knocker, rapping it three times on the gigantic door. In no time at all the door swung open, revealing three more colossal raptors. The two adults were a head taller than their daughter, and Monty, who looked quite young and very jolly, was only half Hillary's height.

"Hillary, great, I see the Smiths are all here!" spoke the mother in a calm voice. "I just put breakfast on the stove, so why don't you hand me Mr. and Mrs. Smith and you kids can hang out a bit?" Hillary eagerly thrust her thumb claw next to your parents, and they held on tight to the thick talon. As quick as a wink, your parents were whisked away into Mrs. Thresher's scaly clutches. Your brother Billy looked like he was already having a swell time wedged in Hillary's claw, but you are very frightened, because you are positive than even if these raptors mean well, they couldn't possible interact with you or Billy without completely pulverising you. As Hillary stomps through the huge house, with Monty following close behind, she stops in what must be...
1331.title: Neighborly

choices: "Oh, I get it!  Do you have a little crush on me? (giggle)"
13311.content:
By the pink aura that seems to emanate from the walls of the room, you realize that you must be in Hillary's room. This is confirmed when she swivels around and starts staring at Monty. "Excuse me, but what part of 'no little kids in my room' do you not understand, Monty?"

"Sorry sis," whined the pint sized, yet still many mile tall young raptor. "It's just that I wanted to show Billy that new model train I got for my birthday."

Suddenly, your little brother starts yelling to. "Hey, that's right! Miss Thresher, may I go with Billy to his room?"

"Oh, well that's okay." A huge talon swiped your brother away and lowered him into Monty's hands. As the youngest member of the Thresher family scurried out of the room, a gigantic clawed hand shut the pastel door behind him. You feel the wind rush in many directions as Hillary collapsed on her massive fluffy bed, to be replaced by her warm breath as she lowered her towering face to your minute form nestled under her talon.

"So, Daniel, those midterms were something, weren't they?" she spoke, her stare drawing ever closer.

Finally, you are presented with something you are familiar with. You really did finish midterms just yesterday, even though you didn't have neighbors this huge yesterday. "Actually, I found them to be not too bad. History is just memorizing a bunch of dates, and math and science just kind of come easy to me. I admit that World Literature was kind of a doozy, though I think I did well on that essay."

"Yeah, I totally agree with you on World Literature," replied the titanic dinosaur teen. "Although I wish I was as good as you at science." Her face continued to draw even closer, until you were sure that you were being held directly in front of her eye. It is so huge and powerful, you can hear her muscles move every time she blinks, and her slit pupil seems to pulse within a range of 300 to 400 feet thick. This intense stare is really starting to frighten you, and Hillary seems to notice.

"Oh, Daniel, are you sure that you're all right?" she says, bringing her eye even closer. "You're shivering and sweating; do you have a fever?"

"N-n-no, I not s-s-sick," you stutter, completely intimidated despite her concerned tone. Nevertheless, your world suddenly flips upside down as you are dumped into a scaly palm several square miles large. You are suddenly pressed deep into the palm by the finger you were once in, and you can hear Hillary say through acres of scale and bone, "Oh my, you're heart is racing. Yet I'm sure your parents would have made you stay in bed if you're sick..." Suddenly, her eyes widen, and looking over at your iota of a frame in her palm, she says...
13311.title: Alone with Hillary

choices: Hillary keeps her feelings for you a secret from everyone else
Hillary tells everyone that you and her are boyfriend and girlfriend
133112.content:
You are utterly speechless that Hillary would even consider that you had a crush on her. How could you possibly be attracted to something with scaly green skin thicker than you are? Even if that were possible, how could such a huge monster even conceive of such an impossible idea. As Hillary's eye above you flutters a bit, you can't help but flinch from the though that you will be blown off.

"Please, Daniel, there is no need to be so shy about it," spoke the humongous raptor. "In fact, I think I can admit to you now that I feel the same way about you!"

You are suddenly frozen in place by this bit of information. It just seems so wrong for a raptor who could crush skyscrapers to feel any emotion at all towards something the size of a speck of dust to her, expecially if that emotion is some sort of love. Yet Hillary's huge nose is starting to nuzzle you right now, as she giggles lightly. Now less afraid of her, you start to think that you may actually find her attractive in other ways, like her light giggle and her friendly personality, but there is just something odd about a human and a raptor having this sort of relationship. You don't want to hurt this dino's feelings, but you have to let her know that something just is not working for you.

"Hillary, um, this is nothing against you or anything, but," you start to say before being hushed by Hillary. "I know, Daniel, you are worried about what everyone else would say, seeing a human like you and an anthro like me, together like this. I think it may be early to think too far ahead into the future, but I think that if we can be friends, like so many others, there is no reason why we can't be more than friends."

Suddenly, you hear Mrs.Thresher call you two as well as the other children down for breakfast. Quickly rolling off of her cushy bed, Hillary heads down to the dining room, where the smell of bacon and sausage fill the air. It's obvious that this raptor family is carnivorous. As Hillary lowers you to your place setting, you cannot get the image of you and Hillary being together out of your head.
133112.title: Crossing the Species Barrier

choices: She wants you to try brushing one of her fangs
She wants to brush your tiny set of teeth as well as hers
1331121.content:
Hillary didn't mention her feelings for you during breakfast, but she did act a bit 'clingy' in your opinion. She insisted you sit with her and share her food, while the rest of your family shared Mr. Thresher's plate of breakfast meats. Based on the size of that bacon and sausage, farm animals must also be enormous in this new world. Hillary gives you a little bit of each from her plate, plus a drop of her cow's milk, before she starts devouring her massive stack of protein.

Even though the raptor family were civilized among your family and ate the same kind of food you do, they were savages at the dinner table, swallowing huge quantities of food and making loud snarling noises. Your family doesn't seem to mind, so you guess you should just dismiss the behavior as a 'raptor thing'.

Even though she eats like a feral carnivore, Hillary sometimes took a break to watch you eat, sometimes wiping off tiny bits of food from your mouth with one of her enormous claws. You are glad that she can suddenly become gentle so she doesn't render you, but you find it a bit embarrassing. Thankfully your family doesn't seem to notice anything out of the ordinary.

After breakfast, Hillary's razor sharp teeth were full of hunks of meat and had a nasty breath, so it was no surprise that Mrs. Thresher said, "Okay, everyone, let's brush our teeth now." Hillary picked you up in a talon and headed to the washroom, and looked at you with a glint in her eye. She wanted to do something with you in here...
1331121.title: Our Little Secret

choices: "The new amusement park opened today; both our families are going!"
"Back to my room.  I thought we could have a little fun together."
13311211.content:
You think about that odd look your raptor girlfriend gave you as she started brushing her razor sharp fangs with a giant toothbrush covered in gallons of minty paste. After a minute she spit a whole lot of ugly meaty gunk out, but looked at you again. "Daniel, I have a piece of bacon stuck right in between these two front fangs," she said, pointing to her mouth. "Could you be a dear and dislodge it for me?"

Her claws grab you and lift you towards your huge jaws, so you can't refuse. "Sure, Hillary, just be very careful..."

"Don't worry about that, Dan, I'm always careful with you!" she expressed as she poked her claw in her mouth, thrusting you to her top two fangs. Wedged in the middle, there was indeed a very small piece of bacon; too small for her huge claws but big enough to reach in with your arm and grab it. Immediately you threw it down to her huge tongue; it was very wet with drool and not pleasant. Oddly, though, the rest of Hillary's mouth looked perfectly clean and fresh, an obvious sign of a good brushing.

You then hear a rumble, reminiscent of Hillary's voice. Suddenly, her gigantic tongue rises, and she starts pressing tons of the squishy pink appendage against you. It is very slimy but minty fresh; and you actually start to enjoy it very much as she rolls her tongue around you. A giant claw reaches in and presses you down so you stick to it, then draws you out of the pink cavern. You can't help but think: was Hillary kissing you? Her look at you with her huge eyes seem to say that it was a kiss; as she hands you a damp towel and soap to wash off the saliva.

She then picks you up and starts carrying you somewhere. "Um, Hillary, where are you taking me now?" you ask the colossal teenage dino, unsure of what she has in mind. Hillary giggles and replies,
13311211.title: Toothpick Man

choices: A Child Anthro is taking care of Earth Today.
A Teenage Anthro is taking care of Earth Today.
An Adult Anthro is taking care of Earth Today.
134.content:
You woke up groggy,and unhappily shook of the night's wonderful lure of sleep and dream.After preparing for the day,you stepped into the kitchen,your Mom busily making breakfast.You ignored her at this point,she wasn't in the best of moods when she was making breakfast.Your little brother came up to you as you stepped back into the hallway."Morning."You said to him.

"How can't you be excited?"He asked in that baby voice of his.

"Excited about what?"You reply.

"Stop kidding,big bro!I wonder who will be taking care of us today....."He said,walking off.

You shrugged off your brother's mysterious words.Maybe he was talking about a game?Anyways,you went into the living room,and turned on the television.The screen flipped onto the news channel."Good Morning Everyone,I'm Katie Matthews,"The Newswoman greeted all who were watching from the station."Everybody across the nation eagerly waits who will be 'taking care' of us all today."

Wait,what did she just say?It was almost the exact same thing your brother said."As you all know,everyday is a special ceremony between us,and the other Earth."The Newswoman continued.

Other Earth?Since when is there two Earth's?

"Each day,we are all taken care of by an Anthro,each one has been so kind to us!"She said,and you were absolutely transfixed on these words.Anthros....you heard that word in your dream last night.

Suddenly,the camera zoomed out,pointing at the sky."And here comes the Anthro who will be taking of Earth today!!"The Newswoman said joyfully.Your eyes went wide,and your mouth dropped.A Gigantic Hand was coming right from space.This hand could hold the entire earth!!No,was it a paw...or a claw?

Whatever it was,it was astronomical.
134.title: Passing Around Humanity

1342.title: A Teenage Anthro is taking care of Earth Today.

13421.content:
What you were seeing right now, you couldn't fully comprehend. As you gazed at the television screen documenting the event live, you still could not believe was actually happening. Was this all a dream? It didn't feel like it. Maybe it could have been a hoax or a joke? You highly doubted your brother and the entire news media team would do something like this just to fool you. No, it was happening, and it was happening fast. The massive, sky-filling hand was coming down upon earth faster and faster, closer and closer, until you could make out details. Heck, you didn't even have to look at the television anymore to get a good view, you could look outside your window now.

As you gazed upwards, you found that the closest thing of this astronomical hand was the thumb, so you focused on that. It was humanlike in appearance, yet covered in fur that gradated from light brown to a blended orange color, coming to a tip with pointed claws at the end of the digits. All of a sudden, there was a massive boom that echoed across the planet and a giant shudder that nearly knocked you off your feet. Once you regained your composure, you looked outside to see on the horizon that the thumb and forefinger of the hand had made contact with earth, holding the planet steadily. Good god, how massive was this anthro?! You were truly terrified to believe that a creature held the entire human race right between their fingernails, and apparently, everybody was okay with it!

The anthro must have had great dexterity, as it moved the earth very gently, and you hardly felt like you were moving at all. The sky seemed pitch black for a moment before it was replaced with an eye. It blinked a few times, sending a mighty wind across the face of the earth with every bat of an eyelash.

"Wow, look at all of you! I didn't realize humans were so...tiny." A mighty, booming voice thundered overhead, yet having an odd, feminine undertone. Okay, the anthro was a girl, that much you could make out.

"Here, lemme just give you guys a better look at the one who's gonna be taking care of you all today." The titaness bellowed. There was a slight shuffling with booming noise effects, and the sky became clear once more. The anthro must have settled the earth farther away or something.

"There!"

You looked to the sky once more, and there she was. She was a hyena, a wide, toothy grin on her face. She was clad in torn and tattered punk rock clothes that barely covered her well-defined curves., from a tank top with some rock band logo on it down to black boots that covered her paws.

"Hey everybody, I'm Sasha, nice to meet you all!" She cackled with a familiar hyena's laugh.
13421.title: The Huge Hyena Girl

choices: Enough to pick off a few humans and use them as toys.
Enough to toy with cities, or maybe entire countries.
134212.title: She's very mischievous and playful

135.content:
Here are a few more ideas...

Size Class: The world is dominated by friendly mega-anthros; each household has a human household in it, living alongside the giants as best they can. You might well be a favourite of a giant.

Nature Plays Chance: Similar to Lesser Sex, except that birth goes between mega-anthro and human regardless of sex (e.g. If the first born is a human, the second born will be a mega).
135.title: More Options

1351.content:
"Get up, sweetie." You rouse to see your mother standing over you. "The Franklins wish us to have breakfast with them today." You get up confused. Who are the Franklins? Why would we have breakfast with people we hardly know.

Once you're dressed you open the curtains to espy a very unusual landscape. It's like a great wooden plateau in the distance with a lovely back garden outside your house. You can't determine the strange shapes in the distance.

After going downstairs you prepare to get your coat and shoes.

"There's no need for that," Your mother tells you, "Diana will give us a lift." You're still none the wiser as to what is going on but you follow your parents out the front door.

"Good morning." A powerful female voice addresses you from above. "Did you all have a good night?"

"Yes, thank you, Diana." Your mother responds. "How are you this morning?"

"I feel great." The voice responds. "I'm so happy that you're all joining us for breakfast!" Then your eyes rise to see an asotnishing sight. High above you is an enormous anthropomorphic dog's face. Diana turns out to be a super-colossal bitch (no offense), her height must be in miles what a twelve-year old girl would be in feet. She lowers a vast paw to you and your family.
1351.title: The Franklins

choices: Mrs. Franklin comes in with Breakfast
13511.content:
Your parents immediately grab hold of Diana's fur when her little finger has reached your level and you do the same. With one twitch she tosses all of you up into the air only to come to a landing upon the pad of that same finger. She lifts you all up with great care. Looking over the edge of her gigantic pinky you see that your house and gardens are covering only a fraction of a table in what must be Diana Franklin's home.

Diana carries you through the house, giving you a good view of the giant home and all that lies within it. Even when you try to look past the sheer scale of it you find that it is bigger than your house proportionately as well as literally; it seems that the Franklins live in a mansion for all accounts.

Eventually Diana enters a dining room where a large (even to her) dining table stands, only laid out for breakfast at one end. Here you can see some of the other Franklins. At the head of the table a charismatic mature-looking dog is reading what must be a giant version of The Times (Diana's father), on his left you see a teenage bitch wearing suprisingly tasteful clothes and looks about 19 or 20 (Diana's eldest sister), next to her a younger bitch sits in what appears to be more 1960s style clothing (Diana's second elder sister), opposite her a young puppy smart clothes awaits for the meal to start (Diana's brother) and next to him is a bitch who seems to have a strong cheery optimism about her (Diana's younger sister).

Looking up from his newspaper, Diana's father sees her and then looks upon her pinky to see you and your parents attempting to stand after that swift trip through the giant house.

"I see you've picked them up." He comments to his daughter with a hint of humour in his voice and facial expression. "Good morning, little 'uns. Won't you take a seat." He indicated the chair next to him and the chair next to his second eldest.Diana carries you over to the table and sets your parents down into tiny chairs upon the table on either side of an equally tiny dining table positioned so either of them can look at either her father orher mother, who would clearly sit on her husband's right. Once your parents are seated Diana carries you round the table to the chair opposite her younger sister and sets you down in a solo chair at a much simpler table where you can choose whether to look at Diana, her younger sister or the rest of her family.
13511.title: Going to Breakfast

1353.content:
Some more story ideas:


Anthro dentist: To improve the relationship between humans and the mega-anthros, a group of humans has decided to open a "small" dentist buisness for the anthros. All of the employees are humans, and you happen to be one of them.

Furry Friend: A more casual storyline; you live in a world where the mega-anthros have maneged to live among the humans peacefully. You befriend one of these gigantic beings, and have a chance to just relax or hang-out with him or her.
1353.title: More stories

13531.content:
The first thing you felt was the cold, hard tile floor beneath you. You concentrated all of your energy just to sit up, and looked around. Above you, the ceiling was so high up that you couldn't even see it!
"Well, done with our little cat-nap now are we?" You literally jumped a foot in the air, and quickly turned around to face whoever this voice belonged to. You saw a nearly bald middle-aged man glaring at you. "Who are you?!" you asked, startled. The man scoffed at your question. "I'm the guy who's gonna fire you if you don't stop lazing around and get back to work!" There were several more questions you wanted to ask, but the guy just walked off muttering to himself.

You started to walk across the flat surface that looked like it went on for miles, when you stopped and looked up. There was some sort of gray wall in front of you that was wider than your house. As you were looking at the wall, it suddenly moved! "Ah, are you ready for my appointment?" you heard a loud, definitely male voice boom from somewhere high above you.
"Uh... your what?" you asked. "Ha ha, not only are you humans helpful in keeping our teeth clean, but you're funny too!" the voice laughed. Keeping clean teeth? Before you could think of what that meant, a giant hand came out of the sky and picked you up. It moved with unbelievable speed, and within seconds you were staring into the face of a colossal anthropomorphic wolf.
13531.title: Anthro Dentist

choices: Can’t do it and are kicked to the curb
Calm down. You have a job to do
135311.content:
“Uh... um” you stare in shock and awe at the titanic grey face of the wolf, then his strong booming voice startles you.

“Ok well doc, if you don’t mind I’m just going to place you in so you can begin ok?” Before you can say anything he starts to lower you towards an absolutely Titanic mouth, big enough to contain a city block. You feel a warm moist wind blow over you and see towering teeth. You scream and flail in the un breakable grip. The face contorts into panic and he promptly places you onto the ground again. Pressing a massive red button.

Once on the ground you try to run from the large beast directly into the man from before, he grabs you and you stare at him.

“Doctor! What the hell are you doing, I’ve never seen you act like this before, you’re one of the best dentists I know and it’s not even a simple procedure, it is literally an examination, you climb into our dear friends mouth and analyze any further procedures from a simple cleaning all the way to root canals. So get your act together and fix our reputation with this kind young man!” He says gesturing to the massive wolf.

Staring up at the Titan you...
135311.title: Learning curve

choices: Ben Ursuus a young male Bear
1353112.content:
Still confused you stare, but your best chance at at answers to what’s going on might be playing along and the balding man did say it was a simple examination after all. You turn to your fellow human and look at him

“I-i’m Sorry sir, I’m not sure what came over me. Guess I was stuck in some sort of waking nightmare and got confused.”

The balding man smiles at you and pats your shoulder “that’s what I like to hear Doctor, tension between humans and the titans are getting tighter so having a a talented human dentist who is willing to , literally, get up close and personal with titans on my side means a lot” the man turns to the massive wolf and shouts up to him “ alright, Mr. Brock, sorry for the inconvenience. The doctor is now ready for your appointment, if you would kindly allow the doctor into your mouth”

The massive wolf releases a booming laugh and says “no worries, I understand. It must be nerve wracking to put your fate so fully into the hands of an anthro like myself, especially in these political times. Now if you don’t mind I do have to get to a game of squash with a potential client by 5, so...”

The wolf places his hand down and, still a tad sceptical, climb onto it. This time he slowly lowers you towards his mouth and sticks out his tongue. His breath washing over you, smelling of toothpaste.

Taking a deep breath you step onto the tongue and for the first time realize you are not wearing shoes. You feel his saliva all over your feet and begin the examination.

With no real dental experience that you can remember you think it all looks fine and after a walk through decide to tell him it all looks fine. You are unaware of how to let him know to release you and try to scale his lip yourself. Somehow such a titanic being still feels this and releases you.

He thanks you and sets you back down on the strange grey tray and you wonder what happens next.

Eventually a voice comes over a massive intercom system and says

“Doctor your next patient is here, it’s....”
1353112.title: A simple evaluation

13533.content: OK just bear with me on this. In this world every alien species has a "Soulmate". It's basically a species that they will partner with. When they partner with their soulmate they gain new benefits like being able to reproduce with one another and there societies became more prosperous, but if one species suffers so will the other... In the year 2016 on the planet Pellicius a race of anthros find the location of their Soulmates' home planet and send ambassadors to it. The planet is called "Earth" by the local population. It was supposed to be a simple meet-and-greet, but to the ambassadors' horror that have a "slight" size difference to their destined mates....
13533.title: Soulmates

135331.content: David Peterson was a normal teenage boy. He got ok grades and had plenty of friends. He was just completing Stage 3 of his saturday ritual. Stage 1 was sleep in, Stage 2 was eat breakfast, Stage 3 was watch TV until he got sick of it. Needing something to do he decided to take a walk around town. Santos, Flordia was a small city of 10,000 people. It was a tight-knit community where almost everyone knew each other. David walked along until a deafening boom came from the sky. A large object was coming towards the city from space. At first he thought it was a meteor until he noticed it was made of metal and seemed to be slowing down....
135331.title: The Visitors

1353311.content: "Vector 6523 coming out of hyper-space now" Tigris announced over the ship's intercom. She could barely contain her excitement as she prepared to land the ship "THEY WERE FINALLY HERE! Earth, their Soulmates home planet. Only one species is informed of their soulmate and the task was given to them the Pellicusions to find theirs. She wondered what meeting an actual "human" would be like. The peninsula on the smaller continental mass was her designated landing zone. She heard the "humans" had spacecraft of their own but she didn't see any, just a few tiny pieces of debris bouncing off the window. As the ship got closer to ground she activated the landing thrusters. " touchdown. everyone welcome to Earth" she announced into the intercom.
1353311.title: continue

13533111.content: Tigris slowly looked around the meeting room at the ambassadors as they argued about there plan of action. Teri who was also a tiger anthro like Tigris wanted to go out and meet the locals face-to-face. Lupus a wolf anthro wanted to let the locals make contact. Nika a shark anthro agreed with Teri and Tali a cow anthro agreed with Lupus. Kane a dog anthro and the team's doctor had to serve as the tiebreaker. Much to Lupus' disappointment he sided with Teri. Tigris had also serve as security detail so she put on some black combat boots and armor. The ambassadors would be wearing long flowing robes that reached down to their ankles. Nika put on a pair of sandals on her webbed four-toed feet, but the other ambassadors like most anthros went barefoot. Tigris and the ambassadors stepped in the airlock and shielded there eyes from the bright light from the world outside.
13533111.title: The Ambassadors

135331111.content: David could hardly believe what he was seeing. A huge spaceship at least 1000 miles high. "Millions of aliens must be in there" he thought. Suddenly a large hole started opening. David held his breath as he wondered what it could be. Then like a ton of bricks the realisation of what it was hit him and the rest of Santos, it was a door... As if to back up their claims a gigantic armor-clad figure emerged through the doorway. The being was obviously female but the weirdest thing was that it had the appearance of a humanlike tiger. The alien looked around with an eager look on her face which quickly replaced with disappointment. She then step off of the ship her boots dwarfing the city. A shiver of fear ran through David as he realized what this meant. They were nothing but ants. Ants at her mercy..
135331111.title: It's a bird! it's a plane! it's a.....giant...cat.

choices: Tigris notices the tiny humans at the last second
1353311111.content: "Is this the right planet? " Tigris asked Nika. "I am positive that this is the right one. We monitored all communications and information coming from the planet. This is Earth all right " the shark girl replied. "If this is Earth then where is everyone?" Asked Tigris as she looked over the seemingly lifeless plain. Tigris decided to amuse herself by observing the surrounding area. It was nothing remarkable but a flat landscape that seemed to stretch on forever there was a few weird gray patches here and there but once nothing worthy of note.. X-POV CHANGE-X David couldn't believe his eyes. Giant humanlike animals were walking around his city not even knowing it was there. The tiger one seemed to be talking to what looked like a shark. He couldn't understand their language but the creatures all seemed to be looking for something that was obviously their size and david wondered what it could be. David then looked up at the tiger who had finished her conversation with the shark and began walking straight towards the city...
1353311111.title: Is this the right planet?

13533111111.content: Tigris couldn't get it out of her head. There was something strange about the gray grass. She was alot bigger than it was and it didn't look toxic but their was something.... just wierd about it. There was strange crisscross lines in arranged like a grid. It made Tigris think about...... "roads" she whispered in horror. "Roads!" she yelled out. "Tigris what's wrong" Lupus asked in concern. "The gray grass! It's really human cities!" All of the pellicusions froze with looks ranging from suprise,horror, and disbelief. Tali the cow was the first to speak up "bbb but how is this even possible" she stuttered with poorly contained shock. "Our probes never actually told us their size" said Kane somewhat level-headedly. "The humans must be so afraid" added Nika. "Despite their size we still have a mission to complete" said Teri taking charge of the situation. "We are gonna need one of the locals the synthesize a translator program." "I'll get one" said Tigris pulling out a magnifying glass. Tigris very carefully used her claws to pick up one of humans. She couldn't help but wonder what was going through the human's head. Nothing good most likely.....
13533111111.title: Pellicius.. we have a problem

135331111111.content: This day was getting worse by each passing second. First a race of gigantic alien animals landed on Earth. Second the aliens were so huge they couldn't even see the cities at their feet. Third when they do see the cities one of the aliens grabs him with her claws. If someone told David yesterday that tomorrow he would be manhandled by a miles-high tiger he would recommend that person speak with a therapist. The aliens were taking him inside their ship. He would have been in awe if he wasn't completely terrified. The aliens must be planning to torture him or probe him or turn him into an alien-robot-cyborg the conquer the Earth. His fears were confirmed when they put him in this large machine. It look like a x-ray machine you would see at a hospital but it was obviously designed for someone the alien's height. Before David could react the machine was turned on and instead of immense pain he just felt a light tickling feelin. Just as he was beginning to a enjoy the tickling it stopped.
135331111111.title: From Bad to Worse

1353311111111.content:
David was confused by the aliens' behavior. After they took him out of the machine and set him on a table; they began to have a heated discussion with each other. David couldn't deny that they all had an excited look on their faces. Suddenly they stopped talking and one the tiger creatures stepped towards him. David didn't know what to do. Should he run to the other side of...the table.... or make the miles high jump off it. He didn't have much faith in those ideas. He began to think he could fight it, but realized his chances against a being whose little toe was taller than Santos' highest buildings was that good. David was frozen in terror as the tiger creature opened it's mouth to speak and to his surprise english can out.

"Human can you understand me?" It spoke. David was on the verge of fainting from shock, but he tried to pull himself together. He began to think of an answer because he could see she (or at least he thought it was ) was getting impatient.
1353311111111.title: Take Us to your leader

13533111111111.content:
"Uh hello" David said nervously to the tiger alien in front of him. As soon as he said it her face lit up and she began talking very rapidly. David caught a few things like her name was Teri and they were from the planet Pellicius and something about "soulmates".

"Ok slow down!" David said exhausted.
"Oh sorry. I'm just very excited about meeting a human" said Teri slightly embarrassed.
"Why are you here" asked David.
"I tell you, but i'll have to explain the concept of soulmates to you"

1 long explanation later

"Wow. You guys came all this way to meet us?"
"Yep" replied Teri "We were wondering if you could help us get in contact with your leaders"
"Sure i'll help" said David. David could finally relax when he realized the aliens or Anthros as they prefer to be called.He didn't know what this means for humanity, but the world would never be the same....
13533111111111.title: Explanations

135331111111112.content: Parch 17,2016- A day that will forever be known as bonding day. The anthros of Pellicius make comtact with their soulmates due to the help of a young boy. He pointed them to the United Nations where they explained themselves. All over Earth people celebrate their new relationship with the Pellicusions. April 2016- Scientists from both worlds have discover the Pellicusions are roughly 200 miles larger than humans so in order to protect the public Pellicusions have established settlements in areas where human development is nearly non-existant such as Sibera, Canada, and the Great Plains Region in the U.S. A joint colony that includes both Pellicusions and humans is established on Mars. October 2025- The first human anthro child is born. The daughter of Jack Fisher and Sally Fisher a collie anthro. Their daughter was an anthro like her mother, but her birth reaveled the likelyhood for human children. Human females will rarely give birth to anthro children a 10% chance. Anthro females however have a 50/50 chance of giving birth to either species. June 2029- The town of Gaea in the Great Plains region of the U.S. has become the largest anthro community on earth with a population of 105. Most residents are ambassadors and government officials however. A similar census on pellicius was undertaken showing the resident human population is at 10 million.
135331111111112.title: Together at last

135331111112.content:
You are Elgar Sigurdsson a normal boy, well if you consider being normal was being cool as hell and being a superstar you were a handsome redhead with an epic full beard. Life was great.Well, it was until aliens came and almost stepped on your city.It felt like you were in one of them movies.And then suddenly out of nowhere, you saw a hand coming straight for him you and then you were picked up there were many thoughts going through your head but the one that was dominant the most was,"SHIT SHIT SHIT."
While you were being lifted you were praying to the gods that you didn't do anything wrong and then the rise stops in front of this gigantic tigress' eyes and while you were trying to man up and handle the tiger like a man would.you got your shit together and stood up to confront the tigress and you looked the woman straight in the eyes and all you could see was concern adoration and slight fear from the tigress. And then she moves her mouth to start speaking.

"Are you a human.What's your name?" Her voice was angelic and music to his ears.But yow were never one to fall for looks you knew how to handle the situation.

"isn't impolite to ask for one's name before giving your own," You reply.
"Oh, My name is Tigris, Now can you give me your name." To you, they seemed like planet conquers you had to intimidate them and scare them so you think of something and spout it
"Yes, I am Elgar Sigurdsson a proud member of the human race and if you plan to conquer us think aliens because even though we are small compared to you we came from caves and paved the way to today with endless technologies that sure as hell bet will take you down so hey perhaps that indicates the fact that this teensy race adapts were made to last the worse our circumstances the more certain our chance is we WILL stand persistent grin in the face of hostility and live." You say that with your voice rising by each and every word and you look at them to see the effects to see that many of them were shocked and widened their eyes and then Tigris looked at you with tears in her eyes and said.
"Oh No we could never think of hurting our soulmates without you, our kind would perish please Elgar I beg of you reconsider." To see a large creature in front of you looking this way is weird, outlandish, but weird all of them seemed scared and some shaking but the only thing that came to your mind right now was
"Soulmates?" you ask in a bizarre way. to which Tigris replies
"Yes, Master Elgar soulmates." You're thinking "Master? and what the hell is a soulmate?"
Seemingly reading your mind out of nowhere Tigris continues still crying "In this world, every alien species has a "Soulmate". It's basically a species that they will partner with. When they partner with their soulmate they gain new benefits like being able to reproduce with one another and their societies become more prosperous, but if one species suffers so will the other...Our planet Pellicius a race of anthros found the location of their Soulmates' home planet and send ambassadors to it. The planet is called "Earth" your planet Master Elgar. It was supposed to be a simple meet-and-greet, But it turned into a huge misunderstanding please Master Elgar if you refuse us not only will we suffer but also your own kind."

"Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Master Elgar you saved us from the brink of destruction.Our policies are to act peacefully bring any willing man woman and child anyone who is not willing is fine but you'll be surprised by how much want to come with us but the honor of the first should go to you-you will be treated with respect and be allowed anything you if you wish to come on our planet you will be welcome anytime but I do so wish you to accept the honor of the first Master Elgar" She says with a huge smile on her face,No wonder she was calling you Master it seems that this deal is one of the best you ever got in your life you look at her and say,"I accept the privilege and honor of being the first."

The sudden light blinded him momentarily but he saw that the city was intact but everyone was a bit shaken up. They must survived by being between the heel and sole. Even though the city was safe they might not survive the second time. He had to find a way to get the attention of the giants. He looked around for away to accomplish this task until he happened upon a fireworks store. The bright flashes and loud bangs of the fireworks might get their attention but it also might not. David then remembered the jet at his family's hanger in the public airfield. His dad was a police chopper pilot and once took him up in it and even let him fly around a bit. He only took off and flew for a few minutes around the airfield and this was fly dozens miles into the air and not get mistaken for a bug by these giant anthros. If you had to tell someone your most favorite thing in the universe it would most likely be sleeping. While you sleep a feeling of bliss and safety covered you like a blanket. As you lay under your mattress and covers you hear her voice above you saying "Now you know I hate having Rai do that."

Rai? Who was Rai? Your question was answered as you crawled out from under your mattress and was greeted by your mother who was sitting on the shoulder of a humongous Raichu. On this agumon's shoulder you could see who you believed was your dad. It seemed like Digimon also existed here. 13533222222111.content:
Setting yourself up so a long read doesn't put pressure on your muscles you take the book and look at the front cover. It's a shock to see it with a silhouette of a canine's profile with a barely discernible silhouette of a person just across from the former. Hesitantly you open the book and begin.

The history offered speaks of there being two supercontinents, one being pretty much what you'd expect and the other being on a far larger scale, lousy with something typically referred to as 'magic', and populated with enormous anthropomorphic mammals who interact as readily as humans of different ethnic origins might. It appears that these two lands developed separately for millennia before first contact was made. There then followed a war triggered by a military assault upon an explorer from the land of giants, the anthropomorphic inhabitants of which are termed 'Titans'; however this war didn't really last long because, for all of humanity's technological development, no weapon they can craft can harm a titan. What basically happened is that humanity would send an expeditionary force to bring down the titans, but they never reported back having been captured usually within a week, and the titans would send envoys to try and make peace but who were attacked in a reactionary move that provoked them to just grab the assailants and go home. Peace eventually came due to popular protest from human civilians, appalled by the 'casualty rate', where a new enlightenment age began as the titans now had the opportunity to show the humans just what their society was like.

The titans' homeland, apparently named Gargantua, had been at peace since its unification some 50,000 years ago, all the jobs that needed to be done but which no one likes doing were typically done in some magical way allowing the titans to engage in more academic pursuits. It turned out that the humans who became POWs were given conditions of internment that were at least five times better than those laid out in what you knew as the Geneva Convention.

Anyway, in these modern times, titans and humans...

135332222221112.content:
Even though both titans and humans are welcome in each other's lands they mostly kept to their own. In the case of the titans it seemed understandable as a single mouthful of food to them would mean something the size of a city. You pause in your reading at this, wondering just how tall the titans must be and shuddering at the idea that one forkful on their scale could easily carry thousands of people. Reading on you find that the relative lack of humans in Gargantua seems to be more to do with a prevailing unease about living somewhere where just about everything's bigger and stronger than you.

Eventually you find more details about the titans. The description paints a picture of a race who are inherently superior to humans in almost every way. The majority live to be 10,000, their senses are so keen that they can hold conversations with humans over a hundred miles away without a telephone, there's no record on either end of their children acting out of malice and then there's the whole 'magic' thing. They've taken to wearing cloth shoes while out and about to stop themselves from the off-chance of crushing innocent people, which seems rather blasé.

Before you can continue in your studies a noise outside the door makes you put the book away just as a few of the other boys stir at the sound.

1353322222231.content:
It happened so fast, you and the rest of your people have no choice but to leave your home planet for good, after an horrific event that have wiped out tons of life on Earth, making it no longer inhabitable for you and the others to live. So here you are right now, inside a large spaceship trying to search another planet to live in. You wonder how are you going to adjust to the new life of your new home, you never seemed to trust any unfamiliar stuffs due to being such a worrywart. You sighed and decided to take a nap on your bed. It has been about two years and yet still no planet found.

Two hours later, you soon woken up by a loud alarm:

"Attention everyone, we have finally found a suitable planet for us to live. It seemed to contain life similar to Earth. We'll arrive shortly so please patient as we now approach the new planet."

You were both excited and nervous at the same time. What if it was full of aliens who don't treat kindly to invader like you? You left your room and began to walk across the hallway. You looked across the glass windows that made up the hall and try to look forward to see the brand-new planet. You saw a small blueish dot across it and suggested that it could be the planet that is going to be your new home. However right at the corner of your eye, you saw something glowing, fast, and....it's heading right toward the ship! "Oh my GOD!!!!!" you yelled as the huge meteorite have impacted the ship just in a bink of an eye. Because it happened so quickly, you fell off your feet and rolled over towards the a station in the middle of the hallway. You unfortunately didn't saw what it was and went inside it. Once inside, you found yourself sealed completely shut after accidentally pressing a button along the way and a voice that said:

"EMERGENCY ESCAPE POD ACTIVATED"

"NO, NO, NO, NO!!!!" you yelled as you try to pry it open, but it was useless. Outside, you see many people running across the hall, screaming and searching for the exit. You try to call them for help but you know it wouldn't work. You stood there as the pod have unwillingly launched you off the wrecked ship and into the unknown. You looked ahead and could make out some of the other pods now leaving the ship. You closed your eyes, believing that it was now the end of your life. Unbeknownst to you, your transportation was heading straight towards the new planet.

"There you are." the ebony titaness rumbled. "I've been looking all over for you. You really had me worried."
Did... did she know you? How is this possible? Not wanting to think about it any further, in a blind panic you tried to run and jump away from her palm but the way became blocked when she clasped her other hand over you, shrouding your tiny form in darkness. "Ah ah ah. We wouldn't want to hurt ourselves, now would we?"

You were freaking out.
Chrysalis shouldn't be here. Didn't she hate Starlight's guts after what she did? What the fuck is going on?
The gigantic hand curled around your minuscule body and dropped you suddenly into a dark, warm place filled with a soft fabric. A loud zipping sound could be heard, telling you that she must've dropped you into her coat pocket and closed the zipper.

Chrysalis' deep, sultry voice filtered in through the thick leather, albeit a little muffled. "Alright Glimmer, I got what I came here for. You can consider this a small down payment for your role in the destruction of my hive. The next time I see you. I'm still going to beat you to within an inch of your life, but this time. I won't slice you up with my claws.."

"Um, thanks?" came the bewildered reply.

There was a small pause before Chrysalis continued.
"And don't take this to mean I'm going to go soft from your so-called "friendship". We're not friends, and I'll thank you to remember that."

A loud drone from outside began to sound, and it began to feel ever hotter inside the felt lined pocket. Suddenly, a bright green flash surrounded your whole being, and you felt yourself being thrown back, colliding with the soft wall. The zipper rapidly unzips and you're lifted back out into the open air by a harsh green glow.
When you look back at Chrysalis you could see her expression had completely changed. There were tears in her eyes and her mouth was formed into a gentle smile.
She redeposited you back onto her outstretched palm, finding it difficult to speak through her starined sobs.
When finally she spoke, her voice barely came above a whisper, and was choked with emotion.
"I can't believe it. I can't believe I finally found you. My dear, sweet little..."
