1411.title: The old human age

142.content:
You wake up with your odd dream still visible in your head, which puts you in a good mood. You get out of your bed and start heading to your closet, but the closet is ... gone? You look around your bedroom, and you realize that all of the doors are gone! All that's left is the window, but you live on the seventh floor of an apartment building, so that won't do any good. You look for a telephone, but instead of one you find an intercom button. You don't remember this, but at least you can call someone for help now.

Pressing down the button, you yell, "Excuse me, is the management there?" Immediately you hear a crackly female voice you don't recognize giggle a bit before answering, "You don't have to be so formal, Chuck. Well, I'm glad your finally awake, did you forget to set your alarm clock? I told you that I would be cleaning the apartment today."

"Wait, don't come yet, I'm not dressed appropriately!" you shout into the intercom, not wanting any kind of woman see you in messy clothing without shoes.

"I know how much you want an extra set of clothes, Chuck, but I told you that I can't afford to get another set in your size. Besides, I spent a good deal of cash on our intercom, and many people in the city are already horribly jealous of that. I'll be there in a minute to get you out of your apartment so I can clean it."

Knowing that the woman would not return your next message, you wait by the window, not knowing what else to do. It does look like a good day, it is very bright and the weather looks beautiful. You look down, and unusually there are no cars out. In fact, the whole city looks barren. Where could everybody be? The woman did mention that there were many people in the city, and you remember there being at least half a million individuals based on the last census. Suddenly, the brightness around the city goes dark, and an unusual sliding sound is heard. You wonder what kind of freak weather change could be occuring and look up.

Suddenly, with a loud popping noise, your room heaves forward, exposing it to the outside air. It is very odd that your apartment now acts much like a drawer; you wonder how the management could have set that up without you noticing. It's even odder that the entire sky is black, white and pink, and moving straight towards you.

You have no time to panic as your apartment lurches high into the air and flips upside down. You fall about twenty feet before landing on a soft pink part of the sky. Except that this is definitely not the sky, it is a huge feline paw! You can see your apartment above you gripped gently between two huge pads, each one many times larger than the apartment itself! Looking down, you see a black and white striped wall of fur that makes your city seem very small in comparison. You also notice that there is a glass dome next to the city; it looks like it could make a snowglobe of the town.

"Well, Chuck, now that your up, why don't you join the rest of town with breakfast so I can get to work?" spoke the humongous white tiger woman above you. Picking you up in two massive pink pads, you are whisked into a little tray by the city and lowered in. You smell eggs and sausages, and everyone seems to be mad at you for your tardiness. You are very confused, but strangely unafraid. It's almost as if your previous, tedious life of a pencil pusher has been, dare you think it, vastly improved.
142.title: Spring Cleaning

1421.content:
As you eat, you ignore the angry retorts of your fellow citizens. You have trouble eating your scrambled eggs. All of your attention is directed on that huge white tiger woman; you can't seem to think about anything else. Some people try to talk to you, but you only answer with little grunts.

How can anyone not admire the hugeness of this anthro? She is very attractive and looks very strong and muscular, yet at the same time she is so dainty and gentle when she cleans the city. The entire city could be demolished by one swipe of her massive paw, yet she deftly handles each building like a pro. Even the largest skyscraper in the city isn't even half the height of one of her finger pads, yet she can expertly scrub each floor with a brush on a long handle, then gently wipe every corner with the tiniest yellow cloth. The way that she places those buildings down so softly, you have no doubt that there isn't a single piece of furniture out of place in any of the buildings.

You sip some more coffee, and realize that it has gone cold. You look around, and all of the half million or so people are avoiding you. You don't know why, so you ask a prominent looking lady.

"Why are we avoiding you? Humph!" the lady remarked rather rudely. "I didn't know you needed people to talk to. I know, why don't you ask your 'girlfriend' to get you some human friends!" The lady stormed away in a huff, and you reason that she's probably just jealous.

Pretty soon, people were being scooped up by the thousands as the tiger woman placed them on a soft pillow-like object in town square. Well, it would take far too long to place everyone in their apartments separately, so this way is probably to cut time. Soon, everybody is back in town except for you, and the anthro tiger now reaches for you. However, you are apparently not going back to town, as the tiger carries you to...

14211.content:
Taking you to her place, you rest on her soft pink hand. Asking yourself what is going on around here. As you hold on to the pink skin of her hand, you look up at her face. She had beautiful green eyes and with long strands of fur clump together act as her hair. For an anthro, you thought of her pretty cute. She finally stops at her place looking down at you as she opens door with a smile on her face. Entering the house, she closed the door behind her as you assume this is the living room.

But for a living room, it is huge. The ceiling looked like it was past the sky and beyond. The nicely colored white and black furniture with a fake white and black tiger rug seemed to you like skyscrapers. "It's pretty small but I hope you don't mind chuck," she blushed.

"Small...you kidding me...it's like a freaking country," you said in awe.

"That's probably from your view," She smiled as she went towards the couch and took a seat. With her hands cupped like a football stadium, she intensely stared at you with affection.

"I not so big on math but how big are you in human terms," you asked sheepishly as you wanted to know her height at least.

"Hmmm, that's a hard question," she said as she thought about, "I think I'm basically five miles to u Chuck," she said with a smirk.

"Wow," you said amazed with a strange feeling of being thrilled. "But how do you know my name and............why is everyone jealous about you and me," you asked as you needed some answers.

"Wow your straight to the point," she asked with an embarrass smile .
14211.title: Her own living quarters

143.content:
So, humans are icredibly little yet beloved pets in this reality; but what's exactly your situation as a pet, when you wake up in the new universe?

There can be several options.

1) Family. You're still living in a farm where humans are bred, until the moment they're taken to shops to be bought. You live with your family, parents and many sons and daughters, and since you all are so close, you all live in fear of being separated once you children grow up. You father often begged the owner of the farm to not split your family, but he hasn't gotten an answer yet.

2) Shop. You're in a pet shop, waiting to be bought, and you're very nervous. Which kind of master are you going to live with?

3) Young Owner. You're the pet of a ten-year-old anthro kid (species and gender are your choice), who adores you and carries you to school and wherever he/she goes, never getting tired of toying with you.

4) College Life. You're the pet of a college-aged anthro teen, who lives in a dorm room with several schoolmates, and all of you have great fun but also troubles.

5) Other....

Just before waking up, you had a long dream about your new life, and waking up you smirk, thinking about how odd dreams can be...

But a moment later, you notice your new surroundings, and realize, much to your horror, that your dreams has turned into reality! What are you going to do? Freaking out or adapting to the new reality the best you can?

You awake with a sharp gasp from the dream, your head still spinning as you look around the translucent room you've come to call home since arriving here.

The chamber, more spacious than your apartment was back home to say the least, is sparsely furnished, only a thick mattress to sleep on and table to dine at (aside from the restroom facitlities of course) decorate the plexiglass chamber.

You're treated well by the owners of the shop of course, they dote upon your every desire as best they can, but you know they can't grant you the freedom from these confines that you've been dreaming of for your months of protective custody. Like all humans, upon discovery, you're held in one of these chambers awaiting adoption by a guardian.

Today is your lucky day though. The light of day is blocked by a massive face that squints in at you, a smile splitting the muzzle that fills your vision as the titan simply announces. "This one. I've had my eye on him for a while. I'd love to take him home."

You smile as you jog to the clear side, putting a tiny hand to the glass as you all but bounce with glee, looking out at your new companion for life;

143221.content:
You understood her look exactly.You had seen it so many times before.Once,an Anthro bear child had decided to examine your containment cube.As you looked heavenwards at his face so high above,you expected a smile.You did get a smile,but this one had devious intent behind it.This child was going to be a terrible owner....but luckily,the clerk had seen him before.The child came in just to shake around humans in their cubes,so he was shooed away before you were bought.

"My pet."She interrupted you.Instead of a booming shockwave,her voice sounded normal to you.The belt's technology was amazing."Your my pet.I'll name you when I feel like it...."She continued on grinning at you.She stopped walking,having arrived at her apartment.It appeared she lived alone.Is that why she bought you?

"Oh,we are going to have so much fun.I haven't had a pet in so long....my last human died a couple years ago."She sounded sincerely sad at the end of her sentence,but her mischeivous energy came back quickly.She took off her belt,and removed you from your containment case.This was all done in a blur.You had no idea something so big could move so fast.

God. Damn. The tiger was huge. . . like all the inhabitants of this world, he was nearly a hundred miles tall when fully grown, so massive that you find yourself unable to even focus on his entire face as he peers in at you. Your eyes dart from that wide muzzle to those piercing amber eyes to the mile wide nose. . . hell, if it weren't for the distinct orange and ebon stripes of a bengal, you wouldn't even be certain it was a tiger.

The whole world seemed to shake as your containment unit was taken from the stack, a glance over your shoulder at the remaining cubes a brief reminder of just how many humans were in this holding facility, waiting for caretakers to take them home.

The belts, thankfully, were one of the first things you got when arriving on this world, both protecting you from harm and allowing for conversation with a giant, so long as they were wearing a receiver tuned to your belt. . . the explanation of the scientific principals were well over your head, but the basic concept of a combination walkie-talkie and force field belt made sense.

143232.content:
The mighty tiger's eyes are so huge, that you cannot see both of them at once as they grow closer to your tiny aquarium. You see a great sparkle in them, though, and the rumbling that accompanies his look at you can only be him purring. Unexpectedly, his cavernous mouth opens, and a gigantic tongue washes over your cage, spilling thousands of gallons of saliva over the sides, and a little of it seeps in through the air holes. You know that he's just showing you a little affection, but even that could end up drowning you if he decides to do that when he takes you out of the cage.

Apparently, the tiger lives within walking distance of the shop. You half expect him to put you into one of the huge pockets of his blue jeans, but no, he keeps you out, staring lovingly at you the entire trip. There is an inquisitive expression on his face; there is no doubt that he is thinking of all of the things he can do with his very own micro-human pet. You hope that he isn't planning on playing too rough with you. Indeed, even if he was being a gentle as he could and your security belt works perfectly, you still worry that something bad could still happen to you. You guess that you should just leave your life in your new owner's paws now.

When you get home, the first thing your new feline owner does is pop your aquarium open and shake you on to his gargantuan paw. Wondering what he is thinking, you suddenly realize that...
143232.title: He Think's You're Cute!

1432322.content:
The 'house' the tiger has set up before you occupies a glass coffee table in his enormous home. He stoops as he tilts his paw, letting you slide off his hand, right into your new home.

You've only a few moments to look around your new accommodations, but they certainly look more comfortable than the terrarium you've been kept in until now. A full kitchen, washer and dryer, indoor pool and basketball court . . . it's everything you could have ever wanted in a home, a sprawling mansion of your very own. But still you can't help but notice a few flaws. No doors leading outside. No windows. The entire ceiling is made of a refracting glass surface. For all it's wonderful features, it is still, in fact, a very nice cage for your new owner to keep his pet in.

That's when, for the first time, you hear his voice, both as a subsonic rumble all around you and coming from the speaker in your belt.

"Hello. Is this thing working?"

You can't help but look up at the towering being now, wincing as you realize that he's gotten the earstud that allows for proper communication to work. Anything he says while wearing the stud, you'll hear, and vice-versa. Your voice cracks a bit as you reply, a reminder that you've hardly spoken twelve words since your arrival on this world. No sense in talking when no one can hear you. "Yessir. I can hear you just fine now."

The massive cat stoops, his face seeming to fill the entire sky as he looks down at you in the house, a wide grin splitting his muzzle. "No need to call me 'sir'. It's Antiony."

You nod dumbly for a moment before realizing that he can't actually see you, still trying to work your head around the situation. "Oh. . . okay, Antionysir."

The cat can't help but chuckle at that, but he clearly understands your nervousness. "Well I've got some news, my little friend . .

The low thunder of Antiony's purr vibrates through you as he kneels beside the table, his breath blowing your hair and clothes around as he leans in to study your tiny features as best he can.

"So, my little pet, what did you want to do first?" He winks, a playful grin splitting that miles wide muzzle. "Did you want to explore your new home or explore your new owner?"

There was no hallway for as far as you could see, but all of your stuff appeared to be in one corner of a gigantic room. The walls seemed to go on for miles. Light was filtering into the room from a window that looked larger than your family’s farm was supposed to be.

You think that you are just having a weird dream, but when you pinch yourself nothing happens. Now you are starting to get a little nervous. “Mom, dad, are you there?” you call out. There is no response. “Mary, Tom, where are you?” you yell to your brother and sister and receive no response. “Jace, come here boy,” you call out to your border collie in the vain hope that he will respond.

“Coming master,” you hear an unfamiliar voice respond from what seems like miles away. You wonder what could make itself heard over that distance. Then something comes into view. It was absolutely huge and headed straight in your direction. The creature kind of reminded you of your dog, except he was walking on two legs and a good 70 miles tall. You were paralyzed at the sight of the massive canine which made you look like something less than a speck.

He walked what must have been hundreds, if not thousands of miles within a few seconds. Then he got down on all fours and you saw that he was wearing a dog collar. On that collar was a dog tag with the name Jace etched into it. It did not seem possible, but this unbelievably huge creature was your loyal and lovable dog Jace.

Jace’s muzzle was mere inches from your face, filling your entire field of vision before a huge pink tongue darted out and gave you the biggest lick you had ever experienced. Your entire body was covered in a thin layer of dog drool, but it made you fell safer around the humongous dog. He was obviously trying to show you his affection and that was much better than him stepping on you or trying to eat you. “Good morning master, are you ready for me to take you to breakfast with the rest of the family?” Jace asked in a warm, friendly manner.

Since you loved animals you wanted your own animal preserve. You and the animals got along great and you even trained them to behave like normal household pets. Now THAT was a surprise to the inspectors who saw man-eaters behaving like puppies or kittens. Your preserve contained animals from all over the world. From simple dairy cows and horses to lions, tigers, and hyenas. You were a pretty long way from civilization but never without company.
14513.title: The Animal Preserve

145131.content: You were then shocked from your reminiscing by huge earthquakes that would easily surpass the Richter Scale. When you looked at the source of the tremors your jaw dropped. Walking towards you was a massive hyena. The hyena bore a striking resemblance to your pet hyena Shenzi. So named due to her similarly to the Lion King character. This couldn't be Shenzi because last time you checked she wasn't 2000 mile tall anthro! Or was she? Those pills really did a number on you; maybe they corrupted your memories? The Shenzi you remember was kind and compassionate unlike the disney character maybe this one is the same. As Shenzi's shadow loomed over you your neck started to hurt as you tried to look at her face but she was to tall. A voice rang above you so powerful that you nearly cowered in fear if it wasn't for the compassion in it. "Good Morning Master would you like some breakfast or would you like to skip it today"? Breakfast sounded good and you were a bit curious to see what a 2000 mile tall hyena would cook.
145131.title: Your Pet Hyena

1452.content:
You wake up from your dream suddenly and in a cold sweat. Your room is bathed in an eerie white light. You try to get up, but realize that your body is immobile. The dream you just had continues to dance in your head, and no matter how hard you try, you can't shake it out.

Suddenly, your body slowly starts to rise off of your bed! You have no control over moving your body, so you can only stare at the ceiling in fear as it moves closer. You hear your bedroom window slide open, then you are maneuvered in midair towards the portal to the outside.

As soon as your head is exposed to the chilly air of the wee hours, you notice something absolutely mindboggling floating in the sky; a giant ship. It is not a saucer, but more shaped like a conventional rocket. It seems to be floating using an odd unseeable power, and you realize that you must be having another odd dream or you are being abducted by aliens. The ship is massive; it extends almost from horizon to horizon, yet must be several miles in the air.

Your body then starts rising up, up, up to the spacecraft. You are glad that you cannot look down, as the view would be very frightening. The air becomes cooler, but for some reason not absolutely frigid like it should. You are even only wearing your boxers, which should make your body more exposed to the cold.

You soon see a hatch that the eerie light emanates from, and you don't doubt that that is where you are heading. Sure enough, you float inside the ship, and suddenly everything goes dark.

You regain control of your body as soon as the lights turn off, but you are obviously no less fearful. You hear odd movements outside that seem to come from all around you. Unexpectedly, a door opens in front of you and you stumble into an odd room. You see other humans in here; ten including you, and from their appearance they look like they have all come from different parts of the world.

Without thinking, you ask, "Can anyone tell me what's going on?" You don't even realize that half of these people are women and you are still in your boxers, though they probably would be too shaken to notice. One woman says, in an Australian accent, "Nobody here knows whats going on. From what I can gather, we all woke up from a weird dream about giant man-animals to find themselves floating towards this huge ship in the sky."

You find it very unusual that everyone has had the strange dream you did. Suddenly, everyone starts shouting as the walls of the roomto lift up. You soon realize that you are in the presence of a pair of absolutely enormous draconic anthros! You are all inside of a little glass box, levitating in the air before two faces, which you see as one male and one female. The creatures must be several thousands of miles tall! As your senses knock you for a loop, a single sentence forms in your mind: "Do not fear us, Earthlings, for we come in peace."
1452.title: Abducted

14522.content:
After you wake up the day seemed just like any other, but when the morning news came on they delivered a ground-breaking story. It turned out that astronomers all over the world had spotted a large cylindrical object moving towards the Earth with a comparatively slow and strongly insinuated to be deliberate transition through the solar system. Currently radio transmissions were not registering any response, in spite of accounting for a ten-minute delay at this stage.

There were a number of rumours circulating about throughout the day but little else was heard until the evening news, where you learn that the apparent spaceship was now in orbit around the Earth, moving faster than its altitude would suggest. Other indications suggested it was a massive vessel of 500 miles in diameter and longer than the diameter of the Earth itself. Amazingly it was having no gravitational influence on the world. Reports came in indicating a raised military alert status as a precautionary measure.

More information didn't get through until 10 o'clock when the final news report of the day told of a final achievement in radio communication. Indications suggested that the aliens inside the vessel spoke at least English if not other languages of Earth, although they could've been in possession of translators of some kind, and that they were expressing peaceful intentions for them to study life on Earth in exchange for sharing knowledge about their own life.

Next morning you were just about to set off when a phone call came through. A gruff voice told you that the aliens had apparently managed to pick out specific civilians they wished to meet and you were on the list. Stunned you talked for a while before it became apparent that the military were the ones who had decided to alert you to this fact, a jeep was on its way at that very moment.

By the time it arrived you had packed sufficiently for a week's holiday, expecting to be out of the house for more than a day or two. When the driver, who bore the rank of corporal, helped you with your gear he informed you that an alien pod had landed and you were to be driven straight to the landing site.
14522.title: Mega Extraterristrials

1453.content: Mind-reading Titans: Anthros live side by side along humans but only for one reason. They feed of of human emotions, however positive and negative emotions have positive and negative effects on the anthros. Emotions like anger,hate and fear cause pain to the anthros while love, happiness and...lust stimulate the anthros and various way.
1453.title: Your own choice.

14532.content: Similar to Paradox. You and a small group of friends wake up in a world ruled by titanic anthros. Even though the anthros have the advantage in size they worship you and your friends as divine beings with mystical abilities. The abilities you and your friends possess include giving any anthro near them magical powers and being immortal.
14532.title: Elite Class

145322.content: In the 25th Century the Human Republic discovers a star system several times larger than usual. Probes discover it's inhabited by Anthros. The Anthros stand at an average height of 100 miles tall and are at a early industrial era level of technology. After some debate it was decided to uplift them so they can join the humans on the galactic stage. First Contact was in short weird. Anthros were shocked that a species tinier than ants could be so powerful. Eventually the Anthros warmed up too humanity and accepted the gifts they'd be given. You are a member of a group of teachers, doctors, and engineers being sent to one of the more powerful anthro nations.
145322.title: Uplift

1453222.content: This scenario is like the Lesser Sex, except that the birth rate of the gender that are giant anthros is much greater than the birth rate of the smaller one. Families will adjust accordingly, so relationships between one small person and many anthros will be the norm.
1453222.title: The Lesser Sex, in Number and Size

14532221.content:
You struggle to open your eyes as you lie in bed. "Ughhh," you moan. "I feel better, but that flu really did a number on me." Turning to your side, you furrow your brow as you see a wide, expansive wooden ground that stretches out far into the horizon. "Am I still dreaming?" you mutter aloud. The longer you stare, the better your vision gets. You slowly realize that what you thought was the ground was actually a nightstand in a giant bedroom that extends for what must be dozens of miles in every direction, with a ceiling that is at least one hundred miles high.

Shaking your head, you call out into the vast room. "Hello? Where am I?" You shout.

"Looks like our little man is awake girls!" a female voice echos from another room.

"Finally! It's been days since he's come down with that fever." A second voice says soon after.

"Well you know how men are. Their tiny bodies are more susceptible to illness than ours." says a third voice.

As you wonder who those voices belong to, tremors rock the room as the door on the far side of the room opens. You let out a gasp as a massive anthro tiger that is easily seventy miles tall walks in. She has her jet black hair tied in a ponytail, with just a hint of red lipstick applied to her orange and black striped face. She's wearing a tight black t-shirt that contours around a set of F-cup breasts, each the size of a large city. Looking down, a pair of blue jeans do little to hide her shapely hips, and you can see the hint of a thong poking out of them as she steps aside.

Right behind the tiger is a comparatively shorter anthro mouse who is roughly fifty miles tall. Upon looking at you she lets out a squeal of delight and does a small twirl, her long pink hair spinning around her grey fur as she does so. She's not as curvy as the tiger was, with a pair of breasts no bigger than a C-cup, but more than makes up for her smaller chest with an absolutely massive ass that could flatten a metropolis. Her shorts don't even cover a quarter of her thick thighs, and a sports bra that fits her well.

While the first two anthros were huge, they both pale in comparison to the ninety mile tall anthro cow who follows behind them. Wearing nothing except a pink pair of panties, the massive black and white spotted bovine is voluptuous to say the least. Sporting what looks to be a gigantic pair of M-cup breasts that could house a small country, a huge belly, and an ass that extends behind her for what must be miles, this cow also has the friendliest look of them all. When she catches sight of you, a grin spreads across her face as she silently adjusts her short green hair.

As your mind struggles to comprehend the scene in front of you, the mouse approaches and deftly plucks you from your bed with her titanic fingers. Bringing you to her other palm, she gently drops you down onto the massive grey plain as the tiger and cow bend over to get a closer look at you.

"How is our little husband feeling today?" the tiger says. Looking at the titanic anthros staring down at you, it finally hits you - you're married to three gorgeous anthro women!
14532221.title: Sure

145322211.content:
As you stare at the three anthros, the cow furrows her brow. "Honey," she says. "Is everything alright?"

The mouse squints at you before she lets out a gasp."Oh no! Darling, can you remember us?" She looks back at the other two girls before continuing. "It's rare, but sometimes when a man comes down with a bad case of the flu, they get amnesia. I don't think Darling remembers who we are!"

You nod your head at the explanation. "I'm sorry, but I can't remember you guys at all. I don't even know what happened to me. For that matter, how are you even as big as you are?"

At that question, the tiger lets out a deep laugh that shakes you to your core. "That flu really must have done a number on him if he can't remember that! All women are this big sweetie. Men are just teenie tiny specks, while us girls get to tower over you. Some of us are bigger than others however." With that, the tiger tussles the hair of the shorter mouse girl next to her, who frowns slightly at the movement. "Hey!" the mouse exclaims. "I thought I told you to stop that." "I'll stop when you stop being so cute about it." the tiger replies. The mouse blushes at that statement, before looking back at you.

"Do you remember our names at least?" she asks. After you shake your head, the mouse sighs. "Well, in that case, let's see if we can jog your memory a little bit. How about you do the honors, since you are technically his first wife Natasha?" the mouse gestures at the tiger woman.

A massive grin spreads across Natasha's face. "It'll be my pleasure, short stuff." Without another word, she picks you up off the mouse's palm and not-so gently drops you into the middle of her mountainous cleavage. While you struggle to get your bearings among the titanic strands of hair, Natasha softly strokes you with the tip of her claw as she tells her story. "As you just heard, my name's Natasha, and as much as these two pout about it, I am your first wife by the order that we met you. It was back in kindergarten, and I was away from my mom and aunts for the first time in my life. So you can imagine I was pretty terrified. Come lunchtime, I was crying at a table by myself, when lo and behold, a tiny little speck of a boy approached me and said he didn't like to see me sad. He asked me if I wanted to be his friend, and ever since then, we've stuck together through thick and thin, my sweet, kind husband."

Natasha chuckles. "By middle school I knew I wanted to marry you. And since the law says that a man could have more than one wife to account for the gender imbalance, I knew you would be in my grasp no matter what." With that, Natasha forcefully pushes your body down into the depths of her breasts, surrounding you in miles upon miles of soft, furry flesh. "And I just LOVE how much you squirm when I put you anywhere. Makes me feel like a predator, playing with my tiny prey before a meal. You really know how to turn a cat on, don't you hubby?" Natasha moans in pleasure as you struggle between her breasts, but before she can start to make the most of the moment, the mouse reaches underneath her t-shirt to pull you out. After a couple of seconds of desperate fondling, the mouse smirks as she quickly pulls you out of the furry mountains, which is disorienting to say the least.

"Hey, what's the big idea! Me and hubby were having a good time just now!" Natasha pouts at the mouse.

"I know, I know," the mouse sighs. "But maybe save that for later when we're not trying to get him to remember us, OK?"

Natasha continues to frown at the statement, but nods her head in understanding.

Sighing, the mouse looks back to you. "Anyways, back to the topic at hand. My name is Catherine, and I'm the second of your wives if we're going by the order in which we met you. While I didn't have the pleasure of knowing you before high school, I definitely remember the pleasure after it." Catherine blushes at that last statement before continuing. "It was after I had just finished a workout at the school gym, and I was in the change room getting out of my gym clothes. As I was... putting on my underwear, I felt a little itch in my ass, but thought nothing of it. I kept feeling something while I was walking home, so I ran up to my room to check it out. And that's when I found a certain someone trapped in between my cheeks. I was embarrassed, but if I was being honest, I liked having a man trapped down there. It made me feel..." Catherine lets out another sigh. "Powerful. And I'm so glad you keep making me feel like I did back then everyday for the rest of my lives." At that, Catherine turns around and smacks her ass, grinning while she looks at you lustfully.

You blush as she tells the story. "But why was I in the girl's changing room in the first place?" You ask. At this, Natasha giggles. "I may have forgotten to pick you up again after we had some private time together at school." she says. "Catherine brought you back to me, and after some discussion, we decided to date you at the same time." Catherine smiles at that. "It was the best thing that ever happened to me. I'm so, so glad I got to meet you. I can't imagine what my life would have been like" With that, Catherine pulls you in for a kiss. Your entire body is pushed against a pair of lips so big that you could land planes on them. You kiss back, which you assume would not be felt, but Catherine only moans and sucks you into her mouth in response. She tosses your body around with her monolithic tongue, coating you in saliva as you desperately try to hold on. As frightening as the experience is, it's also pleasurable, and you can't help but grow aroused at the situation you're in.

Without warning, Catherine's mouth opens as another tongue pushes it's way inside. The moans coming from both women echo in the wet cavern, as they wrestle to try and grab a hold of you. Before long, the other tongue retreats, carrying you with it. A moment later, and a single white finger presses into your body, sticking it to the furry appendage with ease. And as it retracts from the mouth, you stare up in awe as the cow woman gazes at you with an aroused look in her eyes. You try to move, but the saliva prevents you from doing anything outside of a pitiful shake. Her snout playfully nudges you as she lets out a booming laugh.

"I guess it's my turn now honey," the cow booms. Her voice is deep, shaking you to the core with both its volume and the clear arousal behind it. "I'm Bessie, and I met you when you were just out of high school. It was at the beach, and I had just finished a modeling job and was looking to relax for a few hours. I had sat down to order a drink at a bar, when I heard a little voice call out to me. Looking around, a saw a speck smaller than a grain of sand jumping up and down on the table in front of me. You told me that you were with your family, and one of your aunts - I think it was the lizard one - had left you behind just as you were leaving. Said that you needed to find another girl to date, cause two wasn't good enough for a charming young man like yourself."

"So what did you do?" You ask. "Well, I did the only thing I could do honey," Bessie smirks. "I asked if you wanted to have a good time, and after you said yes, shoved you straight down my panties. Figured that I could kill two birds with one stone. I could relax, and you could see just what a big, beautiful woman like myself was capable of. While I had dreamed of something like that moment for years, having you inside me was like a whole new experience. Right then and there, I discovered just how much I liked to be in control, and fortunately, you were OK with that. After we both had our fill several times over, I brought you back to your family and introduced myself as your newest girlfriend. That was five years ago, and after awhile, you asked all three of us to marry you. And ever since then, we've been living together."

As Bessie finishes her story, Catherine approaches you. "So now that you heard all of that, can you remember us now?" she asks.

Looking back on it, you had begun to remember each of the girls. You remembered how Natasha would sneak you over to her place so you could help her with her homework and her 'needs'. You remembered Catherine taking you to one of her kickboxing matches, watching as she took down an opponent nearly twice her size before she smuggled you out in the back of her shorts again. And you remembered taking you shopping for high end clothes for her modeling job, sometimes keeping you out in the open, while other times leaving store employees wondering why she was sweating so much.

"Yeah," you nod. "I remember you guys. How could I possibly forget my beautiful wives." At that, each of your wives smile in delight, happy that the amnesia isn't permanent.

"Thank the gods," Catherine says. "I was beginning to worry about you hubby," Natasha says.

As you're still stuck to Bessie's finger, you take a moment before deciding...
145322211.title: Continue this story

15.content:
(Here are some storyline suggestions)

Speck-Sized Celebrity: Unknown to you at first, being the only human in a world of mega-anthros has made you famous. Every anthro knows your name and you are beloved all over the new huge world.

Guinea Pig: In this universe, you were created in a laboratory by mega-anthro scientists seeking to learn the mysteries of life. You are very tiny to them, and you are actually shrinking at a slow constant rate, but as you shrink your relative vitality and healthiness increases.

Adopted: In this universe, you were found by a family of mega-anthros and adopted as their son/daughter.

Me and You: In this universe, there are only two living things: you and an enormous god-like mega-anthro. Since you only have each other, you are the best of friends.
15.title: A Bit Overwhelmed?

151.content:
You wake up, the dream still fuzzy in your head. At the very end of your dream, more and more titanic anthros started to appear, and all of them were absolutely gigantic. It was if millions anthros that were billions of times your size were focusing directly on you. You remember more: every one of them was smiling broadly and were trying as hard as they can to look at you.

You sit up, and suddenly notice that something is wrong. You are not in a bed, but something else very soft. It feels like cotton, but the weave is too good, since you cannot feel it at all. Also, it is very large; about one hundred feet thick, and you cannot tell at all how long it stretches. You walk to the side, and notice that it is a hundred foot drop to the ground, which does not look like the ground at all; far too smooth and perfect, plus it is also white. You look up to the ceiling, and it looks like a normal ceiling, but seems too far away.

You look at a wall, which must also be very far away, and you see an impossibly huge poster. You notice your body on the poster naked, and you panic, suddenly aware that you are naked as well and no clothes are in sight. Underneath the embarrassing image are the unusual words, "The Amazing Femto! Meet Earth's Littlest, Most Beloved Angel!"

Could it be that you are Femto? And why are you suddenly the 'most beloved'? You do not remember doing anything special.

Suddenly, the loudest noise you ever heard broke the eerie silence of the room. "Femto, it's time for your biggest adventure yet!" Looking at the door far, far away, you see an anthropomorphic fox woman, a very good looking one at that, enter the room. The fox walks closer and closer, and with each step you see her look relatively larger and larger. Whenever you think that she is close enough, she just takes one more step closer.

Eventually, she is so close and so big that you can hardly see any of her. When she finally stops, she rests her hand on the smooth white surface below the object you were sleeping on, a few miles away. However, even then her black fingers seem to extend forever towards the sky. This is impossible, the fox must be thousands upon thousands of miles tall! Her claw alone could probably fit one, no, three cities on it, and it is slowly approaching you! This is when it hits you; 'femto' is a prefix used before some sort of measurement to indicate some very small fraction you can't remember. You were sleeping on cotton; to be precise a single strand of cotton. Somehow, you have become the smallest living thing on Earth, probably even smaller than mircoorganisms, and apparently, everyone else on Earth is an anthro that adores that fact.
151.title: The Amazing Femto

choices: in a specially designed, colorful carrying case
1511.content:
The fox's claw continues to creep closer. You can hardly move from the amazing size of that claw; it must be over a mile away, but it already completely blocks out everything in front of you. The tiniest imperfections in that claw should be maginified intensely, but it still looks almost perfectly smooth and shiny; that fox has a great manicure.

Suddenly, the very tip of the claw plows into you; and you feel like a whole planet is pushing against you. The world moves very fast as you are suddenly whisked in front of the fox's face. You feel like you are glued tight to her claw as her moon-sized head scans your feeble, exposed body. You feel so insignificant right now; her eyelids alone are about a mile thick, and you can almost see all of Earth's population crushed to nothing every time she blinks. Her red fur looks more like gigantic plateaus; you could fit a neighborhood on the tip of one of those strands. And yet this giant of giants, who shouldn't even be able to see you, looks at you like a priceless treasure, a tiny bauble worth protecting; possibly even as a friend.

"Good, I managed to get you on the first try this time, Femto!" boomed the anthro fox. "Now we can finally begin your world tour. Imagine all of the different anthros around the world wanting to meet you in real life! It's absolutely amazing how a single, almost unnoticeable creature like you can inspire a whole generation!"

Suddenly, you realize that your dream is coming true. The fox goes to the door much more quickly than she entered, and you see a bunch of other anthros make way for her as she walked through a hallway. All of them looked at you adoringly as you clung to the tip of the fox's claw. As the anthro opens another door, you are suddenly blasted by an intense amount of noise. A huge crowd of anthros were cheering your new name, "FEMTO!" repeatedly as they looked at the fox move towards a long, long limousine. Your carrier got in the limo, and she puts you...
1511.title: It's a Huge World

15112.content:
With a slight twitch, you fall off the fox's enormous claw and go into freefall. You feel like you are skydiving, even though you are in actuality falling only a couple of inches. When you make contact with her palm, you bounce a bit before coming to a rest. The mammoth vixen continues to look at you in awe as you look out at the endless expanse of her black paw. Her fingers and thumb, each many times larger than mountains, seem to fade into the distance. However, something strikes you as odd; you should have been squashed many times over by the things that you have gone through today. When she picked you up, her claw must have been traveling in access of 500 miles per hour, and when she walked down the hall, you should have been flattened by the air resistance as she traveled at least Mach 10. Also, that fall of several miles should have pulverized you, and you didn't even sprain your ankle. You don't even recall hearing any sonicbooms today. You realize that it must have been you who has shrunk, but that still doesn't explain why you are still alive. Could it be possible that you really have become a tiny angel?

After an hour, the fox carrying you gets out of the limo and onto a planet-sized private jet. As she sits down, she reaches into her bag and takes out a small map of the world, though to you it might as well be actual size. The world is still Earth; you recognize all of the countries, and they still have the same names.

"See, Femto, were going to be all over the globe this year!" exclaims the enormous fox, gesturing towards the map with her other paw. "You see, right now, we are here," she continues, pointing to somewhere in Kansas or Nebraska. "However, by the end our first ride, we are going to be all the way over here!" You watch as the fox's enormous black finger points to...
15112.title: To the Airport

choices: Something happens on the way to the hotel
You get to the hotel without incident
151121.content:
You never went to Japan before; in fact, you've never been outside the continent before. You hope that Japan is still similar enough to what you have heard about it before you woke up in this odd version of Earth. Although you doubt that you would be heard by the titanic fox that is carrying you around, you try your luck, and shout up, "What kinds of things am I doing in Japan?"

Amazingly, the fox turns her massive head towards your voice and answers you. "You have a lot of fans in Japan, Femto, and they are actually holding a Femto Convention in Tokyo tomorrow. Lots of anthros will be there looking forward to meeting you, taking their picture with you, getting your autograph; you know, lots of the things you do at home. Of course, you will be expected to put on a little show."

"What, a show?"

"Yeah, you know, just do what you do best for the Japanese anthros!"

You are very nervous now that you realize that you are expected to perform in front of a huge audience, but have no idea what you do. However, before you can think of anything, your mind is deafened by the roar of the jet engines as the plane takes off.

The plane ride is surprisingly very much like the plane rides you are used to. Most of the time you just lay back on the fox's paw, which lies in turn on her shirt as she naps a bit. She is woken for the in-flight meal, a country-sized sandwich. She shares a tiny bit of the salami with you, even though that tiny bit happens to be the size of several skyscrapers. You quickly learn that even gigantic airline food does not taste good at all.

Much later, the plane lands, and your giga-sized caretaker suddenly starts carrying you towards her pants pocket. You see that it is lined with hundreds of square miles of cotton balls as you tumble into the soft darkness. From way up high, the fox explains, "I'm sorry, Femto, but I don't want to start a ruckus if anyone sees you on the street today. I'll let you out as soon as I get to the hotel; the people there are already expecting us."

You wait in hope that the trip will be short as the fox gets up and starts to walk somewhere.
151121.title: The Far East

choices: He intends to hold you for ransom
He is actually a rabid fan of yours
1511211.content:
You can do nothing as you feel the great movements of the foxes hips against your whole body. You are buried deep in the cotton, so that you cannot see anything. You stay absolutely still, as you fear slipping further into the endless confines of your helpful assistant's pant pocket, or worse; falling through the weave.

The trip is taking an extraordinary long amount of time. The vast city-sized pieces of fluff are jostled often, squeezing your body often. Once during the trip, you were pinched quite hard against the cotton, and remained trapped in the tightly packed fluff for a long time. Since then you felt yourself move even faster, but decide not to question anything until the end of the trip.

Once you feel yourself slow down, you hear the sounds of doors opening and closing, the sound of an elevator, and some sort of doorbell, and you feel that you must be near the hotel room. However, as thousands of tons of cotton are lifted off of you, you realize that you are no longer in the company of that friendly vixen. In its place, a piercing red scaly face looks down at you, and you are shocked when you realize that you have been stolen by this Japanese dragon anthro! You hope that he, who must be even bigger that the vixen and definitely stronger, does not intend to harm you, since you are some sort of celebrity.
1511211.title: Pickpocketed

choices: ask him to take you back to the fox-lady
15112112.content:
As you look around you realize you must be in this dragon's appartment.You then look up at his face. He seems to be very excited.
- W-w-why did you steal me? - you ask nervously.
The dragon is too excited to hear you.
- Oh my god, - he shouts in a booming voice, hurting your ears - It realy is you, FEMTO!
You try to get his attention, but for about 3 mintues he isn't even listening to you.
Finally he calms down and turns his attention to you.

- That's a serious crime you know! - you exclaim.

You start to feel remorse. After all, he didn't mean any harm.

You look around and see his claws towering beyond the horizon.
