You try to question your newfound surroundings but you can't even utter a single word. You try to look out of your encasement and see a strange glowing light but you couldn't go to it if you tried. In the light you see a strange figure, somewhat humanlike, but large and with an unusually shaped head. Before you can do anything else, the figure comes closer and you twitched because whatever that creature was, it was huge, just one of its eyes as obscured as they were at the moment, were the size of a moon to you. You crouch back in your enclosed space as the creature came closer and then something even stranger happened. Your enclosed space opened up and the fluids drained out. You were in pure fear as the strange creature loomed over you. "Stay back!" you yelled. "Where am I? What's going on?!" The figure then stood up fully and revealed its true height. This creature had to be a few thousand feet tall, even its pinky fingernail was the size of a football field compared to you. But you also notice that this strange beast appears female in body shape. Very plump but still with an hourglass figure and wearing a large lab coat. The figure takes off her mask and you see her as a huge anthromorphic albino white rhinoceros with two horns, bright red eyes and long dark purple hair. She puts on a pair of glasses and looks down at your cowering form with a smile. "Success." She said.
1522.title: Bring Me to Life

15221.content:
You look around in fear, test tubes and strange machines filled the room but nothing was more frightening than the colossal rhinoceros woman and those bright red eyes right above you scared you half to death. "Success?! What do you mean...Ah!" You nearly fall off the table but the rhino woman pushes you back with her gigantic finger. "Now calm down S-1? "S-1?!" "Sapien-1," said the rhino woman. "As in human." "I know I'm human, but what am I doing here?!" The rhino woman laughed loudly and you had to plug your ears.

This rhino chick stops herself and clears her throat. "Sorry," she said. "I am Dr. Vivian White, geneticist. I created you." You gasp loudly and then Dr. White notices something about you. "Oops," she said with an uneasy look. "I completely forgot." Dr. White reached into her coat pocket and took out a strange blue uniform with white stripes on the side. Your 'creator' hands you your unitard and you hesitantly put it on.

"As I was saying," said Doc White. "Humans haven't lived on this planet for, for well, not for centuries. You're effectively extinct." Ouch. That was unnerving. "But," said the doctor. "I managed to find a human fossil a few days ago and, well, you." This was unreal, you were a clone created in a lab from an old fossil by a several mile high albino rhino. You can hardly speak.

"Calm down," said Dr. White. "This is a good thing. You've escaped extinction. As of today, think of yourself as my..."
15221.title: The Lab

152212.content:
"You can just think of yourself as my lab assistant." Vivian says as she bends down to get a better look at you. As her gigantic face gets closer you fall back, but again her finger props you up. Its amazing how this building sized appendage can handle you without crushing you. "But what can I do?" you ask. Vivian smiles a gently, making your heart skip a little. "Nothing right now, but once I'm done studying you a little I'll find something." You step back. "Studying?" you ask nervously. The rhino giggles. "Of course! You're an extinct species brought to life! I need to make sure you're in good physical and mental condition, then I can show you to my colleagues." This makes you tense up, but she shushes you with her massive finger. "Its okay, you're not some object, but I still need to show off my discovery." She's pretty convincing with that smile. It makes you trust her completely.

Vivian stands up and walks over to a table. As she walks away you can see her figure even in the lab coat. That hourglass shape looks good and you can tell that underneath there's a great ass. When she returns she's holding two tiny pairs of tweezers. "Okay, just hold still." she says, and grabs one of your arms with the instrument. The other one grabs your other arm and she begins moving you around, kind of like a puppet. She does your legs too, lifting them up and bending them at the knee. "Okay, muscles and joints are fine." she mutters. While her face takes up most of your view, you can see past it enough to glance at her breasts. under the lab coat she's wearing a sweater that makes her voluptuous boobs more pronounced. You feel your penis begin to stir and Vivian notices. "Hmm..." she grins. "Hormones seem to be fine." She's smirking at you but when her eyes glance at your crotch they glaze over a little and she looks horny for a split second before snapping out of it. "Huh..." she says and writes something down. You stand there, covering your crotch in embarrassment, not noticing what happened.

Next she grabs a clipboard and sands over you. Staring up at her form is mind blowing. She's like the size of a planet! "Okay, can you remember anything about your life/" she asks. Now that she mentions it you don't. You can't even remember who you are. "Memories of previous life gone, but cognitive skills and knowledge remain." she notes. She notices your slight panic and taps the ground in front of you. "its okay, you have me. We'll make you some new memories." This calms you down and you give her a smile that makes her grin.

Vivian walks away and thinks to herself as she writes on her clipboard. "S-1 seems to be very trusting of me, calming down almost instantly when I try to soothe him. It may be a result of awakening to a new life. I was the first being he saw, so he latched onto me, almost like a hatchling." That's fine though, once your settled she plans to take good care of you. It will be fun to have such a cute little assistant. Just then the lab door opens and Vivian's research partner enters. Its a female...
152212.title: Lab assistant

15222.content:
Your eyelids slowly drag open, your mind struggling to process... Well, anything, really. You can feel something snaking down your throat, a tube of some kind. You wriggle as much as you can, the few inches of movement alerting you to the presence of similar tubes entering your body at various points. You manage to register the fact that you were surrounded by a liquid of some kind. It wasn't water, it was... Too thick. It was also pleasantly warm, but that does nothing to stop a powerful shiver from shooting down your spine.

Where were you?

You can't see much, only a few feet in any given direction, almost like you were deep sea diving. You strain your right arm forwards, the jack implanted directly into the left side of your wrist jostling unpleasantly. Feeling around your mouth you discover an airtight rubber seal connecting to the tube, almost like the one on an oxygen mask a military pilot would use.

"Hold on... We're getting delta waves."
"What?!"
"You heard me. Look, we've got a heartbeat as well, in addition to multiple brain wave frequencies."
"So, you're telling me that thing is alive?"
"Precisely."

You try to look around but your head is constrained by the mass of wires feeding into and out of your neck and head. Where the hell did those voices come from?! And why were they do loud?!

"Heart rate elevating, should we apply sedative?"
"Do it."

You breathe in and out, quicker and quicker. What the hell was going on?! Where there other people here, and why had they called you a thing?!

"Damnit, it's not working, he's having a panic attack!"
"Give him another dose, now!"

Your breathing slows as you calm down, questions buzzing through your head but no longer seeming critical or existential in nature.

"What should we do?"
"I have no idea, it wasn't supposed to develop intelligence this quickly!"
"Maybe we should release him?"
"No!" "It's too risky!"
"I think he's ready. You've seen all the work the biologists put into him, he can withstand almost anything. And if he's exhibiting neural activity, he's most likely awake. And very frightened."
"Okay, how about we hold a vote? If we vote not to release him we can just put him into a coma until we're sure he's ready, then just flush his system and take him out."
"Alright, then. All those in favour of releasing the subject?
And those against?"

"Fine. You win, professor, and while I respect the work of our colleagues I still think we should err on the side of caution. This is, after all, an unprecedented situation."

They were going to release you? That was good. You could get some answers about what was happening.

"Draining fluid."

The warm fluid you were submersed in began to recede, slowly taking its warmth with it until you managed to stand rather than float, feeling cold, wet, and vulnerable.

"Alright, Atto, let's hope you can handle this..."
"Atto?"
"Ten to the power of minus eighteen? Anyway, it's better than Yocto by yottametre."

The various jacks and plugs connected to you fall out simultaneously, the small holes where they had been implanted healing instantly. Then the blackness you can see for miles is interrupted by a flash of light as what you assume to be two massive sections of whatever chamber you're in grind open.

Hesitantly, you step forward, testing the strength of your leg. Swallowing, you begin to talk out of the chamber, nervously looking about for any sign of life. You clear your throat and call out, "Hello? Is anyone there?" As you walk, hoping to find the source of the voices.

"My goodness..."
"He can already speak?"
"Wow..."

You are shivering slightly by this point, your body having grown used to the warm fluid.

"Look, he's shivering! Should I..."
"You may, but be gentle. He's resilient, but we're not sure just how resilient."

You are about to ask the voices for assistance when you are suddenly engulfed in a mass of what appears to be rubber. Flailing ineffectually, you breathe a sigh of relief that quickly catches in your throat when you are released.

Towering over you in the most literal sense possible, was a small crowd of undescribably titanic anthropomorphic animals, one of which was holding you, on...

The tip of her finger, which seemed to stretch outwards in every direction for hundreds of miles. You gulp, looking up into the planet sized face of the dolphin you was holding you, as her caring voice rings out from every direction you can process:

"Welcome to the world, Atto! Heh, you may want to sit down for a bit..."
15222.title: Ten To The Power of Minus Eighteen

152222.content:
You grunt and open your eyes. "Where am I?" you think to yourself. But you can see nothing but darkness all around you. You see small flashes of light but that is it. "What is this place?" you ask yourself. As you move your fingers, you gasp because you appear to be submerged in water, if not a similar fluid and yet, you didn't seem to have any trouble breathing. "Where am I?" you ask. "Why is it so wet." You then feel around and feel something weird. It was rather long and almost tube like but when you pull it, you grunt slightly, as if the tube was somehow attached to you. Then you freeze in place because you hear a mild and faint throbbing sound. You swim around as much as it's possible and feel a large wall that feels surprisingly squishy but really large. From what little you could see, the wall seems to go on and on for miles.

You then let out a yell but there doesn't appear to be anyone who can hear you. "How could this be?" you ask. "I don't remember being... wherever this place is... last night. What did I do last night?" As you're wondering to yourself, you feel strange vibrations emanating through the wall and you cover your hears at the sound. "What is on the other side of this wall?" you ask yourself.

On the other side of the wall, is a large and bloated stomach that is being poked by a rather large hand with pudgy fingers. Both the stomach and hand belonged to an enormous anthropomorphic hippopotamus woman who had to be at least a few miles high. She had fuchsia-colored skin and black hair worn in a bun. She was wearing a lab coat, a black skirt and a teal tank top as she tapped her stomach. The hippo woman was in a lab with tons of strange vials and was soon approached by a large and bactrian camel woman who appeared to have long red hair worn in a ponytail with a freckled face. She was wearing a lab coat as well and a pair of glasses.

"I still can't believe you're seriously going through with this, Jessica," says the camel woman to the hippo woman. "The idea that you're using your own body to resurrect a long extinct species." "This could be the only chance, Pepper," says Jessica, the hippo woman. "To the camel girl. By injecting DNA from a human fossil into my womb, I am growing a human being inside of myself. I modified the serum to speed up the gestation so that the human will come out of me fully grown when its ready." "How will you tell, Jessica? You're a hippo with a large stomach so I can't really tell if you're pregnant or just fat like you usually are. Besides, what you're growing inside you is a creature 1/10,000th of our height."

Jessica blows on her finger. "It will work. I predict it will only be a few more weeks. Then, once the project is successful, we will repeat the process, using heavy anthro girls like me to incubate the new humans. Project Appleseed will work." Jessica pats her large stomach to emphasize her point.

You had no way of knowing, but you were growing inside this planetary scientist hippo lady's birth canal and in a few weeks you'd be ready to come out.
152222.title: Project Appleseed

choices: Jack your wolf brother who you were sleeping on his bare chest and you're a boy
Tammy your jaguar sister who you were sleeping on her forhead and your a girl
153.content:
It was darkness all around you when your eyes fluttered open. Sitting up in your unusually soft bed, you look around for any chance to figure out where are you. Your view was blocked by thin strands almost like vines. That's when you noticed something, the constant motion of the land moving up and down. And the sound of rushing air going in and out from a far off outlet. "Okay," you said a bit freaked when the land under you suddenly jerked.

"Huh is that you Sam," a loud voice said from out of no where.

"Where are you," you yelled up to the heavens.

"Haha...very funny," the voice said sarcastically when a huge shadowed pillar raised in your view. It seemed to be thirty miles long. You simply just stared at it in shock as millions of questions ran through your mind. Watching the pillar grab something, it reminded you of a arm or it was actually was one. What this disembodied arm grabbed was like a gigantic version of a sports watch. "Jeez, its only seven am, good things its Saturday right bro," the voice said as it set the watch down.

Not knowing what to do, you accepted whats going on until the chance arose for more info on this matter. Then out of no where, a huge hand descended for you. It moved slowly and delicately as the thumb and index had a grasp on you before you can run. The world around you was a blur when it suddenly stopped. Filling up your vision was the face of a...
153.title: What time is it?

choices: Time to swim with the fishes
I'll take the low road you'll take the high one
1531.content:
What filled your whole vision was the head of a wolf that can hold a small city. His gaping maw was filled with sharp teeth taller then any skyscraper. It soon dawned on you that you were sleeping on a titanic wolf like human who is presumed to be your brother. You tried your best to think of what possible reasons can be for this. Your mind was left blank of any memory of the past in fact there was none.

Trapped in your own mind, you couldn't figure out why you can't remember anything at this moment. Have you suffered to a loss of memory. Is this gold like anthropomorphic wolf really your brother. You have no choice but to play along not wanting your brother who ever he is to wake. "What's with you Sam," the wolf asked as his foul breath watched over you.

"Ugh dude...your breath is the strongest weapon ever," you whined without control. You just realized you have assaulted your giant brother as you felt the scene around you turn to a blur. Next thing you know you were being stared upon one angry eye. Being so close, you couldn't help but think you can get loss in the sea of a eye. His one pupil can hold a small neighborhood as it stared at you angrily.

"Oh really, I think you should be a little nice to your brother Jack. Don't you think Sam," Jack said as his voice vibrated through your very fiber.

"Eh...sorry about that bro," you smiled nervously when his eye blinked. Something so large shouldn't be able to move that fast you thought when you flinched back spooked. Your brother easily saw this and couldn't help to smile. Moving you back so you can see his full face, something wasn't right with the toothy smile he was giving you. "Um...any chance you may let me on the joke," you asked as fear crept inside you.

"Aww don't be scared little bro," Johnathan smiled as his titanic body lifted up. Moving his feet upon the floor miles away from you. He sat there on his vast bed keeping you in front of his maw. "Too bad mom isn't around to save you now bro...I wonder what should be a good punishment. Licking my feet or between the toes or while I take my shower you'll take one in my mouth," he pondered as he licked his lips thinking which should be more humiliating.

"Ehhh...what about neither," you asked trying to wriggle out of Jack's grasp. Taking a look down, there's always a chance the bone-shattering fall with kill you painlessly.

"Nice try bro but mom will kill me if you were to fall. If your not going to help me choose I guess I'm going to have to go for the best one," Jack chuckled making up his choice...
1531.title: Jack the big bully

choices: Your mom is hot for a wolf anthro
She's not a wolf at all...your not the only one adopted
15312.content:
There you stared into your eighteen year old brother Jack's maw as his foul morning breath made you struggle to breathe. You rather put up with his feet then be stuck in that dark abyss of a mouth. Jack saw you staring into his maw and couldn't help but smile. "I guess taking a bath in my maw is a bit to harsh but I do like a good foot message in the morning," Jack smiled. Making up his choice, life around turned into a blur again. Soon you were were left off onto the ground before you brother's titanic paws.

His paws were close to human if it wasn't for the long claws, the pink paws under and the fur on top. Not wanting to spend your time studying this titan's feet, you started running as you heard laughter all around you. "Jeez bro, I can't even tell if you are running," he mocked as he watched you running barely making progressed from his feet. His one little toe can crush a whole block with ease but you kept on running. Five minutes later you were out of strength when you fell hard.

"Awww...don't tell me that's all the progress you can do," Jack's annoying voice ranged in your head. If there is one thing you know now is that you two are pretty much how two brothers are but a bit more extreme. Flipping over on your back, you faced Jack giving you a toothy smile.

"Screw you, you ass," you cursed but he continued to smile. "I'm telling mom for this," you threatened thinking who ever your mother is that she'll teach Jack a lesson.

"Oh really...I was thinking of just a foot rub but now you got to lick my pads and between the toes. And through the whole progress you'll remind me how tasty my feet are and you are glad that you have such a honor," Jack described your punishment as his right foot left the ground. Watching the pink flesh of his foot raise above you, you couldn't help but imagine being crushed by billions of flesh with an easy step.

You laid their frozen while he flexed his foot and wriggled his toes. You stared into the large folds of flesh you will easily be lost in without a trace. You won't be surprised if a small village lived between each individual toe. Theres a better chance of that happening then it being clean and tidy. "I see you are enjoying the view...well let me give you a close up," just like that it fell upon you.

All you could do is raise you hands as if it would stop by magic. But nothing that big can be stopped with a easy will. Luckily your brother can as the sole of his foot stopped from a mere inch away from you face. "I don't feel any licking or hear any compliments," Jack said as you forced your self to comply. Sticking away your pride, your tongue escaped your lips and made contact with his sole.

"What is that suppose to be...unless you want to end up sleeping in my running shoes after my nightly jog. You better do better," Jack threatened backing up his words with his voice alone. Hearing this sent you into a licking frenzy as you ignored the horrible taste. You continued licking as you paused from the sound of his toes scraping aginst the floor in pleasure.

"Heh...why you stop bro. You are doing a great job unless you want to compliment the taste of my feet," Jack voice vibrated through your bones as you start thinking of words that can keep him happy.

"Oh my powerfully brave brother who is better then me in every way...you feet are those to die for," you sugar coated with everything on top.

"Well, well...you finally realized your place little brother. I knew I'll soon crack you if you are sleeping in this bed with me," Jack chuckled.

"Oh brother," you sighed under your breath.

"For such a good compliment...I'll give you the honor to snack between my big toe and the one next to it," Jack replied as you watched thousands of feet of pink flesh pass in front of you. Finally you face was free of the pink wall as his foot finally fell softly inches away from your on feet. Taking a good whiff, the smell was pretty horrible as you a wall of dried sweat appear to be in front of you.

"Oh god," you stared in disbelief. You can finally see your brother's smiling face with the walls of his toes blocking the view of the rest of his body. You couldn't believe how vast your brother is since his head stood up in the heavens.

"Well little bro start eating," he orders down at you watching your every move.

"Just for one little thing I have to go through this," you yelled up upon your feet. You felt silly as if you were just merely yelling up into the heavens. Sadly you brothers face was occupying it.

"What do you mean...I been putting up with your slick month all week," he yells back in anger.

"And what you couldn't think of a good come back," you yelled back up pissed.

"Does it matter...you're still going to-," Johnathan cut himself off when he heard the door knocking.

"Boys...what's going on in there...open this door," a female voice yelled through. Yo couldn't help thinking that this must be your mother.

"I guess your safe for now...if you don't say a thing I'll forgive you and you'll won't have to eat between my toes," Jack said down to you.

"Oh really...I want retribution for this," You yelled back folding you hands to prove a point.

"Find...anything but don't tell mom," you bargained as the walled of his toes were removed from around you. You then spied your brother's titanic foot land with a boom a few miles off. You can only say wow under your breath as you think of how small you are compared to this being. How can you be remotely connected to this godlike wolf who has to struggle just from not crushing you.

Once he grabbed you carefully with his thumb and his index finger. You soon was dropped in the middle of his right hand as you took a seat. Closing your eyes as the wind whipped aginst your face, your brother soon was unlocking the door and opening it. You couldn't believe your eyes for what is the sight before you.
15312.title: A good licking

choices: Help your twenty-two year old sister with a project
Help your mom do her nails
153122.content:
As the door opened, you try to imagine what kind of mom you have. Is she nice, or is she mean. By the way your brother sounds when speaking about her, your unknown mom is always on your side. Trying your best to peak through Jack's fingers, you didn't have to when it turns out your mom is taller then Jack. Actually, she wasn't a wolf at all, she was a lioness.

"Oh hey mom...what's wrong," Jack asked playing dumb.

"You know what's wrong I heard yelling," the landscape of a mother folded her arms waiting impatiently. Looking up at your brother towards your mom, it turns out he only comes up to her chest.

"Oh great, I'm being bullied by a dwarf giant," you quietly muttered to yourself hoping they didn't hear. Somehow your mom noticed your voice but unable to hear exactly what you say.

"Did you say something honey," she asked as she bent over to get a closer view. You couldn't lie on the fact that your mom has a great figure and gorgeous eyes. Even with a smile miles wide, her sharp teeth larger than any building you can think of. Yet, staring into her caring eyes, you knew deep down if this is your mom then she can never hurt you.

"Oh nothing mom...me and Jack were fighting again though," you chuckled looking up at Jack face cracking into a smile.

"Yeah mom but its just a harmless accident," Jack said forcing a smile to move a point.

"Oh really," the lioness said to herself a bit suspicious of the two. "As long as its not nothing serious...right Sam," she redirected the statement towards you. Pinning you between revenge or fear of your brother. Suddenly you felt her cold stare miles away and looked up to see that's she quite serious.

"Well...if you don't count having your brother force you to lick his feet serious," you told as the pillars around you started to come upon you.

"Son of a-I mean mom he's lying," your brother stated trying to defend himself.

"Ah-Hand him over," she demanded. You watched as the fingers around you moved back. Until it seemed like a flat plain that would take an hour to walk from end to end. You looked up as the titanic fingers of your mother fell around you. Using the point of her claw. She picked you up by your shirt as the scene around you turned into a blur. This is going to be something that will take while for you to get use to.

You found yourself in front of your mom's caring face as her muzzle came closer and closer. The thought of being eaten sent you in fright when you stopped before her black curved lips. What she presumed to be a small peck was a bit of a rough wide for you. She couldn't help but getting saliva all over you. "Awww...what did Jack force my baby to do," your mom cooed as Jack snickered.

"What did you do," she snapped slapping your brother across the hair.

"MOM," both you and your brother said together disagreeing with your mother's action.

"Well," your mom asked after placing you upon her muzzle. Safely perched among the tall tree-like strands of fur. You can actually see how short your brother comes up to your mom. As if seeing it from her own eyes, your brother seemed small and vulnerable in front of your mother. It was a good thing she was looking down on him or you wouldn't be able to see him.

"I didn't do a thing," he whimpered as his eyes started watering.

"Awww, I would actually believe that if it was someone else," she stated.

"Ouch," you said, "I see where I get my mouth from."

"What was that honey," she asked, rolling her massive eyes upon you. Looking up, this was pretty frightening scene having large feline eyes on you.

"I said that Jack really was an ass towards me," you said not being careful with your words.

"Mom," Jack yelled.

"He's right Sam...no language please," she asked reinforcing this with her giant eyebrows crunched together.

"Sorry mom, I meant that he forced me lick his feet for just telling him that he needs to brush his teeth," you told not telling the whole truth.

"He said it a lot ruder then that," Jack argued.

"Does it matter, go ahead and take a whiff mom," you yelled standing up, pointing at Jack to prove a point. He growled back when mom slapped him across the head again. You couldn't help to laugh from, the titanic shock wave that would wipe a whole nation used on your brother. Holding onto a stand of hair as your mom bended over, you held your breath her muzzle came down to Jack's mouth.

A giant flow of air was sucked up into her nostrils like a hurricane on steroids. "Woo man, Jack have you even brushed your teeth at night. I can still smell last night's meatloaf," your mother whined.

"Well, uh, you see I can explain," Jack mumbled trying to find a way out of this.

"Don't bother...you'll be doing you brother chores and my chores for a punishment. I allowed Sam to sleep in your room so he doesn't have to sleep in mine at his request. I'm not going to take this back away from him but I might have you moved out to the living room couch," she ordered as your brother let out a sigh.

"Why you always got to stick up for Sam," Jack whined.

"What do you mean...he also has to pay for that slick mouth of his," she revealed. Your face went pale as a question went through your mind. What is your punishment," you asked.
153122.title: Punishment

1531221.content:
You turned around and faced your mothers carnivorous eyes. Even as a predator she has caring, blue eyes that looked at you lovingly. But you saw a gleam in it and you knew that your mom must of planned something devilish for you. Her eyes brightened up and you couldn't help thinking about the rows of teeth taller then skyscrapers were being shown in her toothy smile. "I got a good idea...why won't you help Emily for her special project," your mother announced.

"What kind of project," I asked thinking it won't be so bad.

"I'll tell you at the breakfast table but at the mean while," your mother paused before pillars of her fingers fell around. It still scared you a bit from the shadow they cast down upon you. A shadow that can block the light of a small city even. But you reminded yourself your lioness of a mother would always love you. Pinning you between them, you were lifted carefully and fell upon dark trees you presumed to be your brothers head.

"Now...you two be good to each other and freshen up. You have a busy day today," she announced before lowering down. You were more afraid of being covered in lion saliva then being crushed by her tendered lips. The scene around you turned all black, pressing you down on your stomach softly. You can feel this was a more passionate kiss for you and your brother together. Even though you can't help but to enjoy it but the saliva was too much for you at the moment. Another thought passed in your mind that Jack must be getting a great view of our mom's cleavage. "Lucky bastard," you mumbled sure that no one heard you.

Finally your mother brought her lips back from her wet kiss smiling before exiting out the room. You and Jack together cried out, "EW!" Not another word came between you and Jack. You both brushed up and showered, finishing up at the same time. It was a good thing they had a mini bathroom for your size.

You dressed yourself with camouflage shorts and a black shirt with black sandals. Jack was wearing jeans with a green shirt, bare foot though. You sat there on his shoulder half expecting him to grab you and stick you between his toes. But he made no such move and just kept on out the room and down the stairs. You figure you lived in quite a big house if it was scaled down to your size. Nice mahogany floor and banisters with three rooms other than yours up here in the second floor. You went down into the hallway by the door you presumed to lead out of the front of the house. For you this hallway stretched for miles but is easily stepped through in seconds.

You entered the dining/living room seeing the whole family. You noticed most of them were all carnivores accept one. You sighted a large Hyena male laughing with you mom and thought that that must be your dad. Next to him was a large Arctic female fox probably in her twenties who was laughing with your mom and dad. What took your attention the most was that her humongous breast bigger then your mom bounced with the beat of her laugh. You ripped yourself from staring hoping this was your sister Emily.

On the opposite of Emily was a young female bunny you presumed to be younger than you. Your mother places pancakes on the table and all five of you dig in. As you're eating your breakfast you can't help but watch as your family is shoveling their breakfast in and being hippos, they can eat a lot in a very short time. You shiver and are somewhat unnerved. You almost think that one of them might eat you by mistake. Alyssa notices you staring as syrup drips out of her mouth. "Hey shrimp," she says. "Mom worked hard on those pancakes so I'd advise you to eat them before they get cold."

"Uh sorry," you say as you continue eating. "It's just... I'm kinda..." Alyssa raises an eye. "Are you implying that I'd eat you? I'm insulted." "No!" you yell. "I mean..." Gemma lets out a giggle and then taps you on cheek. "Well, he is so sweet and cute you could just swallow him whole." "Gemma!" yells Beth. "You're scaring him! He might have amnesia. Humans aren't used to anthro colds. You should know. You got him sick to begin with." Gemma blushes as you just continue eating your pancakes. You look forward to see your mother has finished and is rubbing her stomach.

Then your mother looks down on you. "Sam," she says. "Sweetie. I think I have something stuck in my teeth. Would you mind taking a quick look." You nod your head and your mother picks you up before opening her hippo mouth wide. You see fangs as big as skyscrapers and a tongue big enough to build a city on as you're laid down on it. You couldn't believe it. You were in your own mother's mouth and she was a hippo. You walk down and see that she has a piece of pancake stuck between her back teeth. You yank out the crumb and then toss it down your mother's esophagus. You look down the hole and shiver.

"Don't stay in there too long honey," says your mother. "I don't want to pump you out of my stomach again." You step back. "Oh yeah, sorry Mom." "Thanks for the assist sweetie." You walk down the tongue as your mother holds her mouth open wide. "Uh mom," you say. "Can I ask you a question?" "Go ahead Sam." Says your mother as you walk down her mouth.

You bite your lip and then look around before you ask your question. "Am I adopted." Your mother rolls her eyes. "We've already had this talk hun. You know you are. You're a human after all. You did lose your memory." Your mother then spits you into her hand as you try to wrap your head around this when suddenly...
15333222222211.title: Your Big Hippo Family

15333222222212.content:
As Beth walked into the kitchen with you on your snout, you suddenly remember something. You weren’t the only one adopted. You and your three sisters were all adopted because your mother was unable to have children herself. However, it couldn’t be any more obvious than you and your sisters were not related by blood because NONE of them were the same species as each other or your mother. You remember that Beth was the middle child of your three sisters and the hippopotamus giantess was the closest sister to you. As it was, your sisters despite being adults, chose to stay to help your mother because her eyesight was failing her and she was in danger of going blind. More of your memories come back. Of course, there was one thing that your mothers and sisters had in common. They were all 800 mile high, they were all somewhat obese and they were all anthropomorphic mammals known for being heavy.

First of them was the oldest of your three sisters, Alexandria; Alex for short. Alex was an 800 mile high camel and somewhat of a nerd. She had bright red fur and strawberry pink hair worn in a ponytail and bun. She had two enormous humps on her back and the second biggest rear of your sisters after Beth. Although she did have the biggest belly out of the trio because she was always filled with water. She wore a pair of triangular glasses and a gray 1980s style jumpsuit that did a good deal of showing off her curves. You remember that Alex had a job as a reporter for Channel 12 News. She was the smartest of your siblings but you did have a spat with her from time and time due to her teasing you for your small size. Alex was currently making coffee for breakfast.

Then there was the youngest of your three older sisters, Chase. Chase was an 800 mile high blue-skinned armadillo girl who while having a smaller belly and butt than your other two sisters (though her butt was still big enough to require two chairs), she had the biggest breasts. Chase was a goth girl who had pure dyed purple hair and was dressed in black leather with a spiked choker and ankle bracelets and a pierced navel. Despite her dark appearance, she was on good terms with you. But a lot of times she treated you more like her pet than her younger brother. Chase was a programmer for a computer company and you saw that she appeared to be texting at the breakfast table.

“Chase,” says your mother. “I thought that I told you not to text at the table.” Chase shrugged her shoulders and put her phone away. “Sorry, Mom.” Your mother stomps in and reveals herslef to be a 800 mile high rhinoceros with bright green skin and long white hair. She was actually heavier than your sisters and was wearing a blue leotard with leg warmers and a jacket that made her look like she came from an 80s music video. She also wore large crescent moon-shaped earrings and a pair of heart-shaped sunglasses. Your mother then turns her head and spots you riding on Beth’s nose. “Sam!” she yelled. “There you are, sweetie. Thank goodness that cold of yours is over and done.” You mom snatches you up and then you look in slight panic as the rhinoceros giantess takes you up to her lips, big enough to build a city on and gives you a big kiss, completely covering you in lipstick and rhino drool.

That kiss made you remember something. Your mother first found you in her flower garden when you were a baby and realized you were a human. Apparently, humans were believed to have gone extinct a thousand years ago. She adopted you and it attracted heat from the media, bothering her to display you to the world. The giant anthros that ruled the world had for the most part never seen a human and reporters nagged your mother for a long time before she forcibly made them leave you alone. She didn’t like how her son was seen as an exhibit of a long lost species. As soon as the kiss is over, your mother puts you in the center of the table and then starts to wipe you off with a napkin.

Chase then lets out a giggle and scratches you in the head as you grunt. “Chase,” says Beth. “Be careful. Sam’s suffering mild memory loss.” “I’m not surprised,” said Alex as she pours herself a cup of coffee. “The squirt is a human. Anthro colds can be very dangerous to creatures the size of germs themselves.” “Let’s not forget, Alex,” said Chase. “He caught it from you. Remember when you asked him to go into your mouth to get that slice of lettuce out of your teeth?” “What about you, Chase?” asked Beth. “You kept him in your mouth to smuggle him into the movie theater without people going crazy about a human in the theater.” That’s when you remember that Chase did hide you in her mouth the other day. There was a movie you both wanted to see but there was a kook in the theater who wanted to study a human more closely, so Chase kept you in her mouth for most of the movie. You regretted that because being an omnivore unlike the rest of your family, she had bug breath.

“Now, girls,” said your mother. “What’s important is that Sam made a recovery. By the way, Sam. Elisa will be joining us for breakfast. She was very worried about you.” Elisa?! That was the name of your girlfriend. You heard stomping and you look up and see Elisa looking down on you. She was an 800 mile high and very obese and bottom-heavy ox giantess with bright yellow fur, long dark-colored hair, huge cuved horns, a rear that rivaled Beth’s own planet-sized booty and an udder that was bigger than her head. The bovine giantess snatches you up as you grunt and she rubs you into the side of your face. “Thank goodness you’re alright, Sammy,” said Elisa. “I missed seeing your cute little face.” Then, your girlfriend licks you a few times. “Elisa!” you yell. “Elisa! Stop! I just got rhino drool cleaned off of me!” “Aw, come on, Sam,” said Elisa. “It’s only natural that you’re so cute. I could just eat YOU for breakfast.” Your girlfriend playfully nashes her teeth in front of your face and you see they’re as big as mountains.

"Elisa," says Beth. "Stop. You're scaring him." "Come on, Beth," said Elisa. "He's been in my mouth before." "He may be your boyfriend," said Alex as she adjusted her glasses. "But he's our brother. Leave him alone." "Now, now," says your mother. "Calm down. It's breakfast time." Elisa puts you down and takes her seat at the table with your sisters and your mother and your mother hands you a plate of human-sized pancakes as Alex and Beth help her set the table." As you're eating your breakfast, you look around to see your sisters, mother and girlfriend tearing into their food rather voraciously. No wonder they were so big. While 5 out of 6 of them were herbivores, their appetites slightly frightened you because it looked as though they could easily swallow you and feel like it was nothing.

You then realize something. "What day is it?" you ask. Your mother pauses from her meal to answer your question.
15333222222212.title: Your HUGE Family

1533322222222.content:
When you woke up, you were in a valley between 2 huge mountains much, MUCH bigger than Mt. Everest. They must have been 950 miles tall! Even stranger, the ground was sapphire blue, and looked to be made of plates that were each twice the size of a football field. Suddenly, you felt the ground heave up and down! Then you heard a voice that resounded all around you: "Morning, my little cutie." A moment later, you recognized the voice: though it was amplified countless times, it was clearly the voice of your girlfriend, Jenna! But where was she, and why did she sound so big? For that matter, where were you? "Jenna, where are you?" you yelled at the top of your voice. "I'm right underneath you, you silly goose. And you don't have to shout, I can hear you just fine." No sooner did you hear this, than an ENORMOUS talon came down from the sky, picked you up, and carried you up to a TITANIC face! You couldn't believe your eyes: it was Jenna, alright, but she was a 5000-mile-tall anthropomorphic blue dragon! She had H-cup breasts and muscles that put the Incredible Hulk to shame: her pecs where 10 times the diameter of her head, she had 8-pack abs, and her arms were almost as thick as they were long! The 2 things you thought were mountains were her breasts! "J-Jenna, w-w-what happened to you? You're a g-g-g-giant d-dragon g-girl!" you stammered. "Silly, I've always been like this!" she replied. As she said this, memories came flooding into your mind: you saw yourself as a child with a 100-mile-tall, Hulk-muscled sphinx who clearly had the same face as your mother; you saw yourself and your best buddy playing with (well, more like being played with by) other anthro mythical monster kids who ranged from 50 to 2500 miles tall; and you saw yourself meeting the giant dragon version of Jenna in middle school and falling in love almost instantly! Just as you processed all this, Jenna told you she was going to introduce you to.....

(A/N: If you read this, please add to the other stories I've added to!)
1533322222222.title: Mega Mom and Giga Girlfriend

15333222222222.content: Her parents or more options?
15333222222222.title: Her parents

154.content:
You wake up feeling very strange. You are definitely not in your bed, and when you open your eyes, you see that you are on a field of orange. Nothing but orange stretches as far as the eye can see, and the sky is black, pure black, no stars, no moon, nothing. You feel very lonely and afraid. You don't know how you can see without a single light source, unless the orange ground is the light source. You wonder if you died and went somewhere weird.

"Don't worry, your not dead," spoke a voice from nowhere. You jump, but the voice seems friendly enough. You ask, "Who are you and why do you know what I'm thinking?"

You hear a friendly chuckle. "You know who I am. You've known me all your life, silly human. And I know what you are thinking because you just thought it."

Suddenly startled, you fall down on your knees, expecting to see the face of God, but the voice said, "Please, there's no need for that, I'm not a god."

You get up and ask, "Well, who are you, then?"

"Completely in the blank, eh, human? Here, why don't you take a gander at me and guess? Your feet suddenly leave the orange ground and nothing seems to change at first. The ground continues to be orange, orange, orange. Then, after a minute, you see deep canyons in the orange. Then, as the you rise above those canyons, even deeper canyons appear on the edges of the orange. The orange surface starts to take on a lattice shape and starts to curve gently. You notice slight variations in the orange colors, some are more reddish while others are more yellowish. As you continue to rise, the orange varieties merge together to form a smoother flow of orange, and you are starting to get very sick of the color orange.

Then, more canyons appear. You have no idea who this could be, because nobody looks like this. All that you know is that you must be an enormous distance from where you started; an impossibly large distance not meant to be traveled by a human in a lifetime, even a million lifetimes. As you rise continually faster, you feel like you must be traveling faster than the speed of light; a physical impossibility. And still the orange land seems to stretch forever.

"Just give it another minute or two, human, and try not to be too impressed." After one minute, you look down and finally recognize what is beneath you, the palm of an impossible large hand. Zooming out even more, you see the hand's long supple fingers ending in huge sharp black claws. You do not believe it, but you were standing in the palm of a dragon; a dragon that could surely make galaxies look like specks in comparison. "You're a really big dragon?"

"Almost right, human, but not quite." You look up at the dragon's impossible large face, a face that should not exist, a face with a smile that could cheer up a million galaxies full of nothing but gloom. "Give up, human. Okay, then let me introduce myself. I am the universe."
154.title: Two With the Universe

choices: "I have a very important job for you."
"Well, its just been so lonely for the past 13 billion years ..."
1541.content:
How can the universe possible be the same thing as this orange dragon? Sure, it's probably big enough, but the universe has stars, galaxies, and nebulas; not arms, legs, and a head.

"Oh no, I've got those too," replies the dragon, reading your mind again, "They're right here." He pats his plump belly with his enormous hand, easily millions of parsecs across.

"No, don't tell me you ate the universe!" you shout. The dragon just laughs.

"I guess you're having a very hard time understanding the situation, human. I did not eat anything, nor have I ever eaten anything, because to do that I would have to eat myself." You just stare, completely lost. "Let me put it this way. I am the universe, so therefore I am everything. Galaxies, nebulas, all those things are parts of me. Even you are a part of me, human."

"But I can't be a part of you, wouldn't that mean you would be talking to yourself now?"

"I told you, I'm not a god, I'm the universe. I only control my outer shell; everything else just sort of happens on its own. I am aware of everything that I do, like what you are thinking, but I can't predetermine anything."

Your brain is wracked, but then you burst out laughing. You just realized that you are trying to understand the universe, but, of course, this impossible for anyone to do. Even the universe itself just admitted that it doesn't know everything. It's odd, that the orange dragon you are accepting as the universe, the embodiment of everything, is at the same time so ordinary, treating you like you are worth listening to, even though you are absolutely nothing in comparison

"So, um, the universe, why did you bring me here, anyway?"

The dragon looks at you with its huge eyes, sparking like a billion supernovas, and said:
1541.title: Incomprehensible

choices: Draws a huge planet from its body
15412.content:
You suddenly become very angry at the dragon/universe. "You only brought me here because you were lonely? How can you be so selfish?"

"Well, I don't really have much of a choice but to be selfish. It's not like there's anything else other than me," replied the universe, looking a bit hurt.

"Well, what about my life?", you shout. "I have a family and friends back on Earth, and I have a part time job, and..."

"Whoa, whoa, slow down there, human, I'm aware of your everyday life. You don't have to worry about them, because now that your not in me, you don't have to abide by my laws."

You are confused, you weren't aware of such laws. "What laws are you talking about?"

"You know, the laws of physics. Time doesn't really mean anything out here, so you won't really be gone from your life from anyone else's point of view. You should have realized that when you thought you were going faster than the speed of light earlier, because speed doesn't have any meaning here either."

You brain is throbbing from all of this information. You take a deep breath, and try to calm down, which is very hard when a universe-sized dragon is staring at you. "Okay, I think I understand that you set this up so my life doesn't get messed up. But why me? I mean, there's six and a half billion others like me, and probably many other intelligent life forms all over you!"

The orange dragon turned slightly red. "Well, you seemed kind of nice..."

You look back at the huge, huge dragon, and for the first time you do not see an all powerful being or the congregation of all matter. You just see a shy being who only wants some company. "Listen, universe, I'm sorry if I hurt your feelings. I guess I should be a bit more thankful that you provided me with a place to live in the first place."

"Gee, thats nice of you, human," replies the universe, returning a million parsec smile. You suddenly see a massive orange wall appear before you, and then touch your body. You try to hug the tip of the forefinger as best as you can, but all you can really do is lie flat upon it face down. The surface radiates a great deal of warmth as you are drawn closer to the universe's looming orange head.

"Say, human, I have an idea." The universe closes its eyes and concentrates intensely before it...
15412.title: One is the Loneliest Number

154121.content:
There is a bright flash, and you find yourself in your own bed, in your own house.

"Hmmm," you think to yourself, "what a weird dream."

You walk downstairs, and are surprised no one is here.

"Mom?Dad?" you shout, but there is no answer.

You go outside, and a huge sight fills your vision.The big orange dragon, who you know as the universe, had parked his huge butt in your driveway. Though much smaller
than he was before, He still towered over your house, even sitting down!

"Hey, little man.Thought I'd pay you a visit." He chuckled, then reached down and deposited you on his big belly."I thoughtsince you missed home so much, we could visit it together!" He gave you a giant grin.

"Wow." you said. He talked about cool powers but this was amazing!"OK.What do you want to see?"

He thinks for a moment, then says," Let's see...
154121.title: Tour time with a big dragon

choices: He asks if he could try food
1541212.content:
"How bout you show me downtown?"he asks, eyes wide in anticipation."I've always wanted to see a human city with my own eyes."

How could you say no?He seemed gentle enough, and besides, he probably couldn't hurt anyone."OK!" you say, happy for him.This is the first time he's gotten out since...ever!

He smiles, gives you a giant hug, then stands up, revealing the butt-shaped crater in the pavement."Oops."he chuckles, embarrassed."I'll have to fix that later." He begins to walk towards downtown, his footfalls causing small earthquakes.Every now and then, he stops to examine a house.

"You humans live in here?"he said, as he picked up a house and peeked inside."Seems kinda cramped."Screams eminated from the displaced house, and the universe set the house back down as a woman stepped onto her porch to see what lifted her hom. Her jaw dropped at the sight of the big orange dragon.He just smiled and said, "Sorry.I was just looking." He walked off, leaving her staring.

He stepped over houses and cars, and finally reached downtown. His giant form was nearly as wide as the street, and he found it had to walk through the mess of cars and screaming people.

"Wow.Are people always this afraid?" he asks, confused that everyone was scared of him.Was he really this terrifing?

"Well," you say, hoping to cheer him up."Things as big as you are kinda scary at first.Maybe you could convince them you're a good guy."

He seemed to brighten up, and asked questions about the structures.He once again parked himself where he was, his huge rear crushing four abandoned cars, and his gut making a dent in an apartment building.He winced.

"I'm really causing a lot of damage. I should be more careful."he said as he picked up a car to examine it.Then...
1541212.title: downtown

choices: are confused, but don't run away
15412122.content:
"Well, I've never eaten anything.Could you show me where I could get some food?"he asked, rubbing his belly in anticipation.

"Sure."you answer,"I think there's enough food at the grocery store."The universe's eyes light up, and he smiles as he presses your body into his gut.He seems really affectionate!

"Thanks! You're the best!"he booms cheerfully.He holds out his hand, and you climb into it. He stands up, and his belly hits the building he just scraped, crumbling it to pieces.You're lucky everyone already left. "Was I always this much of a klutz?" he wonders as he walks away.You laugh and try to encourage him.

"I suppose you've never really had to control your body movements."you say, directing him through the streets.You watch as his broad foot almost hits a bus.

"True,"he replies,"but that doesn't matter.I'm still breaking a lot of you guys' stuff. That kinda makes me scary."He carefully steps through a park, his feet narrowly missing playground equitment. Children stare up at the giant plump dragon, and he smiles back, announcing "Don't worry.I'm just passing through."

He asks you another question."Some of those human's back there didn't seem afraid of me.Why?"

"Well,"you think aloud,"they were only 4 or 5 years old.They probably didn't see you as a big scary monster."

"Really?" The universe stops, thinking."Maybe they could help convince everyone else. If they aren't afraid, maybe others won't be, either."He gives a hearty chuckle that echos through the suburbs."I guess I'm not so bad after all!"he says, bounding towards the now visible grocery store.

He approaches from the back, and stares at the white-painted building."So,"he says, confused,"how do I go in?I'm way too big for the door.I'm taller than the whole store!"

"Well,"you offer, "I could go in, and explain the problem.Once they see you, I'm sure they'll help feed you."You're sure that the people in the store will at least abandon it once they see the universe.Maybe the universe could persuade them to help him do other stuff, too!

"OK.How should I 'make my apperance'?"he asked."The only way I'm visible to the whole store is if I tear the roof off."You tell him to do so, seeing that there was no other way to do this.

He grips the roof, and gently lifts it, placing it on the ground.People inside are shocked at the sight of him, but before anyone can scream, the universe calmly explains."Don't be afraid.I just heard they're was food here, so I thought I'd eat something.Anything is fine.Sorry about the roof.I didn't know how I'd be able to tell you all."

The people in the store...
15412122.title: He asks if he could try food

154121221.content:
The people stare, silenced at the crazy sight.Did this huge monster actually just speak to them?One man tried to reply.

"Uhhh...yeah.You,uh,need food?"he started, very nevous.The universe chuckled at the fear in his voice.


"Don't worry! I'm not gonna hurt anyone."he assured them, smiling."I was just wondering if you had some spare food I could eat."The silience continued for a moment, then the man said,"I...guess I could spare some of these cans of soup."He held them up to the universe, who thanked him profusly.

One by one, others began to give him their spare food. Soon, the universe had a whole pile of assorted foods.He turned to the shoppers.

"Thanks again."he said gratefully as he set the roof back on the building.He then asked you, "How'd I do?" You smiled up at him.

"Great!" you reply."I think you convinced them you're not a bad guy."

"Really?Cool!" the universe says triumphantly."Now, about the food..." He begins to eat, literally pouring food into his mouth.Each new food tasted so different, so great!When he finished, his belly had gotten a bit wider.

"That was...."he trailed off, searching for the right word.

"Delicious?" you offer.

"Yes!That was delicious!" he says as he pats his belly."I haven't had a meal like that since..ever!" You smile as he enjoys something you find commonplace.

Then, he gets a bloated look on his face."Universe?" you ask, uncertain as to what is going on.His cheeks puff out, and he holds air in for the longest time.Then, his mouth open, and-

UUUURRRRRRPPPP!

A great windy belch came from his gaping maw.When it was finished, you both look at each other, then burst into laughter.

You two then decide to...
154121221.title: His first meal

1542.content:
Your eyes weakly and slowly flutter open, and you are met with an impenetrable wall of white. You blink and the stubborn colour begins to fade from your vision, but given the at which rate it is doing, it will most likely be several minutes before you have regained your sight. Bored and confused, you turn your attention to the material you are lying on.

It definitely wasn't your bed. Beds don't feel rubbery and aren't this warm. Beds don't emit faint squeaking noises whenever you roll over on them. So, you weren't in your bedroom, and you were lying on what seemed to be a sheet of rubber of an indeterminate size. Making a mental note to visit a doctor once this bizarre hallucination finished you elect to simply lie back down on the strange, If admittedly warm and somewhat inviting, surface.

Eventually the white fades and gives way to an unnatural grey. You have a hand in front of your eyes and confirm that your vision has indeed returned. Before you can think about the implications of a seemingly infinite grey plane a loud, recognisably female voice from an extremely high point jubilantly cries out, "Oh, good, you're awake!" prompting you to look upward and receive the biggest shock of your life as you look straight into the face of a multi-thousand mile tall...
1542.title: Greyscale

choices: Wait for a bit and then ask the questions.
15421.content:
You irises quickly shrink to pinpricks as you stare into the face of a several thousand mile tall, if not taller, anthropomorphic dolphin. Her face shifts into a frown as your brain seizes up, unsure of what to do, and asks you, "Are you okay, little guy?" in a caring tone of voice. You, however, reel backwards as if struck, and begin to edge away from her huge face, your mind not registering the fact that you were currently sitting on top of the titanic cetacean.

Suddenly her face takes on a concerned and somewhat fearful expression as she barely whispers, "D-do you remember me?", to which you reply with a fearful shaking of your head, indicating a no. She begins to quietly sob, although due to the difference in scale between you it was nearly deafening to you. At a loss for options, and scared of what she could do if pushed for details in her current emotional state, you decide the best course of action is to lay down on her and hug her as best as you can.

You feel her crying slowly come to a halt, wondering why your amnesia could have prompted such a response. Had you been best friends? Brother and sister? Maybe even man and wife?

The anthro's crying comes to a halt and you feel somewhat self conscious as she looks at you in a sad way. With her emotional state more or less stable, you...
15421.title: Grey background, grey dolphin skin and grey moods.

154211.content:
"I'm sorry, but... Do you know who I am?" You ask timidly, fearing another outburst from the immeasurably large anthro. However, she simply strokes your back lightly with a single finger several miles wide (how she managed such a feat without powderising your body eludes you) and begins to explain.

" well... It's always just been you, and me. Just you, me, and the grey. We've been here for as long as I remember, which I'm pretty sure is forever. Every few years you would... Go to sleep for a few hours, and you would experience an entirely different reality. I looked in on your dreams from time to time, to see what those realities were like. Anyway, you'd wake up, and we'd spend the next few years talking about that reality. B-but, the last time you, f-fell asleep, you wouldn't wake up, and I had to look into your dream, and you had f-forgotten everything, and thought the d-dream was real..."

Wait, was she saying that... Everything you had ever know was a dream? How long had you been asleep?

Your mind, unable to comprehend the notion that everything you had ever known was a dream, kind of... Shuts down, and you lean over backwards onto her skin, pushing yourself into the rubbery material as you pull yourself into a fetal position, screwing your eyes shut.

You feel yourself being picked up by two of the anthro's fingers, and are rubbed, slowly and gently, into a different area of the anthro, which, unknown to you, was the bottlenose the dolphins in your dreams had inherited.

She places your curled form onto her massive breasts, which thrust outward from her torso, dominating most of it, and begins to stroke you again.

A small part of your mind that isn't breaking down thinks of a question to answer her when you come to terms with your existence...
154211.title: Ask her who you are.

155.content:
Paradox: In this world, not only are all of the anthros extremely large, they also all have omnipotent divine powers. However, these anthros have very odd, backwards beliefs. They see being huge and all-powerful as ordinary and nothing special, and see you, an insignificant powerless being, as their god. (Just imagine a world in which instead of all humans worshipping one god, all gods worship one human.)

'Average' World: In this world of mega-anthros, none of them act as if your microscopic size is anything special; they just treat you as an equal and don't even acknowledge the difference.
155.title: The Only Human: More Suggestions

choices: Climb and attempt to contact the brown furred anthro.
Climb and attempt to contact the white furred anthro.
Find a way off this bed and explore your current surroundings.
1551.content:
You're not entirely sure why, but just before you wake up you're sure all those giants were being very respectful towards you, almost as if you were a king... or perhaps something more.

Regardless you awake grogily, wondering where your pillow has got to as you fumble for your alarm clock, but your right hand merely feels the same texture under it no matter how far it stretches - the most comfortable bed you've ever felt, to be honest.

Hang on a tick, whats that noise you hear? Its certainly not your alarm clock.

You open your eyes to look about... only to find that you are definitely not in your regular room anymore. Certainly the ground beneath you feels like an extremely soft version of the bed you're used to, yet as you look about it stretches for what seems to be miles in two directions, ahead and behind. On either side of you however, you look up with trepidation at two huge mountains of equal length, oddly which look to have forrests growing all over them too.

Now you think of it, they look quite like....

You momentarily panic, and try to judge your surroundings. Squinting you can make out in the sky what looks to be a brown ceiling, and as you run down the odd surface alongside the two 'mountain ranges', you see what can only be said to be the biggest cave enterance you've ever seen, that is if caves were made of quilt and fine silks.

No use denying it any longer, particularly considering your recent dream. This 'cave' must actually be the edge of a vast bed cover on an equally massive bed in an enormous bed room. And if thats the case, these two 'mountains'...

You try to get an impression of who or what they are, but the pair of anthos are very big so its pretty tricky. The only thing you can tell down here is that one of them has white fur and the other brown. After a little more inspection you gather that the brown fured one on your left is lying on her back (or his,though if you are a king like in your dream you would certainly hope its a her) while the white one on your right is lying on her (or his side), their back exposed to you. Judging by your dream you would expect either of these two would be friendly if you were to try and contact them. One the other hand, you could be a bit more adventurous and scope the place out - besides, if this is your room you might as well take a look about your likely riches.
1551.title: The Mountains of Fur

15513.content:
You decide to try to get off the bed. After all you think the anthros are nice but what if you're wrong? You certainly don't want to think about that; and so you start your trek to the right edge of the bed.

The ground you were sleeping on might have been comfortable to lie down on, but walking's a different story. The surface is extremely plushy and you fall down every once in a while, tripping on the material as it engulfs your feet, at least the landings are soft. Your journey to the end of the mattress is not as easy as you thought it was going to be, but finally, after literally hours of nonstop walking you reach the end of your expedition. Despite the distance, you don't feel fatigued in the least.

The edge of your bed is a fascinating site as you gaze out into what is supposedly your bedroom, you see that it looks as if it were designed for a king! Large tapestries depicting you wearing majestic robes or glorious armor adorn the walls, furniture made of the finest quality materials and constructed with godly craftsmanship furnished the room in a most luxurious manor, the velvet carpet that covered the floor was woven with intricate, otherworldly patterns that were almost impossible to conceive by the human mind. You are so taken aback by the wonder this bedchamber that you involuntarily take a small step forward and lose your balance on the clumsy material of the mattress...
15513.title: Curiosity and slight Mistrust

choices: They think it is great that you were willing to explore on your own
They never want you to do anything without supervision again
155131.content:
"Ahhhhhhh!" you scream as begin to fall the hundreds of miles from the bed to the floor. You start to think this is the end and try to use the time you have left to come to grips with that. When suddenly your decent is stopped and you begin to float toward a brown rabbit woman lying down on the bed that is twirling her paw around as if making a sort of mystical gesture. After a few moments you land on her now waiting palm.

"Adventurous as ever hmm m' lord?" The gigantic lagomorph said as she smiled sweetly, "Thank your name that we brought you here from your dimension before something like this could happen there!" She had a strange mixture of worry and relief on face. You remain silent and just stare up in wonder at this beautiful, yet powerful anthro-girl as she began to pet you with a finger.

"How is he?" asks a different voice that sounds like it is coming from behind her.
"Oh, I think he is doing fine," says the rabbit still focusing on you, "just a little confused that's all."
"Yeah I think you're right." came the other voice again but this time it was directly to your left. You turn your head and see the face of a anthropomorphic arctic wolf who wasn't there just seconds before. How could she have gotten there without you noticing? "Of course it's only natural for one so powerless to take time to adjust to such a big change."
The wolf then speaks directly to you: "M' lord, I suppose we should explain what has transpired, but first I want to tell you what I think of what happened just now.,,"
155131.title: Protective? Or overly so?

choices: They show you around your palace
1551312.content:
"While I think it is cute that you decided to go on a little adventure I never want you to do it again ok?" The wolf says in a commanding voice, "I know we don't have the right to order you around m' lord, but it is for your own good that you don't do anything without an anthro watching you. Now I want you to say that you understand ok?"

"I...u-u-u-u..." You stutter not being able to form words at the sight of the enormous carnivore.

"Ruby," the wolf addresses the rabbit, "are you sure he's ok?"
"Yes, I think so," the 200 mile tall bunny-girl responds and then gets a very concerned look on her face, "I mean, we would just know if something happened to him right Vera?" Ruby looks seriously worried.
"Yeah I suppose we would... I think he's alright, maybe he's just a little scared." The great wolf gazes into your eyes and you feel a strange sort of warmth fill your entire being. It's as if you are feeling a pure aura of comfort and safety surrounding your very soul.
"It is ok m' lord, we would never hurt you. It is our purpose to protect and care for you for all eternity. Now can you please say something so we can stop worrying?" You are starting to feel safe around them now and you guess your dream was right.
"S-s-sure." As soon as you utter that word their faces immediately brighten up.

"Seems you're alright after all m' lord." says Ruby with a smile on her face.
"Now that you've gotten over your fear, lets tell you what is going on or would you rather us show you?"
1551312.title: Fragile Treasure

choices: Another God comes into the bedchamber
Vera and Ruby take you out to meet your public
15513122.content:
You sit there for several minutes, looking up at the gigantic faces of the two goddesses that seem to think very highly of you. By now you are positive you can trust them, and you're quite interested as to what they could tell you, so it's only natural that you say: "Um... Could you just tell me? I mean, I think a tour would be a bit to much to t-take in Ma'am..."
Ruby giggles a bit before bringing you closer to her immense face, "Of course m'lord. There's no need to be so nervous."
"Ruby's right," Vera chimed in, "it wouldn't be any trouble at all." the wolfess looks up at Ruby, "May I?"
"Oh, here" responds Ruby as she gently pinches you between two of her monolithic fingers and carefully places you on Vera's county-sized palm pad.

When Vera stands up, you are surprised gravity doesn't pin you to her pad, or at least knock the air out of your lungs. "That's because in this dimension, the laws of physics don't have to apply, if we don't want them too." says Ruby looking down at you with a warm smile. You give her a confused look and she begins to blush. "Sorry m'lord, I know you like your privacy but sometimes I can't help myself. Some interesting thoughts pass through that head of yours." Can they really read minds? "Of course we can, along with anything else you can think of.., and probably more."
"Alright Ruby, at least try to stay out of this mind." sighs Vera
"Fine..." the rabbit-girl says in a tone that suggests she's pouting.

"Now m'lord," begins Vera, "It's time you learned the truth about this universe. You see, at the very moment you were born, so were we, in a sense. Your sub-conscious mind, fueled by desires that your conscious mind would one day have, sent out tiny, undetectable signals that were able to sneak past the dimensional barrier and interact with small amounts of matter on the other side; matter, that would one day become us. Every second that passed in your universe, a millennium passed in ours, allowing our species to develop to well past your own before you were even old enough to speak. By the time you were five, we had already discovered the secret to infinite power and immortality, and we used that power to seek out the greatest questions in life, starting with our origins which just so happen to lead back to you m'lord. After this ground-breaking discovery we devoted our lives to you, our creator. We watched you grow, learned everything we could about you in order to make your eternal stay here as pleasant as possible, and protected you. Have you ever heard of guardian angels my lord?"
"Y-yes."
"Well you have better. For you m'lord, are responsible for creating the Gods."
15513122.title: Creating Gods

choices: "You may choose to experience the love of us three." She says sexily.
"Or you may see the Royal Council and assess your kingdom, sire."
155131221.content:
At that moment the enormous (well to you at any rate) doors swing open and you are stunned from your Wolf Palm perch to see a third goddess enter the chamber - this one happening to be a lioness with stunning golden hair across her body. Unlike the other two who are to all intents and purposes naked (though you'd admit with all that fine hair on their bodies it doesn't really matter), she is wearing a finely crafted crown on her head and on her back a flowing gown. She gazes down at you with a sweet and warm smile despite showing flashes of large sharp white teeth between those beautiful lips of hers and you get the nagging sensation that you know exactly who and what this latest titan is meant to be.

Her first words confirm as such. "Ah, good morning sweetie. Did you sleep well enough?"

Vera and Ruby bow slightly to the person of royalty as you try and figure it out, but Vera manages to speak up for you. "I'm afraid your majesty that our lord is but a tad confused and might have misplaced his memory."

You speak up to the new arrival. "Well er... I gather that you would probably be... my wife?"

"Not so confused as Vera says, my dear Speckie. May I?" Before you can respond the Wolf Giantess passess you carefully onto the waiting outstretched finger of the Queen. She explains at your vacant face. "Sorry, m'lord... 'Speckie' is my occasional nickname for you, sweet husband, after your little size, naturally. But don't think I rate you small in my heart, no matter how much you might have forgotten." She puts her huge finger with you on to her vast lips and you receive a large kiss before being returning to view by all three godesses. "Now, since you're a tad confused, perhaps I can answer your questions. "I am of course your wife, Queen Susannah, and togethr you and I rule over your expansive kingdom created by your wonderous imagination, of which we are all elternally grateful, my highness."

You relay your thoughts for a moment before a thought enters your head. "Erm... Lady Susannah?"

"Yes dear?"

"If we happen to be married, then what does that make ... er, Vera and Ruby here?

"Oh silly Speckie! They are your lovers of course!" She smirks at your surprise. "Just because we happen to be married doesn't mean I would deny you access to the rest of creations of beauty, sweet as it is for you to think so. Vera and Ruby as with several others keep you safe and perform... other duties at your command... when I am either absent... or just because you can." With a seducive look on her face she leans in toward you. "A speck you may be m'lord, but you are more than capable of keeping the ladies of your kingdom under your thrall in more ways than one."

She straightens up. "Now, the day is young and I think you have two options at your command, my dear..."
155131221.title: Benefits for a Speck

choices: We introduced you to your royal council"
1551312212.content:
"As much as the other option interests me..." You say slowly, hoping not to offend those present. Ruby giggles again after hearing that thought making Vera look at her. "I would rather learn more about this world."

"You always were an inquisitive one." Susannah chuckled making you relax as her heavenly voice flowed through the air. "Very well." She turned away with you still in her paw and you looked back to see Vera and Ruby now fully clothed walking behind her. Each of them smiling at you in a calming way. Although as she exited the room through the massive doors your vision was overtaken by the beauty of the architecture.

It twisted and bent in ways you couldn't hope to understand, you tried but it only ended up giving you a head ache. Two guards were standing by the door, clothed in majestic armour you could imagine would belong to a wealthy king and queen. They each parted as you were brought through them and looked at you with deep respect. The male seemed to be almost panther like while the other seemed more like a snake with her hypnotic eyes. How had you ever gotten the respect of such godly creatures? The thought brought a smile to your lips as you chuckled making them look at you.

"What is it my lord?" Vera asked, obviously trying her hardest not to peer into your mind.

"Just the fact that I'm so powerless and yet I seem to get so much respect." You say gazing at their titanic forms. Susannah grins, revealing her teeth which dwarfed you in stature.

"Well you were the one that graced us with such a plentiful world and great lives." She says simply as she strides through the amazing structure. The artwork on the walls captured your attention, It seemed to move with your perspective and you barely even noticed that you passed more of these anthros that bowed on their ways past. Everyone seemed to move with purpose here while you had none, it was a strange thought but one you quickly got over as you emerged into a continental chamber.

Its sheer size left you speechless, the towering spires were a work of art built straight into the walls. The roof flooded in a filtered blue light through the stained glass. Chairs were lined around a table which seemed to stretch off into the horizon. Susannah sat in the largest chair and let you gently drift onto the table. You noticed a beautiful high backed throne was next to you, although you're sure it wasn't there before. Ruby gives you wink as you look at it in confusion making you shrug and take a seat in the comfortable throne.

"Well my dear Speckie. I think it's time...
1551312212.title: Comprehension is non-existant

1552.content:
You were shaken from your slumber as the world around you shook time and time again. For a moment you believed an earthquake was coming before you noticed that there was a distinct pattern to the vibrations, like... footsteps. You just have enough time to notice that your bedroom has become extremely spacious, like you were living in a mansion.
